name: Ses01M_script02_2_M000
label: xxx
text: They're out there swimming right now...

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M001
label: exc
text: ...to this spot for this massive celebration of like sex and death...

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M002
label: exc
text: Look at this, my hairs are standing up my arm. I'm giving myself goose bumps.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F000
label: neu
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M003
label: exc
text: Well, so?  What do you think?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F001
label: xxx
text: About what?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M004
label: xxx
text: About what I was saying.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F002
label: fru
text: I think it's ridiculous.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M005
label: xxx
text: It certainly is not.  It's like slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F003
label: fru
text: It's a PR.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Somebody sold you a bill of goods that something amazing is going to happen on the beach.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: It's not just me, okay?  Look at like all the people.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F005
label: fru
text: They're all told the same thing.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F006
label: fru
text: Everybody is believes that it keeps them excited, you know it keeps them coming back for more.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F007
label: fru
text: Everybody keeps thinking that they can just find the right spot, you know they'll get it on the action.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: Their life will start then.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M007
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F009
label: fru
text: I'm sorry it still just fish to me.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M008
label: neu
text: Can I ask you a question?  Are you on your period?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F010
label: ang
text: Why do you ask me that?  God damn it, I told you not to ask me that I hate it when you ask me that. It's insulting.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M009
label: xxx
text: Okay, well then what's bugging you?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F011
label: ang
text: I just, we just have different ideas of what this evening is supposed to look like.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M010
label: fru
text: Is not supposed to like anything.  We come down here, we look at the fish, they arrive, we go woo-ah fish.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: Oh. Grow up Augie, the fish are not going to come.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M011
label: xxx
text: And then we go home and they go home.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F013
label: ang
text: Because they never do.  Do they, have they ever?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M013
label: neu
text: We missed them twice.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F014
label: ang
text: Twice is every year we've tried that's ever.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: Okay we'll see them this year, this is a much better spot. Trust me.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F015
label: ang
text: No we won't.  It's pointless it's like a waiting up to see Santa Claus.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F016
label: ang
text: I feel like my whole life is going to be spent here on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly, waiting for fish to show up and the fish never show.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M015
label: fru
text: Okay, I'm trying to work this backwards

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F017
label: fru
text: You don't understand anything I'm saying.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M016
label: fru
text: and figure out where we took a turn to the worst thing.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M017
label: fru
text: Of course not.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F018
label: xxx
text: I did want to see it I still do, I always do.  I keep thinking that this time will be the time but it just never is.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M018
label: fru
text: Okay.  I'm trying to work this backwards here and I'm trying to figure out the exact moment that you took a turn for the worst here, now.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M019
label: neu
text: you were fine during the phone call from Marge, dinner was okay, doing the dishes was fine.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M020
label: neu
text: Let's see, uh, I took a shower and, um, you were watching the news and you said the "the Grunions are running tonight," and I said "okay great, let's go."

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M021
label: neu
text: So I'm putting the animals out we're getting the car to the garage and--

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F019
label: neu
text: Do you remember the first year we came here? It's about four years ago right after we got married.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F020
label: xxx
text: We thought I was pregnant we had this bottle of champagne but no glasses.  You asked me to dance so we took off our shoes.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F021
label: xxx
text: While we were dancing you said the softest most intimate things to me, right into my ears so I could feel them much as hear them.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: And I remember thinking this is it. finally, finally I'm as happy as I'm supposed to be.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M022
label: neu
text: Wait a minute, I've got it.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F023
label: xxx
text: Dancing on the beach barefoot, drinking champagne from the bottle.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M023
label: neu
text: It was when we were driving passed that knickerbocker liquor locker and you would said, no you said "let's get some champagne" and I said "no time to wasting" or something like that.  That's what it is, right?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M024
label: xxx
text: You want this to be like the other times, right?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F024
label: sad
text: I'd rather not remember some things.  I'd rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M025
label: neu
text: Oh right sure, of course.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M026
label: xxx
text: Do you want to dance?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F025
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M027
label: neu
text: You want me to go get some champagne?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F026
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M028
label: neu
text: Do you want to take off our shoes?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F027
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M029
label: neu
text: What? Huh?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M030
label: neu
text: You want to get married again?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M031
label: fru
text: What?  What?  You want to divorce?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F028
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M032
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F029
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M033
label: ang
text: A new carpet, a poodle, a suicide pact, ice cream, a back rub, what?  What?  What the hell do you want?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F030
label: ang
text: I want something to turn out the way that it's supposed to.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M034
label: fru
text: Well, welcome to the human race.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M035
label: ang
text: You think nothing turns out how it's supposed to.  You think I had some grand idea going that four years down the line.  We would come to this beach and argue over fish?  No.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M036
label: xxx
text: You think there would be times when you'd look at me like I was used Kleenex and then I'd look at you and think "Holy hell when is the next flight to Alaska."

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M037
label: sad
text: No, no I'm just like you, I thought it was going to be all rosy cheeks and the bills would pay themselves and fish will always come and--

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M038
label: sad
text: No.  You know what you get?  You know what you get?  You get this.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F031
label: ang
text: This what?  What is this?  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M039
label: neu
text: Yeah, it is.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F032
label: ang
text: Oh, sure this is standing on the beach, this is waiting, fighting.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M040
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F033
label: sad
text: This isn't anything like I thought anything would be.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M041
label: sad
text: I know me neither.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F034
label: sad
text: This is just this.  I mean it includes a lot and everything but it's--do you understand what I'm saying?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M042
label: sad
text: I'm doing the best I can.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F035
label: sad
text: I know that Augie, I really do.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F036
label: sad
text: I just can't help wishing that I was somebody, somewhere else.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M043
label: sad
text: Maybe if you were with somebody else too?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F037
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M044
label: sad
text: No, I know but--I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F038
label: sur
text: Are you kidding me?  For heaven sake Augie anything I'm doing I'd rather be doing it with you.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M045
label: sad
text: Yeah?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F039
label: sur
text: Yes, don't be ridiculous.  Don't you know that?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F040
label: sad
text: You are the one who probably wishes he was with somebody else, someone who didn't take everything so seriously, someone who would enjoy yourself.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M046
label: xxx
text: Actually, you know what?  Now you mentioned that--no I don't.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F041
label: xxx
text: So maybe we're in the wrong spot.  But we're with the right person.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M047
label: xxx
text: I don't know, just seemed like such a good spot to me.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M048
label: xxx
text: We do have really good view of the moon from here though.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F042
label: xxx
text: Oh I saw that.  Pretty isn't it. Big ol' white moon.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M049
label: hap
text: Look what we got here.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F043
label: xxx
text: Augie, you brought refreshments.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M050
label: neu
text: It's not champagne.

label: hap
text: I guess we don't need glasses.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M051
label: neu
text: Are you cold, huh?  Do you want to go home?

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F045
label: hap
text: I'm beginning to think you might be right.  I think this might be the spot after all.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F046
label: sad
text: Augie, I'm sorry.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M052
label: hap
text: Shh...

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M053
label: hap
text: If we are really quiet, the fish might come.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_F047
label: neu
text: Or not.

name: Ses01M_script02_2_M054
label: neu
text: Or not.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M000
label: xxx
text: What time is it?  I think it's supposed to run around midnight, right?  God, this is great, isn't it, Carla?  Look at this night we got here, huh.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M001
label: xxx
text: Actually I want to get a little further up the coast, get away from all like the lights and the people, but...  How are you doing?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F000
label: neu
text: Fine.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M002
label: exc
text: Okay.  Is that, is that--

text: No.  That's just foam.  I don't know.  I can't tell.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F001
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M004
label: xxx
text: I don't know, probably if you can't tell, though, it's probably not them, right?  It's probably going to be like this unmistakable thing, right?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M005
label: xxx
text: Oh no.  you know what I forgot?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F002
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M006
label: xxx
text: My flashlight.  God, how could I be so stupid?  I can't believe I forgot my flashlight.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F003
label: sur
text: What flashlight?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M007
label: neu
text: The flashlight, the silver one.  There's only one, isn't there?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F004
label: neu
text: That's not your flashlight.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M008
label: neu
text: Whose is it?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F005
label: xxx
text: It's ours; it's my flashlight too.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M009
label: neu
text: Oh...well. Yeah, of course.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F006
label: ang
text: You keep saying my flashlight like it's just yours.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M010
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F007
label: ang
text: How's that supposed to make me feel?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M011
label: neu
text: Of course, our flashlight.  What's yours is mine.  Me flashlight es su flashlight.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M012
label: fru
text: Naturally.  God, how could we not think to bring it?  I hope the moon stays out, though.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M013
label: neu
text: Do they always run during a full moon?  I don't remember.  Was it full last year?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F008
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M014
label: neu
text: Huh.  Are you cold?  Do you want my jacket?  No?  you know, we should have brought the blanket?  Our blanket.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M015
label: neu
text: Aw.  Do you know, I should have brought a six pack, too.  A six pack, that would be just the ticket right about now.  Huh?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M016
label: exc
text: God, I'm so excited, I'm like a kid.  I can't believe I got out of the house with my fly zipped up.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F009
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M017
label: xxx
text: I wonder if they can hear me talk or like feel the vibrations in the sand when we move around.

text: I'm cold.

text: Do you want my jacket?

text: It's after eleven, let's go.

label: xxx
text: What?  We just got here.  What's the point of coming all the way down here if we just turn around and go home?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F012

text: There is no point.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M020
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F013

text: That's my point.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M021
label: neu

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F014
label: fru
text: Well, then let's go.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M022
label: fru
text: No, no.  Okay.  That's not my point.  My point is there is no point in coming down here if we just turn around and go home.  Don't you want to see it?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F015
label: neu
text: Not particularly.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M023
label: neu
text: Why not?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F016
label: xxx
text: I just don't.  It's stupid.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M024
label: neu
text: Honey, this is like a natural phenomenon. I mean... People in Kansas would have to get plane reservations and get hotel rooms to see this.  It's just forty minutes away for us; it's too good to pass up.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F017
label: fru
text: Pass what up?  I mean these fish swim out of the ocean, they flop around on the beach, they swim away and then they die.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M025
label: neu
text: Yeah.  But this..this moment on the beach is like the highlight of their little lives.  All that flopping around is laying eggs or what to do - spawning or mating or whatever.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M026
label: neu
text: This is a big night for these little guys.  It's like life's last orgy.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F018
label: xxx
text: I don't see why you're so excited; this isn't a freaking moon landing we are talking about.  It's fish.  It's a fish nobody even eats.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M027
label: fru
text: Yeah they do.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F019
label: fru
text: Oh Augie

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M028

text: okay... well, Whatever.  But it's a fish who do something no other fish do.  It's like those swallows returning to Capistrano or like those lemmings that throw themselves off the cliffs.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M029
label: neu
text: There's like mystery here, there's magic.  It's like a little bit of the unexplainable.  I just can't see how you're not interested.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F020
label: xxx
text: I'm just not.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M030
label: sur
text: For real?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F021
label: fru
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M031
label: neu
text: God, I don't get it.  you know the first time we came here, you said it was the best night of your life?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M032
label: neu
text: And last year, I remember distinctly you said, you were so excited to get here that you don't remember you stubbed your toe until we were in the car.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F022
label: xxx
text: Last time, you'll also remember, we got our shoes wet, I got sand in my panties, you got a sore throat and we got into a big fight and we did not see the grunions.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M033
label: neu
text: Ahh...we weren't in a good spot.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F023
label: fru
text: Hmm.  We didn't see them the year before either.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M034
label: neu
text: We just weren't in a good spot.  I'm telling you, this is a much better spot.  I have instincts for these things.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M035
label: exc
text: Look there, see?  What's that?  No, that's - that's just seaweed.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M036
label: hap
text: God, this is great.  Think about this.  I know you are not interested, but just think about this.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M037
label: xxx
text: Right now out there, there is this mass of silver fish and it's heading this way.  No one sent them an invitation, no one told them, no one even gave them a map.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M038
label: exc
text: Just all at once, they turned and they formed this line as long as the California coast.  And some instinctual little firecracker went off in their bodies and they all just turned as one and started swimming.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M039
label: xxx
text: They are swimming right now.  They are swimming as if that is the only thing that matters to them.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M040
label: exc
text: It's single mindedness with no mind.  It is urgency that is just pure urge.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M041
label: xxx
text: And they are swimming right now to this very point where we stand for this huge celebration of sex and death.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M042
label: xxx
text: Oh look.  I'm giving myself goose bumps, my hairs are standing up on my arm.

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F024
label: neu
text: That's the wind.

label: hap
text: So what do you think?

name: Ses01F_script02_1_F025
label: neu

name: Ses01F_script02_1_M044
label: hap
text: About all of that, about all I was talking about.

text: You okay?

text: Yeah, I'm just-- yeah

text: What's happened?

label: sad

name: Ses01M_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: [BREATHING] Umm.

name: Ses01M_impro06_M004
label: sad
text: God I've told this story so many times. Umm.

name: Ses01M_impro06_F002
label: neu
text: You don't have to if you don't want to.

label: sad
text: I just...I just basically lost someone that was really close to me.

label: sad
text: And I've kind of been dealing with all of the...the stuff, you know the hospital and people work because...

label: sad
text: He kind of didn't have anyone to take care of that for him, so--

text: You've been taking care of it all?

label: sad
text: Oh Jesus.

label: sad
text: So weird you know that like one days it's like you know sounds so stupid but like one day someone's here. And like next day you know they're not here and it just kind of makes you like think about like life and mortality and like that kind of stuff.  You just like used to take for granted--you know.

name: Ses01M_impro06_F014

text: Mmhmm.

text: Lock

text: The plans you make [GARBAGE].

name: Ses01M_impro06_M018

text: Exactly, you know, and like he had so many plans and he was going to do...

name: Ses01M_impro06_F018
label: neu
text: It leaves a hole for you too.

name: Ses01M_impro06_M019
label: sad
text: so many things, you know?

name: Ses01M_impro06_F019

text: It leaves a hole for you too, in your plans together.

text: What?

name: Ses01M_impro06_M021
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro06_F020

text: It gets better.

name: Ses01M_impro06_M022

text: He was a really, really good guy.

name: Ses01M_impro06_F021
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01M_impro06_M023

name: Ses01M_impro06_F022

text: MMhmm.

name: Ses01M_impro06_M024

text: You know, it's like affecting a lot of people it's not just me, you know?

text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01M_impro06_M026

name: Ses01M_impro06_F025

name: Ses01M_impro06_F026

name: Ses01M_impro06_M028

name: Ses01M_impro06_F027

text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M000
label: exc
text: The craziest thing just happened to me.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F000
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M001
label: exc
text: This girl; she just offered me fifty thousand dollars to marry her.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F001
label: sur
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_impro03_M002
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F002
label: exc
text: Why?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M003
label: neu
text: Well, she's not a citizen so she wants to get a visa.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F003
label: exc
text: Is she on the run?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M004
label: exc
text: No, no, no, no, no, no she just... she's not a citizen but she wants her visa, yeah. She's going to pay me fifty thousand dollars to marry her and stay married to her for two years.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F004
label: exc
text: Oh, she just needs to marry you.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F005
label: exc
text: That's incredible. That's awesome. Where's she from?  Maybe you can get a dual citizenship.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M005
label: exc
text: That's like twenty five thousand dollar a year for doing nothing. Isn't that awesome?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M006
label: neu
text: She's actually from England, I think.  Well she- she spoke English but she had an accent. I didn't even ask.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F006
label: exc
text: That's so cool. Uh huh.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F007
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER] Why did she pick you? Where were you?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M007
label: exc
text: Fifty thousand dollars. Fifty thousand dollars. I was just out... I just... she's - well, she's a friend of friend but like...

name: Ses01M_impro03_F008
label: exc
text: You were at a party? And she's like hey. You seem unattached she's like.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M008
label: exc
text: Yeah.  Can you believe that? Yeah, she's like hey, I'm like sure I'll do it, I don't care. Yeah. I'm like fifty thousand dollars, I'd totally do it for fifty thousand dollars. But the only thing is that's kind of like illegal. So like I could go to jail probably for a long if I get caught, but...

name: Ses01M_impro03_F009
label: exc
text: That's unbelievable... Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F010
label: exc
text: Well I've known people who have done this before. Yeah.  You just- it's really fun actually 'cause you have like a fake engagement party and all your friends come over and like...

name: Ses01M_impro03_M009
label: xxx
text: Have you?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M010
label: exc
text: It's like I'm really going to get married. We'll have like the whole thing.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M011
label: exc
text: Oh, good. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_impro03_F011
label: exc
text: Yeah. Yeah. And then yeah, and then you know like you could like you could do like like sock her for a lot of money

name: Ses01M_impro03_M012
label: exc
text: I know. What do you think I should-

name: Ses01M_impro03_F012
label: exc
text: Like make her rent the apartment that you two have to live together in, you know. And you won't pay any rent or you pay like, a hundred bucks a month or something.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M013
label: exc
text: Oh good idea.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M014
label: neu
text: Yeah.  Make her like open the bank account and stuff too.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F013
label: exc
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M015
label: exc
text: It's a good idea.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F014
label: exc
text: Dude, you lucked out.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M016
label: exc
text: I know.  Also I get to like plan the wedding now too. That will be fun.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F015
label: exc
text: Yeah.  My colors are blush and beige what is it, do you know?

name: Ses01M_impro03_M017
label: exc
text: Something blue, something new, something... no I don't know. [LAUGHTER] So yeah, wonder if she's going to pay me up front but do you think it's bad though, do you think they're going to like track the money or something?

name: Ses01M_impro03_F016
label: exc
text: Oh I don't know. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_impro03_F017
label: neu
text: I don't know get it in cash.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M018
label: neu
text: Just cash hardcore.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F018
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M019
label: exc
text: What should we do?  Where should we get married? We should have party.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F019
label: exc
text: How exciting. You should have a wedding on the beach.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M020
label: exc
text: Yeah, like a big like- A wedding on the beach, that would be nice.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F020
label: exc
text: Yeah, at night.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M021
label: neu
text: And then we can honeymoon.  I want to go tropical though like Bahamas- --or like Tahiti or something. I just want to like beach and like drink.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F021
label: neu
text: Oh yeah, absolutely, absolutely.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F022
label: exc
text: How exciting.  You should make her bring all your friends too.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M022
label: exc
text: I'll make her pay for that.  I hear she's like totally wealthy. She's like royalty- --or something like and- --whatever like removed or something but yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F023
label: exc
text: [GARBAGE] She's got to be loaded.  fifty thousand dollars.  That's incredible.

name: Ses01M_impro03_F024
label: exc
text: Incredible.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M023
label: exc
text: I'm going to marry a blue blood. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_impro03_F025
label: exc
text: you're a lucky, lucky, lucky man.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M024
label: exc
text: Will you help me plan?

name: Ses01M_impro03_F026
label: exc
text: Oh, totally. Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro03_M025
label: xxx
text: Good.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M000
label: fea
text: Good God.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F000
label: fea
text: Is it them?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M001
label: fea
text: I wonder.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F001
label: fea
text: Freda is the only one who knows we are here.  She wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M002
label: fea
text: It must be them then.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F002
label: fea
text: It had to happen sooner or later.  What are we going to do?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M003
label: fea
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M004
label: xxx
text: We are okay, aren't we darling?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F003
label: xxx
text: Now and always, sweet.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M005
label: exc
text: I don't care then.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F004
label: xxx
text: It had to happen sooner or later.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M006
label: xxx
text: Hello?  Hello?  I'm sorry, what's that?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M007
label: hap
text: No.  Wrong number. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F005
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] That sent shivers up my spine.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M008
label: hap
text: What shall we do if they suddenly walk in on us.[LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F006
label: exc
text: We'll behave exquisitely.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M009
label: hap
text: With perfect poise.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F007
label: exc
text: I think I shall do a curtsy.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M010
label: hap
text: It's strange; things that ought to matter dreadfully, they just don't matter at all when one's happy.  Do they?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F008
label: xxx
text: Hmm.  The pity is that one can't stay happy.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M011
label: xxx
text: Darling, don't say that.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F009
label: xxx
text: It's true.  I think the whole thing's a cruel joke.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M012
label: xxx
text: What?  This beautiful and sacred thing - love?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F010
label: hap
text: Yes.  Meaning just that.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M013
label: hap
text: Well what does it all mean?  That's what I ask myself in my quest for ultimate truth.  Dear God, what does it all mean?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F011
label: hap
text: Don't laugh at me.  I'm being serious.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Oh darling, you mustn't be serious.  It's just what they want.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F012
label: exc
text: Who's they?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M015
label: xxx
text: All of those futile moralists who make life unbearable.  You have to laugh at them, be flippant.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M016
label: xxx
text: You know, flippancy brings out the acid in their darned, light and sweetness.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F013
label: xxx
text: you know if I laugh at everything then I must laugh at us, too.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M017
label: xxx
text: Oh of course.  We are figures of fun.  All right.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F014
label: xxx
text: How long with it last, this ludicrous overbearing love of ours?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M018
label: hap
text: Who knows?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F015
label: xxx
text: Shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M019
label: xxx
text: Oh no.  That fire will fade along with our passion.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Oh dear, should we like that?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M020
label: xxx
text: Well it depends on how well we've played.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F017
label: xxx
text: What happens if one of us dies?  Does the other one still laugh?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M021
label: exc
text: Yes.  Yes with all of his might.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Well that's serious enough, isn't it?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M022
label: xxx
text: No, no, no, no. no.  Death is a very laughable thing.  It's a cunning little mystery, it's all done with mirrors.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F019
label: xxx
text: I think you are talking nonsense.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: Oh.  So is everyone, in the long run.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M024
label: exc
text: Let's be superficial, and just pity those poor philosophers, huh?  Let's blow trumpets and squeakers and enjoy the party for as long as we can, you know, like small, idiotic school children.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F020
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M025
label: hap
text: Oh Come and kiss me darling before your body rots and worms pop out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F021
label: hap
text: Oh Elliott, worms don't pop.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M026
label: hap
text: Oh See, I don't care what you do, see.  You can paint yourself green and run naked through the Place Vendome and run off with all of the men of the world.  I shan't say a word, just as long as you love me best.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F022
label: hap
text: Aw.  Thank you, darling.  The same applies to you too, except that if you so much as look at another woman I'll kill you.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M027
label: xxx
text: Do you remember that awful scene we had in Venice?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F023
label: xxx
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M028
label: xxx
text: The one where you put that tiny painted wooden snake in my bed.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F024
label: exc
text: Oh Charles, that was his name.  He did wiggle so beautifully.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M029
label: xxx
text: [GARBAGE]

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M030
label: dis
text: It was a terrible thing.  I hated it.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F025
label: xxx
text: I know you did.  You threw him out the window into the Grand Canal.  I'll never forgive you for that.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M031
label: xxx
text: How long did that row last?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F026
label: xxx
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M032
label: xxx
text: Uh huh.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M033
label: xxx
text: But the worst one was in Cannes when your curling irons burnt a hole in my new dressing gown.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F027
label: xxx
text: Oh And it burnt my comb, too, and all of those towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M034
label: hap
text: That was a rouser, wasn't it?

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F028
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] That was the first time you hit me.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M035
label: xxx
text: I did not hit you very hard.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F029
label: hap
text: The manager came in, he found us rolling about the floor, biting and scratching like panthers. [LAUGHTER]  How utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M036
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] I'll never forget his face. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M037
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] We were very much younger then.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F030
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] And very much sillier.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_M038
label: xxx
text: However I believe the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses01F_script03_1_F031
label: xxx
text: Oh.  You knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F000
label: fru
text: What's he going to say?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F001
label: xxx
text: Maybe we should tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M000
label: neu
text: He saw it.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F002
label: sur
text: How could he see it?  I was the first one up; he was still in bed.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M001
label: neu
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M002
label: neu
text: Four o clock this morning.  I heard a crack and I woke up and looked out.  He was standing right over there when it cracked.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F004
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four o clock in the morning?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M003
label: neu
text: I don't know.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F005
label: neu
text: He's dreaming of him again, walking around.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M004
label: neu
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F006
label: xxx
text: It's getting to be just like after he died.  What's the meaning of that?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M005
label: fru
text: I don't know the meaning of it.  But I know one thing, Mom, you've made a terrible mistake with father.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F007
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M006
label: xxx
text: Being dishonest with him, you know.  This kind of thing always pays off and it's paying off.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What do you mean dishonest?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M007
label: neu
text: You know Larry is not coming back and I know it.  Why do we allow him to go on thinking that we believe with him?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F009
label: fru
text: What do you want to do?  Argue with him?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M008
label: fru
text: I don't want to argue but it's time he realized that nobody believes Larry is alive.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M009
label: fru
text: You know?  Why shouldn't he walk the nights thinking of him, dreaming of him?   Do we contradict him?  Do we say, we don't have any hope anymore?  That we haven't had any hope for years now?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F010
label: fru
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M010
label: neu
text: We've got to say it to him.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F011
label: fru
text: Where's the proof?  Do you have any proof?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M011
label: fru
text: For God's sake, three years?  Nobody comes back after three years; that's insane.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F012
label: fru
text: To you it is, to me it is, but to your father, you can talk yourself until you are blue in the face.  But there is no grave and there is no body, so where are you?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M012
label: neu
text: Sit down, Mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F013
label: xxx
text: It's that the trouble is those God damn newspapers.  Every month some new boy comes back and so the next one is going to be Larry, they just--

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M013
label: fru
text: All right, all right, all right.  You know why I asked Annie here, right?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F014
label: fru
text: Why?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M014
label: neu
text: You know.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F015
label: neu
text: Well I got an idea, but what's your story?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M015
label: neu
text: I'm going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Well that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M016
label: neu
text: You know it's not just my business.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Well what do you want me to do?  You're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: So all right then, I'll just go ahead with it?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Well you want to make sure that your father is not going to --

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M018
label: fru
text: Then it's not just my business.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F019
label: xxx
text: I'm just saying.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M019
label: ang
text: You know sometimes you infuriate me.  you know that?  Isn't it your business if I tell father and he throws a fit about it?  God, you have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Oh.  I ignore what I got to ignore.  That girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M020
label: fru
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F021
label: fru
text: From your father's point of view, he is not dead and- Chris he still thinks he's still alive.  The girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F022
label: fru
text: Now you can go on from there if you know where to go, but I'm telling you, I don't know where to go.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M021
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is, but every time I reach out for something I have to pull back because I am afraid other people will suffer. My whole bloody life, time after time.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F023
label: fru
text: You're a considerate fellow, there's nothing wrong in that.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M022
label: fru
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F024
label: fru
text: I just don't see why.  Have you asked Annie yet?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M023
label: neu
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F025
label: fru
text: Well how do you know she's going to marry you?  Maybe she feels the same way your father does.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M024
label: neu
text: Well if she does, then that's it.  That's the end of it.  From her letters, though, I think she's pretty much forgotten him.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M025
label: neu
text: And then we'll thrash it out with father.  Okay Mom?  Don't avoid me.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F026
label: fru
text: The trouble is you don't see enough women.  You never did.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M026
label: fru
text: So what.  I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F027
label: fru
text: Why does it have to be Annie?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M027
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F028
label: fru
text: Oh that's a great reason.  It's no reason at all.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M028
label: fru
text: I don't know.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F029
label: fru
text: You haven't seen her since you went away to war, it's been five years.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M029
label: fru
text: I can't help it, I know her best.  I was brought up next door to her, you know?  These years when I think of someone for my wife, I think of Annie.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M030
label: fru
text: Mom, what do you want?  A diagram?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F030
label: fru
text: I don't want a diagram.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F031
label: fru
text: He thinks he's coming back Chris.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F032
label: fru
text: You marry that girl, you are pronouncing him dead...

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F033
label: fru
text: ...and then what's that going to do to your father?  Do you know?  I don't.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M031
label: fru
text: All right, then, Mom. [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F034
label: neu
text: Just give it some more thought.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M032
label: fru
text: I've given it three years of thought.  And I'd hope that if I waited, father would forget about Larry and then we could just have a regular wedding and everyone would be happy.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M033
label: fru
text: But if I can't do that here, I may have to go somewhere else.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F035
label: ang
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M034
label: neu
text: I'll get out.  I'll get married and I'll move somewhere else, maybe New York.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F036
label: xxx
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M035
label: fru
text: I've been a good son for too long, a good sucker.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F037
label: ang
text: You have a business here.  What the hell is this?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M036
label: fru
text: The business?  The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F038
label: ang
text: Oh.  Must you be inspired?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M037
label: fru
text: Yes.  I like it for an hour a day.  I don't care if I have to grub for money all day long, when I come home I want it happy.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M038
label: fru
text: I want some kids, I want a family, I want somebody that I can give myself to and Annie is in the center of that.  Now it's just where to find it.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F039
label: fru
text: You mean to tell me that you would leave the business over this?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M039
label: neu
text: On this, I would.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F040
label: fru
text: Well you don't want to think like that.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M040
label: neu
text: Then help me stay here.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F041
label: ang
text: All right.  But you don't want to think like that because what the hell are we working for, Chris?  It's all for you.  This whole shooting match is for you.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M041
label: fru
text: I know that.  Then just help me stay here.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F042
label: ang
text: Just don't think like that.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M042
label: fru
text: Well I am thinking like that.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F043
label: fru
text: I don't understand you, do I?

name: Ses01F_script01_1_M043
label: fru
text: No.  You don't.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses01F_script01_1_F044
label: fru
text: I can see that.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F000
label: neu
text: Excuse me.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M000
label: fru
text: Do you have your forms?

name: Ses01F_impro01_F001
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M001
label: fru
text: Let me see them.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F002
label: neu
text: Is there a problem?

name: Ses01F_impro01_M002
label: fru
text: Who told you to get in this line?

name: Ses01F_impro01_F003
label: xxx
text: You did.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F004
label: xxx
text: You were standing at the beginning and you directed me.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M003
label: fru
text: Okay. But I didn't tell you to get in this line if you are filling out this particular form.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F005
label: neu
text: Well what's the problem?  Let me change it.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M004
label: fru
text: This form is a Z.X.four.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M005
label: fru
text: You can't--  This is not the line for Z.X.four.  If you're going to fill out the Z.X.four, you need to have a different form of ID.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: What?  I'm getting an ID.  This is why I'm here.  My wallet was stolen.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: No. I need another set of ID to prove this is actually you.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: How am I supposed to get an ID without an ID?  How does a person get an ID in the first place?

name: Ses01F_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: I don't know.  But I need an ID to pass this form along.  I can't just send it along without an ID.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F008
label: fru
text: I'm here to get an ID.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: No.  I need another ID, a separate one.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F009
label: fru
text: Like what?  Like a birth certificate?

name: Ses01F_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: A birth certificate, a passport...a student ID; didn't you go to school?  Anything?

name: Ses01F_impro01_F010
label: xxx
text: Who the hell has a birth certificate?

name: Ses01F_impro01_F011
label: fru
text: Yes but my wallet was stolen, I don't have anything.  I don't have any credit cards, I don't have my ID.  Don't you have things on file here?

name: Ses01F_impro01_M010
label: fru
text: Yeah.  We keep it on file, but we need an ID to access that file.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F012
label: ang
text: That's out of control.

name: Ses01F_impro01_M011
label: ang
text: I don't understand why this is so complicated for people when they get here.  It's just a simple form.  I just need an ID.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F013
label: fru
text: How long have you been working here?

name: Ses01F_impro01_M012
label: xxx
text: Actually too long.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F014
label: neu
text: Clearly.  You know, do you have like a supervisor or something?

name: Ses01F_impro01_M013
label: ang
text: Yeah.  Do you want to see my supervisor?  Huh? Yeah.  Do you want to see my supervisor?  Fine.  I'll be right back.

name: Ses01F_impro01_F015
label: fru
text: That would - I would appreciate that.  Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M000
label: neu
text: So what's up?  What's new?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F000
label: hap
text: Well Vegas was awesome.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M001
label: neu
text: Yeah.  I heard.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F001
label: hap
text: And, um, I got married.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M002
label: sur
text: Shut up.  No- in Vegas?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F002
label: hap
text: Yeah.  In the old town part.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M003
label: exc
text: Who did you marry?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F003
label: xxx
text: Chuck. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_impro03_M004
label: xxx
text: Did you propose to you?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F004
label: hap
text: Um- Yes.  It was very romantic.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F005
label: hap
text: It was at the slot machines.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M005
label: xxx
text: Oh.  The Wheel of Fortune slots?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F006
label: hap
text: Uhuh, uhuh.  He won big and he-and he realized that the only thing that would make it better was me as his bride.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M006
label: neu
text: He turned to you and was like...

name: Ses01F_impro03_F007
label: xxx
text: Hey.  Let's get married and I said okay.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M007
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] That's really romantic.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F008
label: hap
text: Yeah.  Well.  You know, because he's leaving the next day.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M008
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F009
label: hap
text: But we're going to have a honeymoon cruise.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M009
label: neu
text: Does that mean that you're going to get citizenship, too, in- in England or whatever?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F010
label: hap
text: Oh.  I hadn't even thought about that.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M010
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  Think about that.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F011
label: xxx
text: He's not going to be a citizen, though.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M011
label: neu
text: Yeah.  But he'll have like a long visa.  Can you go visit then for a long time?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F012
label: hap
text: Oh.  Totally.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M012
label: xxx
text: Oh, how are you going to do the long distance thing?  So wait, are you going to move there?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F013
label: hap
text: I guess I'll-  I guess I'll have an internet husband.[LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_impro03_M013
label: hap
text: Like you need another one of those.[LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_impro03_F014
label: xxx
text: I have an internet boyfriend.  I guess I'll have to juggle the two.  Is that cheating?  I don't know. Hmm.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M014
label: hap
text: Is that your phone?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F015
label: exc
text: Yeah, so [LAUGHTER] He's calling me now

name: Ses01F_impro03_M015
label: hap
text: He loves you.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F016
label: hap
text: He likes to keep tabs, you know.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M016
label: neu
text: How much did he win at the slot?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F017
label: neu
text: Uh, I think seven hundred and fifty dollars.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M017
label: sur
text: Really? Penny slots?

name: Ses01F_impro03_F018
label: neu
text: Penny slots. That's what he plays.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M018
label: sur
text: Wow.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F019
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M019
label: neu
text: I'm a big fan of the Wheel of Fortune quarters. But it just costs so much.  I don't know.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F020
label: xxx
text: Oh.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F021
label: hap
text: Yeah.  We played Wheel of Fortune pennies.  It's like a giant thing with like-

name: Ses01F_impro03_M020
label: neu
text: But the pennies always get you because you end up spending like, you know, fifty bucks.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F022
label: neu
text: Fifty bucks. Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M021
label: neu
text: like, wait, but it's just pennies.  You're like, wait a minute I'm on to you.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F023
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F024
label: hap
text: Well so now we're married. We have cat children.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M022
label: exc
text: Awesome.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M023
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] Cat babies.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F025
label: hap
text: We renamed Brenda, Lumber Janet.

name: Ses01F_impro03_M024
label: neu
text: That's fair enough.

name: Ses01F_impro03_F026
label: hap
text: She needs a new name each state that we go into. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_impro02_M000
label: neu
text: Hey, Joy come in here.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F000
label: neu
text: What's happening?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M001
label: sad
text: I have to go back.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M002
label: sad
text: I just got a letter I have to go back.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F001
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M003
label: sad
text: First thing tomorrow morning.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F002
label: sur
text: Are you kidding me?

name: Ses01M_impro02_F003
label: fru
text: How...

name: Ses01M_impro02_M004
label: xxx
text: I don't understand, I don't underst--

name: Ses01M_impro02_F004
label: fru
text: How can they do that?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M005
label: xxx
text: They can do it.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F005
label: fru
text: They said you're home for at least four years.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M006
label: fru
text: I guess they can do it,

name: Ses01M_impro02_M007
label: sad
text: The National Guard is I guess really spread thin and then everyone has to go.  We all have to go back, my whole companies going back.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F006
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_impro02_F007
label: fru
text: That's not fair.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M008
label: xxx
text: I can't believe it. I just got back.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M009
label: sad
text: So yeah, we leave tomorrow...

name: Ses01M_impro02_F008
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_impro02_M010
label: sad
text: ...we're all shipping out.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M011
label: sad
text: I just got I feel like I'm in shock actually.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F009
label: sad
text: I don't even know what to tell you.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M012
label: sad
text: I don't know.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F010
label: sad
text: What about the birthday party?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M013
label: sad
text: I guess you're just going to have to have it without me.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M014
label: sad
text: Hey listen, it's going to be okay though, all right?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M015
label: sad
text: You're going to be fine.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F011
label: xxx
text: Me?  I'm not worried about me.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M016
label: sad
text: I'm going to be fine too, okay?

name: Ses01M_impro02_F012
label: xxx
text: How do you know?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M017
label: sad
text: I know I have a good... I have a really good group of guys with me.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M018
label: sad
text: We're going to be okay.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F013
label: sad
text: You're going with the same ones?

name: Ses01M_impro02_M019
label: sad
text: Do promise me you're going to take a lot of pictures.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F014
label: xxx
text: Always, I always do.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M020
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F015
label: sad
text: It's not the same though.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M021
label: sad
text: I just wish there was something I could do.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F016
label: xxx
text: We could hide away.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M022
label: sad
text: Run away?

name: Ses01M_impro02_F017
label: sad
text: Mm hmm.  We'll build a bunker and never come out.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M023
label: sad
text: I really don't want to go, I don't want to go...

name: Ses01M_impro02_F018
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] Mmm.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M024
label: xxx
text: I'm scared.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F019
label: sad
text: Don't say that.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F020
label: xxx
text: I'll send you a letter every single day.

name: Ses01M_impro02_M025
label: sad
text: I love you.

name: Ses01M_impro02_F021
label: xxx
text: I love you too.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M000
label: exc
text: Check this out.  You know how I've told you I've been really into like softball recently?

name: Ses01M_impro07_F000
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M001
label: exc
text: Well, this is totally random, I got this full ride scholarship to go to U.S.C next year to play softball.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F001
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER]. For softball? That's unbelievable. Is it slow pitch?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M002
label: exc
text: For softball.  They're going to pay me to go to school. Isn't that awesome?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M003
label: exc
text: Yeah.  Well, I don't--well yeah I can pitch, I'm not like the pitcher though. I'm like the pinch hitter guy I mostly just hit.  But I guess I'm going to have to... Yeah, and then I play shortstop too but... It's so ex- The good news is I get to stay here.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F002
label: xxx
text: Uh huh.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F003
label: exc
text: Pinch hitting softball.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F004
label: exc
text: That is incredible.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F005
label: exc
text: That's amazing. They pay for everything?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M004
label: exc
text: I know. For softball, yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F006
label: exc
text: Your housing, books, everything? That is incredible.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M005
label: exc
text: Yeah, everything. Every like- free ride and I get to, you know, like be on like a Trojans sports team too. And it's like cool. Isn't it awesome?

name: Ses01M_impro07_F007
label: exc
text: That is incredible. Do you get like a per diem?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M006
label: hap
text: I don't know. I should ask. Yeah, I will.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F008
label: exc
text: You should...You should look into that.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F009
label: exc
text: That is amazing, congratulations. Good for you.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M007
label: exc
text: Thank you.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M008
label: exc
text: But I don't know I want to live in the housing that they give me though 'cause I think I want to you know like get like a nicer place.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F010
label: neu
text: Oh.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F011
label: exc
text: Yeah, that you probably. You should see one of these Victorian houses around by.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M009
label: exc
text: Where should I move?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M010
label: exc
text: That's a really good idea. Or I could go to like Santa Monica. Go beach. Venice beach, yeah a little dirty though. I don't want to go to Venice beach. But - Malibu. All right.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F012
label: neu
text: Oh. Venice beach.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F013
label: exc
text: Oh, you don't like that. You're west-sider?

name: Ses01M_impro07_F014
label: exc
text: Okay. That would be way too much of a commute you can't do that. Especially- I know especially from--I don't know, what I was going to say, I don't know.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M011
label: hap
text: Professional softball player Malibu. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_impro07_M012
label: xxx
text: From where? Huh? Well I'm from San Francisco.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F015
label: exc
text: I don't know. Commuting from what Malibu that would be ridiculous.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M013
label: hap
text: Oh yeah, that would be.  Well, depends on what type of car you had, though too. I guess it would be worth it. helicopter. Yeah, helicopter.  There is a helipad there, right? Yeah, exactly.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F016
label: exc
text: Oh yeah. He'd drop you right off at practice?

name: Ses01M_impro07_F017
label: xxx
text: Do you--are you one of those like four a clock in the morning practices?  Is it--that's more like swimming and- --ballet and things like that.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M014
label: xxx
text: Yeah. I think it's in the afternoon 'cause I mean can't be too early 'cause then you can't see the ball.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F018
label: exc
text: They have those neon--softballs.  They're like day-glow you can see them anywhere.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M015
label: xxx
text: Yeah, but no. Well, they have a night games but you know there's more like night games they're not like morning games, you know. I guess it's kind of same thing.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F019
label: xxx
text: I'm surprised you don't know that.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F020
label: neu
text: Oh. That is incredible. Is it--

name: Ses01M_impro07_F021
label: exc
text: do they have a--is it a co-ed softball team?  I mean... Really? You know, I didn't even know that they have that.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M016
label: xxx
text: No it's all boys. All boys' softball team.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M017
label: hap
text: They do it's--believe me it's huge.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F022
label: exc
text: Who do you play? Like do--are you like... nationally ranked?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M018
label: exc
text: I just got into it. I just kind of fell into it. Literally I was walking around and...

name: Ses01M_impro07_F023
label: exc
text: That is unbelievable.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M019
label: hap
text: It's pretty wild.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F024
label: exc
text: I would put that right up there with--ping-pong.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M020
label: neu
text: Yeah, well I doubt [GARBAGE] ping pong [GARBAGE]

name: Ses01M_impro07_F025
label: exc
text: I mean not to denigrate what you are doing.  I think that's great.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M021
label: sur
text: Oh you mean it's not really sport that what you're saying?

name: Ses01M_impro07_F026
label: exc
text: No, no.  I love softball. I played softball all the time.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M022
label: sur
text: It's totally a sport. What are you talking about?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M023
label: xxx
text: What, just 'cause I don't play regular baseball doesn't mean I'm like any less of like a sports guy.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F027
label: exc
text: I am not saying you should be. I'm not no. I think it's great I think you should be incredibly proud yourself especially because you're going to U.S.C for free for doing it. For free.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M024
label: exc
text: For free that's really what it's about. I mean who cares I mean if I have to play softball all the time?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M025
label: xxx
text: But they got to like drive around in a bus--that would suck.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F028
label: xxx
text: Oh really? With the whole team?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M026
label: neu
text: Yeah we have like away games and stuff.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F029
label: xxx
text: What are your teammates like? I'm sure you don't know yet? What kind of people play softball?

name: Ses01M_impro07_M027
label: xxx
text: They're nice.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M028
label: xxx
text: Like, you know like police officers, like--kind of heavyset guys. Mustaches, yeah. It's that kind of-

name: Ses01M_impro07_F030
label: xxx
text: Oh really?

name: Ses01M_impro07_F031
label: xxx
text: Cool. You don't seem like you'd fit in there.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M029
label: xxx
text: That kind of...They're okay.  No I'm like- I'm kind of like the odd man out I'm like...

name: Ses01M_impro07_F032
label: xxx
text: Oh, cool.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M030
label: neu
text: But you know I'm like [GARBAGE].

name: Ses01M_impro07_F033
label: hap
text: You're like the rookie? The new kid.

name: Ses01M_impro07_M031
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro07_F034
label: hap
text: Just watch in five years you'll be like on the force. You carry around donuts in your back pocket... [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_impro07_M032
label: hap
text: I'm going to have a mustache...On the force...

name: Ses01M_impro07_M033
label: hap
text: Pull over..

name: Ses01F_impro06_M000
label: sad
text: I'm sorry, Joy.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F000
label: xxx
text: It's okay.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M001
label: neu
text: Is there anything I can get you?  Do you want me to take care of anything for you or...?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F001
label: xxx
text: No, no, no.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M002
label: neu
text: ...pick up anything?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: You know you are welcome to stay at my house if you want to just check out for a couple days and hang out.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F003
label: neu
text: That's sweet.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F004
label: neu
text: Thank you.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: I went to see her headstone a week or two ago.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: I used to go to cemeteries a lot before she died.  I just, you know, I felt like they were urban oasis, you know, there is always this green in the city.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M004
label: neu
text: Hmm.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: So I was like wandering around before.  It takes forever to find her headstone; I always lose it. You know.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: So I was looking at this other one and there was like a piece of candy there and I thought that I would take the candy and put it on her headstone.  And-

name: Ses01F_impro06_F009
label: neu
text: this woman came up and, you know, it was hers. It was her person that was there.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M005
label: neu
text: Oh.  She was there?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: Yeah.  And she was like, that's pathetic, I hope you enjoy it.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F011
label: sad
text: And I, you know, I mean, I said I was sorry and I brought it back to her kind of and I like put it on the ground and she was like, no, it's fine.  She was like, I would rather have her back, honestly.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M006
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F012
label: sad
text: I don't know.  It just, like, I felt so bad because I shouldn't have done it.  I don't know.  Whatever.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M007
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F013
label: sad
text: I don't know.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M008
label: neu
text: How long were you there for?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F014
label: sad
text: At the cemetery?

name: Ses01F_impro06_M009
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F015
label: sad
text: couple hours.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F016
label: neu
text: I brought- I brought Chuck with me. He went to Redlands, yeah, for the day.  We ran through the sprinklers.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M010
label: neu
text: Oh really?

name: Ses01F_impro06_M011
label: neu
text: You ran through the sprinklers in the cemetery?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F017
label: xxx
text: It was hot.[LIPSMACK]

name: Ses01F_impro06_M012
label: neu
text: Is it a big cemetery?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F018
label: neu
text: Yeah.  It's huge.  Redlands is an old city so they have lots and lots of stones.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M013
label: neu
text: Oh, so they're like really old too, really old ones?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F019
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F020
label: sad
text: It's weird.  Whenever I go back to town, I think of her.  I mean, it's like ... I mean we grew up together and she died when we were twenty one.  And yeah.  She had cancer, she had two brain tumors.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F021
label: sad
text: My best friend Heather.  She's got a- we have a- we built this like little--  There's a park, Prospect Park.  And there is like a garden section of it that we set up for her.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F022
label: sad
text: She used to have these poetry parties on Memorial Day.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M014
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F023
label: sad
text: Umm. Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F024
label: sad
text: And the last time before she died, I remember she couldn't really stand, umm...

name: Ses01F_impro06_F025
label: sad
text: But I mean she could, but it was- so it was kind of sitting at her feet holding her up and she had these poems she had memorized.  And I remember looking up, she had curly red hair and there was this palm tree right behind her and it was like a crown growing right out of her head.  It was cool.

name: Ses01F_impro06_M015
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F026
label: sad
text: Some, I guess.  She memorized this one, John Dunn, it's called, Death Be Not Proud. and-

name: Ses01F_impro06_M016
label: neu
text: So she wrote a lot of poetry?

name: Ses01F_impro06_F027
label: neu
text: There's another one, I can't remember.

name: Ses01F_impro06_F028
label: sad
text: I remember, too, when we were--  she died at U.C.L.A.  She had brain surgery and there was not much hope to begin with, but I gave blood for her surgery, her mom and I before, so we dropped her off in the waiting room and then we were giving blood and came back.  And she, in her wheelchair, like can hardly do anything, reciting her poetry for these people like in the waiting room.  All she needs is a God damn audience.  You know?

name: Ses01F_impro06_M017
label: xxx
text: Mmhmm.Mmhmm.Mmhmm.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M000
label: exc
text: What time is it?  God, this is great, isn't it?  I can't believe it.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M001
label: exc
text: Of course I did want to a little further up the coast you know get away from all the lights and people and everything.  Is it midnight, do they always start at midnight?  Is that what it is midnight?  How you doing, huh? You okay?  That's good.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F000
label: xxx
text: I'm fine.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M002
label: exc
text: Look, there what's that, what's that?  Is it--

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M003
label: xxx
text: No, I think that's just foam.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F001
label: fru
text: Ugh...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M004
label: exc
text: Oh, no I can't tell though.  Although probably if you can't tell it probably isn't them right, yeah.  Probably going to be like unmistakable, right?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M005
label: exc
text: Gosh, this is great, isn't it?  This is awesome.  Oh, no you know what I forgot?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M006
label: xxx
text: My flashlight.  How could I forget my flashlight?  God--

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F002
label: sur
text: What flashlight?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M007
label: neu
text: Flashlight the silver one.  There's only one isn't there?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F003
label: xxx
text: That's not your flashlight.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Whose is it?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F004
label: xxx
text: It's ours; it's my flashlight, too.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M009
label: neu
text: Oh, well, yeah of course.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F005
label: ang
text: You keep saying "my flashlight" like somehow it's just yours. How's that supposed to make me feel?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M010
label: neu
text: Of course, our flashlight.  What's your is mine, mi flashlight es su flashlight.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M011
label: neu
text: Gosh, I should have brought it. I can't believe I forgot that.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M012
label: xxx
text: It's a nice moon though, should stay full.  Do they always run during a full moon?  I can't remember was it full last year?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F006
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M013
label: xxx
text: Are you all right?  Are you okay?  You cold?  Do you want to my jacket? My jacket? No?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F007
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M014
label: exc
text: You know what we should've brought a blanket too.  Man, our blanket, our blanket.  Wish I had six-pack too, a six-pack would be just the ticket right about now, huh, six-pack.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M015
label: xxx
text: What's wrong?  Are you okay?  Huh?  You cold?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F008
label: neu
text: I'm fine.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M016
label: exc
text: Oh yeah, I'm so excited right now I'm like a kid.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M017
label: exc
text: I can't believe I got out of the house without my fly zipped up even.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F009
label: hap
text: I wonder if they can hear me talk

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M018
label: xxx
text: I wonder if they can hear me talking, you know.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M019
label: xxx
text: Like feel the vibrations in the sand when we move around.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F010
label: fru
text: I'm cold.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M020
label: fru
text: Do you want my jacket?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F011
label: fru
text: It's after eleven, let's go home.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M021
label: fru
text: What are you kidding?  We just got here.  We don't want to turn around and go home now.  What's the point coming all the way down here?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F012
label: fru
text: There is no point.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M022
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F013
label: fru
text: That's my point.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M023
label: neu
text: That's my point too.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F014
label: ang
text: Then let's go.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M024
label: fru
text: No, wait no, no that's not my point.  My point is there is no point and coming all the way down here if we just turn around and go home.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M025
label: xxx
text: Don't you want to see it?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F015
label: xxx
text: Not particularly.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M026
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F016
label: xxx
text: I just don't, it's stupid.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M027
label: fru
text: It's not stupid.  It's a natural phenomenon.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M028
label: ang
text: People in Kansas would have to get plane tickets and make hotel reservations to see this.  It's only forty minutes away; it's just too good to pass up.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F017
label: ang
text: Pass what up?  These little fish swim out of the ocean, they flop around on the sand then they swim back and then they die.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M029
label: xxx
text: Yeah but that like flopping around is what to do it's like spawning or mating or something.  This is like the highlight of their little fish lives.  It's like life's last orgy.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F018
label: fru
text: I don't know what you're so excited about.  This isn't a moon landing we're talking about, it's fish, it's a fish nobody even eats.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M030
label: neu
text: Yeah, they do.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F019
label: fru
text: Oh, Augie.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M031
label: exc
text: Well, okay whatever, okay but it's a fish who do something that like no other fish do, you know, it's like those swallows that return to Capistrano or those like those lemmings that jumped off the cliffs, you know.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M032
label: exc
text: It's like a little bit of the unexplainable, a little magic, a little mystery.  I just don't see how you can not be interested in this.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F020
label: fru
text: I'm not.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M033
label: xxx
text: For real?

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F021
label: ang
text: Yes.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M034
label: fru
text: All right.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M035
label: fru
text: I don't get it though, I mean the first time we came here you said it was like the best night of your life...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M036
label: fru
text: And last year I remember like distinctively you were so excited to get here that you didn't realize you stubbed your toe until we were in a car.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F022
label: ang
text: Last year, you'll also remember we got--our shoes got wet, I got sand in my panties, you got a sore throat, we got into a big fight and we did not see the grunions.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M037
label: neu
text: We just weren't in a good spot though.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F023
label: ang
text: We didn't see them the year before either.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M038
label: xxx
text: We just weren't in a good spot I'm telling you this is a much better spot.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M039
label: neu
text: Come on, trust me I got instincts for these things, okay?  So just--just think about it all right?  Okay, I know you're not interested, think about it...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M040
label: exc
text: Out there, there's like this big mass of silver fish they're heading this way...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M041
label: exc
text: They don't know why, we don't know why.  No one like sent them an invitation or gave them a map or direction...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M042
label: exc
text: They just all turned at once and they just form this line as long as the California coast.  And they just started swimming...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M043
label: exc
text: Like some little time release fire cracker went off inside their little tiny bodies.  And they all turned as one...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M044
label: exc
text: And form the line and started swimming, swimming that would bring them to this point here...

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M045
label: exc
text: It's like urgency that's pure urge you know.  It's single-mindedness with no mind.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_M046
label: exc
text: It's crazy.  Look at this, I'm giving myself goose bumps, the hairs are standing up on my arm.

name: Ses01M_script02_1_F024
label: xxx
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F000
label: neu
text: You're the only one who still loves his parents.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M000
label: neu
text: I know.  It kind of went out of style, didn't it?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F001
label: neu
text: It's not so bad; it's a good thing.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F002
label: neu
text: [BREATHING] You know, it's lovely here.  The air is sweet.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M001
label: neu
text: You're not sorry you came.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F003
label: neu
text: I'm not sorry, no. But I'm...I can't stay.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M002
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F004
label: neu
text: For one thing, your mother much as told me to go.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M003
label: neu
text: Well.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F005
label: neu
text: And then, you.  You've been kind of...

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M004
label: neu
text: What?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F006
label: neu
text: Sort of embarrassed ever since I got here.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M005
label: neu
text: Well I was kind of planning of sneaking up on you over the course of a week or so.  They just take it for granted that we're all set.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F007
label: neu
text: I knew they would.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: You did?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F008
label: neu
text: Well sure, from your mother's point of view.  Why else would I come?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: So would you want to?  I mean, I guess you have to know that's kind of why I asked you to come?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F009
label: neu
text: I, umm. I guess, I guess that's kind of why I came.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F010
label: hap
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M008
label: hap
text: I love you. Annie, I love you.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F011
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M009
label: hap
text: I don't really have any imagination, that's all I know how to say.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M010
label: hap
text: Am I embarrassing you? Are you - See, I didn't want to do it here with this yard, on this porch.  I wanted it to be somewhere new, some place fresh for both of us.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: No. No

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: You feel uncomfortable here, you feel that it's wrong here somehow.  I just...I don't...I didn't want...I didn't want to take you away from anything.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F014
label: neu
text: Chris, I've been ready a long, long, time.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: And he's gone forever?  Are you sure?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F015
label: neu
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M013
label: xxx
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F016
label: neu
text: You started to write me.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M014
label: sur
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F017
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M015
label: hap
text: Why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F018
label: xxx
text: I was waiting for you, Chris.  You sure can be ambiguous, you know.  And when you did finally write me,

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M016
label: hap
text: Give me a...

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M017
label: hap
text: Give me a kiss.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M018
label: xxx
text: God.  I kissed you Annie.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F019
label: hap
text: beating around the bush.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F020
label: hap
text: I will never forgive you.  All I'd done was sit around wondering if I was crazy waiting so long, wondering if you were thinking about me.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M019
label: hap
text: Oh Annie, we are going to live now.  I am going to make you so happy.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F021
label: hap
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M020
label: hap
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F022
label: neu
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you, Chris.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F023
label: xxx
text: Chris, what is it?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M021
label: sad
text: Hey, let's drive some place.  Huh?  Let's get out of here.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F024
label: xxx
text: No. What is it?  Is it your mother?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M022
label: sad
text: No it's nothing like that. It's-

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F025
label: xxx
text: Then what?  Chris.  Even in your letters, there was something ashamed.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: Yeah.  I suppose I have been. But it's going from me.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F026
label: xxx
text: You've got to tell me.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M024
label: sad
text: I don't even know how to start.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F027
label: xxx
text: It wouldn't work like this.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: It's just all mixed up with so many other things, you know?  You know overseas I was in command of a company?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F028
label: neu
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: Well I lost them.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F029
label: neu
text: How many?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: Pretty much all.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F030
label: sad
text: Aw, geez.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: You can't just toss off a thing like that because they weren't just men. You know?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M029
label: sad
