text: Like for instance, there was this one time it had been raining for several days and this kid he just came up to me and he gave me his last pair of dry socks.  He just put them in my pocket.  That's a little thing, you know, but that's what kind of guys I had.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: They didn't die, they killed themselves for each other.  I mean that, exactly.  Just a little more selfish and they would all be here today.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M031
label: xxx
text: And I had this idea as I was watching them go down.  Everything was being destroyed, you know, but this one thing was being made.  It was kind of a monument, it's kind of responsibility, man for man.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F031
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: To bring that on to the earth again, you know, is like some kind of monument and I thought I would just make a difference to them.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: But then I came home and it was incredible, you know?  The whole thing was just kind of this random bus accident.  You know, I went back to the rat race again, I went to work.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M034
label: xxx
text: Driving my new car and seeing a new refrigerator.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M035
label: xxx
text: I mean...You can't take those things out of a war. when you drive that car and you see that new refrigerator, you have to know that it came out of the love that a man can have for another man.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M036
label: sad
text: And I didn't want any of it. I guess that included you.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F032
label: xxx
text: Do you still feel that way?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M037
label: neu
text: I just want you to know Annie.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F033
label: xxx
text: Because you mustn't feel that way.  Everything you have, you've earned - everything.  you understand me?

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F034
label: xxx
text: Even me.  And your money?  Chris, there's nothing wrong in your money.  Your father put hundreds of planes into the air, you should be proud of that.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_M038
label: xxx
text: Annie, Annie.  I am going to make a fortune for you.

name: Ses01F_script01_3_F035
label: hap
text: What would I do with a fortune?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M000
label: fea
text: Good God.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F000
label: xxx
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M001
label: fea
text: I wonder.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F001
label: fea
text: Freda is the only one who knows we are here. She wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M002
label: xxx
text: Must be them then.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F002
label: fea
text: What we're going to do?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M003
label: fea
text: We're okay, right darling?  Whatever happens, we're okay?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F003
label: hap
text: Now and always sweet.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M004
label: hap
text: I don't care then.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F004
label: hap
text: It had to happen sooner or later.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M005
label: xxx
text: Yes... Hello?  Hello?  I'm sorry what's that?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M006
label: xxx
text: No, it's a wrong number.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F005
label: xxx
text: Oh, oh, that sent shivers on my spine.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M007
label: xxx
text: [BREATHING] [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F006
label: xxx
text: Oh...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M008
label: xxx
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F007
label: exc
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M009
label: xxx
text: What shall we do if they suddenly walk in on us?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F008
label: hap
text: Oh. Behave exquisitely...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M010
label: hap
text: With perfect poise...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F009
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] I think I shall do a court curtsey.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M011
label: hap
text: Ah...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F010
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M012
label: hap
text: Ah...Strange...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F011
label: hap
text: Mmm...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M013
label: hap
text: Things that just ought to matter dreadfully, you know they just don't matter at all when one is happy, do they?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F012
label: xxx
text: The pity is that one can't stay happy.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M014
label: sad
text: Darling, don't say that.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F013
label: xxx
text: It's true.  I think the whole things a very poor joke.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M015
label: xxx
text: What, this sacred and beautiful thing, love?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F014
label: hap
text: Oh, yes meaning just that.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M016
label: hap
text: Oh, dear god what is that all mean, dear god?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F015
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] Don't laugh at me I'm being serious.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M017
label: hap
text: You mustn't be so serious, darling, it just what they want.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Oh whose they?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M018
label: xxx
text: Oh you know all those superficial philosophers. We must laugh at them, be flippant.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M019
label: hap
text: Flippancy brings out the acid in their darn sweetness and light.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F017
label: hap
text: Mmhmm If I must laugh at everything, I must laugh at us too.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M020
label: xxx
text: Oh yes.  .

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F018
label: hap
text: How long will it last, this ludicrous, overbearing love of ours?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M021
label: hap
text: We are figures of fun all right

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M022
label: hap
text: Ahh...who knows.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F019
label: hap
text: Shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: No, that will fade...Along with our passion...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Oh, will we like that?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M024
label: xxx
text: Well it depends on how well we've played.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F021
label: hap
text: If one of us dies...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F022
label: xxx
text: does the one that's left still laugh?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M025
label: xxx
text: Yes, yes with the all his might.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F023
label: xxx
text: Well, that's serious enough isn't it?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M026
label: xxx
text: No, no, no, no death is very laughable it's a cunning little mystery, you know.  It's all done with mirrors.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F024
label: hap
text: I think you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M027
label: xxx
text: Ah so is everyone in the long run, huh?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F025
label: xxx
text: Hmm.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M028
label: exc
text: Let's pity the poor philosophers, huh?  Let's enjoy the party for as long as we can, okay?  Let's blow trumpets and squeakers and sit like small idiotic school children. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F026
label: xxx
text: Ah.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M029
label: exc
text: Come here darling, kiss me

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F027
label: xxx
text: Oh, Elliot.  Worms don't pop.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M030
label: hap
text: before your body rots and worms pop out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M031
label: hap
text: See, you know I don't care what you do.  You could paint yourself green and run naked to the Place Vendome.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F028
label: xxx
text: Oh, thank you darling.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M032
label: xxx
text: You could run off with all the men in a world. I won't say a word.  Just as long as you love me best.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F029
label: xxx
text: The same applies to you too, except you so much as look at another women I'll kill you.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M033
label: hap
text: Do you remember that row we did have in Venice?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F030
label: hap
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M034
label: xxx
text: The one when you put that little wooden painted snake in my bed?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F031
label: exc
text: Oh, Charles.  That was his name Charles. He did wriggle so beautifully.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M035
label: xxx
text: It was a horrible thing I hated it.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F032
label: xxx
text: Oh I know you threw it out the window and into the Grand Canal.  Oh, I'll never forgive you for that.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M036
label: xxx
text: Of course how long did that row last?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F033
label: xxx
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M037
label: exc
text: But you know it wasn't as bad as the one we had in Cannes...mmhmm...where your curling irons burnt a hole in my dressing gown.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F034
label: hap
text: Cannes...mmhmm...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F035
label: xxx
text: Oh it burnt my comb too and all those towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M038
label: xxx
text: Oh that was a rouser wasn't it?

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F036
label: hap
text: The manager came in he found us rolling about the floor.  [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M039
label: hap
text: I will never forget the look on his face.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F037
label: hap
text: Scratching and biting like panthers. [LAUGHTER] Oh...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M040
label: hap
text: oh...

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F038
label: hap
text: Utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F039
label: hap
text: oh...[LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M041
label: hap
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F040
label: hap
text: Very much sillier.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_M042
label: xxx
text: However, I do believe the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses01M_script03_1_F041
label: exc
text: Oh you knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F000
label: xxx
text: Why did he invite her here?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M000
label: xxx
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F001
label: xxx
text: She's been in New York three and an half years, why all of a sudden?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well maybe...maybe he just wanted to see her.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Nobody comes seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M002
label: xxx
text: What do you mean?  You know he lived next door to the girl his whole life, why wouldn't he want to see her?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M003
label: fru
text: [BREATHING] You don't look at me like that.  He didn't tell me anything more than he told you.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F003
label: ang
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M004
label: neu
text: How do you know he's even thinking about it?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F004
label: ang
text: It's got that about it.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M005
label: xxx
text: Oh.  So what.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F005
label: ang
text: What is going on here, Joe?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M006
label: fru
text: Now listen.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F006
label: ang
text: She is not his girl.  She knows she's not.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M007
label: fru
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F007
label: ang
text: Then why is she still single?  New York is full of men, why is she still single?  Probably a hundred people told her she's foolish, but she waited.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M008
label: neu
text: How do you know why she waited?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F008
label: ang
text: Because she knows what I know, that's why.  She's faithful as a rock.  In my darkest moments, I think of her waiting and I know that I'm right.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: Hey look, it's a nice day, huh?  Why are we arguing?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F009
label: ang
text: Nobody in this house dares take away her faith, Joe.  You know strangers might, but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do? What do you want?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F010
label: ang
text: I want you to-- I want you to act like he is coming back, both of you.  Don't think I haven't noticed you since Chris invited her here.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F011
label: ang
text: I won't stand for any nonsense.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: Kate.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F012
label: ang
text: Because if he's not coming back, I'll kill myself.  Oh laugh, laugh all you like but why does this happen the very night he comes back.  She goes to sleep in his room and his memorial breaks in pieces.  Look at it, Joe, look.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F013
label: ang
text: Just believe with me, Joe. Only last week a man came back in Detroit missing longer than Larry.  Believe with me. You, above all, have got to believe. Just believe.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M014
label: fru
text: Okay. Calm yourself.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M015
label: fru
text: I know. All right, all right. All right. Okay.  Calm yourself. What does that mean, me above all?

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M016
label: xxx
text: Look at you, you're shaking.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_F014
label: fru
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses01F_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: What have I got to hide?  What the hell is the matter with you, Kate?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M000
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F000
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] Utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M001
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F001
label: xxx
text: Very much sillier.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M003
label: xxx
text: However, I do believe the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Oh you knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M004
label: xxx
text: I knew nothing of the sort. You took presents from him.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F003
label: sur
text: Presents? It was a trivial little broach.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M005
label: xxx
text: It was bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Not at all. It was very pretty. I still wear it often.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M006
label: xxx
text: You sent out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F005
label: xxx
text: I did not you worked whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M007
label: xxx
text: Well, you let him kiss you.  You said you did.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F006
label: neu
text: Well, what of it?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M008
label: xxx
text: What of it?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: It gave him a lot, a great deal of pleasure and it didn't hurt me.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M009
label: xxx
text: And what about me?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F008
label: xxx
text: If you hadn't been so suspicious and nosey you'd never known a thing about it.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M010
label: xxx
text: That's a nice point of view I must say.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F009
label: xxx
text: I'm bored with this conversation.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M011
label: xxx
text: So am I.  I'm bored stiff.  You want some brandy?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F010
label: neu
text: No, thank you.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M012
label: neu
text: I'll have a little, I think.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F011
label: ang
text: I don't see why you want any you already had two glasses.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M013
label: neu
text: Oh, you know no particular reason besides they are very small glasses.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F012
label: xxx
text: I just think it's silly you know to go on and on and on about such a thing.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M014
label: xxx
text: You can hardly call three glasses of liquor in a whole evening going on and on and on.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F013
label: xxx
text: I just, I just think it's becoming a habit with you.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M015
label: xxx
text: Hmm.  Well, you needn't be so grand just because you don't happen to want any at the moment, okay?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F014
label: xxx
text: Do be quiet.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M016
label: fru
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F015
label: ang
text: Don't be stupid, what?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M017
label: fru
text: Nothing.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M018
label: neu
text: Are you going out somewhere dear?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F016
label: xxx
text: No, darling I'm just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M019
label: xxx
text: That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F017
label: ang
text: Well it's a woman's duty to allure the man. Watch me a minute will you?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M020
label: xxx
text: As matter the fact that's perfectly true.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F018
label: xxx
text: Oh no, it isn't.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M021
label: xxx
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F019
label: xxx
text: Don't be stupid, shut up.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M022
label: ang
text: You know, it's a pity you didn't have any more brandy. It would have made you just a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F020
label: xxx
text: Oh, well that's funny.  It doesn't seem to have worked such wonders with you.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M023
label: ang
text: You know what?  You snap, you snap, you snap you're like a little adder.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F021
label: xxx
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M024
label: ang
text: Nonsense.  They have a bag of venom behind of fangs and they snap.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F022
label: ang
text: They sting.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: I don't care.  I don't care, do you understand?  I don't mind if they bark and they roll about like hoops.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M025
label: ang
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F024
label: ang
text: Yes, I did quite a lot.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M026
label: ang
text: I suppose you let him just kiss you or good deal more than too.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F025
label: ang
text: Oh, mind you own business.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: I suppose you two had a riotous time, huh?  No restrain at all, very enjoyable, he never had much any how.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F026
label: ang
text: You're quite insufferable, I expect it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M028
label: ang
text: I am not in the least bit drunk.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F027
label: ang
text: You always had a weak head.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M029
label: ang
text: I think I told you once before that I had three minute liquor glasses the whole evening long.  A Child of two cannot get drunk on that.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: On the contrary, a child two could get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: Oh very, very interesting Amanda.  How about the child of uh... four, six or maybe nine---you know, we could work up a splendid little debate about it, you know?  Intemperate tots.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: Shut up.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F030
label: ang
text: Not very funny darling.  Why don't you have some more brandy?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M031
label: ang
text: That's a very good idea I think I will.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M032
label: ang
text: Would you uh...turn that off please? You're going to wake the people upstairs.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F031
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F032
label: xxx
text: There are no people upstairs. It's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M033
label: ang
text: Well then you'll wake the people downstairs.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F033
label: ang
text: They are away in Tunis.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: This is no time a year for Tunis.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M035
label: ang
text: I will do no such thing.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: Very well if you insist on being boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M036
label: ang
text: Turn it off. It's driving me mad.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: I won't.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M037
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: Stop it. No. Go away.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: Amanda listen. Listen.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: listen Oh I'm sick and tired of listening to you, you damn sadistic bully.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: That's very amusing indeed.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: Oh you're cruel you're...you're...I hate you, I hate you. Go away. You're conceited. You're overbearing. You're utterly impossible.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: You...You're an evil minded, self-centered little wench and I never want to see you again.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: This is the end do you hear me?  Finally and forever.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: You're not going like this.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: Oh yes I am...Oh yes I am. Let go of me. You let go. You...urgh...You're a cruel friend. I loathe and I hate you. Marry you again...Ha...Never, never, never, never. I hope you die in torment. You beast.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: No you're not.

name: Ses01M_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: Shut up. Shut up. I wouldn't marry you again if you came crawling back to me on a bended knee. You are an evil tempered little vampire and I never want to see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M000
label: neu
text: Have you tried, uh, Craig's List?

name: Ses01F_impro04_F000
label: neu
text: Uh, what?  Craig's List?  Oh the internet thing?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M001
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F001
label: neu
text: I don't know.  Isn't that-- that's all like escort services and things like that.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M002
label: neu
text: No.  There's regular jobs on there.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F002
label: fru
text: I don't know.  I mean I've been looking for so long that I just figured that--  I mean, I think things like Monster are a lot more reliable than just some random free board.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M003
label: neu
text: Uh huh.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M004
label: neu
text: I'm just saying I have a friend that got a good job on it so I was just recommending it.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F003
label: xxx
text: What kind of a job?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M005
label: neu
text: He's like a manager for a theatre.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F004
label: xxx
text: Really?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M006
label: neu
text: He's like a house manager. Yeah.  It's a good job.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F005
label: neu
text: He just...

name: Ses01F_impro04_F006
label: neu
text: you know what?  I heard about that job.  I applied for that.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M007
label: neu
text: You did?

name: Ses01F_impro04_F007
label: fru
text: Yeah.  I saw a posting at the theatre.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M008
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F008
label: xxx
text: He got it?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M009
label: neu
text: You've been looking for a job for a long time; that was a long time ago.  Right?

name: Ses01F_impro04_F009
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M010
label: neu
text: Hmm.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F010
label: xxx
text: What did he do?  What was so great?  I don't understand why they would pick him over me.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M011
label: neu
text: I don't know.  He had a really good resume I guess and--

name: Ses01F_impro04_F011
label: xxx
text: A resume?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M012
label: neu
text: Yeah.  Do you have a resume?

name: Ses01F_impro04_F012
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M013
label: neu
text: It's kind of helpful when getting a job.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F013
label: neu
text: I just- I mean I call people up and I tell them what I'm good at.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M014
label: neu
text: Well maybe we should sit down some time and you can just tell me all the stuff that you have done and I'll write it out.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F014
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F015
label: xxx
text: I don't like- I don't like sending things in the mail.  I don't want my information out there.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M015
label: neu
text: No.  You can- or you can just bring it in person.  But they need, generally, something to see, you know, what kind of what that you've done, what kind of--

name: Ses01F_impro04_F016
label: fru
text: I'm there in front of them.  I'm telling them what I'm good at.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M016
label: neu
text: Yeah.  But the piece of paper helps, too.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F017
label: fru
text: Why?  It's a piece of paper.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M017
label: neu
text: No.  But it has an outline, you know.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F018
label: fru
text: I just don't want this paper trail, you know.  I just don't want things following me around, like-.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M018
label: neu
text: I know.  Okay.  Well, um. Maybe--

name: Ses01F_impro04_F019
label: fru
text: It's just-- You know, I've had this problem before.  You're not the first person to tell me that I need a resume but...

name: Ses01F_impro04_M019
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M020
label: neu
text: Okay, yeah.  I would imagine.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F020
label: xxx
text: ..I just-..I just think it's kind of prejudiced and they are really discriminating against people who just aren't that way.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M021
label: neu
text: Well, sometimes you have to do things that you don't necessarily like to do to have a job. But the job affords you money, you won't have to be taking the bus right now.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F021
label: fru
text: That's baloney, that's baloney.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F022
label: fru
text: Please.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M022
label: neu
text: maybe get a car.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M023
label: neu
text: I just, you know, think you should try a little harder maybe.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F023
label: fru
text: you think that you're better than me because I don't have a car?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M024
label: neu
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F024
label: fru
text: You know, you're riding the bus, too.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M025
label: neu
text: I am riding the bus, but by choice.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F025
label: fru
text: Why?  What choice?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M026
label: neu
text: To save the environment, carpool.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F026
label: fru
text: You're saving the environment. mmhmm

name: Ses01F_impro04_M027
label: neu
text: Yes.  One less car at a time.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F027
label: fru
text: Interesting.  That's fantastic.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M028
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M029
label: fru
text: You know, you don't have to take out your frustration on me, you know, just because...

name: Ses01F_impro04_F028
label: ang
text: I'm not frustrated.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M030
label: fru
text: ...you can't get a job and refuse to have a resume.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F029
label: ang
text: Who do you think you are?

name: Ses01F_impro04_M031
label: neu
text: I don't think I'm anyone.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F030
label: ang
text: You are so high and mighty.  I just--

name: Ses01F_impro04_M032
label: neu
text: I- I-I didn't-- okay.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F031
label: ang
text: Oh.  I'm saving the environment. I'm riding this car because I- I want to.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M033
label: xxx
text: What?  No.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M034
label: fru
text: What? Oh.  So now you're...

name: Ses01F_impro04_F032
label: ang
text: The bus, I'm riding the bus because I want to.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M035
label: fru
text: you know what?  You don't have to take your anger and your hurt out on me.

name: Ses01F_impro04_F033
label: ang
text: I can not-- you are not here by choice.  Nobody would ride this bus by choice.

name: Ses01F_impro04_M036
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses01F_impro02_F000
label: sad
text: Did you get the mail? So you saw my letter?

name: Ses01F_impro02_M000
label: xxx
text: It's not fair.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F001
label: sad
text: Yeah.  I know.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M001
label: sad
text: I don't understand.  You've already done so much, I don't know why do you have to go back.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F002
label: sad
text: I don't know.  I put in that. request too. They didn't...

name: Ses01F_impro02_F003
label: neu
text: I guess, you know, everybody has to make sacrifices.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M002
label: xxx
text: I don't know, it's just not fair.  I think you've already made your sacrifice.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F004
label: sad
text: There's people that have given more though, you know?

name: Ses01F_impro02_M003
label: fru
text: I just don't see how they can make you leave when you have a new baby - we have a new kid.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F005
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M004
label: xxx
text: Then why is that fair?  Why--

name: Ses01F_impro02_F006
label: neu
text: There's babies over there, though, that need mothers.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M005
label: sad
text: I don't know how you can be okay with this?  I don't know why you're not-- you're fine with it.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F007
label: xxx
text: I'm not okay with it, but I don't-- it's not like I have a choice.  I don't see what crying about it is going to fix.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M006
label: xxx
text: I'm just trying to think of another way.  I'm just trying to...

name: Ses01F_impro02_F008
label: sad
text: Just, you know, kicking myself.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F009
label: xxx
text: like you sign up because you need money and

name: Ses01F_impro02_F010
label: sad
text: things just aren't what they seem.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M007
label: xxx
text: This is a stupid war.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F011
label: xxx
text: We're doing the right thing, though.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M008
label: fru
text: I know.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M009
label: sad
text: I just don't see why it has to be you.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F012
label: sad
text: If not me then, who?

name: Ses01F_impro02_M010
label: sad
text: What am I going to do? Huh?

name: Ses01F_impro02_F013
label: sad
text: You'll videotape everything, yeah?

name: Ses01F_impro02_M011
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F014
label: sad
text: Maybe you can send it to me, like stream it, yeah?

name: Ses01F_impro02_M012
label: neu
text: Don't you guys have access to computers over there.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F015
label: sad
text: Last month--  Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M013
label: sad
text: I just don't know how I'm going to do it without you.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F016
label: neu
text: I have to find sitters.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M014
label: sad
text: I can't raise a baby by myself.  How?

name: Ses01F_impro02_F017
label: sad
text: We've got friends, that's why we moved here, huh?  Because there is a day care down the street.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M015
label: neu
text: I know.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F018
label: neu
text: And your mother is close by.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F019
label: sad
text: I'll send you lots of letters.

name: Ses01F_impro02_F020
label: sad
text: And I want lots and lots and lots of pictures.

name: Ses01F_impro02_M016
label: fru
text: It's just not fair.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M000
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F000
label: hap
text: And very much sillier.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M001
label: neu
text: However I believe the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F001
label: hap
text: Oh.  You knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M002
label: neu
text: I knew nothing of the sort.  You took presents from him.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F002
label: hap
text: Presents?  It was only a trivial, little brooch.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M003
label: xxx
text: It was bristling with diamonds.  In the worst possible taste, too.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F003
label: xxx
text: It was not.  I still have it, and I wear it often.  It is very pretty.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M004
label: neu
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F004
label: neu
text: I did not.  You worked that whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M005
label: fru
text: Well, you let him kiss you, huh?  You said you did.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F005
label: neu
text: Well, what of it?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M006
label: xxx
text: What of it?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F006
label: xxx
text: It gave him a lot of pleasure and it didn't hurt me.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M007
label: ang
text: What about me?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: If you hadn't been so suspicious and nosey, you never would have known a thing about it.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M008
label: xxx
text: That's a nice point of view, I must say.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F008
label: fru
text: Oh dear.  I'm bored with this conversation.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M009
label: fru
text: So am I.  I'm bored stiff. [GARBAGE]  Do you want some brandy?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F009
label: xxx
text: No.  Thank you.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: I'll have a little, I think.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F010
label: xxx
text: I don't know why you'd want any, you've already had three glasses.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M011
label: neu
text: No particular reason.  Anyhow, they are very small ones.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F011
label: xxx
text: I just think it's silly to go on and on and on about such a thing.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M012
label: fru
text: You can hardly call three glasses of liquor a whole evening long, going on and on and on.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F012
label: xxx
text: It's become a habit with you.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M013
label: fru
text: Oh.  Don't be so grand.  Just because you don't happen to want one at the moment.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F013
label: ang
text: Don't be stupid.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M014
label: ang
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M015
label: fru
text: Nothing.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M016
label: neu
text: you going out somewhere, dear?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F015
label: ang
text: No.  I am just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M017
label: xxx
text: That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F016
label: ang
text: Oh.  It's a woman's duty to allure the man.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M018
label: neu
text: Well as a matter of fact, yes, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F017
label: ang
text: No it isn't.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M019
label: neu
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F018
label: ang
text: You shut up.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M020
label: ang
text: Oh really.  It's a pity you didn't have any brandy, it would have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F019
label: xxx
text: It's funny it hasn't worked such wonders for you.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M021
label: ang
text: Snap, snap, snap.  You know you are like a little adder.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F020
label: xxx
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M022
label: ang
text: Nonsense.  They have a bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap. They snap.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F021
label: ang
text: They sting. I don't care.  Do you understand?  I don't care if they bark and they roll about like hoops.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M023
label: ang
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F022
label: ang
text: Yes I did, quite a lot.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M024
label: ang
text: And I suppose you let him kiss you a good deal more than, too. Yes.  I suppose you guys had a riotous time, huh?  All out, no restraint at all.  Well, you never really had much anyhow.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: Mind your own business.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F024
label: ang
text: You're quite insufferable, I expect it's because you are drunk.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M025
label: ang
text: I think I am not in the least bit drunk.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F025
label: ang
text: You've always had a weak head.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M026
label: ang
text: I think I mentioned once before that I've had three minute liquor glasses the whole evening long.  A child of two cannot get drunk on that.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F026
label: ang
text: On the contrary, a child of two can get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: That's very interesting Amanda. How about a child of four?  Or a child of six?  Or a child of nine? We can get a good little conversation going on about this, you know, intemperate tots.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F027
label: ang
text: Oh shut up.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: Shut up.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: Not very funny, darling.  Why don't you have some more brandy.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M028
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] That's a very good idea.  I think I will.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M029
label: ang
text: Look, you better turn that off. I don't want to wake up the people upstairs.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F030
label: neu
text: Why?

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F031
label: neu
text: There are no people upstairs; it's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: Well then you'll wake up the people downstairs.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F032
label: neu
text: They are away in Tunis.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M031
label: neu
text: This is no time of year for Tunis.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F033
label: xxx
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M032
label: ang
text: I will do no such thing.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Fine if you insist on being boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M033
label: ang
text: Will you turn that off, it's driving me mad.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: You are far too temperamental, try to control yourself.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: I won't.  Let go, let go of me. Listen, listen?  I'm sick and tired of listening to you, you sadistic bully.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M035
label: ang
text: Amanda, listen, listen.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M036
label: ang
text: Oh.  That's very amusing indeed.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: Oh shut up.  Let go.  I hate you, I hate you.  Do you hear?  You are a conceited and overbearing and utterly impossible.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M037
label: ang
text: You are a vile, ill-tempered, loose living, wicked little beast and I never want to see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: This is the end.  Do you hear me?  Finally and forever.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: You're not going like this.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: Oh.  Yes I am.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: You're not.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: Yes I am.   Stop it. Stop it.  Let go of me. Oh.  You're a cruel fiend.  I loathe and I hate you. Marry you again?  Never, never, never. I hope you die in torment, you brute beast cad.

name: Ses01F_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Shut up. Shut up. God, I wouldn't marry you again if you came crawling back to me on a bended knee.  You are a vile, ill-tempered, mean little wench and I never want to see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F000
label: ang
text: Why did he invite her here?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M000
label: neu
text: Well, maybe he wanted see her.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F001
label: ang
text: It's been three and a half years.  Why all of a sudden?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well uh, He grew up next door to the girl, why wouldn't he want to see her?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M002
label: fru
text: Don't look at me like that.  He didn't tell me anything he told you.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F002
label: xxx
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M003
label: fru
text: How do you know he's even thinking about it?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: it's got that about it.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M004
label: fru
text: Oh so what?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F004
label: ang
text: What is going on here, Joe?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M005
label: fru
text: Okay, now listen, kids...

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F005
label: ang
text: The girl is not Larry's.  If the girl is Larry's girl she's not his she know she's not.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M006
label: fru
text: Listen. Line. You can't read her mind.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F006
label: xxx
text: Then why is she still single?  New York is full of men probably a hundred people told her she is crazy but she is waited.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M007
label: neu
text: And how do you know why she's waited.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Because she knows what I know that's why.  She's faithful as a rock. in my darkest moments I think of her waiting and I know that I'm right.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M008
label: fru
text: Okay, look it's a beautiful day.  Why are we arguing?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F008
label: fru
text: Nobody in this house dares take away her faith Joe.  Her- strangers might but not her father, not her brother.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do?  What do you want?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F009
label: ang
text: I want you to---act like he is coming back.  Don't think I haven't noticed you, both of you since Chris invited her here.  I won't stand for any nonsense.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: Kate...

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F010
label: xxx
text: Because if he's not coming back then I'll kill myself.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F011
label: ang
text: Oh, laugh at me, laugh all you like but why does this happen to very night she comes back?  She goes to sleep in his room and his memorial breaks in pieces.  Look at it, Joe look.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: All right, calm yourself.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F012
label: ang
text: Believe with me Joe, you got to believe. Only last week a boy came back missing longer then Larry you read it yourself.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: Okay, calm yourself. Alright.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M014
label: fru
text: calm yourself.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F013
label: ang
text: You above all have got to believe. Just don't stop believing.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M015
label: ang
text: What does that mean? Me above all? What does that mean?

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: Look at you. You're shaking.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_F014
label: xxx
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses01M_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: What the hell do you want from me, Kate?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F000
label: neu
text: You seem kind of down.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M000
label: xxx
text: I'm just mad.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F001
label: xxx
text: How come?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M001
label: fru
text: It's--I've been trying to find this job I can't get any job.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M002
label: fru
text: It's not fair.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F002
label: neu
text: What do you mean?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M003
label: fru
text: I mean I've been looking for a job for like three years and I can't get a job.  I mean like, it's America, right?  I should be able to get a job.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F003
label: neu
text: There's a lot of people looking for jobs.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M004
label: fru
text: I guess.  But three years?  I mean, I like--I went to college even, I mean I didn't finish but I went for like a little bit.  It's not fair, I don't know.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F004
label: neu
text: I don't know, I mean, I just don't think...

name: Ses01M_impro04_M005
label: fru
text: I mean I've been sending out my resumes and doing everything I can do but nothing is happening.  You know, it's like I can't and I can't keep living on loans anymore like this.  I'm going to--I mean eventually I'm going to have to pay it back. I'm just kind of freaking out, I don't know.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F005
label: neu
text: Did you ever think it might be your attitude that's...

name: Ses01M_impro04_M006
label: xxx
text: What's my--like what do you mean "my attitude"?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F006
label: neu
text: I don't know just sometimes you get kind of... No, I'm not saying that.  I just--

name: Ses01M_impro04_M007
label: xxx
text: Do I have an attitude problem?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M008
label: fru
text: No, well maybe it's because I'm like frustrated 'cause I can't get a job, you know.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F007
label: neu
text: ...has anyone ever just said anything like that to you before?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M009
label: fru
text: Like it's really hard to like shake that off when you go into like audition a room or whatever, you know what I mean?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F008
label: neu
text: Right, sure.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F009
label: neu
text: But I mean you kind of got to, you got to fake it 'til you feel it, right?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M010
label: fru
text: I guess I just getting really hard to fake, you know.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F010
label: neu
text: I'm just saying that if I was looking to hire somebody in the--or kind of... No. No. No.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M011
label: fru
text: Are you hiring? Wait, do you know of a job? Seriously, do you know, like do you know of anything though?  Like, oh please, do you know of anything?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F011
label: neu
text: No.  I'm just saying though that if I was a person who was hiring somebody I-- --would not hire someone who was angry or upset.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M012
label: fru
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M013
label: fru
text: I come across angry?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F012
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M014
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F013
label: neu
text: Well, you know a little.  If you were to listen to--

name: Ses01M_impro04_M015
label: fru
text: Okay.  You're my friend you can tell me stuff.  You can tell me honestly stuff, okay?  Please.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F014
label: neu
text: I just don't want you to fly off the handle.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M016
label: fru
text: Okay, I'm not flying off the handle I don't think I'm flying off the handle here at all.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F015
label: neu
text: You kind of have a short fuse.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M017
label: fru
text: I have a short fuse?

name: Ses01M_impro04_F016
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M018
label: ang
text: Okay. Okay no, no, no, no okay no, I need to hear this more. Come on, bring it.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F017
label: neu
text: Like this, right now we're trying have a conversation.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F018
label: neu
text: We're trying to have a conversation and you seem extremely hostile. You keep cutting me off.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M019
label: xxx
text: Well, it's 'cause I can't get a job, okay?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M020
label: fru
text: I'm not always right I'm just--

name: Ses01M_impro04_F019
label: neu
text: I can't finish the sentence with you without you jumping in...

name: Ses01M_impro04_F020
label: neu
text: ...and you're always right.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M021
label: xxx
text: fine okay.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F021
label: neu
text: You have an excuse for everything.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M022
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_impro04_F022
label: neu
text: I'm just saying that maybe you should take in some information before you produce more of your own.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M023
label: ang
text: I'm like a sponge I'm like soaked up with all this information for like three years I'm just dying for a job to like put it in to.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F023
label: neu
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_impro04_F024
label: fru
text: That's -.

name: Ses01M_impro04_M024
label: fru
text: You know, and like I don't think it's that much to ask. I know.

name: Ses01M_impro04_F025
label: neu
text: Well, what kind of field are you looking to go into?

name: Ses01M_impro04_M025
label: neu
text: That's it.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F000
label: fru
text: What he's going to say?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M000
label: neu
text: He saw it.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F001
label: sur
text: When?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M001
label: xxx
text: He was out here at four this morning.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F002
label: sur
text: How could he see it?  I was the first one up and he was still in bed.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M002
label: neu
text: I was out here at four this morning I heard a crack and I looked out the window and he was standing right over there.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F003
label: sur
text: What was he doing here at four in the morning?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M003
label: sad
text: I don't know.  But he went back in the kitchen and he cried.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F004
label: sad
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M004
label: sad
text: No.  I figured I'd just let it wait.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F005
label: sad
text: Cried hard?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M005
label: sad
text: Yeah, I could hear him crying through the floorboards in my room.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F006
label: sad
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F007
label: fru
text: What is he doing out here at that hour?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M006
label: sad
text: I don't know.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F008
label: ang
text: He's dreaming about him again, walking the streets.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M007
label: sad
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: It's getting to be just like after he died.  What is the meaning of that?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M008
label: fru
text: I don't know the meaning of it.  But I know we've made terrible mistake with father.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F010
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M009
label: xxx
text: I mean, these kinds of things, man they always come back at you.  And this is definitely coming back to us.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F011
label: ang
text: What do you mean a mistake?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M010
label: fru
text: I just--why shouldn't he walk the nights waiting for him, huh?  Do we contradict him do we say we don't have any hope any more that he's not coming back?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F012
label: fru
text: What do you want to do, argue with him?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M011
label: fru
text: I don't want to argue with him, it's just for God's sake it's time he realized that no one believes with him any more.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F013
label: xxx
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M012
label: fru
text: I got to.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F014
label: ang
text: What, can you prove it?  What proof do you have?  Can you prove it?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M013
label: fru
text: For God's sake, three years?  Nobody comes back after three years. It's insane.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F015
label: ang
text: To you it is, to me it is.  But to your father?  You can talk yourself 'til you're blue in the face but there's was no grave and there is no body.  So where are you?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M014
label: fru
text: Okay, all right.  Mom, sit down.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F016
label: ang
text: The trouble is those god damn news papers.  Every month some boy comes back missing longer then Larry so--

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: Yeah, okay all right, all right.  Listen, um, you know why I asked Annie here, right?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F017
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M016
label: xxx
text: You know.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Well, I've got an idea but what's the story?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: I'm going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F019
label: fru
text: Well, that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M018
label: fru
text: You know it's not just my business.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F020
label: ang
text: Well, what do you want me to do?  You're old enough known your own business.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: So it's okay then?  I'm just going to go ahead with it?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F021
label: xxx
text: You want to make sure that your father's not going to...

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M020
label: ang
text: See.  Then it's not just my business. Sometimes you infuriate me, you know that?  You know it's just your business too if I tell father and he throws a fit about it, huh?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F022
label: fru
text: I'm just saying.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F023
label: ang
text: I'm sorry.  I ignore what I've got to ignore. That girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: She is not Larry's girl.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F024
label: ang
text: From father's point of view he is not dead and you have no right to take his girl.  I'm just saying that you can go on from there if you know where to go but I'm saying I don't know where to go.  See, I don't know.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M022
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is you know every time I reach out for something I have to pull back 'cause I'm afraid it's going to hurt somebody.  All my life...

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F025
label: neu
text: You're a considerate fellow.  There's nothing wrong in that.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M023
label: ang
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F026
label: neu
text: Did you ask Annie yet?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M024
label: sad
text: No, I wanted to get this all sorted out first.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F027
label: fru
text: Well, how do you know she's going to marry you?  Maybe she feels same way your father does.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M025
label: xxx
text: Well, if she does then that's the end of it.  However from her letters I think she's pretty much forgotten him.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F028
label: fru
text: The trouble is you don't see enough women, you never did.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M026
label: fru
text: So what?  I'm just--I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F029
label: ang
text: I don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M027
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F030
label: ang
text: That's a good answer but it doesn't answer anything.  You haven't seen her since you went away to war, it's been five years.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M028
label: fru
text: I don't know, it I think of her, I grew up next to her.  She is what I think of when I think of a wife.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F031
label: sad
text: He thinks he's coming back, Chris.  You marry that girl you're pronouncing him dead.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F032
label: ang
text: Do you know what that'll do to you, to your father, do you know?  I don't.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M029
label: xxx
text: All right then.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F033
label: xxx
text: Give it some more thought.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M030
label: fru
text: I've given it lots of thought.  And I keep coming back to the same thing.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M031
label: fru
text: When I think of a family, when I think of my future I see Annie in the center of that and you know and if that can't happen here then I'll go somewhere else.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F034
label: sur
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M032
label: fru
text: I'll leave.  I'll get married and move somewhere else maybe New York.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F035
label: ang
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M033
label: xxx
text: I'll do it.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F036
label: ang
text: You have a business here.  I said what the hell is this?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M034
label: ang
text: Business?  The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F037
label: ang
text: Oh, must you be inspired.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M035
label: ang
text: Yes, yes I like it for one hour a day.  I don't care if I have to grub for money all day long when I come home I want it nice, I want a family, I want to kids and Annie is in the center of that.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M036
label: fru
text: If that can't happen here...

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F038
label: xxx
text: You mean to tell me you would leave the business for this.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M037
label: neu
text: Yes, on this I would.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F039
label: ang
text: Well, you don't want to think like that.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M038
label: sad
text: Then help me stay here mom.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F040
label: ang
text: All right but you don't think like that because what the hell is this all for.  This is all for you, what are we working for Chris? The whole shooting match is for you.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M039
label: xxx
text: I know, I know.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M040
label: sad
text: Then help me stay.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F041
label: ang
text: Well, you don't think like that.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M041
label: ang
text: I am thinking like that.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F042
label: ang
text: I don't understand you, do I?

name: Ses01M_script01_1_M042
label: sad
text: No, you don't.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses01M_script01_1_F043
label: ang
text: Well, I can see that.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M000
label: exc
text: Look at this, all of the hairs are standing up on my arm.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F000
label: neu
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M001
label: exc
text: Well, so, what do you think?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F001
label: neu
text: About what?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M002
label: neu
text: About what I was saying.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: I think it's ridiculous.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M003
label: xxx
text: It certainly is not.  It's slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: It's PR! Somebody sold you a bunch of crap that there is this wonderful thing that is going to happen tonight on the beach.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M004
label: fru
text: Not just me, look at all of these people.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Everybody's told the same story.  It keeps us coming back for more, it keeps us excited.  We keep thinking that life is going start at any minute if we can just find the right spot, get in on the action.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M005
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing, here?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F005
label: xxx
text: I'm sorry, it's just fish to me.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M006
label: neu
text: Carla, can I ask you something?  Now, don't take this the wrong way, but are you on your period?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F006
label: ang
text: Don't ask me that.  I hate it when you ask me that, you always ask me that.  It's insulting.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M007
label: fru
text: Well then, what's bugging you?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F007
label: fru
text: We just have different ideas of what this night is supposed to look like.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M008
label: fru
text: There is nothing to it; we come down here, the fish arrive, they flop around, they do their fish thing.  We go ooh, ah, look at the fish and we go home.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F008
label: ang
text: For God- Grow up, Augie.  The fish are not going to arrive.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M009
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F009
label: ang
text: Because they never do.  Have they...Have they ever?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M010
label: fru
text: We've missed them twice.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F010
label: ang
text: Twice is every time we have tried; that's ever.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: They'll show up this time.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F011
label: xxx
text: No they won't.  It's like waiting for Santa Claus.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: I feel like my whole life is going to be spent standing on this beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for fish to show up.  And the fish never show up.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M012
label: xxx
text: I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F013
label: fru
text: You don't understand anything I am saying.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: No. Of course not.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F014
label: xxx
text: I did want to see it, I still do, I always do.  I just...

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F015
label: sad
text: I feel like I'm always just standing here waiting.  I feel like this night is going to be the night, but it never is.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: It's just fish, it's nothing to get traumatized over.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F016
label: ang
text: For God's sake, this is not about fish.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M015
label: fru
text: Okay.  I'm trying to work this backwards and pinpoint the exact moment where we took a turn for the worst here.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M016
label: neu
text: Okay.  So you were fine during that phone call from Marge and then dinner was okay.  And doing the dishes was fine and then I was going to take a shower and you're watching the news and you said the grunions are running tonight, do you want to go?  And I said, sure great, let's go.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M017
label: neu
text: Okay.  So I am putting out the pets, getting the car out of the garage.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F017
label: neu
text: Do you remember the first year we came here?  It was like four years after we got married.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F018
label: xxx
text: We thought I was pregnant, we got a bottle of champagne, we had no glasses.  We took off our shoes and you asked me to dance.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F019
label: hap
text: You whispered the sweetest, most intimate things to me right into my ear so I could feel them as much as hear them.  And I remember thinking, this is it.  You know, finally, I am as happy as I'm supposed to be.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M018
label: xxx
text: Wait a minute, I got it.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F020
label: xxx
text: Drinking champagne from the bottle,

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M019
label: neu
text: It's when we were driving past that Knickerbocker Liquor Locker, you said, let's get some champagne.  I said no, time's a wasting or something like that.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F021
label: fru
text: dancing barefoot in the sand.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M020
label: fru
text: That's what it is?  Right?  You want this to be like the other time, right?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: I'd rather not remember some things.  I'd rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M021
label: neu
text: Sure.  All right.  Okay.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M022
label: neu
text: Listen, do you want to dance?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F023
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M023
label: neu
text: Do you want me to go get some champagne?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F024
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M024
label: hap
text: Do you want to take off your shoes?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F025
label: fru
text: No, no. Nothing.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M025
label: xxx
text: Then what?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M026
label: hap
text: Do you want to get married again?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F026
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M027
label: oth
text: What?  What?  Do you want a divorce?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M028
label: xxx
text: A vacation?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F027
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M029
label: xxx
text: Like a new carpet?  A poodle?  A back rub?  Ice cream?  A suicide pact?  What do you want?  What the hell do you want?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F028
label: xxx
text: I just want something to turn out like I expected it to.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M030
label: xxx
text: Well welcome to the human race, huh?  Do you think I had some grand fantasy going that four years down the line we would come to this beach and be arguing over fish?  No.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F029
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M031
label: fru
text: No I'm just like you.  I thought it was going to be all roses and peaches and the bills would just pay themselves.  And we'll have three, fat rosy cheeked children.  Huh, baby, the joke's on us.  Because you know what you get?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M032
label: fru
text: Do you know what you get?  You get this.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F030
label: fru
text: This? What is this?  This is nothing.  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M033
label: neu
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F031
label: xxx
text: Sure.  This is standing on the beach waiting.  This is fighting.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M034
label: xxx
text: Right

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F032
label: fru
text: I mean this is a lot of things, but it's just...

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M035
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F033
label: fru
text: Do you understand what I am saying?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M036
label: fru
text: I'm doing the best I can.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F034
label: sad
text: I know you are Augie, I know.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F035
label: sad
text: I know you meant this to be special, I know that you wanted it to be right, but I just can't help thinking that, I can't help wishing that I was somewhere else.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M037
label: sad
text: Maybe if you were with someone else, too.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F036
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M038
label: sad
text: I just- I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F037
label: sur
text: Don't be ridiculous.  Anything that- anything I am doing, I'd rather be doing it with you.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M039
label: sur
text: Yeah?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F038
label: sur
text: Yeah.  Don't you know that?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F039
label: xxx
text: For Heaven's sake Augie.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F040
label: sad
text: You're the one who probably wishes he was with somebody else.  Somebody who doesn't take things so seriously, who could enjoy herself.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M040
label: neu
text: You know, actually now that you mention it, no I don't.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F041
label: neu
text: So maybe we are in the wrong spot, but we are with the right person.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M041
label: fru
text: I don't know, it seemed like such a good spot to me.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M042
label: neu
text: We have a great view of the moon from here, though, huh?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F042
label: hap
text: Hmm.  I noticed that, it's pretty. Big old white moon.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M043
label: neu
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M044
label: hap
text: And look what I got here.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F043
label: hap
text: Augie, you bought refreshments.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M045
label: xxx
text: It's not champagne.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F044
label: hap
text: I guess we don't need glasses.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M046
label: hap
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M047
label: neu
text: Do you want to go home?  Are you cold?

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F045
label: hap
text: I'm beginning to think this might be the right spot after all.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F046
label: sad
text: Augie, I'm sorry.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M048
label: neu
text: Shh.  If we're very quiet, the fish might come.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_F047
label: neu
text: Or not.

name: Ses01F_script02_2_M049
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F000
label: neu
text: The only one I know still love his parents.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M000
label: hap
text: Yeah, that kind of went out of style didn't it?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F001
label: neu
text: Oh it's not bad thing it's good thing.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F002
label: xxx
text: You know it's nice here, the air is sweet.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M001
label: hap
text: You're not sorry you came?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F003
label: sad
text: Not sorry, no.  I can't stay here.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M002
label: sad
text: Why not?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F004
label: neu
text: For one thing your mother as much as told me to go.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M003
label: xxx
text: Well.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F005
label: sad
text: [BREATHING] And then you've been kind of...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M004
label: neu
text: What?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F006
label: sad
text: You've been kind of embarrassed ever since I got here.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: I was kind of planning on sneaking up on you, you know over like a course of a week or so. They just take for granted that we're already set.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F007
label: xxx
text: I knew they would, your mother anyway.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M006
label: neu
text: You did?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F008
label: neu
text: From her point of view why else would I come?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M007
label: neu
text: Yeah--

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M008
label: xxx
text: So then would you want to?  I mean I guess, you kind of have to know, maybe that's why I asked you to come.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F009
label: xxx
text: Well I guess that's why I came.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M009
label: hap
text: Ann, I love you.  I love you.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M010
label: xxx
text: I love you a great deal.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: I'm sorry I don't really have much of an imagination.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F010
label: xxx
text: Chris,

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: I'm sorry I'm embarrassing you, aren't I?  See, I didn't want to do it here I didn't on this porch, with this ring--I didn't want to win you away from anything.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F011
label: xxx
text: I've been ready a long, long time.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M013
label: xxx
text: So then he's gone.  You sure?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F012
label: neu
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M014
label: neu
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F013
label: xxx
text: You started to write me.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M015
label: xxx
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F014
label: exc
text: Everyday since.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M016
label: exc
text: why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F015
label: exc
text: Because I was waiting for you, Chris.  Till then you never wrote me and then when you did, well, you sure can be ambiguous you know.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M017
label: xxx
text: Oh Annie, why don't you go ahead and give me a kiss, come on just a...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M018
label: exc
text: I kissed you.  I kissed Annie.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F016
label: hap
text: I'll never forgive you for waiting so long.  All I did was sit around and wonder if I was crazy for thinking about you.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M019
label: hap
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do what like you, Chris.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F018
label: sad
text: Chris, what's the matter?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M020
label: sad
text: Do you want to go somewhere?  Let's go.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F019
label: sad
text: No, what is it?  Is your mother?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M021
label: sad
text: No, no, it's nothing like that.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F020
label: xxx
text: Well, then what?  You know, even in your letter you seem kind of ashamed.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M022
label: sad
text: I don't know it's--it's complicated. But it's going from me now.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F021
label: sad
text: You got to tell me.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: I don't know.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M024
label: sad
text: It's kind of all mixed up with all these other things.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F022
label: sad
text: Wouldn't work like this.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: you know over seas I was in command of the company?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F023
label: sad
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: Well I lost them.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F024
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: Pretty much all.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F025
label: sad
text: [BREATHING]. Geez.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: Takes awhile to toss something like that off.  I mean they weren't just men, you know.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: For instance, there was this one time when this kid--it had been raining for like several days and he gave me his last pair of dry socks.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: He just put it in my pocket that's the kind of guys I had.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: They didn't die they killed themselves for each other and I mean that exactly, you know a little more selfish and they'll all be here today...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: And I had this idea as I was watching them go down like everything was being destroyed, you know.  But I felt like this one new thing was being made, you know it's kind of like this.  This monument...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: You know, that they were bringing something on to this earth, a kind of sacrifice you know.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: I thought I would change everything you know, and I got back here and it was- it was like nothing had changed at all...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M035
label: sad
text: You know.  I went to work with dad and I started that whole rat race again...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M036
label: sad
text: And no one had changed it was just like sort of random bus accident to them.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M037
label: sad
text: Driving my new car and I felt guilty you know opening my bank book seeing a new refrigerator.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M038
label: sad
text: 'Cause you can take those things out of a war.  But you have to realize that those things came out of the love that a man can have for another man...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M039
label: sad
text: And if you can't see that then it's just loot and there's blood all over it.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M040
label: sad
text: I felt ashamed and I didn't want any part of it.  I guess I included you too.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F026
label: sad
text: Do you still feel that way?

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M041
label: sad
text: I want you to know Annie.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F027
label: xxx
text: 'Cause you mustn't feel that way.  Everything you have, you have a right to...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F028
label: xxx
text: Everything Chris do you understand that?  To me too...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F029
label: xxx
text: And your money there's nothing wrong in your money.  Your father put hundreds of planes into the air.  You should be proud of that a man should be paid for that.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M042
label: xxx
text: Annie...

name: Ses01M_script01_3_M043
label: hap
text: I'm going to make a fortune for you.

name: Ses01M_script01_3_F030
label: hap
text: What would I do with a fortune?

name: Ses01F_impro05_F000
label: fru
text: Hi.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M000
label: neu
text: Hi.  Thanks for waiting.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F001
label: fru
text: Yeah. This is the fourth line that I have been in.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M001
label: hap
text: Can I help you?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M002
label: hap
text: Uh huh.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F002
label: fru
text: I need my bag.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M003
label: neu
text: Okay.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F003
label: fru
text: I flew in over three hours ago, I've been in four different lines.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M004
label: neu
text: Okay.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F004
label: fru
text: I waited the entire baggage- I waited for the whole baggage carousel four times.  They told me to go to the next one.  I waited through that for three planes and now I'm here.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M005
label: neu
text: Okay.  Great.  I'm really sorry that you had to do that.  What's your last name?  Let's start there.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F005
label: fru
text: Nash.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M006
label: neu
text: Okay.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F006
label: xxx
text: No G.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M007
label: neu
text: all right- okay.  And you lost your bag? Is that- that the issue?

name: Ses01F_impro05_F007
label: fru
text: Yes.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F008
label: ang
text: Flight seven fourteen.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M008
label: neu
text: Uh-huh.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F009
label: ang
text: Am I going to be getting, like, free tickets, free mileage. When can I expect my bag here?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M009
label: neu
text: Yeah. Yeah, I don't see- I don't see any--

name: Ses01F_impro05_M010
label: neu
text: I don't see any record of it, and I-usually when I don't see a record of it, that means um-

name: Ses01F_impro05_M011
label: neu
text: we've mistakenly lost your baggage.  We're very sorry.  On behalf of Jet Blue I would like to apologize for any inconvenience.  I am allowed to issue you a fifty dollar gift card which you can use any future flights you want to take with us.  I'm very sorry, once again...

name: Ses01F_impro05_F010
label: xxx
text: Oh, Are you kidding me?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M012
label: neu
text: for such an inconvenience and your bag, but

name: Ses01F_impro05_F011
label: ang
text: Is this a joke?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M013
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M014
label: neu
text: No, no.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F012
label: ang
text: Are there candid cameras?  Is this that movie? There's that show, right?  Airplane, airline.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M015
label: neu
text: No, no.  This is real.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F013
label: xxx
text: So you'll give me money and then I'll get my bag?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M016
label: neu
text: No.  I'm just giving you money, the bag is gone.  If it's not here, I'm really sorry there is nothing I can do because...

name: Ses01F_impro05_M017
label: neu
text: this is the only track record that we have and if it's not listed here then it's probably not anywhere.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F014
label: ang
text: You're kidding me, this is a joke.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M018
label: xxx
text: Once again, I'm really- I'm really sorry.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F015
label: ang
text: Do you have any idea-- fifty dollars?  That's supposed to replace everything that I have?  Do you understand how much I have packed in there? Not only does it have sentimental value; it can't be replaced like that.  It was incredibly expensive.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M019
label: neu
text: Yes.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M020
label: neu
text: I know.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F016
label: ang
text: We flew in from Paris.  I've been shopping for three weeks.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M021
label: xxx
text: I'm very sorry.  But if you see the sign that's right behind me here, it spells it out really clearly that we are not held liable--

name: Ses01F_impro05_F017
label: ang
text: I don't care what you're freaking sign says.  Somebody- Somebody needs to replace everything I've got there and give me money for my inconvenience.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M022
label: neu
text: Okay. Calm-

name: Ses01F_impro05_M023
label: neu
text: Actually, we are not necessarily liable to give you- to even give you this fifty dollars so... it's actually- it's actually really

name: Ses01F_impro05_F018
label: ang
text: Do you understand who my husband is?

name: Ses01F_impro05_F019
label: ang
text: If you're- if you're- if you're looking for a lawsuit, baby, you've found it.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M024
label: neu
