text: We are actually not even allowed--  you know, like we don't have to give you this fifty dollars.  We don't have to do that.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F020
label: ang
text: Oh-Oh.  It's a gift.  You're-You're helping me out here?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M025
label: neu
text: It's a gift.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M026
label: neu
text: You know, the airlines can not be held responsible for every bag of luggage that comes through here.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F021
label: ang
text: You are cruising for a bruising.  You are in so much trouble.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M027
label: neu
text: With the amount of--

name: Ses01F_impro05_F022
label: ang
text: Who's in charge?  Who is the president of Jet Blue?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M028
label: neu
text: Um, actually, I don't know. I don't know. Oh really?

name: Ses01F_impro05_F023
label: ang
text: Because I probably know him.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F024
label: ang
text: Yeah.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M029
label: neu
text: Well then maybe you can just call him and he can give you more money.  But right now all I can do--

name: Ses01F_impro05_F025
label: ang
text: I don't want money, I want my clothes.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M030
label: neu
text: Right now all I can do is just give you this fifty dollars, I'm really sorry.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F026
label: ang
text: What's your name?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M031
label: neu
text: Oh.  My name is Sean. Hi.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F027
label: xxx
text: Sean.  Great. Do you have a badge number or something?

name: Ses01F_impro05_M032
label: sur
text: Badge number?  Uh, no.  You can just take my employee number I guess.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F028
label: ang
text: Okay.  I'll do that.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M033
label: sur
text: Why?  Have I done something wrong?  Have I given you bad service?  I feel like I have done the best I could.

name: Ses01F_impro05_F029
label: ang
text: I don't think you have done everything you could do because I don't have my bag here yet.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M034
label: neu
text: If you want, you can write a letter.  I can give you the address. Yes.  An angry--

name: Ses01F_impro05_F030
label: ang
text: A letter? I'll make a personal phone call.

name: Ses01F_impro05_M035
label: neu
text: Or you can make a phone call.  But I think a letter might be a little more-- in my impression, letters have more...

name: Ses01M_impro05_F000
label: neu
text: Can I help you?

name: Ses01M_impro05_M000
label: fru
text: Yes, please help me.  Where is my bag?

name: Ses01M_impro05_F001
label: neu
text: I need a little more information.

name: Ses01M_impro05_M001
label: fru
text: Where is my bag?  Come on, I've been here for four hours.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F002
label: neu
text: What- What flight did you come in on?

name: Ses01M_impro05_M002
label: fru
text: Okay, I'm coming in from Atlanta.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F003
label: neu
text: Georgia?

name: Ses01M_impro05_M003
label: xxx
text: Yes, Georgia.  Good for you I need my bag.  Can you...

name: Ses01M_impro05_F004
label: neu
text: There's no need for you to raise your voice, sir.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F005
label: neu
text: I've been college educated.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F006
label: neu
text: I speak your language.

name: Ses01M_impro05_M004
label: ang
text: Are you insinuating that I don't have a college education and that- for some reason that makes you a better person than I am?

name: Ses01M_impro05_M005
label: ang
text: Listen, shut your smug mouth, okay?  I don't need that.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F007
label: neu
text: I'm just saying you don't need to talk to me like I-

name: Ses01M_impro05_M006
label: ang
text: I've been sitting here for four hours.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F008
label: fru
text: I'm not a child.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F009
label: xxx
text: I've been here for sixteen.

name: Ses01M_impro05_M007
label: ang
text: You people have just been tossing me around like a used hanky.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F010
label: xxx
text: I come here every single day.

name: Ses01M_impro05_M008
label: ang
text: You work here.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F011
label: neu
text: Details, Details.  Well, anyhow can I--

name: Ses01M_impro05_F012
label: neu
text: so you flew in from Atlanta...

name: Ses01M_impro05_M009
label: fru
text: My bag from Atlanta.

name: Ses01M_impro05_F013
label: neu
text: Four...Four hours ago.

name: Ses01M_impro05_M010
label: fru
text: It's a little black bag with wheels.

label: neu
text: Do you have any i-?

name: Ses01M_impro05_M011
label: xxx
text: That you wouldn't let me put in the overhead compartment.  You said I had to check it.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F012
label: neu
text: Who's they?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M013
label: neu
text: All those futile moralists that try to make life unbearable.  Laugh at them.  Be flippant.  Laugh at everything.  All their sacred shibboleths.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M014
label: neu
text: Flippancy brings out the acid in their damn sweetness and light.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F013
label: neu
text: If I laugh at everything, then I must laugh at us too.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M015
label: neu
text: Certainly, you must.  We're figures of fun, alright.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F014
label: neu
text: Well how long will it last us, this ludicrous overbearing love of ours.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M016
label: neu
text: Who knows.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F015
label: neu
text: Well, shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M017
label: neu
text: No, that desire will fade.  Along with our passion.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F016
label: neu
text: Oh, dear, shall we like that?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M018
label: neu
text: Depends on how well we've played.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F017
label: neu
text: Well, what happens if one of us dies?  I mean, does the one that's left still laugh?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M019
label: exc
text: Yes.  Yes. With all his might.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F018
label: xxx
text: That's serious enough, isn't it?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M020
label: exc
text: No. No, it isn't.  Death is very laughable.  Such a cunning little mystery.  All done with mirrors.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F019
label: hap
text: Darling, I believe you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M021
label: neu
text: So is everyone else in the long run.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M022
label: exc
text: Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers.  Let's blow our trumpets and squeakers and enjoy the party as much as we can.  Like quite idiotic, very small school children.  Let's savor the delight of the moment.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M023
label: exc
text: Come and kiss me, darling, before your body rots and worms pop in and out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F020
label: hap
text: Elliott, worms don't pop.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M024
label: neu
text: I don't care what you do.  See, you could paint yourself green and dance naked in the Place Vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word.  As long as you love me best.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F021
label: hap
text: Oh, thank you, dear.  The same applies to you except that if I catch so much as looking at another woman, I'll kill you.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M025
label: neu
text: You remember that awful scene we had in Venice?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F022
label: hap
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M026
label: neu
text: The one when you bought that little painted wooden snake in the Piazza and put it on my bed.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F023
label: hap
text: Charles.  That was his name.  Charles.  He did wriggle so beautifully.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M027
label: xxx
text: Ah, horrible thing.  I hated it.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F024
label: hap
text: Yes, I know you did.  You threw it out of the window into the Grand Canal.  I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M028
label: neu
text: How long did that row last?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F025
label: hap
text: It went in intermittently for days.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M029
label: neu
text: The worst one was in Cannes when your curling iron burnt a hole in my new dressing gown.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F026
label: hap
text: It burned my comb too and all the towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M030
label: xxx
text: That was a rouser, wasn't it?

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F027
label: neu
text: That was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M031
label: neu
text: I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F028
label: hap
text: The manager came in and found us rolling around on the floor, biting and scratching like panthers.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M032
label: exc
text: Oh, I'll never forget his face.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F029
label: exc
text: It was ridiculous.  Completely ridiculous.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M033
label: neu
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_F030
label: xxx
text: And very much sillier.

name: Ses02F_script03_1_M034
label: neu
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F000
label: ang
text: Why did he invite her here?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M000
label: xxx
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F001
label: ang
text: She's been in New York three and half years why all of a sudden-

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well, maybe he just wanted to see her again.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F002
label: ang
text: Nobody comes seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M002
label: fru
text: What do you mean? He lived next door to the girl all his life, why wouldn't he want to see her again?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M003
label: fru
text: Don't look at me like that, he didn't tell me any more than he told you.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F003
label: ang
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M004
label: neu
text: How do you know he's even thinking of it?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F004
label: xxx
text: It's got that all about it.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M005
label: neu
text: Well, so what?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F005
label: ang
text: What's going on here Joe?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M006
label: xxx
text: All right. Now, listen kid-

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F006
label: ang
text: -She's not his girl Joe; she knows she's not.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M007
label: neu
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F007
label: fru
text: Then why is she still single, I mean New York is full of men, why isn't she married? Probably a hundred people told her she's crazy but she's waited.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M008
label: fru
text: How do you know why she has waited?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F008
label: fru
text: She knows what I know, that's why. She's faithful as a rock. In my worst moments I think of her waiting and I know again that I'm right.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: Look it's a nice day, what are we arguing for?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F009
label: fru
text: Nobody in this house dares take her faith away Joe. Strangers might, but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do about it?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F010
label: ang
text: I want you to act like he's coming back, both of you. Don't you think I haven't noticed since he invited her, I won't stand for any nonsense

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: But Kate

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F011
label: fru
text: Because if he's not coming back, I'll kill myself. And laugh -- laugh at me but

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F012
label: xxx
text: why did that happen the very night she came back she sleeps in his room and suddenly his memorial breaks to pieces, just look at it, look.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F013
label: sad
text: I need you to believe with me; I can't stand all alone.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F014
label: fru
text: Even last week there was a man who showed up in Detroit missing longer than Larry, you read it yourself.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M014
label: fru
text: All right. All right. Calm yourself.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F015
label: fru
text: Just you above all need to believe.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M015
label: xxx
text: Wait, why my above all?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F016
label: fru
text: Don't stop believing.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: What does that mean, me above all?

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: Look at you -- look at you shaking.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_F017
label: fru
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses02M_script01_2_M018
label: fru
text: What have I got to hide? What the hell is the matter with you, Kate?

name: Ses02M_impro04_M000
label: fru
text: Uhm, I don't know

name: Ses02M_impro04_F000
label: neu
text: So how you feeling?

name: Ses02M_impro04_M001
label: fru
text: I don't know what I'm going to do about this; I mean

name: Ses02M_impro04_M002
label: fru
text: I have got to get a job, you know? Like-

name: Ses02M_impro04_F001
label: neu
text: You've been doing a lot of work for it, right?

name: Ses02M_impro04_M003
label: fru
text: Well, yea you know, I get my resumes and I mean I-

name: Ses02M_impro04_F002
label: neu
text: Right, so the fact you doing the best that you can is -

name: Ses02M_impro04_M004
label: fru
text: I go out all the places I can, every place that'll give an interview you know.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F003
label: neu
text: you know you shouldn't give yourself a hard time for that, it's the best you can.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M005
label: fru
text: But it's been so long, like what - what am I - what am I waiting -- I should probably just do something else, or

name: Ses02M_impro04_F004
label: neu
text: Well, but you care about what you do, right?

name: Ses02M_impro04_M006
label: fru
text: I don't know, I mean why - why

name: Ses02M_impro04_M007
label: fru
text: Yea, but it's - it's almost like it's not worth it you know, if I'm going to waste to have my life like trying to get a job, I mean once I actually do get the job it's like oh, retirement or something. I don't know, you know.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F005
label: neu
text: I understand that it's so frustrating but I know that you're here because you really want it you know and, and uh

name: Ses02M_impro04_M008
label: xxx
text: Well, and that's what I begin to question after a while is maybe I just don't want it, maybe it's not even worth it, you know, like

name: Ses02M_impro04_M009
label: fru
text: I don't even know if it's going to be worth it because I can't break myself in, you know like I can't - can't even get a foot in the door you know.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F006
label: neu
text: Well, I mean you're still here you've tried for this long so I think that says something all in itself.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M010
label: fru
text: Yea, it says I'm stupid enough to be trying this long and not move on somewhere else.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F007
label: neu
text: You are persistence. I mean that's important. that's

name: Ses02M_impro04_M011
label: fru
text: I mean, I can't- I can't be persistent forever, you know, you can't not have a job forever, you know, I've got- I've got to do something, I've got to make money and get food on the table.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F008
label: neu
text: Well, you're talented so keep that in mind, you know, you shouldn't give yourself too hard of a time.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M012
label: fru
text: I mean, maybe I'm not, you know. I don't have a job. Maybe - maybe I'm not as good as-as I thought I was and

name: Ses02M_impro04_M013
label: fru
text: I just got a whole skewed opinion on just how this is supposed to work out and

name: Ses02M_impro04_F009
label: sad
text: I'm sorry.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M014
label: sad
text: I don't know, it's just not, I don't know - I don't know what to do really, you know, I'm just thinking

name: Ses02M_impro04_M015
label: fru
text: maybe - maybe take up painting, I don't know, you know.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M016
label: fru
text: Do something that I don't have to go out and do something, stay at home, I don't know.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M017
label: fru
text: Seems like the only option at this point because obviously the outer world has just rejected me of all possible employment.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F010
label: neu
text: That's- I mean. There are more factors then just whether you're good or not, you know what I mean like

name: Ses02M_impro04_F011
label: neu
text: and the fact that you know there is always different types of things and what kind of people they want in the office and whether it's male or female or you know what I mean, like things are out of your control.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F012
label: neu
text: So you should take that in consideration rather than giving yourself such a hard time.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M018
label: fru
text: I know, but I mean- if that's the - you know, I'm either like the worst at this or just the most unlucky person on the planet I mean this doesn't

name: Ses02M_impro04_F013
label: xxx
text: It might be the latter I don't know because you're not the worst, I mean you're great, you very talented at what you do.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M019
label: ang
text: this doesn't happen to a normal person.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F014
label: neu
text: You know and the fact you still here and still cooking, like it's good that you're thinking about it, that you're reconsidering.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F015
label: neu
text: But like, just because you're considering why it's been so difficult doesn't mean you should just stop.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M020
label: fru
text: I mean, I don't know, I don't see - I don't see any other way - any other way around it right now.

name: Ses02M_impro04_F016
label: neu
text: Maybe you should take a little break from it, but I don't think you should stop.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M021
label: xxx
text: What am I going to do on a break?

name: Ses02M_impro04_F017
label: xxx
text: Get out of town or something, I mean you need - you need to clear your head 'cause you seem like you're really frustrated about it. I mean you need to like, be excited about you're doing, rather than, you know upset.

name: Ses02M_impro04_M022
label: sad
text: Right. Thanks for talking to me.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F000
label: xxx
text: What's he gonna say?  Maybe we ought to tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M000
label: xxx
text: He saw it.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F001
label: xxx
text: How could he see it?  I was the first one up, he was still in bed.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M001
label: xxx
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F002
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M002
label: xxx
text: About four this morning.  I heard it cracking and I woke up and looked out. He was standing right here when it cracked.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four in the morning?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M003
label: xxx
text: I don't know.  When it cracked, he ran back in the house and cried in the kitchen.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F004
label: sad
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M004
label: xxx
text: No.  I thought it was best to leave him alone.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F005
label: sad
text: He cried hard?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M005
label: xxx
text: I could hear him right through the floor of my room.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F006
label: sad
text: What was he doing out here at that hour?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F007
label: xxx
text: He's dreaming about him again.  He's walking around at night.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M006
label: xxx
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F008
label: xxx
text: He's getting just like after he died.  What is the meaning of that?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M007
label: xxx
text: I don't know the meaning of it.  But, I know one thing Mom, we made a terrible mistake with Dad.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Being dishonest with him.  I mean, that sort of thing always pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F010
label: xxx
text: What you mean dishonest?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M009
label: xxx
text: You know that Larry's not coming back and I know it.  Why do we allow him to go on thinking that we believe with him?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F011
label: fru
text: What do you want to do argue with him?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M010
label: xxx
text: No, I don't want to argue with him, but it's about time he realized that nobody believes Larry's alive anymore?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M011
label: ang
text: Why shouldn't he dream of him and walk the nights waiting for him?  Do we contradict him?  Do we say straight out that we don't have any hope anymore?  That we haven't had hope for years now?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F012
label: fru
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M012
label: fru
text: We've got to say it to him.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F013
label: fru
text: Can you prove it?  How can you prove it?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M013
label: ang
text: For God sakes, it's been three years.  Nobody comes back after three years.  It's insane.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F014
label: fru
text: To you it is and to me, but not to him.  I mean, you can talk yourself blue in the face, but he--there's no body and no grave so where are you?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Sit down, Mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F015
label: xxx
text: Trouble is the God damn newspapers.  Every month or so a boy turns up out of nowhere so, you know, the next one is gonna be Larry.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: All right.  All right.  Listen to me.  You know why I brought Annie here don't you?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M016
label: xxx
text: You know.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F017
label: sad
text: I've got an idea, but what's the story?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: I'm gonna ask her to marry me.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F018
label: neu
text: Well, that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M018
label: fru
text: You know it's not only my business.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F019
label: ang
text: What do you want me to do?  You're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: So it's all right then?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M020
label: fru
text: I'll go ahead with it?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Well, you want to make sure that your father isn't going to--

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: Well, then it isn't just my business--

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F021
label: neu
text: I'm just saying that--

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M022
label: xxx
text: Ah, sometimes you infuriate me.  You know that?  I mean, isn't it your business too if I tell Dad and flips--freaks out about it?  I mean, you have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F022
label: xxx
text: I ignore what I gotta ignore.  The girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M023
label: ang
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F023
label: fru
text: From your father's point of view, he isn't dead.  And you've no right to take his girl.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F024
label: fru
text: And you can go on from there if you know where to go, but I don't know where to go.  See, I don't know.  Now what can I do for you?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M024
label: fru
text: I don't know why, but, every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back 'cause someone else will suffer.  My whole bloody life.  Time after time after time.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F025
label: neu
text: You're a considerate fellow.  There's nothing wrong with that.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M025
label: ang
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F026
label: neu
text: [BREATHING] Have you asked Annie yet?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M026
label: xxx
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F027
label: neu
text: Well, how do you know she'll marry you?  Maybe she feels the same way your father does.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M027
label: sad
text: Well, if she does, then that's the end of it.  But from her letters, I think she's forgotten him.  I'll find out.  And then we'll thrash it out with Dad, right?  Mom, don't avoid me.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F028
label: sad
text: Trouble is, you don't see enough women.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F029
label: fru
text: You never did.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M028
label: xxx
text: So what, I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F030
label: fru
text: I just don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M029
label: neu
text: Because it is.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F031
label: fru
text: Well, that's a good answer, but it doesn't answer anything.  I mean, you've been away for--at war.  It's been five years.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M030
label: xxx
text: I can't help it.  I know her best.  I mean, I grew up next door to her.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M031
label: fru
text: These years when I think of a wife, I think of Annie.  What do you want, a diagram?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F032
label: fru
text: I don't want a diagram.  Umm-- He thinks he's coming back, Chris.  You marry that girl and you're pronouncing him dead.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F033
label: fru
text: I mean, what's gonna happen to your father?  Do you know?  I don't.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M032
label: fru
text: All right.  All right, then, Mom.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F034
label: fru
text: I just--give it some more thought.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M033
label: fru
text: I've given it three years of thought.  I thought that if I waited Dad would forget about Larry and we could have a regular wedding and everything happy.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M034
label: xxx
text: But if I can't--if that can't happen here, then I'll have to get out.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F035
label: sur
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M035
label: xxx
text: I'll get out.  I'll get married and go live some place else.  Maybe New York.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F036
label: ang
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M036
label: ang
text: I've been a good son too long.  A good sucker.  I'm through with it.

name: Ses02F_script01_1_F037
label: ang
text: What about the business?  What the hell is this?

name: Ses02F_script01_1_M037
label: ang

label: xxx
text: Did you have a good ring? You better have had a good ring.

name: Ses02M_impro03_M028
label: hap
text: Sure. Oh, yes.

name: Ses02M_impro03_F026
label: xxx
text: Good. The ring makes all the difference.

name: Ses02M_impro03_M029
label: xxx
text: You know I had my mom come along maybe help me out a little bit because she's got good taste. but

name: Ses02M_impro03_F027
label: xxx
text: Oh, that's awesome.

name: Ses02M_impro03_M030
label: exc
text: Yes, well, Thanks, thanks. Thank you. yeah

name: Ses02M_impro03_F028
label: exc
text: Yay, well congratulations, that's so cool. [BREATHING] I can't wait.

name: Ses02M_impro03_M031
label: hap
text: Hah.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M000
label: neu
text: So what do you think?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F000
label: xxx
text: About what?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M001
label: neu
text: What I was saying.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F001
label: fru
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M002
label: neu
text: Certainly it's not. Slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: It's PR. Someone sold you a bill of goods that this wonderful event is going to take place on the beach.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M003
label: xxx
text: Well, I'm not the only one look at all these people.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: Yea, sure everyone was sold the same story. I mean it keeps us all excited, keeps us coming back for more, keeps us thinking that life is going to start any second now if we can just get in on the action and find the right spot.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M004
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F004
label: xxx
text: I'm sorry but it's still just fish to me.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M005
label: fru
text: Carla, can I ask you something? Don't take this wrong but are you having your period?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F005
label: ang
text: Goddamn it Augie don't ask me that. I hate it when you ask me that. You always ask me that. It's insulting.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: Well, what's bugging you?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F006
label: ang
text: We just have different ideas of what this evening is supposed to look like.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M007
label: fru
text: There is nothing to it, we come here, the Grunion arrive, then do their little fish business, we go oh ah look, they go home, we go home.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F007
label: fru
text: For heavens sake we are not going to see the Grunions.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M008
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: We never do, do we? I mean have we ever?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M009
label: fru
text: We've missed them twice; that's not ever.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F009
label: fru
text: Twice is every time we've tried, that's ever.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M010
label: neu
text: Well, we'll see them this year.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F010
label: fru
text: No we won't; it's pointless. It's like waiting up to see Santa Claus,

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F011
label: ang
text: I mean I feel like my whole life is going to be spent standing on the beach waiting for the fish to show up with my eyes open and my hands clasped expectantly and the fish won't show up.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: I thought you wanted to see them.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: You don't understand anything I'm saying.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: No of course not.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F013
label: ang
text: I did want to see them, I always do. I mean I keep thinking that this is going to be the time and it never is.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M013
label: xxx
text: It's just fish, I mean nothing to get traumatized over.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F014
label: fru
text: For heavens sake this isn't about fish.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: All right. I've been trying to work this backwards but I cannot seem to pinpoint the moment that we took a turn for the worst.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M015
label: neu
text: You were fine during the phone call from Marge, dinner was okay, doing the dishes was no problem, let's see, I took a shower, you watched the news, you said

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M016
label: neu
text: "the Grunion are running tonight," I said "great, let's go, I feel lucky,"

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M017
label: neu
text: okay so I'm getting on my jacket and putting out the animals, getting the car out of the garage-

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F015
label: sad
text: Do you remember the first time we came to see it? It was about four years ago right after we got married.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F016
label: sad
text: We thought I was pregnant and we opened a bottle of champagne but no glasses, you asked me to dance, we kicked off our shoes and you popped the cork.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F017
label: sad
text: And when we were dancing you said the softest most intimate things to me right into my ears so I could feel them as much as hear them

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: and I remember thinking that this is it you know. At last, at last I am as happy as I am supposed to be

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M018
label: xxx
text: Wait a minute I've got it

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F019
label: sad
text: Just dancing barefoot in the sand, drinking champagne out of the bottle.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M019
label: exc
text: It was in the car, right? Driving past the Knickerbocker Liquor Locker you said, let's get some champagne and I said times are wasting or something like that, right?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M020
label: exc
text: Of course, I see it now; you want this to be like that other time, right? That's it, right?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F020
label: sad
text: I'd rather not remember some things. I would rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M021
label: neu
text: Yea. Okay, sure, no. I see. Listen, you want to dance?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F021
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M022
label: neu
text: You want to go get some champagne?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M023
label: neu
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F023
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M024
label: xxx
text: What, you want me to breathe in your ear?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F024
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M025
label: neu
text: Get married again?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F025
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M026
label: fru
text: What? What? You want a divorce?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F026
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M027
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F027
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M028
label: fru
text: A new carpet? A poodle, a ice cream, backrub, a suicide pact, what, what Carla, what the hell do you want?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F028
label: fru
text: I want something to turn out the way that it supposed to.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M029
label: ang
text: Well welcome to the human race, all right. Do you think this is what I had in mind when I proposed? You think I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road we'd come to the beach and yell at each other over fish?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M030
label: xxx
text: You think I knew that there be times when you'd look at me like I'm a used Kleenex, or that I'd look at you and think holy hell when is the next flight to Alaska?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M031
label: fru
text: No, no, just like you I thought it was going to be all like peaches and roses and sand in our toes, and wind in our hair, and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and we'll have three, fat, rosy kids and ha-ha baby the joke is on us

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M032
label: fru
text: 'cause you know what you get Carla, you know what you get? This.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F029
label: fru
text: This? What, what is this? This isn't even anything.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M033
label: xxx
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F030
label: fru
text: I'm sure, this is standing on the beach, this is waiting, this is fighting.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M034
label: xxx
text: Right.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F031
label: sad
text: Well, but this isn't anything like I thought anything would be like.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M035
label: sad
text: No, I know. Me neither.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F032
label: fru
text: I mean it's -- this is just this. I mean it includes a lot and everything but isn't something else. Do you have any idea what I'm trying to say?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M036
label: xxx
text: I'm doing the best I can.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F033
label: xxx
text: I know that Augie. Really I do.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F034
label: sad
text: I know that you meant this to be special and nice, and there's the sand and the moon and everything but I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M037
label: sad
text: Maybe if you were with somebody else too.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F035
label: xxx
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M038
label: sad
text: No, I know. But still, I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F036
label: xxx
text: For heavens sake, whatever I'm doing I'd rather be doing it with you.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M039
label: xxx
text: Yeah?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F037
label: hap
text: Don't be ridiculous. I mean don't you know that?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F038
label: sad
text: You're the one who probably wishes he was with someone else, someone who knew how to enjoy herself and didn't take everything so hard.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M040
label: hap
text: Now that you mention it. No, I don't.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F039
label: xxx
text: Okay.  Fine, so we're in the wrong spot but we're with the right person.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M041
label: hap
text: I don't know it seemed like a pretty good spot to me. Look at the moon - view the moon view I got from here.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F040
label: xxx
text: Yes, I noticed that. It looks pretty on the water doesn't it? Big old white moon.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M042
label: hap
text: What have we got here?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F041
label: xxx
text: Augie, you brought refreshments.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M043
label: xxx
text: It's not champagne.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F042
label: hap
text: Well, I guess we don't need glasses.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M044
label: xxx
text: You still cold? Do you want my jacket? Do you want to go home?

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F043
label: xxx
text: No. No. I think you might be right. I think this may be the spot after all.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F044
label: sad
text: Augie, I'm sorry.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M045
label: hap
text: Shh, if we're very quiet the fish might come.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F045
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_M046
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses02M_script02_2_F046
label: neu
text: Hmm.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F000
label: neu
text: Hi. Excuse me.  Um, I'd like to put in this application for my registration.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M000
label: neu
text: Hi.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M001
label: neu
text: Okay.  Let me see here.  Um, we need--we need your original birth certificate.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F001
label: sur
text: My--my original birth certificate?  But I don't carry that with me.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M002
label: neu
text: Right.  Well.  We still need it.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F002
label: xxx
text: Well, I have my driver's license, does that work?

name: Ses02F_impro01_M003
label: xxx
text: No. no  Uh, no one told you that you needed your original birth certificate.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F003
label: fru
text: No it doesn't say it on the form.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F004
label: fru
text: I mean it just says that you need some form of identification, but it doesn't say what kind of identification.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: I mean if I had known--I would have brought it.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M004
label: neu
text: um Sorry.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M005
label: fru
text: Okay.  Um, I'm sorry but I--I can't help you.  You're gonna have to go back and uh...

name: Ses02F_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: Look, I've been waiting in line for a really long time.  I mean, you've seen how long it is.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: It's lunch hour.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: Right.  It's the D.M.V..

name: Ses02F_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: I know, it gets long, but I can't do anything without your--do you have Social Security card, maybe?

name: Ses02F_impro01_F008
label: fru
text: Well, no.  I mean, I don't carry my original documents with me because if those things get destroyed, then what do you, you know what I mean, like if I loose my wallet or something, I'll never have them again.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F009
label: fru
text: I have my passport and I have my driver's license. And that's all I have.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: Alright, I don't know what to tell you right.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: I think you're just gonna--you're gonna have to get 'em and then you can back and then, we'll help you out.  Maybe, we can-

name: Ses02F_impro01_F010
label: fru
text: But, isn't there anything you can do.  Can't you make an exception this one time?  My picture is on both of those identifications.  It's not like you don't know that it's me.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M010
label: fru
text: I can't.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F011
label: fru
text: And I can give you my social--

name: Ses02F_impro01_M011
label: fru
text: I make an exception for you and I have to make an exception for everyone.  I mean, I-I've seen this before and I know it's frustrating, but there's nothing I can do. You just have to-

name: Ses02F_impro01_F012
label: fru
text: Well, I can give you my Social Security Number.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M012
label: fru
text: No, it's--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F013
label: fru
text: And I can tell you where I was born and what time and by who and what day.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M013
label: fru
text: Okay.  But how do I--that's- that's not proof to me.  How do I know that, you know, that it's really you.  I need--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F014
label: fru
text: I can't go--I have to go back to work.  I don't have time to go back to my house and get all of that stuff and then get back in line and wait for another forty five minutes.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M014
label: fru
text: Well, the weekends are not as busy.  Maybe you can uh, come and try to get here early--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F015
label: fru
text: Um, I have kids.  I have to take them places on the weekends.  I don't have time to come back here.  Please.  I really need you to help me.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M015
label: fru
text: I can't.  There's nothing I can do.  I'm sorry.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F016
label: fru
text: Well.  [BREATHING] I just--I just don't.  I-I'm sorry that I'm standing here-- But I can't leave. I-

name: Ses02F_impro01_M016
label: xxx
text: The line--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F017
label: fru
text: I really need this done today.  As you can see, the deadline is almost up and I can't come back.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M017
label: ang
text: Ok, but you're right now you're holding up more people in line by standing here-- and letting

name: Ses02F_impro01_F018
label: ang
text: Well, why didn't the D.M.V. put that you needed your birth certificate on the application then?

name: Ses02F_impro01_M018
label: fru
text: I--when you're going to the D.M.V., you usually need pretty professional identification--

name: Ses02F_impro01_M019
label: ang
text: You know, Official documentation--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F019
label: ang
text: Yeah, but your birth certificate--I mean, who carries around their birth certificate?  Nobody does that.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M020
label: fru
text: No, but you come--you come to the D.M.V., it's something-- You should've- You should've figured--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F020
label: ang
text: With your driver's license and your passport.  Just like everybody else.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M021
label: fru
text: But, without your drive--where-where- what about your identification without your driver's license?  I mean, you need--you needed something before then?

name: Ses02F_impro01_F021
label: ang
text: Who--you always use your driver's license.  I mean, you're not coming to the D.M.V. if you're not over sixteen and that's when you get your driver's license so you're never gonna need it anyway.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M022
label: fru
text: All right.  Well, um, you know, I'd love to help you, but--nothing I can do.

name: Ses02F_impro01_M023
label: fru
text: So, if you wanna go get your birth certificate, um, maybe come back--I don't--maybe you can talk to the person in the--in the front of line maybe.  I don't know.

name: Ses02F_impro01_F022
label: fru
text: Do you have a supervisor?

name: Ses02F_impro01_M024
label: fru
text: I am the supervisor.  So--

name: Ses02F_impro01_F023
label: fru
text: Well, thank you very much.  You've been very helpful.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F000
label: xxx
text: Why did he invite her here?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M000
label: xxx
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F001
label: xxx
text: She's been in New York for three and half years.  Why all of a sudden?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well, maybe he just wanted to see her again.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Nobody comes seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M002
label: neu
text: What do you mean?  He lived next door to the girl all his life.  Why wouldn't he want to see her again?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M003
label: xxx
text: Don't look at me like that.  He didn't tell me anymore than he told you.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: She's not-

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M004
label: neu
text: How do you know he's even thinking of it?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F004
label: oth
text: -he's not gonna marry her.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F005
label: ang
text: It's got that all about it.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M005
label: neu
text: Well, so what?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F006
label: xxx
text: What's going on here, Joe?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M006
label: neu
text: Now, listen Kate.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F007
label: xxx
text: She's not his girl, Joe.  She knows she's not.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M007
label: neu
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F008
label: fru
text: Well then why is she still single?  I mean, New York is full of men.  Why isn't she married?  Probably a hundred people told her she's crazy, but she's waited.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M008
label: neu
text: How do you know why she's waited?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F009
label: fru
text: She knows what I know, that's why.  She's faithful as a rock.  In my worst moments I think of her waiting and I know again that I'm right.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: Look, it's a nice day.  What are we arguing for?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F010
label: xxx
text: Nobody in this house dares take her faith away, Joe?  Strangers might, but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: Well, what do you want me to do about it?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F011
label: fru
text: I want you to act like he's coming back.  Both of you.  Don't you think I haven't noticed since she got here.  I won't stand for any nonsense.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: But Kate--

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F012
label: ang
text: Because if he's not coming back, I'll kill myself.  I mean, laugh--laugh at me, but...

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F013
label: ang
text: But why did that happen the very night she came here?  She sleeps in his room and his memorial breaks to pieces.  Just look.  Look at it.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F014
label: fru
text: Believe with me, Joe.  I can't stand all alone.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F015
label: fru
text: Last week, a man turned up in Detroit missing longer than Larry.  I mean, you read it yourself.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M014
label: fru
text: All right.  All right.  Calm yourself.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F016
label: fru
text: You, above all, have to believe.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M015
label: xxx
text: What?- Why- Why me above all?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F017
label: fru
text: Just--just don't stop believing.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: What does that mean?  Me above all?

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: Look at you.  Look at you shaking.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_F018
label: fru
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses02F_script01_2_M018
label: ang
text: What have I got to hide?  What the hell is the matter with you Kate?

name: Ses02F_impro07_M000
label: neu
text: So, how's it going?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F000
label: xxx
text: It's going really well.  Um, I received something in the mail today.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M001
label: exc
text: Oh, you got what?  Where?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F001
label: exc
text: I got into U.S.C.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M002
label: exc
text: Oh, no way.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F002
label: exc
text: Yeah, I'm so excited.  So I'm gonna say--

name: Ses02F_impro07_M003
label: exc
text: Are you gonna go? you gonna-

name: Ses02F_impro07_F003
label: exc
text: Yeah, I think, I mean because where else would I gonna go?  Like the other places that I applied to I really didn't like that much anyway.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F004
label: exc
text: So--

name: Ses02F_impro07_M004
label: exc
text: Wow, that's...

name: Ses02F_impro07_M005
label: exc
text: ...that's first choice, huh? That's so awesome and now look you're gonna be--you're gonna be here. you know

name: Ses02F_impro07_F005
label: exc
text: Yeah, I know.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F006
label: exc
text: Absolutely. I'm so excited.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F007
label: exc
text: I know.  I know. And we'll all get to hang out.  And I'm--even though we'll be at like at different parts of the city, we can still, like...

name: Ses02F_impro07_F008
label: exc
text: ...hang out and, like, have our different lives--And meet each other's friends and stuff.  So, I'm just so glad 'cause they have such a good school

name: Ses02F_impro07_M006
label: exc
text: Yeah, no, definitely--It's gonna..

name: Ses02F_impro07_M007
label: exc
text: Yeah.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F009
label: exc
text: and like-- The football team--And like all the-...you- what I mean, like...

name: Ses02F_impro07_M008
label: exc
text: Yeah

name: Ses02F_impro07_M009
label: exc
text: Fight on.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F010
label: exc
text: You can walk somewhere and be anywhere in the country and be like, oh, yeah, I am at U.S.C.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F011
label: exc
text: And you know what, you know what I mean, like it's recognizable rather than just being like I went some random school. It's like people really know what you...

name: Ses02F_impro07_M010
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses02F_impro07_M011
label: exc
text: Wow. That's cool.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F012
label: exc
text: ...like, they feel like--I feel like it's going to be so like accomplished.  Do you know what I mean?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F013
label: exc
text: Like it has some prestige. so

name: Ses02F_impro07_M012
label: xxx
text: Yeah. Hey. Prestigious school.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M013
label: xxx
text: So, what, do you have to send in your deposit now?  Or what you-?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F014
label: exc
text: Yeah, I mean there's all the money stuff and my mom's helping me with the financial aid and stuff.  But, it'll be fine--

name: Ses02F_impro07_F015
label: exc
text: Like, now that I'm accepted, it's just, like, such a huge load off my mind.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M014
label: xxx
text: That's great.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F016
label: exc
text: I don't mind worrying about all the paperwork.  You know--

name: Ses02F_impro07_M015
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M016
label: neu
text: So...

name: Ses02F_impro07_F017
label: exc
text: Because, I don't have to like make that decision anymore.  I don't have to try and decide, like, what the bad school I'm going to go to is. you know

name: Ses02F_impro07_M017
label: exc
text: Right.  Right.  Right. Oh, man, then you're going to have to do orientation, I guess.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F018
label: exc
text: I know. I know.  I think you go and you like stay for a couple of days and you meet people and--And they'll give you like a tour--And show you everything.  Oh, man, I'm just so--I'm so excited.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M018
label: hap
text: That'll be awesome.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M019
label: hap
text: I mean because you went to the campus before, right?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F019
label: exc
text: Yeah, oh totally.  It's a beautiful campus.  It's gonna be really nice.  Um, and everyone is friendly and like there's ivy on all the walls.  Oh, it's just so--it's so like collegiate.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F020
label: exc
text: You know what I mean?  Like, it's like exactly what I want.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M020
label: xxx
text: So what're you--what're you gonna do there?  Have you decided?  Thought about it?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F021
label: exc
text: Well, you know, I've thought about it but they have so many things that I might--Like try some things out first...

name: Ses02F_impro07_M021
label: xxx
text: I know.  I mean, it's good all around.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F022
label: exc
text: ...because also on the list of their, um, like G.E.'s or whatever, you have a lot of choices within every single one.  So you can, like, try things out and not just be like, oh, I have to take math, oh, I have to take this.  You know what I mean?

name: Ses02F_impro07_F023
label: exc
text: So, um, so I don't know.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M022
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses02F_impro07_F024
label: exc
text: I mean I'm gonna take a bunch of stuff and see.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M023
label: exc
text: Oh man.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F025
label: exc
text: I- They have like--they just have so many like prestigious like this school is top ten and like the departments within it, you know what I mean.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M024
label: xxx
text: I always see people walking around with like U.S.C stuff on--

name: Ses02F_impro07_F026
label: exc
text: I know, I get to be one of those now--I'll like walk around and be like a U.S.C..  You know what I mean.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M025
label: xxx
text: You know is like.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M026
label: xxx
text: I know.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M027
label: exc
text: Ahh. Yeah. [GARBAGE]

name: Ses02F_impro07_M028
label: exc
text: You'll be like are you a fan or a student you know? Student. [LAUGHTER] Oh man, that's awesome.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F027
label: exc
text: And you'll be like...

name: Ses02F_impro07_F028
label: exc
text: Student. I'm a student. Yes I am, Thank you very much.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F029
label: exc
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses02F_impro07_M029
label: exc
text: A U.S.C. graduate now. You're set.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F030
label: exc
text: I know.  I'm excited.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F031
label: exc
text: Well, that'll take a while. [GARBAGE]

name: Ses02F_impro07_M030
label: xxx
text: I know, that's a ways down the road. That's cool.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F032
label: exc
text: That's going to be a lot of work.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F033
label: exc
text: But, it'll be fine, I mean.  I'm so excited. It's going to be so fun.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M031
label: xxx
text: In LA. Oh man.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F034
label: exc
text: I know, and I mean the area's not great, but like the school makes up for it. It'll be fine. It'll be good.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M032
label: xxx
text: So much.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M033
label: xxx
text: But it's LA, you know, everything.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M034
label: exc
text: You're getting close to the beach.  I mean geez.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F035
label: exc
text: I know. I know. So fun.  I can't wait.

name: Ses02F_impro07_M035
label: xxx
text: Cool.  Well give me a call, you know when--You get in town. definitely Awesome.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F036
label: exc
text: I will. I will. Thank you.

name: Ses02F_impro07_F037
label: exc
text: Thanks.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F000
label: sad
text: It's almost time for me to go.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M000
label: xxx
text: I can't believe that--now--are you sure this is absolutely necessary?  Like--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F001
label: sad
text: There's nothing I can do.  I mean, the government you know--

name: Ses02F_impro02_M001
label: fru
text: What--what're we gonna do here?  I can't--I can't do this by myself.  I--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F002
label: sad
text: You're gonna have to.  I mean, you're a great father.  You can do it.  I know you can.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M002
label: fru
text: But, I'm--I'm nothing--I'm nothing without you here.  Maybe we can--we can get out of this somehow.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F003
label: sad
text: I don't think so.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M003
label: fru
text: Well, come on.  You've gotta think of something.  A year--a year away, it's gonna tear us apart.  I don't even--I don't even wanna think about it.  I mean, I don't even know if I'll be able to get in touch with you or--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F004
label: sad
text: Well, we can do the best we can and-and, with um, you know like wireless internet these days--I think that we could-- Talk every once in awhile.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F005
label: sad
text: You could send me pictures.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M004
label: xxx
text: It's not going to be the same.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M005
label: fru
text: What if--maybe--what if, uh, we went somewhere over there?  I don't--I don't know--I--I need to figure something out for this because--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F006
label: sad
text: Their not gonna let you.  You have to stay home and I have to go.  I mean, that's all--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F007
label: sad
text: and--I mean, my daughter--I don't want to put her in danger.  You know?  She has to stay.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M006
label: fru
text: This is gonna be a--a crucial yet--she's--she's growing up.  She's gonna need you.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F008
label: sad
text: I know, but, she needs to be safe more.  She needs to be around kids her age--own age.  She needs to be able to play on the streets and--

name: Ses02F_impro02_M007
label: sad
text: But she's--you're not gonna--you're not gonna be here for--for her first words.  For her first steps.  I mean--it's something that you're supposed to be here for that--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F009
label: sad
text: You can just remember it for me.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M008
label: fru
text: I don't know--I don't know--I don't know how--I don't know how this could even be possible for you--I--if I was--

name: Ses02F_impro02_F010
label: sad
text: Well, I need--I need you to be able to do this for me 'cause I can't do anything about it.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F011
label: sad
text: I mean, it's just as hard for me, but--I know that we can do it, you know

name: Ses02F_impro02_M009
label: fru
text: I mean, you just get to--go off and do your thing.  I mean, yeah, we're both--I don't know--it's bad for both of us, but--

name: Ses02F_impro02_M010
label: fru
text: ...it would be so much better if we can--if we could stay together somehow.  You know--we could--we could do this together.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F012
label: sad
text: I don't want you in danger.  And I don't want her in danger.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M011
label: xxx
text: I don't want you in danger.  Where are you going?  You're going over to war.

name: Ses02F_impro02_F013
label: sad
text: I have no choice. There's nothing I can do.

name: Ses02F_impro02_M012
label: sad
text: All right.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M000
label: neu
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F000
label: xxx
text: Honey, you knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M001
label: neu
text: I knew nothing of the sort.  You took presents from him.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F001
label: xxx
text: Presents?  Just a trivial little broach.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: Ah, yes, I remember it well.  Bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F002
label: xxx
text: No, it wasn't.  It was very pretty.  I still have it and I wear it often.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M003
label: xxx
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F003
label: xxx
text: No, I didn't.  You worked the whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M004
label: xxx
text: You must admit, he was in love with you, wasn't he?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Just a little perhaps, nothing serious.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M005
label: xxx
text: You let him kiss you.  You said you did.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F005
label: xxx
text: Well, what of it?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M006
label: ang
text: What of it?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F006
label: xxx
text: It didn't hurt him at all and I enjoyed it.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M007
label: ang
text: Well, what about me?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F007
label: neu
text: Well, if you hadn't been so suspicious and nosey, you never would have known a thing about it.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M008
label: xxx
text: Well, that's a nice point of view I must say.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F008
label: xxx
text: I'm bored with this conversation.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M009
label: neu
text: Me, too.  Bored stiff.  You want some brandy?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F009
label: xxx
text: No, thanks.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M010
label: xxx
text: I think I'll have some.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F010
label: xxx
text: Don't see why you want any.  You've already had two glasses.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M011
label: neu
text: No particular reason.  Anyhow they were very small ones.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F011
label: neu
text: Just seems so silly to go on and on and on with such a thing.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M012
label: fru
text: You can hardly call three liquor glasses in a whole evening going on and on and on.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F012
label: neu
text: Well, it's become a habit with you.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M013
label: ang
text: You needn't be so grand, just because you don't happen to want any yourself at the moment.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F013
label: ang
text: Don't be so stupid.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M014
label: xxx
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M015
label: fru
text: Nothing.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M016
label: xxx
text: Going out somewhere dear?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F015
label: xxx
text: No, just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M017
label: xxx
text: That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F016
label: exc
text: A woman's job is to allure the man.  Watch me a minute, will you?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M018
label: xxx
text: As a matter of fact, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F017
label: fru
text: No, it isn't.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M019
label: fru
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F018
label: ang
text: Oh, be quiet.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M020
label: xxx
text: Ah, it's a pity you didn't have any more brandy.  It might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F019
label: fru
text: Doesn't seem to have worked such wonders with you.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M021
label: fru
text: Snap, snap, snap, like a little adder.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F020
label: ang
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M022
label: fru
text: Nonsense.  They have a little bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F021
label: xxx
text: They sting.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M023
label: fru
text: They snap.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F022
label: fru
text: I don't care, do you understand?  I don't care.  I don't care if they bark or roll about like hoops.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M024
label: xxx
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F023
label: xxx
text: Yes, I did.  Quite a lot.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M025
label: xxx
text: Hmm, I imagine you let him kiss you a good deal more then.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F024
label: fru
text: Mind your own business.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M026
label: xxx
text: Oh, must have had a riotous time. No restraint at all.  Very enjoyable and never had much anyhow.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F025
label: ang
text: You're quite insufferable

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F026
label: fru
text: I expect it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: I'm not in the least drunk.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F027
label: xxx
text: You've always had a weak head.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M028
label: fru
text: As I mentioned before, I have had three minute liquor glasses of brandy the whole evening long.  A child of two couldn't get drunk on that.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F028
label: fru
text: On the contrary, a child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M029
label: fru
text: Oh, very interesting.  How about a child of four?  A child of six?  Or a child of nine?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: Shut up.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: We could get a good debate going about this, don't you think?  Intemperate tots.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F030
label: fru
text: Not very funny, dear.  You'd better have some more brandy.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M031
label: xxx
text: All right.  I will.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M032
label: xxx
text: You better turn that off, I think.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F031
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M033
label: fru
text: Because it's late and it'll annoy the people upstairs.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F032
label: fru
text: There aren't any people upstairs.  It's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M034
label: fru
text: There are people downstairs I suppose?

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F033
label: xxx
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M035
label: fru
text: This is no time of the year for Tunis.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M036
label: ang
text: I'll do no such thing.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: Very well, if you insist on being boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M037
label: ang
text: Turn it off.  It's driving me mad.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: You are far too temperamental.  Try to control yourself.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: Stop it.  Go away.  I hate you.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Amanda, listen. listen

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: Listen?  Listen, indeed.  I am sick and tired of listening to you, damn sadistic bully.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M040
label: fru
text: Very amusing, indeed.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: I hate you.  Stop it.  Stop it.  I hate you, do you hear?  You're conceited and overbearing and utterly impossible.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: You're a vile, tempered, loose living, wicked little beast and I hope to never see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: This is the end.  Finally and forever.  Do you hear me?  The end.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: You're not going like this.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: Oh Yes, I am.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: You're not.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: I am.  Let go of me.  You're a cruel fiend and I hate and loathe you.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M044
label: ang
text: Shut up. Shut up.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M045
label: ang
text: I wouldn't-- I wouldn't marry--

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M046
label: ang
text: I wouldn't marry you if you came in crawling on your knees

name: Ses02F_script03_2_F043
label: ang
text: Thank God I realized what you are-- I'd never marry you again ever in my life. You're a cruel fiend and I hate you. You're a beast. You're a beast--I hate you. Stop it.  Stop it.

name: Ses02F_script03_2_M047
label: ang
text: You're a evil vampire and I hope to God I never see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F000
label: exc
text: Oh my God.  Guess what, guess what, guess what, guess what, guess what, guess what?

name: Ses02F_impro03_M000
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses02F_impro03_F001
label: exc
text: Well, guess.  Guess, guess, guess, guess.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M001
label: neu
text: Um, you--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F002
label: xxx
text: Don't look at my left hand.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M002
label: sur
text: No.  Let me see.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M003
label: xxx
text: Oh, no way.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F003
label: xxx
text: He proposed.  He proposed.  Well, and I said yes, of course. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses02F_impro03_M004
label: hap
text: That is great.  You look radiant.  I should've guess.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F004
label: exc
text: I'm so excited.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M005
label: exc
text: Well, Tell me about him.  What happened.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F005
label: xxx
text: Remember how we had that date?  And I was like, oh yeah, this is a date, whatever.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F006
label: xxx
text: So after we sort of went out dinner and I was already like tired.  I wasn't all that excited and and so he's like let's go down to the beach and I was like no I don't want to the beach, like I'm tired. And he's like no, no we have to go.  And I was like okay, like that's a little weird.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F007
label: xxx
text: So, he--so we walked down to the pier and there's like these lights--like these little, like lights-- and we're like what's that? And he's like I don't know let's go find out.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F008
label: xxx
text: So we walked down there and there's-[LAUGHTER]-And there's- this huge like ten foot heart in candles on the beach--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M006
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses02F_impro03_F009
label: exc
text: like all they have And I was like, what's going on?  And he like takes my hand and pulls me into the middle and he's like--you know, get's on his knee and everything--And says will you marry me? And I flipped out.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M007
label: sur
text: That--that is the most romantic thing I have ever heard.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F010
label: xxx
text: I know.  I was like, how did he get--like he must have called someone or had them set--like, I have no idea.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M008
label: xxx
text: Wow.  Yeah, 'cause yeah I don't know I'm sure if he--oh yeah he definitely had--would have had to have someone else--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F011
label: exc
text: 'Cause- 'Cause he was with me. You didn't do it did you?

name: Ses02F_impro03_M009
label: hap
text: Yeah.  I mean candles wouldn't stay--No, I didn't--I didn't know anything about it.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F012
label: exc
text: You didn't know anything?

name: Ses02F_impro03_M010
label: hap
text: No. I'm just as happy as you are.  This is--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F013
label: exc
text: I was just--it was so like I thought this might happen eventually, but like not yet, you know what I mean?  Like--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M011
label: hap
text: So, I mean--it's good though.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F014
label: exc
text: It is good.  It's totally good.  I mean, it like oh, you know.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M012
label: exc
text: Yeah, I know.  Wow.  I'm shaking.  I can't even--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F015
label: hap
text: I know. So we're gonna take it--Like we're not gonna get married right away--'Cause we want to like have plenty of time to plan everything out

name: Ses02F_impro03_F016
label: hap
text: ...and, um, my parents want to like be part of it and help out and everything--So we want to give it lots of time to like--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M013
label: neu
text: Oh. Do they--do they know yet? Have you told them? Oh, that's--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F017
label: hap
text: Yeah, yeah, I called them. I called them And, of course, they were so excited 'cause they love him. Like they always have.  Um--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M014
label: neu
text: That's great.  Yeah.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F018
label: hap
text: So, yeah, I mean, it'll be good.  We wanna like, uh, I think we're gonna have it in spring time, like early Spring--So it's no too hot yet.  And um--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M015
label: neu
text: Okay. You know--you know where?  Or--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F019
label: hap
text: I don't know.  I mean, I kinda like the idea of having something outside, but--Like--is a- Yeah,

name: Ses02F_impro03_M016
label: neu
text: Uh, huh. I mean, you know, it's spring--It'll be--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F020
label: xxx
text: But It's sort of hard 'cause the weather is so unpredictable and then if it's like cold that day.  Or if it's too hot, you know, it's like--but um--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M017
label: neu
text: Spring's nice though.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F021
label: exc
text: Yeah, I don't know-[LAUGHTER]-I mean--I can't even--the whole idea of like living--spending my whole life with somebody--that's crazy

name: Ses02F_impro03_M018
label: neu
text: Yeah, that is--how long you guys been together now?

name: Ses02F_impro03_F022
label: xxx
text: Two and a half years. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses02F_impro03_M019
label: hap
text: Okay.  All right.  So-[LAUGHTER]-quite a while.  I mean--That's-  That's good.  I'm so happy for you. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses02F_impro03_F023
label: hap
text: Thank you. Thank you so much.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M020
label: hap
text: Yeah, I'd love to be in that same situation some day, but, wow- so-

name: Ses02F_impro03_F024
label: exc
text: Oh, you will--You'll find just the right girl.  And she'll be perfect for you and everything will be great.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M021
label: xxx
text: You guys are awesome together.  It's definitely a--definitely a good couple.  I can see it. I should've guessed--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F025
label: xxx
text: You approve?  You approve?

name: Ses02F_impro03_M022
label: hap
text: Oh, I approve. I-[LAUGHTER]-I more than approve.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M023
label: hap
text: I mean, I'm surprised he didn't, ya know--go get a plane to fly over and shine--But candles on the beach, that's okay too I guess--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F026
label: hap
text: Yeah, it's pretty good.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M024
label: exc
text: Well--can--I mean, let me know--I want- I want invitations and--

name: Ses02F_impro03_F027
label: hap
text: Of course, of course--you'll be able to be a part of it.  You can come help me pick my colors.

name: Ses02F_impro03_M025
label: exc
text: Oh, yes.  This is the whole [GARBAGE]

name: Ses02F_impro03_F028
label: exc
text: It's so girly.  I don't even know how to like--It's so weird, but it'll be fun.  My mom will love to be like--she'll get so into it, I'm sure.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F029
label: hap
text: She'll be like--flowers and the--

name: Ses02F_impro03_M026
label: hap
text: It'll be good.  Wow, that's great.

name: Ses02F_impro03_F030
label: hap
text: Oh, thank you. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M000
label: neu
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F000
label: exc
text: You knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M001
label: ang
text: I knew nothing of the sort. You took presents from him.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F001
label: exc
text: Presents, just a trivial little broach.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: Yes, I remember it well, bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F002
label: neu
text: No it wasn't. It was very pretty I still have it and I wear it often.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M003
label: ang
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F003
label: neu
text: No I didn't, you worked the whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M004
label: xxx
text: You must admit he was in love with you, wasn't he?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Just a little perhaps, nothing serious.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M005
label: ang
text: You let him kiss you; you said you did.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F005
label: neu
text: What of it?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M006
label: xxx
text: What of it?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F006
label: neu
text: It gave him a lot of pleasure, it didn't hurt me any.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M007
label: ang
text: What about me?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F007
label: neu
text: Well, if you hadn't been so nosey and suspicious you never wouldn't have known anything about it.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M008
label: xxx
text: That's a nice point of view I must say.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F008
label: fru
text: I'm bored of this conversation.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M009
label: xxx
text: Yes, me too, bored stiff. You want some Brandy?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F009
label: neu
text: No thanks.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: I have a little I think.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F010
label: xxx
text: I don't see why you want any you've already had two glasses.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M011
label: neu
text: No particular reason. Anyhow, they are very small ones.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F011
label: neu
text: It just seems so silly to go on and on and on with such a thing.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M012
label: neu
text: You can hardly call three liquor glasses in a whole evening going on and on and on.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F012
label: neu
text: Well, it's become a habit with you.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M013
label: xxx
text: You needn't be so grand just because don't happen want any yourself right now.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F013
label: xxx
text: Don't be so stupid.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M014
label: xxx
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M015
label: fru
text: Nothing.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F015
label: neu
text: No I'm just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M016
label: neu
text: Going out somewhere, dear?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F016
label: xxx
text: It's a woman's job to allure the man

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M017
label: xxx
text: That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F017
label: xxx
text: watch me a minute, will you?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M018
label: neu
text: As a matter of fact, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F018
label: fru
text: Oh, no it isn't.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M019
label: xxx
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F019
label: ang
text: Be quiet.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M020
label: xxx
text: It's a pity you didn't have any more Brandy it might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F020
label: xxx
text: It doesn't seem to work such wonders with you.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M021
label: fru
text: Snap, snap, snap, like a little adder.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F021
label: xxx
text: Adders don't snap they sting.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M022
label: fru
text: Oh nonsense they have a little bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F022
label: xxx
text: They sting.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M023
label: fru
text: They snap.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: I don't care. Do you understand? I don't care. I don't care if they bark or roll about like hoops.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M024
label: neu
text: Tell me, did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F024
label: neu
text: Yes, I did quite a lot.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M025
label: xxx
text: I imagine you let him kiss you good deal more then.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F025
label: xxx
text: Mind your own business.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M026
label: ang
text: What riotous time you must have had.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: No restraint at all, very enjoyable, never had much anyhow.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F026
label: xxx
text: You're quite insufferable. I expect it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M028
label: xxx
text: I am not in the least drunk.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M029
label: xxx
text: I imagine, as I may have already mentioned, I've had three minute liquor glasses of Brandy the whole evening long a child of two couldn't get drunk on that.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F027
label: xxx
text: On the contrary a child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass of Brandy.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M030
label: xxx
text: Oh very interesting. How about a child of four, a child of six or a child of nine?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: Oh be quiet.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M031
label: ang
text: We can get a good little debate going about that, don't you think? Intemperate tots.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F029
label: xxx
text: Not very funny my dear, you better have some more Brandy.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M032
label: neu
text: All right. I will.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M033
label: neu
