text: Better turn that off I think.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F030
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M034
label: xxx
text: Because it's late and it'll annoy the people upstairs.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F031
label: xxx
text: There aren't any people upstairs it's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M035
label: xxx
text: There are people downstairs I suppose?

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F032
label: xxx
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M036
label: xxx
text: This is no time of the year for Tunis.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F033
label: xxx
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M037
label: fru
text: I'll do no such thing.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F034
label: fru
text: Very well, if you insist on being boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M038
label: xxx
text: Turn it off it's driving me mad.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: You are far too temperamental. Try to control yourself.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: Stop it. Stop it. I hate you.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Amanda, listen. Listen.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: Listen indeed. I'm sick and tired of listening to you, damn sadistic bully.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: Very amusing indeed.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: Stop it. Stop it. I hate you, do you hear? You're overbearing and conceited and utterly impossible.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: You're a vile tempered, loose living, wicked little beast and I hope I never see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: This is the end, do you hear? The end finally and forever.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: You're not going like this.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: Oh yes I am.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M044
label: ang
text: You're not.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: Yes, I am. Let go of me you're cruel fiend and I hate and loathe you. Thank God I realized who you really are before I would ever, ever marry you again. I would never marry you again. I'd rather die in torment.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M045
label: ang
text: Shut up.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M046
label: ang
text: Shut up.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_M047
label: ang
text: I wouldn't marry you again if you came to me on your bended knees. You're a evil minded little vampire. I hope to God I never see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses02M_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: You're a beast. I hate you. Stop it. Stop it.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M000
label: exc
text: What time is it?  They're supposed to run around midnight.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M001
label: exc
text: This is great, isn't it?  Look at the night we've got here, couldn't be better.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M002
label: exc
text: I would have liked to have gone a little further up the coast to get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid we'd miss it.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M003
label: exc
text: How you doing?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F000
label: xxx
text: Fine.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M004
label: exc
text: Is that--no--is that just foam?  I can't even tell.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M005
label: exc
text: Well, I guess we can tell, it probably isn't right?  Probably be unmistakable don't you think?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M006
label: exc
text: How you doing?  Aw, you know what I forgot?  I forgot to bring my flashlight.  Oh, how could I be so stupid?  I should've brought my flashlight.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F001
label: neu
text: What flashlight?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M007
label: xxx
text: You know, the flashlight, the silver one.  There's only one isn't there?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F002
label: xxx
text: That's not your flashlight.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Who's is it?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F003
label: xxx
text: It's ours.  It's mine too.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M009
label: neu
text: Oh, well sure.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F004
label: xxx
text: You kept saying my flashlight, if as if somehow it's just yours.  I mean is that supposed to make me feel?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M010
label: neu
text: Right, of course.  Our flashlight.  Mine and yours.  I mean, me flashlight is su flashlight naturally.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M011
label: xxx
text: How could we forget to bring it?  I hope the moon stays out.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M012
label: neu
text: I wonder, do they always run during a full moon?  I can't remember if it was full last year.  Do you remember?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F005
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M013
label: neu
text: You cold?  Do you want my jacket?  Oh, we should've brought the blanket.  Our blanket.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M014
label: exc
text: This is great, isn't it?  A six pack would be just the ticket right now.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M015
label: exc
text: I can't believe I forgot.  I'm like a kid.  It's amazing I got out of the house with my fly zipped.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M016
label: exc
text: You think they can hear us talk?  Or feel the vibrations in the sand when we move around?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F006
label: xxx
text: I'm cold.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M017
label: neu
text: Do you want my jacket?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F007
label: fru
text: It's after eleven, let's just go home.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M018
label: xxx
text: Are you kidding?  We'd miss it.  We just got here.  What's the point of coming down here if we just turn around and go home.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F008
label: xxx
text: There is no point in coming down here.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M019
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F009
label: xxx
text: That's my point.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M020
label: neu
text: That's my point too.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F010
label: xxx
text: So, let's go.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M021
label: neu
text: No. No. That's not my point.  The point is there's no point in coming down if we just leave.  Don't you want to see it?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F011
label: xxx
text: Not particularly.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M022
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F012
label: xxx
text: I just don't.  It's stupid.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M023
label: xxx
text: Honey, this is a natural phenomenon.  I mean this only happens once a year, you know.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M024
label: exc
text: Think about the people in Kansas, they had to get plane tickets and hotel reservations to see this.  We live forty minutes away.  It's too good to pass up.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F013
label: fru
text: Pass up what?  These little fish swim onto the beach, they flop around, and swim away.  And then they die.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M025
label: exc
text: Yeah, but that moment on the beach, is the highlight of their little lives.  All that flopping is laying eggs or what do you--spawning or mating.  I mean,

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M026
label: exc
text: this is a big night for these guys.  Life's last orgy.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F014
label: fru
text: What are you so excited about?  I mean, it's not a moon landing we're talking about here.  It's fish.  It's a fish nobody even eats.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M027
label: fru
text: Yeah they do.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F015
label: fru
text: Ah, Augie.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M028
label: exc
text: Alright.  But it's fish that do something that none of the other fish do.  Like the swallows returning to Capistrano or the lemmings throwing themselves off the cliffs.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M029
label: xxx
text: There's--there's a bit of the magic--some unexplainable here.  I don't see how you can not be interested.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F016
label: fru
text: I'm just not.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M030
label: xxx
text: For real?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M031
label: neu
text: I don't get it.  The first time we came here, you said it was the best night of your life.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M032
label: xxx
text: And last year, I remember specifically you were so excited to go that you stubbed your toe rushing me out of the house and didn't even notice until we got in the car.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F018
label: fru
text: Last year, you will also remember our shoes got wet, I got sand in my panties, you got a sore throat, we got in a big fight over nothing, and we didn't see the grunions.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M033
label: neu
text: We weren't in a good spot.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F019
label: neu
text: We didn't see them the first time either.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M034
label: xxx
text: We just weren't in a good spot.  This is a much better spot.  Believe me, I've got good instincts for these things.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M035
label: exc
text: There is that--no that's just seaweed isn't it?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M036
label: exc
text: Oh man, this is great, isn't it?  I wouldn't miss this for anything.  Here, think about this, all right, I know you're not interested, but think about this.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M037
label: xxx
text: Somewhere out there, this huge mass of silver fish swimming this way.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M038
label: xxx
text: They don't know why, we don't know why.  Nobody sent them an invitation or a map, it wasn't a decision, just-

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M039
label: exc
text: all as one, this time release instinctual little firecracker went off and they all turned and formed a line as long as the California coast and started swimming.  And they're swimming right now as if that's all that matters.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M040
label: exc
text: It's like single mindedness with no mind.  It's urgency that's pure urge.  They don't know what drives them.  They don't ask it a question or give it a name.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M041
label: exc
text: They just turn as one and start the swim that brings them right here to where we stand, for a massive celebration of sex and death.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M042
label: exc
text: Ah, God, I'm giving myself goose bumps.  Look, all my hairs are popped up.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F020
label: xxx
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M043
label: neu
text: Well, so what do you think?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F021
label: neu
text: About what?

name: Ses02F_script02_1_M044
label: neu
text: What I was saying.

name: Ses02F_script02_1_F022
label: xxx
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M000
label: fea
text: Good God.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F000
label: xxx
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M001
label: xxx
text: I wonder.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F001
label: xxx
text: Well, nobody knows we're here except Freda and she wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M002
label: fea
text: Must be them then.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F002
label: exc
text: What are we going to do?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M003
label: fea
text: We're all right darling, aren't we whatever happens?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F003
label: hap
text: Now and always sweet.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M004
label: xxx
text: I don't care then.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F004
label: xxx
text: It's bound to come sooner or later.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M005
label: exc
text: Hello? Hello? What? Wrong number.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F005
label: exc
text: Oh. It sends shivers down my spine.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M006
label: fea
text: What do we do if they suddenly walk in on us?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F006
label: hap
text: Behave exquisitely.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M007
label: hap
text: With the most perfect poise.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F007
label: hap
text: Yes, I should probably to a court curtsey.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M008
label: hap
text: Things that ought to matter dreadfully don't matter at all when one's is happy, do they?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What's so horrible is that one can't stay happy.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M009
label: sad
text: Oh darling don't say that.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F009
label: xxx
text: It's true; the whole business is a very poor joke.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M010
label: hap
text: Meaning that sacred and beautiful thing love?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F010
label: xxx
text: Yes. Meaning just that.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M011
label: hap
text: What does it all mean that's what I ask- that's what I ask myself in my ceaseless quest for ultimate truth?  Good God what does it all mean?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F011
label: xxx
text: Don't laugh at me. I'm serious.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M012
label: exc
text: You mustn't be serious my dear one, that's just what they want.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F012
label: exc
text: Who's they?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M013
label: xxx
text: All those futile moralists, who try to make life unbearable, laugh at them, be flippant. Laugh at everything all their sacred shibboleths

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M014
label: exc
text: flippancy brings out the acid in their damned sweetness in light.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F013
label: xxx
text: Well, if I laugh at everything then I must laugh at us too.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M015
label: exc
text: Certainly you must, we figures of fun all right.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F014
label: xxx
text: Well, shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M016
label: sad
text: No, that desire will fade along with our passion.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F015
label: sad
text: Oh dear, should we like that?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M017
label: xxx
text: Depends on how well we play it.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F016
label: fea
text: Well, what happens if one of us dies, does the one that's left still laugh?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M018
label: exc
text: Yes, yes, with all his might.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Well that's serious enough, isn't it?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M019
label: exc
text: No, no it isn't, death is very laughable, such a cunning little mystery, all done with mirrors.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Darling, I believe you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M020
label: exc
text: So is everyone else in the long run.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M021
label: exc
text: Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers, let's blow our trumpets and squeakers and enjoy the party as much as we can. Like quite idiotic, very small, school children. Let's savor the delight of the moment.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M022
label: exc
text: Come kiss me darling before your body rots and worms pop in and out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F019
label: xxx
text: Elliot, worms don't pop.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: I don't care what you do see. You can paint yourself green and dance naked in the Place Vendome, and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word, as long as you love me best.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Thank you dear, the same applies you, except that if I catch you so much as looking at another woman, I'll kill you.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M024
label: hap
text: You remember that awful scene we had in Venice?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F021
label: hap
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M025
label: xxx
text: The one when you bought that little, painted, wooden snake in the Piazza and put it on my bed.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F022
label: hap
text: Oh Charles, that was his name Charles. It did wiggle so beautifully.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M026
label: xxx
text: Horrible thing, I hated it.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F023
label: hap
text: I know you did. You threw it out of the window into the Grand Canal; I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M027
label: xxx
text: How long did that row last?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F024
label: hap
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M028
label: xxx
text: The worst one was in Cannes when your curling iron burned a hole in my new dressing gown.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F025
label: hap
text: It burned my comb too and all the towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M029
label: hap
text: That was a rouser, wasn't it?

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F026
label: xxx
text: That was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M030
label: xxx
text: I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F027
label: hap
text: The manager came in and found us rolling around on the floor biting and scratching like panthers.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M031
label: hap
text: I'll never forget his face.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F028
label: hap
text: Oh it was ridiculous, completely ridiculous.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M032
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_F029
label: hap
text: And very much sillier.

name: Ses02M_script03_1_M033
label: xxx
text: As a matter of fact the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F000
label: xxx
text: What's he going to say, maybe we ought to tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M000
label: xxx
text: He saw it.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F001
label: xxx
text: How could he see it? I was the first one up he was still in bed.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M001
label: xxx
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F002
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M002
label: xxx
text: About four this morning. I heard it cracking and I woke up and looked out. He was standing right here when it cracked.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four in the morning?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M003
label: sad
text: I don't know. When it cracked he ran into the house and cried in the kitchen.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F004
label: xxx
text: So you talked to him?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M004
label: sad
text: No. I figured it was best to leave him alone.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F005
label: xxx
text: He cried hard?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M005
label: sad
text: I could hear him right through the floor in my room.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F006
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at that hour? He's dreaming about him again, he's walking around at night.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M006
label: xxx
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F007
label: xxx
text: He's getting just like after he died. What is the meaning of that?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M007
label: xxx
text: I don't know the meaning of it, but I know one thing mom, we've made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Being dishonest with him. I mean that sort of thing always pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: What do you mean dishonest?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M009
label: fru
text: You know that Larry is not coming back and I know it. Why do we allow him to go on thinking that we believe with him?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F010
label: fru
text: What do you want to do, argue with him?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M010
label: fru
text: No I don't want to argue with him, but it's about time he realized that nobody believes Larry is alive anymore.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M011
label: fru
text: Why -- why shouldn't he dream of him? Walk around, waiting for him at night I mean do we contradict him, do we say straight out that we don't have any hope anymore that we haven't had hope for years now?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F011
label: fru
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M012
label: ang
text: We've got to say it to him.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F012
label: fru
text: Can you prove it, how can you prove it?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M013
label: ang
text: For God sakes it's been three years, nobody comes back after three years, that's insane.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F013
label: fru
text: To you it is and to me. You can talk yourself blue in the face but there is no body and no grave so where are you?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Sit down mom; I want to talk to you.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F014
label: xxx
text: The trouble is the god damned newspapers, every month or so a boy turns up out of nowhere, so the next one is going to be Larry.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: All right. All right. Listen to me.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M016
label: neu
text: You know why I brought Annie here don't you?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: You know.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F015
label: neu
text: I got an idea but what's the story?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M018
label: neu
text: I'm going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Well that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: No it's not only my business.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F017
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do; you're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M020
label: fru
text: So it's all right then I'll go ahead with it?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F018
label: neu
text: Well, you want to make sure that your father isn't-

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: See it isn't just my business-

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F019
label: fru
text: I'm just saying

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M022
label: xxx
text: Sometimes you infuriate me you know that. Isn't it your business to if I tell dad and he throws a fit about it? You have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F020
label: xxx
text: I ignore what I got to ignore. The girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M023
label: fru
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F021
label: neu
text: From father's point of you he isn't dead and you have no right to take his girl.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F022
label: fru
text: You can go on from there if you know where to go but I don't know where to go, see I don't know. So what can I do for you?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M024
label: ang
text: I don't know why but every time I reach out for something that I really want, I have to pull back 'cause someone else will suffer. My whole bloody life, time after time after time.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F023
label: neu
text: You're a considerate fellow.  There's nothing wrong with that.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M025
label: ang
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F024
label: fru
text: Have you asked Annie yet?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M026
label: neu
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F025
label: neu
text: How do you know she'll marry you? Maybe she feels the same way your father does.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M027
label: neu
text: Well, if she does then that's the end of it. From her letters I think she's forgotten him.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M028
label: sad
text: I don't know, I'll find out. Then we'll trash it out with dad, right? Mom, don't avoid me.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F026
label: ang
text: Trouble is you don't see enough women, you never did.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M029
label: fru
text: So what I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F027
label: ang
text: I just don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M030
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F028
label: fru
text: That's a good answer but it doesn't answer anything. I mean you haven't seen her since you went away to war it's five years.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M031
label: fru
text: I can't help it I know her best. I mean lived next door to her my whole life. These years when I think of a wife, I think of Annie.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M032
label: xxx
text: What do you want, a diagram?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F029
label: fru
text: I don't want a diagram. He thinks he's coming back. Chris, you marry this girl you're pronouncing him dead.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F030
label: fru
text: Do you know what's going to happen to your father because I don't, see?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M033
label: xxx
text: All right. All right. Mom.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F031
label: xxx
text: Just give it some more thought.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M034
label: xxx
text: I've given it three years of thought. I thought that if I waited, dad would forget about Larry and we could have a regular wedding and everything happy.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M035
label: sad
text: If I can't do that here well, then I'll have to get out.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F032
label: ang
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M036
label: sad
text: I'll get out. I'll get married and go live some place else, maybe New York.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F033
label: ang
text: What the hell is this, are you crazy?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M037
label: ang
text: I've been a good son too long a good sucker, I'm through with it.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F034
label: ang
text: What about the business? What is this?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M038
label: ang
text: The business?  The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F035
label: ang
text: Must you be inspired?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M039
label: ang
text: Yes, I like it and hour a day. If I'm going to grub for money all day long, at least in the evening I want it beautiful.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M040
label: xxx
text: I want a family; I want kids; I want something I can give myself to. Annie is in the middle of that. Now where do I find it?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F036
label: ang
text: Tell me, you'd leave the business?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M041
label: sad
text: Yes, on this I would.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F037
label: ang
text: Well, you don't want to think like that.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M042
label: fru
text: Then help me stay here.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F038
label: xxx
text: All right. But you don't want to be thinking like that 'cause otherwise what did we work for, I mean the whole thing is for you, Chris, the whole shooting match is for you.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M043
label: fru
text: I know I know mom. All right. Just help me stay here.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F039
label: fru
text: Just don't go thinking that way.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M044
label: fru
text: Well, I am thinking that way.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F040
label: fru
text: I don't understand you, do I?

name: Ses02M_script01_1_M045
label: xxx
text: No, you don't. I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses02M_script01_1_F041
label: sad
text: Yea, I can see that.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M000
label: neu
text: Hi. Um-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F000
label: neu
text: Hi, can I help you?

name: Ses02M_impro05_M001
label: neu
text: It seems that uh- my-my bag didn't make it out on the carousel.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F001
label: neu
text: Oh, did you check? Did you make sure as it went around the second time that it-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M002
label: neu
text: Yes, yes, it's gone around like you know twenty times. It's been about a half hour.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F002
label: neu
text: Okay. Well, um- the f.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F003
label: neu
text: Actually I'm looking here at the information, the flight that you were on we had some trouble with some of the baggage, it looks like a few peoples' bags didn't make it through. Um, so-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M003
label: neu
text: Okay. So what-what do I have to get you know

name: Ses02M_impro05_F004
label: neu
text: Well, you can fill out this paperwork um- and if for some reason it shows up, we can bring it to you, but-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M004
label: sur
text: For some reason, so you think it won't show up?

name: Ses02M_impro05_F005
label: neu
text: Well, sometimes it's just late baggage or misplaced baggage and it comes out but it seems to be here and just I'm reading off of this that

name: Ses02M_impro05_F006
label: neu
text: Uh- it didn't make it into the second plane so it looks like there - they don't actually know what happened to it.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M005
label: xxx
text: What? What? How does that happen?

name: Ses02M_impro05_F007
label: neu
text: Um, well, sometimes there is just difficulties with loading on to the plane. Uh- There can be a theft or uh- some sort of you know mishap with a cart or something.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M006
label: fru
text: I really - I really need that bag.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F008
label: neu
text: I- I- I understand, but um.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M007
label: xxx
text: there are- I have important things in that bag. I've got

name: Ses02M_impro05_F009
label: neu
text: Okay

name: Ses02M_impro05_M008
label: fru
text: I mean -- I've been away for a while and- and now I've- I've gifts for- for you know friends and family I mean, I got stuff in the there

name: Ses02M_impro05_F010
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M009
label: xxx
text: It's worth a lot.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F011
label: neu
text: I understand that. Um- So I'm going to put down here that you looking for your baggage, but we actually can't, uh this bag is likely not going to show up so what we're going to do-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M010
label: fru
text: Not going to show - well isn't like - wouldn't it just be at the airport, that, like, if it didn't get on the other plane

name: Ses02M_impro05_M011
label: fru
text: can they check there?

name: Ses02M_impro05_F012
label: neu
text: Sometimes it gets stolen, sometimes it gets misplaced on another plane and

name: Ses02M_impro05_M012
label: xxx
text: on another-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F013
label: neu
text: they - they, it gets shipped to somewhere else and then it's stuck somewhere and then we have no way of tracking that.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F014
label: neu
text: So we'll- what we'll do

name: Ses02M_impro05_M013
label: ang
text: But we have the tags on. I mean like it wouldn't you know, if it got stuck somewhere it's like well this is nobodies bag I mean maybe you know look on the tag and

name: Ses02M_impro05_M014
label: fru
text: see where it came from originally. I mean it seems like-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F015
label: neu
text: Right. Like I said sometimes a theft and things happen like that but we are willing to reim-reimburse you.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M015
label: xxx
text: Theft?

name: Ses02M_impro05_F016
label: neu
text: Um, so.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M016
label: ang
text: Theft? Don't you know like all these people that are work - you keep like an eye on them, how can they get away with-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F017
label: neu
text: We have very tight security but we -uh- there are times when we just can't uh make sure there aren't absolutely no human error, you know

name: Ses02M_impro05_F018
label: neu
text: I'm sorry there is no guarantee on baggage.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M017
label: fru
text: This is unbelievable. I've got

name: Ses02M_impro05_M018
label: ang
text: you don't realize the stuff that I've got in that - I really need to get the suitcase okay

name: Ses02M_impro05_F019
label: neu
text: I understand, so-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M019
label: fru
text: so if it's back there or something, if there is something you can do

name: Ses02M_impro05_M020
label: fru
text: I need you to tell me because I really need to get the bag, okay?

name: Ses02M_impro05_F020
label: neu
text: all right, We've already checked back here for your baggage

name: Ses02M_impro05_F021
label: neu
text: and we will continue to look for it and because your paper-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M021
label: fru
text: You've already checked? Can you check again? [garbage]

name: Ses02M_impro05_F022
label: fru
text: I've already looked, thank you very much and because we've filled out paperwork if it shows up we will send it to you but otherwise what we can do is reimburse you for fifty dollar.

name: Ses02M_impro05_M022
label: xxx
text: Fifty- fifty dollars? Come on you have got to be joking.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F023
label: neu
text: Well, it's- it's just sort of help with the fact uh that you lost some of your possessions and we rather do that than-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M023
label: fru
text: Uh huh, yea, lost some of my possessions, yes, so if I lost maybe a shoe that was in the suitcase and like a carry-on

name: Ses02M_impro05_M024
label: fru
text: that might be like fifty dollars okay, but this - I- [garbage] I had like thousands of dollars worth of stuff in that suitcase.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F024
label: neu
text: The airline can't afford to give you everything that is in that suitcase. and so-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M025
label: ang
text: The a- what? Talking about a core they can't afford it? I mean-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F025
label: neu
text: Well because lots of people get their baggage lost and we don't want to have false claims or anything like that so we have

name: Ses02M_impro05_F026
label: neu
text: we can give you fifty dollar to sort of make up for it, to compensate, and we can definitely let you know if it shows up but likely, more than likely-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M026
label: ang
text: I mean you're not helping me here. What do I have to do here? Do I need to sue the airline company is that what I should do

name: Ses02M_impro05_M027
label: fru
text: because this is ridiculous?

name: Ses02M_impro05_F027
label: xxx
text: I'm sorry. I don't- I-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F028
label: fru
text: I don't believe you should sue the airline company but we do have a policy uh- in which we can reimburse you and that's all we can do and I'm sorry I've done everything I can-

name: Ses02M_impro05_M028
label: fru
text: All right. I'm sick- I'm sick of this all right. I'm sick of you and keep your fifty dollar.

name: Ses02M_impro05_F029
label: fru
text: There's other people waiting-

name: Ses02M_impro05_F030
label: xxx
text: Fine.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M000
label: neu
text: Hey, a what's up?

name: Ses02F_impro06_F000
label: sad
text: Um, Johnny died yesterday.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M001
label: neu
text: Wow, that's horrible.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M002
label: neu
text: I'm sorry to hear about that.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F001
label: sad
text: We knew that it was coming, but--

name: Ses02F_impro06_M003
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: It seemed like he had a little bit longer.  Like just last week, he was doing was so well.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M004
label: neu
text: I mean, you know, at least he's not in anymore pain now, right?

name: Ses02F_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M005
label: neu
text: It's good, you know.  you know It hurts I know.  I know what it's like to lose someone like that.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: I just don't want him to be gone.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M006
label: neu
text: It's okay.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M007
label: neu
text: 'Cause, you know, you've got all the times that you guys did spend together, you know and that's something good that you can look back on.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M008
label: neu
text: I mean--I don't know.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: And his whole family was there.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: I mean, he was like really conscious right up until the end. you know

name: Ses02F_impro06_M009
label: neu
text: Well, that's that's good, you know.  At least, I don't know.  I mean it's- it's better to go- to goout that way than...

name: Ses02F_impro06_M010
label: neu
text: .than you know, in pain and like this gradual, this horrible process.  I mean--

name: Ses02F_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: He was so young, you know.  And all the stories he used to tell me about...

name: Ses02F_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: ...the way he wanted to live and he was gonna go to Africa and he was gonna--

name: Ses02F_impro06_M011
label: neu
text: But look at the--he--look at the life he did get to lead.  I mean, for his age, he'd done so much and--

name: Ses02F_impro06_F009
label: sad
text: Nobody's ever gonna forget him.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M012
label: neu
text: Yeah, exactly.  He's made a big impact on a lot of people. and

name: Ses02F_impro06_M013
label: neu
text: And you'll always have that and--you should feel, you know, happy for him that he got to do so much before--I mean, and even after he found out last year.  I mean--

name: Ses02F_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: He did a lot.  But--

name: Ses02F_impro06_M014
label: neu
text: I know.  It doesn't bring him back, but--

name: Ses02F_impro06_M015
label: neu
text: But It's okay because now, you know, you'll just go on with your life and--

name: Ses02F_impro06_F011
label: sad
text: I'm gonna forget him.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M016
label: neu
text: No, you'll never forget him.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F012
label: sad
text: I won't be able to hear his voice or his--

name: Ses02F_impro06_M017
label: neu
text: I know. but you're not  I mean you're not going to forget him.  The pain will go away eventually and--or it will subside--

name: Ses02F_impro06_F013
label: sad
text: You start to lose like that image after a while.

name: Ses02F_impro06_M018
label: neu
text: That will be, It'll be--it'll be better that way. I mean Time will tell.  Time heals, you know, and it's good.  It's okay.  I mean, it wasn't anybody's fault or anything like that so .

name: Ses02F_impro06_M019
label: neu
text: It's hard to lose someone that way, but he's he's better--he's better off now.

name: Ses02F_impro06_F014
label: sad
text: Thanks.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F000
label: xxx
text: You're the only one I know who loves his parents.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M000
label: hap
text: I know, it went out of style, didn't it?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F001
label: hap
text: It's all right.  It's a good thing.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F002
label: hap
text: You know, it's lovely here, the air is sweet.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M001
label: xxx
text: You're not sorry you came?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F003
label: hap
text: No, not sorry.  But, um. But I'm not gonna stay.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M002
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F004
label: xxx
text: For one thing, your mother as much as told me to go.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M003
label: xxx
text: Oh.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F005
label: xxx
text: You saw that.  I mean and then, well, you've been kind of, um--

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M004
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F006
label: xxx
text: Well, kind of embarrassed ever since I got here.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M005
label: fru
text: The trouble is, I planned on sort of sneaking up on you on a period of a week or so.  But they take it for granted that we're all set.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F007
label: hap
text: I knew they would, your mother anyway.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: How'd you know?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F008
label: neu
text: Well, from her point of view, why else would I come?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: Oh.  Would you want to?  I guess you know, this is why I asked you to come.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F009
label: hap
text: I guess this is why I came.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M008
label: xxx
text: Ann, I love you.  I love you a great deal.  I love you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M009
label: xxx
text: I have no imagination.  That's all I know to tell you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M010
label: exc
text: I'm embarrassing you and I didn't want to tell it to you here.  I wanted some place we'd never been before.  A place where we'd be brand new to each other.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: You feel wrong here, don't you?  This yard, this chair.  I want you to be ready for me.  I don't want to have to win you away from anything.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F010
label: xxx
text: Oh, Chris, I've been ready for a long, long time.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: And he's gone forever.  You're sure?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F011
label: xxx
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M013
label: sur
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: Well, you started to write me

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M014
label: exc
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M015
label: exc
text: Ann, why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F014
label: xxx
text: Well, I was waiting for you.  I mean, till then you never wrote and when you did, what did you say?  I mean, you can sure be ambiguous sometimes, you know?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M016
label: xxx
text: Give me a kiss, Anne.  Give me a-

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M017
label: xxx
text: God, I kissed Annie.  How long--how long I've been waiting to kiss you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F015
label: xxx
text: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  I mean, all I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M018
label: xxx
text: Oh, Annie, we're gonna live now.  I'm gonna make you so happy.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F016
label: xxx
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M019
label: xxx
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you, Chris.  What is it?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M020
label: sad
text: Let's drive someplace.  I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F018
label: xxx
text: No.  What is it, Chris. Your mother?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M021
label: sad
text: No.  Nothing like that.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F019
label: sad
text: Well, what's wrong?  I mean, even in your letters there was some--something ashamed.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M022
label: sad
text: Yeah, I suppose I have been.  But it's going from me.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F020
label: xxx
text: You've gotta tell me.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M023
label: xxx
text: I don't know how to start.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F021
label: sad
text: It wouldn't work this way.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M024
label: xxx
text: It's all mixed up with so many other things.  You remember overseas, I was in charge of a company?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F022
label: xxx
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: Well, I lost them.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F023
label: xxx
text: How many?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F024
label: xxx
text: gee.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: It takes some time for a guy to toss that off.  'Cause they weren't just men.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: For instance, this one time, it had been raining several days and this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks.  I put them in pocket.  It's only a little thing, but those are the kind of guys I had.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: They didn't die, they killed themselves for each other.  I mean that exactly.  I mean, a little more selfish and they'd have been here today.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: I got this idea watching 'em go down.  Everything was being destroyed, see, but it seemed that one new thing was made.  A sort of responsibility.  Man for man. You know what I mean?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: To show that, to bring that onto the Earth again, like some kind of monument and everyone can feel it standing behind him and it would make a difference to him.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: Then I came back and it was incredible.  There was no meaning in it here. I mean, the whole thing to them seemed like it's sort of a bus accident.  I went to work with Dad and that rat race again.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: And I felt what you said, ashamed somehow 'cause nobody had changed at all.  It seemed to make suckers out of a lot of guys.  I felt wrong to be alive to open the new bank book, drive the new car, see the new refrigerator.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: I mean, you can take those things out of a war, but when you drive that car, you've gotta realize that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.  You've gotta be a little better because of it.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M035
label: sad
text: Otherwise all you have is really loot and there's blood on it.  And I didn't want to take any of that.  And I guess that included you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F025
label: sad
text: Do you still feel that way?

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M036
label: neu
text: I want you now Annie.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F026
label: sad
text: 'Cause you mustn't feel that way.  Because you have a right to everything you have, Chris.  Everything, you understand that?  Me too.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F027
label: sad
text: I mean, and your money, there's- there's nothing wrong with your money.  I mean, your father put hundreds of planes in the air.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_M037
label: xxx
text: I know Annie.  I'm gonna make a fortune for you.

name: Ses02M_script01_3_F028
label: hap
text: What'll I do with a fortune?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M000
label: exc
text: Well, so what do you think?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F000
label: neu
text: About what?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M001
label: neu
text: What I was saying.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F001
label: fru
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M002
label: neu
text: It certainly is not.  It's slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: It's PR.  Somebody sold you a bill of goods that this wonderful event is gonna take place on the beach.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M003
label: neu
text: Well, I'm not the only one.  Look at all these people.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: Sure, everybody's told the same story.  It keeps us all excited.  It keeps us coming back for more.  It keeps us thinking that life is gonna start any second now if we could just find the right spot and get in on the action.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M004
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Well, I'm sorry, but it's still just fish to me.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M005
label: neu
text: Carla, can I ask you something?  Don't take this wrong, but are you having your period?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F005
label: ang
text: God damn it, Augie, don't ask me that.  I hate it when you ask me that.  You always ask me that.  It's insulting.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: Well, what's bugging you?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F006
label: ang
text: We just have different ideas of what this evening is supposed to look like.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M007
label: neu
text: There's nothing to it.  We come here, the grunion arrive, they do their little fish business, we go ooh, ah, look at the fish.  They go home. We go home.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F007
label: fru
text: For heaven sake, we're not going to see the grunions.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M008
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: We never do, do we?  I mean, have we ever?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M009
label: neu
text: We've missed them twice.  That's not ever.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F009
label: fru
text: Twice is every time we've tried. That's ever.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M010
label: neu
text: Well, we'll see them this year.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F010
label: fru
text: No, we won't.  It's pointless.  It's like waiting up to see Santa Claus.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F011
label: ang
text: I mean, I feel like my whole life is gonna be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up.  And the fish won't show up.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: You don't understand anything I'm saying.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: No, of course not.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F013
label: fru
text: I did want to see it.  I always do.  I keep thinking that this is gonna be the time and it never is.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M013
label: neu
text: It's just fish.  Nothing to get traumatized about.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F014
label: xxx
text: For heaven sake, this isn't about fish.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: All right.  Look, I've been trying to work this backwards, but I cannot seem to figure out the exact moment that we took a turn for the worst.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M015
label: xxx
text: I mean, you were-  you were fine during the phone call from Marge.  Dinner was okay.  Doing the dishes was no problem.  Let's see.  I took a shower.  You watched the news.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M016
label: neu
text: You said, "Hey the grunion are running tonight."  I said, "Great, let's go.  I feel lucky."

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M017
label: neu
text: Okay, so I'm putting on my jacket, putting out the animals, getting the car out of the garage--

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F015
label: sad
text: Do you remember the first time we came to see it?  It was about four years ago, right after we got married.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F016
label: sad
text: I thought I was pregnant, you had a bottle of champagne, but no glasses.  You asked me to dance, so we kicked off our shoes and you popped the cork.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F017
label: sad
text: And while we were dancing, you said the softest, most intimate things to me right into my ear so that I could feel them as much as hear them.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: And I remember thinking, this is it.  You know, at last--at last I am as happy as I am supposed to be.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M018
label: neu
text: Wait a minute.  I've got it.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F019
label: sad
text: Just dancing barefoot in the sand, drinking champagne out of the bottle.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M019
label: neu
text: It was in the car, right?  Driving past the Knickerbocker Liquor Locker, you said, "let's get some champagne," and I said, "time's a wasting" or something like that, right?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M020
label: neu
text: Yeah, of course, I see it now.  You want this to be like that other time, right?  That's it, right?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F020
label: sad
text: I'd rather not remember some things.  I would rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M021
label: neu
text: Okay, yeah, sure, I see it now.  Listen, you wanna dance?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F021
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M022
label: neu
text: You want me to go get some champagne?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M023
label: neu
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F023
label: xxx
text: No. No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M024
label: fru
text: Well, what?  You want me to breathe in your ear?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F024
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M025
label: fru
text: You wanna get married again?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F025
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M026
label: fru
text: What?  What?  You want a divorce?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F026
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M027
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F027
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M028
label: fru
text: A new carpet?  A poodle?  Ice cream?  Back rub?  A suicide pact?  What?  What?  Carla, what the hell do you want?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F028
label: xxx
text: I want something to turn out the way that it's supposed to.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M029
label: ang
text: Well, welcome to the human race.  Do you think this is what I had in mind when I proposed?  That four years down the road, we'd be at the beach yelling at each other over fish?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M030
label: xxx
text: No.  You think I knew that there'd be times when you'd look at me like a used Kleenex?  Or that I'd look at you and think, holy hell, when's the next flight to Alaska?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M031
label: sad
text: No, Carla, I'm just like you.  I thought it was gonna be all peaches and roses and sand in our toes and wind in our hair and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and we'll have three fat rosy kids and ha, ha, baby, the joke's on us

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M032
label: fru
text: 'cause you know what you get, Carla?  You know what you get?  This.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F029
label: xxx
text: This.  What?  What is this?  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M033
label: neu
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F030
label: xxx
text: Uh, right this is standing on the beach.  This is waiting.  This is fighting.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M034
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F031
label: sad
text: Well.  This isn't anything like I thought anything would be like.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M035
label: sad
text: I know, me neither.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F032
label: xxx
text: I mean, this is just this.  It includes a lot and everything, but it isn't something else.  Do you have any idea what I'm trying to say?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M036
label: sad
text: I'm doing the best I can.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F033
label: sad
text: I know that, Augie.  Really, I do.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F034
label: sad
text: I know that you meant this to be special and nice and the sand and the moon and all, but I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M037
label: sad
text: Maybe if you were with somebody else too.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F035
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M038
label: sad
text: No, I know.  But still.  I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F036
label: xxx
text: Oh, for heaven sake, whatever I'm doing, I'd rather be doing it with you.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M039
label: sur
text: Yeah?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F037
label: xxx
text: Oh, don't be ridiculous.  I mean, don't you know that?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F038
label: sad
text: You're the one who probably wishes you were with someone else.  Someone who--you'd rather enjoy yourself and didn't take everything so hard.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M040
label: xxx
text: Well, now that you mention it.  No, I don't.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F039
label: xxx
text: Okay.  Fine so.  We're in the wrong spot, but we're with the right person.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M041
label: hap
text: I don't know.  It seemed like a pretty good spot to me.  I mean, look at the view you have of the moon from here.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F040
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I noticed that.  Looks pretty, doesn't it?  Big ol' white moon.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M042
label: hap
text: Well, look what we have here.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F041
label: hap
text: Augie, you brought refreshments.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M043
label: hap
text: It's not champagne.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F042
label: hap
text: Well, then we don't need glasses.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M044
label: xxx
text: You still cold?  Do you wanna go home?

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F043
label: hap
text: No.  I think you might be right.  Maybe this is the spot after all.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F044
label: sad
text: Augie, I'm sorry.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M045
label: hap
text: Shh.  If we're very quiet the fish might come.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_F045
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses02F_script02_2_M046
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F000
label: xxx
text: You're the only one I know who loves his parents.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M000
label: xxx
text: I know, it went out of style, didn't it?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F001
label: xxx
text: It's all right.  It's a good thing.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F002
label: xxx
text: You know, it's lovely here, the air is sweet.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M001
label: neu
text: You're not sorry you came?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F003
label: xxx
text: No, not sorry.  Um, but, I'm- I'm not gonna stay.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M002
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F004
label: xxx
text: Well, for one thing, your mother as much as told me to go.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M003
label: xxx
text: Oh.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F005
label: xxx
text: You saw that.  I mean and then, well, you've been kind of, um--

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M004
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F006
label: xxx
text: Well, kind of embarrassed ever since I got here.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: The trouble is, I planned on sort of sneaking up on you over a period of a week or so.  But, they take it for granted that we're all set.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F007
label: xxx
text: I knew they would, your mother anyway.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F008
label: xxx
text: Well,

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F009
label: sad
text: from her point of view, why else would I come?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: Oh.  Would you want to?  I guess you know, this is why I asked you to come.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F010
label: xxx
text: I--I guess this is why I came.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: Anne, I love you.  I love you a great deal.  I love you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M008
label: xxx
text: I have no imagination.  That's all I know to tell you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M009
label: xxx
text: I'm embarrassing you and I didn't want to tell it to you here.  I wanted some place we'd never been before.  A place where we'd be brand new to each other.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M010
label: exc
text: You feel it's wrong here, don't you?  This yard, this chair.  I want you to be ready for me.  I don't want to have to win you away from anything.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F011
label: xxx
text: Oh, Chris, I've been ready for a long, long time.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: And he's gone forever.  You're sure?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: You started to write me and--

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M013
label: xxx
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F014
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M014
label: xxx
text: Anne, why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F015
label: xxx
text: Well, I was waiting for you.  I mean, till then you never wrote and when you did, I mean, what did you say?  You can sure be ambiguous sometimes.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M015
label: xxx
text: Give me a kiss, Anne.  Give me a-

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M016
label: xxx
text: oh God, I kissed you.  I kissed Annie.  How long--how long I've been waiting to kiss you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F016
label: hap
text: I will never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  All I did was sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M017
label: xxx
text: Oh, Annie, we're gonna live now.  I'm gonna make you so happy.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M018
label: xxx
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F018
label: xxx
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you, Chris.  What is it?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M019
label: xxx
text: Let's drive someplace.  I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F019
label: xxx
text: No.  What is it, your mother?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M020
label: sad
text: No.  Nothing like that.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F020
label: sad
text: Then, what's wrong?  I mean, even in your letters there was some--something ashamed.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M021
label: sad
text: Yeah, I suppose I have been.  But it's going from me.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F021
label: sad
text: You've gotta tell me.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M022
label: sad
text: I don't know how to start.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F022
label: sad
text: It wouldn't work this way.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: It's all mixed up with so many other things.  You remember overseas, I was in command of a company?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F023
label: sad
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M024
label: sad
text: Well, I lost them.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F024
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F025
label: sad
text: Oh, gee.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: It takes some time for a guy to toss that off.  'Cause they weren't just men.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: For instance, one time, it had been raining several days and this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks.  I put them in pocket.  It's only a little thing, but that's the kind of guys I had.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: They didn't die, they killed themselves for each other.  I mean that exactly.  A little more selfish and they'd have been here today.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: I got this idea watching them go down.  Everything was being destroyed, see, but it seemed that there was one new thing being made.  A sort of responsibility.  Man for man.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: You know what I mean?  To show that, to bring that onto the Earth again, like some kind of monument and everyone would feel it standing behind him and it would make a difference to him.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: Then I came back and it was incredible.  There was no meaning in it here.  The whole thing to them seemed like sort of a bus accident.  I went to work with Dad and that rat race again.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: And I felt what you said, ashamed somehow 'cause nobody was changed at all.  It seemed to make suckers out of a lot of guys.  I felt wrong to be alive to open the new bank book, drive the new car, see the new refrigerator.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: I mean, you can take those things out of a war, but when you drive that car, you've gotta know that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.  You've gotta be a little better because of it.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: Because otherwise all you have is really loot and there's blood on it.  And I didn't want to take any of it.  And I guess that included you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F026
label: sad
text: You still feel that way?

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M035
label: xxx
text: I want you now Annie.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F027
label: xxx
text: 'Cause you mustn't feel that way.  Because you have a right to everything that you have.  Do you understand that?  Everything, Chris, and me too.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F028
label: xxx
text: I mean, and your money, there's nothing wrong with your money.  I mean, your father put hundreds of planes in the air.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_M036
label: xxx
text: I know Annie.  Annie, I'm gonna make a fortune for you.

name: Ses02F_script01_3_F029
label: hap
text: What'll I do with a fortune?

name: Ses02F_impro04_M000
label: neu
text: So, uh, so how's it been going?  I mean, you have any needs or anything?

name: Ses02F_impro04_F000

name: Ses02F_impro04_M001

name: Ses02F_impro04_M002

name: Ses02F_impro04_M008

text: I have some better news than that.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M005
label: xxx
text: Oh, really?

name: Ses03F_impro07_F005
label: hap
text: Yes, What would you want more than anything in this world?

name: Ses03F_impro07_M006
label: xxx
text: A chocolate cake?

name: Ses03F_impro07_F006
label: xxx
text: How about maybe for me to possibly stay in L.A.?

name: Ses03F_impro07_M007
label: xxx
text: Oh, wow. You got in?

name: Ses03F_impro07_M008
label: exc
text: Which one?

name: Ses03F_impro07_F007
label: exc
text: I got--U.S.C.. I got- Yeah, I got the acceptance letter.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M009
label: sur
text: oh really?

name: Ses03F_impro07_M010
label: xxx
text: You got in? Wow.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F008
label: exc
text: Yes, me, I got in. Thank you very much.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M011
label: exc
text: Good for you.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F009
label: exc
text: Yeah, I know, my mom called me. I was with my girlfriend in Boston, and uh- she got the letter and she called me, she said I don't know, do you want me to open it? And I was like yes, open it. And she opened it and she goes oh, I'm sorry, Nat.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F010
label: xxx
text: And I was like what? She's like, you know, you didn't get in. Totally plays it off. Like I didn't get in. And I'm like, I start almost crying.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F011
label: exc
text: And my mom was like Natalie, Natalie, it's [GARBAGE], you know-

name: Ses03F_impro07_M012
label: neu
text: oh yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F012
label: hap
text: and so, I mean, I got in.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M013
label: exc
text: Oh, Jesus. That is so amazing.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F013
label: hap
text: So now I can stay here and now we can party. I know.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M014
label: exc
text: Party. You want to get drunk tonight?

name: Ses03F_impro07_F014
label: exc
text: Yeah, why not.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M015
label: exc
text: Yeah, we're going to celebrate.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F015
label: neu
text: We're not twenty one yet, but whatever.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M016
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I'm only eighteen so it's--go get drunk.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F016
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER]. I'm so excited, Joe. Oh, man, I-- And I got in--I got into the school of theatre, so it's like-

name: Ses03F_impro07_M017
label: sur
text: Shit. That's-

name: Ses03F_impro07_M018
label: sur
text: Oh, my God. That's--I heard it's top five-- --in the Grauman scale or something.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F017
label: hap
text: Yeah. It's really cool.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F018
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F019
label: hap
text: Top five in the nation.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M019
label: exc
text: Who-whooooo. Miss Acti- Acting Pants.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F020
label: exc
text: Acting Pants? So what are you going to do? Are you--you're be--you're going to stay here, right?

name: Ses03F_impro07_M020
label: xxx
text: Acti- acting pants.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M021
label: neu
text: I got into film school at the Art Academy.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F021
label: exc
text: Awesome. We're both going to be in L.A.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M022
label: exc
text: So I'm going to be--yeah. I'm going to make films; you're going to be in them.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F022
label: exc
text: I'm so excited. Yeah, I thought I was going to go to Boston, but then--

name: Ses03F_impro07_M023
label: neu
text: Fuck Boston.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F023
label: hap
text: Oh man, I'm so excited. So much to do.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M024
label: xxx
text: Boston smells bad. L.A. is so much cooler.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F024
label: xxx
text: There's so much culture here, you know? It's just like-- --all great restaurants and-

name: Ses03F_impro07_F025
label: hap
text: I'm just so excited to start my life.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M025
label: neu
text: We should uh- go to Little Ethiopia.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F026
label: exc
text: Oh, and you sit down and you have the sponge bread-- --and eat the--drink the beer. Ugh, I love that stuff. I'm so excited.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F027
label: exc
text: Are you going to come stay in my dorm with me sometime?

name: Ses03F_impro07_M026
label: exc
text: Hell, yeah. Pass out.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F028
label: exc
text: Yeah. I'll get like one of those little--

name: Ses03F_impro07_F029
label: exc
text: Yeah. Those little-- --mattresses. I'll put it by my bed.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M027
label: exc
text: -drunk.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M028
label: exc
text: No, I'll sleep in your bed. Cuddle up.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F030
label: xxx
text: Oh, I don't think so. Hmm-mm. No.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M029
label: exc
text: Uh-oh.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F031
label: neu
text: That's going to--that'll be reserved for somebody else.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M030
label: xxx
text: Oh, hey. Freshman slut. That's you gona need.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F032
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] Hello? I am not.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M031
label: xxx
text: That's what you got to be though, freshman year.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F033
label: xxx
text: No, I don't. I'm not like that.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M032
label: exc
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M033
label: neu
text: Well, get used to it.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F034
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]. No, you'd get used to it.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M034
label: hap
text: Hey, I'm already getting used to it.

name: Ses03F_impro07_F035
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER]. Oh, Joe, I'm so happy.

name: Ses03F_impro07_M035
label: hap
text: Me too, Isabella.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F000
label: fru
text: I don't know, Brian, if they uh--it's been three years.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M000
label: neu
text: Hey, you just got to keep on going.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F001
label: fru
text: No, I don't know, I--maybe this isn't for me. You know, maybe this isn't the right business for me.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M001
label: neu
text: No, don't think like that.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F002
label: sad
text: I just, I see all these other people getting commercials and work and it's like I'm not getting anything.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F003
label: fru
text: I have no money behind me. Nothing. I'm twenty five and--

name: Ses03F_impro04_M002
label: neu
text: Russel Crowe wasn't forty until he got his big stuff.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M003
label: neu
text: If you really want to do it-I mean,

name: Ses03F_impro04_F004
label: fru
text: So I'll have to wait twenty five years-

name: Ses03F_impro04_M004
label: neu
text: you got to do.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F005
label: fru
text: -just going and auditioning and auditioning and rejection after refection, it's like--

name: Ses03F_impro04_M005
label: neu
text: You could. You could. We just--

name: Ses03F_impro04_M006
label: neu
text: we're just pooling our funds together.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F006
label: fru
text: I know, I just don't know if I can handle it. I mean, you're helping me so much financially it's like I can't survive on my own without you. I don't like that.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M007
label: neu
text: You don't owe me anything.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F007
label: fru
text: I feel like I'm not doing anything. Like I'm not giving anything into this world.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M008
label: neu
text: You are, you're going to class, you're learning, you're getting better. When you finally get that role you're going to be prepared.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F008
label: fru
text: Yeah, but what if I never make it? What if I studied all my life, this theatre, this acting, and I'm never going to get anywhere. I'm never going to be able to have a job.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M009
label: neu
text: Oh my God, Anna, you're still young. Don't even think about that.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F009
label: fru
text: Time is passing by. Every year it's

name: Ses03F_impro04_F010
label: fru
text: a part left than I can do.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M010
label: neu
text: You're only twenty five, okay? Some people don't start until they're thirty five.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F011
label: sur
text: Really?

name: Ses03F_impro04_M011
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F012
label: fru
text: I don't know, I just [BREATHING] I get frustrated

name: Ses03F_impro04_M012
label: neu
text: What would you do- What would you do if you didn't? You can go to law school.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F013
label: fru
text: That's the thing. I don't know. I don't know anything.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F014
label: fru
text: Law school? Maybe.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F015
label: xxx
text: I don't know. I don't know anything other than this, though, is the problem. This is my life. This is what I built everything about, you know.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M013
label: neu
text: See? So you can't just quit now.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F016
label: xxx
text: I mean, I could go to law school, but I'm just not passionate about it, you know? Like I'm not--it doesn't drive me, it doesn't motivate me. I--

name: Ses03F_impro04_M014
label: neu
text: Have you been going to auditions and stuff?

name: Ses03F_impro04_F017
label: fru
text: Yeah. I mean, I get a call-back and stuff, but-

name: Ses03F_impro04_F018
label: fru
text: I just, I need a break. I need something to break me out.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M015
label: neu
text: How's the job? Still waiting tables at Denny's?

name: Ses03F_impro04_F019
label: xxx
text: Yeah. Unfortunately.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F020
label: xxx
text: Yeah, so I go to--get an education for four years and I'm waiting tables at Denny's.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M016
label: neu
text: Well, they tip well.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F021
label: fru
text: [BREATHING] Brian-

name: Ses03F_impro04_F022
label: sad
text: it's not funny. I just don't know what I'm going to do.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M017
label: neu
text: Maybe you could start teaching. I don't know.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F023
label: sad
text: Yeah, I guess I could.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M018
label: neu
text: Go back to school. You know? Another three more years, get your master's.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F024
label: sad
text: Yeah

name: Ses03F_impro04_M019
label: neu
text: Close to thirty. Oof, it's going to be tough.

name: Ses03F_impro04_F025
label: xxx
text: Thanks.

name: Ses03F_impro04_M020
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses03F_impro04_F026
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses03F_impro01_F000
label: xxx
text: God, finally I got to the line, the front of the line. I've been waiting there for like half an hour.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F001
label: xxx
text: [BREATHING] It's so hot in here. Hoo.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M000
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M001
label: neu
text: Oh, um-

name: Ses03F_impro01_F002
label: neu
text: What's wrong?

name: Ses03F_impro01_M002
label: neu
text: You didn't fill this out right. All right. It says that you have to fill out the back sheet of this, but you filled out the yellow sheet of it.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F003
label: fru
text: No, no, no, no, no, no. The lady over there, she told me to fill out the front and she said to wait in this line.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M003
label: neu
text: Who?

name: Ses03F_impro01_F004
label: fru
text: I don't know. Some lady. Sonya or something.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M004
label: neu
text: She- she probably doesn't even work here.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: Excuse me? No, no. I waited in the line over there..

name: Ses03F_impro01_M005
label: neu
text: All right  Uh-

name: Ses03F_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: and she told me to come over here and she said to fill out everything on the application and I did that.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: It's not right.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: Look, I-- No, no, no, I--you don't understand. I have to go back to work.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: You just take--all right.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: Well, you didn't fill this paper at work out right and it's going to take another fifteen minutes to do it and look at how long the line we got here so just-

name: Ses03F_impro01_F008
label: fru
text: I am not-

name: Ses03F_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: okay, just go back and fill it out real quick and I'm sorry, you have to get back in line and wait. I can't let you cut.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F009
label: fru
text: But you don't understand. I cannot get back in line because I have to go back to work. I will get fired if I don't leave here.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M010
label: xxx
text: Well, maybe you should have got here earlier than so you had a lot of time to do this.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F010
label: xxx
text: But I was at work and the lady told me to come and work it and to stand in the line.

name: Ses03F_impro01_M011
label: xxx
text: I don't know who this lady is.

name: Ses03F_impro01_F011
label: fru
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M000
label: neu
text: Yes.  The real cause of that rile was Peter Burden.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F000
label: neu
text: Oh, come on, you knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M001
label: xxx
text: I knew nothing of the sort.  You took presents from him.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F001
label: ang
text: Presents?  A trivial little broach.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: Mmm Hmm.  I remember it well.  Bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Not at all.  It was very pretty.  I still have it and I wear it often.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M003
label: ang
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F003
label: neu
text: No I didn't.  You made up the whole thing in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M004
label: ang
text: You must admit he was in love with you.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F004
label: neu
text: Just a little perhaps but nothing serious.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M005
label: ang
text: You let him kiss you. You said so.  What of it?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F005
label: xxx
text: Well what of it?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F006
label: neu
text: Well it didn't harm him, in fact, it pleasured him a lot and it didn't hurt me.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M006
label: ang
text: And what about me?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Well, if you hadn't been so suspicious and nosey you would've never known anything.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M007
label: ang
text: Oh, that's a nice point of view I must say.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F008
label: xxx
text: Look, I'm bored with this conversation.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M008
label: ang
text: Yeah, so am I.  Bored stiff.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M009
label: neu
text: You want some brandy?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F009
label: xxx
text: No thanks.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: I'll have a little I think.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F010
label: ang
text: I don't know why you want it.  You've already had two glasses.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M011
label: ang
text: No particular reason.  Anyhow they were very small ones.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F011
label: ang
text: I don't see what you have to go on and on with this kind of thing.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M012
label: ang
text: Oh my...just because I just...okay...

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M013
label: xxx
text: ...having three small minute liquor glasses in the evening is hardly going on and on and on.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F012
label: neu
text: It's become a habit with you.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M014
label: ang
text: You needn't be so grand just because you don't happen to want any yourself at the moment.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F013
label: xxx
text: Don't be so stupid.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M015
label: fru
text: Really Amanda.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M016
label: fru
text: Nothing.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F015
label: xxx
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M017
label: fru
text: Going out somewhere dear?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F016
label: neu
text: No, just making myself beautiful for you.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M018
label: xxx
text: That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F017
label: neu
text: That's the woman's job to lure the man.  Watch me a moment won't you?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M019
label: neu
text: Actually that's perfectly true.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F018
label: xxx
text: No it isn't.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M020
label: neu
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F019
label: xxx
text: Oh, be quiet.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F020
label: xxx
text: I think you should have some more brandy...

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M021
label: neu
text: I think that

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F021
label: xxx
text: ...cause really

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F022
label: xxx
text: it doesn't seem to be working on you.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M022
label: xxx
text: perhaps maybe you should've had more brandy, it might've made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F023
label: xxx
text: Well it really hasn't worked wonders with you.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M023
label: xxx
