text: Hmm, snap, snap, snap like a little adder.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F024
label: ang
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M024
label: xxx
text: Yes they do.  They have a bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F025
label: ang
text: They sting.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M025
label: fru
text: They snap.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F026
label: xxx
text: I don't care.  I don't care.  Do you understand?  I don't care if they roll around and bark like hoops.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M026
label: xxx
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F027
label: xxx
text: Yes, I did.  Quite a lot.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M027
label: xxx
text: I suppose you let him kiss you a great deal more then?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: Mind your business.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M028
label: xxx
text: Mmm, you must've had a riotous time.  No restraint at all, very enjoyable.  You never had much anyhow.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: You're quite insufferable.  I expect it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M029
label: ang
text: I'm not in the least bit drunk.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F030
label: ang
text: You've always had a weak head.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: Okay, like I mentioned before I had three very small, minute liquor glasses of brandy.  That's not even enough to get a child of two drunk.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F031
label: ang
text: On the contrary, a child of two can get violently drunk off just one glass of brandy.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M031
label: ang
text: Oh, what an interesting topic.  What about a child of four and a child of six?  A child of nine?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F032
label: ang
text: Shut up.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M032
label: ang
text: We might be able to bring up a splendid little debate about this intemperate tots.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F033
label: ang
text: Not very funny dear.  In fact, maybe you better have some more brandy.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M033
label: ang
text: Oh, thanks.  I think I will.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: You better turn that off.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F034
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M035
label: xxx
text: Because people upstairs will get annoyed.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F035
label: xxx
text: There aren't any people upstairs.  This is a photographer's studio.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M036
label: xxx
text: Well there are people downstairs I suppose.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F036
label: neu
text: They are away in Tunis.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M037
label: xxx
text: Oh, this is no time to be in here for Tunis.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F037
label: fru
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: No I'll do no such thing.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: Very well.  If you insist on being a boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Come on, turn it off.  It's driving me mad.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: You are far too temperamental.  Try to control yourself.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Turn it--Turn it off.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: Go away.  Go away.  I hate you.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: Very amusing indeed.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: I hate you.  Listen I'm sick and tired of listening to you, you sadistic bully.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: You know what?  You're a vile, little, evil-minded, little, wicked beast and I never want to see you again.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: This is the end.  Understand?  This is the end, here and now, forever and always.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: You're not going nowhere. No you're not.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F043
label: ang
text: Oh, yes I am. Yes I am and you can't stop me.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M044
label: ang
text: Just shut up.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M045
label: ang
text: shut up. shut up.  I would-I would never marry you again if you came crawling back to me on your hands and knees because you're an evil-minded little vampire and I hope to God I never see you again.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F044
label: ang
text: Listen, you're a cruel fiend and I hate, loathe you.  Thank God finally, finally thank God I've realized just how horrible you are--and marry you?  Marry you?  Never. I will never marry you.  I will die die in torment-

name: Ses03M_script03_2_F045
label: ang
text: Beast. Brute. Cad. Swine. Beast. Beast. Brute. Devil. Sorry.

name: Ses03M_script03_2_M046
label: ang
text: Oh.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F000
label: xxx
text: What's he going to say? Maybe we ought to talk to him before he sees it.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M000
label: neu
text: He saw it.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F001
label: xxx
text: What-how did he see it? I mean, I was the first one up. He was still in bed.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M001
label: neu
text: He was out there when it happened.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F002
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M002
label: neu
text: Um, about four this morning. Uh- I heard a crack and I looked out and I saw him standing there.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out at four in the morning?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M003
label: neu
text: I don't know. But after it cracked he went back in the house and he cried in the kitchen.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F004
label: neu
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M004
label: neu
text: No, I uh-, I figured the best thing to do was to leave him alone.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F005
label: neu
text: He cried hard, huh?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M005
label: neu
text: I could hear it right through the floor.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F006
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out there at that time? He was dreaming about him again. He's walking around at night again.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M006
label: neu
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F007
label: neu
text: Could he-he's acting just like he did after he died, you know?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What's the meaning in that?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M007
label: neu
text: I don't know.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M008
label: neu
text: But I know one thing, mom. We've made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: Well, what do you mean? What?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M009
label: neu
text: Being dishonest with him. That kind of thing always pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F010
label: neu
text: What do you mean, dishonest?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M010
label: xxx
text: You know Larry's not coming back and I know that too. Why do we go on letting him think that we believe with him?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F011
label: fru
text: What, you're going to argue with him?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M011
label: fru
text: No, I don't want to argue with him, but it's time that he realized that no one believes that Larry's coming back anymore.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F012
label: fru
text: You can't tell him that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M012
label: fru
text: We got to tell him that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F013
label: fru
text: We can't. It just won't work.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M013
label: fru
text: You know, for God's sakes it's been three years. No one comes back after three years. It's insane.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F014
label: neu
text: They do come back.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F015
label: xxx
text: I know, but he doesn't know that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Three years has been a long time.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M014
label: fru
text: All right. Just- Sit down, mom. I want to talk to you.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F017
label: ang
text: It's those Goddamn newspapers, you know? I mean, it's like every day they come out with this new person that comes along. And the next one's going to be Larry.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: All right. All right. Just come on, sit down.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F018
label: fru
text: What?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M016
label: neu
text: You know-you know why I asked Annie here, right?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F019
label: neu
text: Why?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: You know.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Well, I have an idea, but go on, tell me, what's the story?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M018
label: neu
text: I want to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F021
label: neu
text: Well, that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: Come on, you know that's not only my business.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F022
label: fru
text: Well, it is. I mean, what do you want me to do? You're grown up; you know what's going on in your mind.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M020
label: neu
text: So it's all right. I'll just go ahead with it.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F023
label: fru
text: Well, you better make sure your father's not- No- I'm just saying.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: See, then it's not just my business. God, you have

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M022
label: ang
text: -Oh, you infuriate me sometimes. You know, it's not just my business too if dad throws a fit.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M023
label: xxx
text: God. You have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F024
label: fru
text: Yeah, well I ignore what I got to ignore.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F025
label: fru
text: And she-she's Larry's girl.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M024
label: xxx
text: No, she is not Larry's girl.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F026
label: fru
text: Well, from your father's point of view she is. I mean, he's still alive. You've got no right to take her.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F027
label: xxx
text: If you go on from that point, I don't know where you go.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F028
label: fru
text: 'Cause listen, I'm telling you, I don't know where to go from there. Do you?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M025
label: xxx
text: Oh, I don't know.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F029
label: fru
text: What do you want from me?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M026
label: sad
text: Every time I reach out for something I have to pull back because other people will suffer. My whole entire life, time and time after time.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F030
label: neu
text: You're a considerate fella and there's nothing wrong in that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M027
label: ang
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F031
label: neu
text: There's nothing wrong with it.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M028
label: neu
text: I didn't ask Annie yet.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F032
label: fru
text: You didn't ask her yet?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M029
label: neu
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F033
label: xxx
text: Well, how do you know she's going to marry you? I mean, what if she feels the same way as your father?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M030
label: neu
text: Well then I guess it's over then. But from her letters I think she's forgotten him.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M031
label: neu
text: I'll find out. But then after it's all over we'll thrash it out with dad, right?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M032
label: fru
text: Mom, don't avoid me.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F034
label: fru
text: You know, the trouble is you've never had enough women. No, you never did.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M033
label: fru
text: So what? I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F035
label: fru
text: I don't understand why it has to be her.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M034
label: neu
text: Because it is.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F036
label: fru
text: That's a good answer, but it doesn't answer anything.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M035
label: fru
text: I just-

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F037
label: fru
text: I mean, you haven't seen her since the war. I mean, it's been five years.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M036
label: neu
text: It just is. I-

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M037
label: fru
text: I grew up with her. Okay. All these years, when I think of someone I want to be my wife I think of Annie. What do you want, a diagram?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F038
label: fru
text: No, I don't want a diagram.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F039
label: fru
text: He thinks he's coming back. You go-go on and marry her, I mean, you're pronouncing her dead. And what's going to happen to your father, huh? I don't know. Do you?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M038
label: fru
text: Okay. All right, then.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F040
label: fru
text: Just, listen. Give it more thought, is all.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M039
label: fru
text: No, I've given it three years of thought.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M040
label: xxx
text: And I thought that if I waited then dad would forget about Larry and then we could have a regular wedding and everything happy.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M041
label: neu
text: But if I can't have that here then I'll get out.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F041
label: xxx
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M042
label: neu
text: I'll get out. I'll marry her somewhere else. Maybe New York.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F042
label: xxx
text: You're crazy.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M043
label: xxx
text: I've been a sucker too long. I'm through with it.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F043
label: fru
text: You're what-you're going to leave the business? But you can't do that. What the hell is this?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M044
label: fru
text: The business. The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F044
label: fru
text: Oh, you have to be inspired.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M045
label: ang
text: Yes. I like it an hour out of the day. If I have to grub for money all day long at least that evening I want it beautiful. I want a wife. I want a family. I want some kids. I want to build something I can give myself to.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M046
label: ang
text: Now, Annie's in the middle of all that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M047
label: neu
text: Now, where do I find it?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F045
label: neu
text: Tell me something.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F046
label: neu
text: You'd leave that business.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M048
label: neu
text: Yes. On this I would.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F047
label: fru
text: You can't do that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M049
label: neu
text: Then help me stay here.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F048
label: fru
text: All right, but you can't do that. You can't talk like that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M050
label: neu
text: Okay. Just-

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F049
label: fru
text: We've worked all our lives for you. Only for you, Chris. The whole shootin' match is for you.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M051
label: fru
text: Yeah, I know, I know, just help me stay here, all right?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F050
label: neu
text: I'm going to.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F051
label: xxx
text: You just can't talk like that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M052
label: neu
text: I am thinking like that.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F052
label: neu
text: I don't know you, do I?

name: Ses03F_script01_1_M053
label: neu
text: No, you don't. I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses03F_script01_1_F053
label: neu
text: Yeah. I can see that.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M000
label: ang
text: Hey, you stupid dumb shit machine, give me a fucking operator, huh?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F000
label: neu
text: Hello sir, can I help you?

name: Ses03F_impro08_M001
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I've been on the-with the machine for like thirty minutes--

name: Ses03F_impro08_M002
label: xxx
text: trying to get an answer, and no one's given me an answer.  So what are you going to do about it?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F001
label: neu
text: I [GARBAGE]

name: Ses03F_impro08_F002
label: neu
text: Yes, sir, I'm very sorry, but we've had some trouble here.  There's been a lot of calls and the system has-

name: Ses03F_impro08_M003
label: xxx
text: Fuck, do you think I have all day?  Jesus

name: Ses03F_impro08_F003
label: neu
text: Sir, please calm down.  There's no reason to use profanity like that.  It's not-

name: Ses03F_impro08_M004
label: fru
text: Fine, sorry.  Okay, my phone's been on the fritz for like three days.  I can't get any incoming calls. What- What is going on?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F004
label: neu
text: Okay, and this is for Verizon? Your provider?

name: Ses03F_impro08_M005
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F005
label: neu
text: Well, um- we have a little problem with the system going on.  One of our satellites is down, and I-

name: Ses03F_impro08_M006
label: ang
text: You know what?  I'm just going to- Patient?  I'm a busy man.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F006
label: neu
text: You're going to have to just be patient with us, sir, as we

name: Ses03F_impro08_F007
label: neu
text: Well, I know sir, and we all are busy.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F008
label: neu
text: But I'm going to definitely have to- uh--get your contact information

name: Ses03F_impro08_M007
label: ang
text: -have to, have to what?

name: Ses03F_impro08_M008
label: ang
text: What?  It's my phone.  You can't even call me on it. I don't have another phone.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F009
label: neu
text: Okay, well, if you would like, um- we will be turning on the systems in probably about ten hours.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M009
label: ang
text: What?  Are you kidding me?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F010
label: neu
text: Sir, I'm very sorry, but this is the way it is.  This- We have no control over it.  It's going to take-  -but you have to be patient with us.  You can use a calling card.  We will give you a free calling card to use.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M010
label: ang
text: Oh, my God.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M011
label: ang
text: I- I'm going to kill myself right now.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M012
label: ang
text: A free calling card?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F011
label: neu
text: Do you have a land line, sir?

name: Ses03F_impro08_M013
label: xxx
text: No, I don't have a land line.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F012
label: neu
text: Okay, well, we will send you- We will reimburse you for the amount of minutes that you-

name: Ses03F_impro08_F013
label: neu
text: -on average would use.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M014
label: ang
text: That's it? Okay, yeah.  What else?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F014
label: neu
text: And we will probably send you a calling card.  I'm very sorry.  You're just going to have to be patient, sir.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M015
label: ang
text: Okay, I need more than this.  Are you going to give me a little bit more?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F015
label: neu
text: No, we don't just give you things.  We're- we're-

name: Ses03F_impro08_F016
label: neu
text: we compensating you for all your-

name: Ses03F_impro08_M016
label: fru
text: So you take things from me and you expect me just to wait around.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F017
label: fru
text: No no, we're not taking anything from you sir.  This is- This is unbeknownst to us.  The problem had just happened.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F018
label: fru
text: The satellite-is down in your area.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M017
label: fru
text: Okay, so you think you're going to-  -get me back some minutes, and that's going to make up for three days of business that I lost?  Okay, great.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F019
label: fru
text: No, three days, sir.  It's not three days. It's- It's only been about a day now. Let's not exaggerate.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M018
label: fru
text: No, it's been--three days.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M019
label: fru
text: Fine, it's been a day.  Okay?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F020
label: neu
text: Three days?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F021
label: neu
text: A day?

name: Ses03F_impro08_M020
label: xxx
text: A day's worth of business.  You know how much I make in a day?

name: Ses03F_impro08_F022
label: neu
text: I don't know, sir.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M021
label: neu
text: About three million dollars.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F023
label: neu
text: Oh, well, I'm sorry about that. Umm- We-

name: Ses03F_impro08_M022
label: xxx
text: So, you're going to give me back ten dollars worth of minutes--

name: Ses03F_impro08_M023
label: xxx
text: -to make up the three million dollars.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F024
label: neu
text: Well, ten hours worth of minutes--

name: Ses03F_impro08_F025
label: neu
text: is what's going to happen.

name: Ses03F_impro08_M024
label: xxx
text: Ten hours? So, basically, a day's worth of minutes which I pay forty dollars a month from it.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F026
label: neu
text: Sir,

name: Ses03F_impro08_M025
label: xxx
text: So you're giving me a dollar back.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F027
label: neu
text: what I would like what I'm advising you to do now is just to write down all of your problems that you-you feel that--You know, haven't been addressed, fax it to us-

name: Ses03F_impro08_M026
label: fru
text: Oh, my God.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F028
label: neu
text: and we will take care of it if anything happens.  But all we can do now is ask for your patience.

name: Ses03F_impro08_F029
label: neu
text: Okay? Thank you for calling.  Goodbye.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F000
label: ang
text: Why did you invite her here?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M000
label: xxx
text: Why? Does that bother you?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F001
label: ang
text: She's been in New York for three-and-a-half years. She don't just suddenly come and-

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well, maybe, maybe he just wanted to see her.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F002
label: ang
text: You don't travel seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M002
label: xxx
text: What do you mean? They lived next door to each other their entire lives. Why shouldn't he want to see her? Hey, don't look at me like that. I don't know anymore than you do.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M003
label: neu
text: How do you know he's even thinking about it?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F004
label: ang
text: It's got that about it.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M004
label: neu
text: Well, so what?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F005
label: xxx
text: What's going on here, Joe?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M005
label: fru
text: Listen, kid-

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F006
label: ang
text: She's not Larry's girl. She knows that.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M006
label: neu
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Then why is she married? Then why isn't she married? She's been in New York and there's hundreds of single men there.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F008
label: xxx
text: I'm sure hundreds of them asked her and told her that she's foolish, but no.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F009
label: xxx
text: She's waited.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M007
label: neu
text: How do you know why she's waited?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F010
label: xxx
text: Because she thinks like me, that's why.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F011
label: sad
text: She's faithful as a rock, don't you know. In my worst moments I can think of her-

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F012
label: xxx
text: I think again, that I'm-I'm right.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M008
label: neu
text: Look, it's a nice day. What are we arguing for?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F013
label: ang
text: Nobody in my house better ever dare-dare to challenge her faith. Maybe strangers, but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M009
label: neu
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F014
label: xxx
text: Because he's not coming back. Then what do I got to live for? I'll kill myself.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F015
label: ang
text: Don't, don't laugh at me, don't laugh at me.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F016
label: ang
text: Look at it. Because why, when she came here and she slept in his room, the memorial broke into pieces. Look at it, look at it, Joe.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M011
label: ang
text: All right. All right. Calm yourself.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F017
label: xxx
text: You got to believe, believe with me because I can't stand all alone.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: Okay. Just calm yourself.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F018
label: sad
text: No, you've got to believe.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F019
label: xxx
text: Believe, Joe. You above all people have got to believe.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M013
label: ang
text: Why me, above all?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M014
label: ang
text: Huh?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M015
label: ang
text: Why me above all?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F020
label: sad
text: You got to keep believing.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: Look at you, you're shaking.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_F021
label: sad
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: What have I got to hide?

name: Ses03F_script01_2_M018
label: ang
text: Huh? What the hell's the matter with you, Kate?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F000
label: xxx
text: You're the only one I know that still loves his parents.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M000
label: xxx
text: I know.  It sort of went out of style didn't it?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F001
label: xxx
text: No.  It's alright.  It's a good thing, you know?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F002
label: xxx
text: It's lovely here.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F003
label: xxx
text: The air is so sweet.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M001
label: neu
text: You're not sorry you came?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F004
label: sad
text: No.  I'm not sorry.  But I'm not going to stay.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M002
label: sur
text: Why?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F005
label: xxx
text: First of all your mother so much as told me to go.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M003
label: xxx
text: Well...

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F006
label: sad
text: Look,

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F007
label: sad
text: you saw the way that she acted and then well, I mean, you, you were acting kind of...

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M004
label: neu
text: What?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F008
label: sad
text: Well, I don't know, embarrassed of her since I came.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: Well the trouble is I was planning on sneaking up on you over a week or so and they take it for granted that we're all set.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F009
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  I know they would, especially your mother.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: How did you know?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F010
label: xxx
text: Well what other reason, from her point of view, would I be coming here?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: So, would you want to?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M008
label: hap
text: I mean, that's the reason why I asked you here.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F011
label: hap
text: Well,

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M009
label: xxx
text: Oh Annie.  I love you.  I love you a great deal.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M010
label: hap
text: I love you.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: I guess that's why I came.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: I don't...I have no imagination that's the only way I know how to tell it.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: I'm embarrassing you.  I didn't want to tell you this here.  I wanted to drive someplace brand new where we'd be brand new to each other.  It feels wrong here don't you?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M013
label: xxx
text: This yard and this chair.  I don't want to win you from anything, I want you to be ready for me.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: Look, I've been ready for a long, long time now.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M014
label: xxx
text: Then he's gone forever, you sure?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F014
label: hap
text: Look, I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M015
label: xxx
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F015
label: hap
text: You started to write me.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M016
label: hap
text: You felt something that far back.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F016
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M017
label: xxx
text: Why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F017
label: hap
text: I was waiting for you Chris, I mean, till then you never wrote and then when you did what did you say?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F018
label: hap
text: You'd always be so ambiguous.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M018
label: hap
text: Give me a kiss Ann, just give me...

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M019
label: exc
text: Oh God.  Annie, I kissed Annie.  I kissed Annie.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F019
label: hap
text: I'll never forgive you for that.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M020
label: xxx
text: How long, how long I've been waiting to do that.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F020
label: hap
text: I mean,  Why did you wait all these years?  There I was sitting around and wondering if I was crazy for thinking about you.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M021
label: hap
text: We're going to live now.  I'm going to make you so happy.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F021
label: hap
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M022
label: xxx
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F022
label: xxx
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you Chris.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: Nothing.  Hey, let's drive somewhere.  I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F023
label: xxx
text: What is it?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F024
label: xxx
text: No, what is it?  Your mother?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M024
label: xxx
text: No, nothing, nothing like that.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F025
label: xxx
text: Tell me what's wrong.  I mean, even in your letters you seemed ashamed.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M025
label: xxx
text: Well, yes I guess I've been ashamed but, it's going from me.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F026
label: xxx
text: You got to tell me.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M026
label: xxx
text: I don't know where to start.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F027
label: xxx
text: Okay.  It wouldn't work like this?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: You remember overseas I was in command of a company?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F028
label: xxx
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: Well I lost them.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F029
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F030
label: sad
text: Geez.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: Takes a little while to toss that off cause they weren't just men.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: For instance, one time this...it had been raining several days and this one kid, he came up to me, he gave me his last pair of dry socks, put them in my pocket.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: That's just a little thing but that's the kind of guys I had.  They didn't just die, they killed themselves for each other and I mean that exactly.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: A little more selfish and they'd still be here today.  And I got this idea watching them go down.  See everything was being destroyed but there was one new thing that was being created.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: It was a kind of responsibility, man for man.  You understand me?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M035
label: sad
text: And to show that and to bring that onto the earth again like some sort of monument standing right behind all of us and we could feel it and it would make a difference to him.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M036
label: sad
text: And then I came here and it was incredible.  There was no meaning in it here.  The whole thing to them was a kind of bus accident.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M037
label: sad
text: And I went to work with dad and that rat race again and I felt what you said, ashamed.  Somehow because nobody was changed at all.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M038
label: sad
text: It seemed to make a sucker out of a lot of guys.  I felt wrong to be alive.  I felt wrong to have that new checkbook,

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M039
label: sad
text: open that new bank account, drive the new car and see the new refrigerator

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M040
label: sad
text: cause you can take those things out of the war.  But you got to know, when you drive that car that it came out of the love that a man can have for a man and you got to be a little bit better because of that.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M041
label: sad
text: Otherwise what you have is loot and there's blood on it.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M042
label: sad
text: And I didn't want to take any of it and I guess that included you.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F031
label: sad
text: And you still feel that way?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M043
label: xxx
text: I want you now Annie.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F032
label: xxx
text: Cause you must not feel that way again.  You hear me?  You can't.  You deserve everything you have Chris.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F033
label: sad
text: that includes me too, I mean and the money, you have right to that money.  Your father put planes up in the air, good planes and he deserves it, you should be proud of that.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M044
label: xxx
text: [GARBAGE] Annie

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M045
label: hap
text: Annie I'm going to make a fortune for you.

name: Ses03M_script01_3_F034
label: hap
text: What am I going to do with a fortune?

name: Ses03M_script01_3_M046
label: hap
text: Buy some hats?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F000
label: hap
text: You're the only one I know that still loves his parents.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M000
label: hap
text: Yeah. I know. It went out of style, didn't it?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F001
label: hap
text: No, it's all right. There's nothing wrong in that, you know.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F002
label: hap
text: It's really lovely here. The air is sweet.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M001
label: neu
text: You're not sorry you came?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F003
label: sad
text: No. I'm not sorry. It's-

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F004
label: xxx
text: I can't stay.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M002
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F005
label: fru
text: Well, for one thing, your mother so much has told me to go. [LAUGHTER].

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M003
label: neu
text: Well-

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F006
label: xxx
text: Look,

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F007
label: xxx
text: you've been acting kind of, well, you know.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M004
label: neu
text: What?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F008
label: sad
text: Well, you've been embarrassed ever since I came.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: Yes, I guess I have been. But it's going from me now.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M006
label: hap
text: Oh look, um, well, the thing is, I was planning on, planning on sort of sneaking up on you over a week or so, and they-they take it for granted we're all set.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F009
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: How did you know?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F010
label: xxx
text: Yeah, they would. Especially your mom.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M008
label: xxx
text: Well, uh- would you want to?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M009
label: hap
text: I, I guess that's why I asked you to come.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F011
label: hap
text: Well, I mean,

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M010
label: hap
text: Oh, Annie.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: from her opinion, why else would I come here?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M011
label: hap
text: Annie, I love you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M012
label: hap
text: I love you a great deal.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M013
label: hap
text: I-I love you. I have no imagination. That's all I know how to tell it.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: Well, I guess that's why I came.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M014
label: hap
text: I'm embarrassing you. I didn't want to tell you it here. I wanted to go somewhere that would be brand-new to each other. It feels wrong here, don't you? This yard and this chair.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M015
label: hap
text: I don't want to win you from anybody. I want you to be ready for me.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F014
label: hap
text: I've been ready for a long, long time.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M016
label: xxx
text: Then he's gone forever. You're sure?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F015
label: xxx
text: Look

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F016
label: xxx
text: I was almost married two years ago.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M017
label: sur
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: 'Cause you started to write me.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M018
label: hap
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F018
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M019
label: hap
text: Why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F019
label: xxx
text: Well, I don't know, you didn't write until then and then when you did, what'd you say?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F020
label: xxx
text: You always can be so ambiguous.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M020
label: hap
text: Give me a kiss, Annie.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M021
label: hap
text: Give me-

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M022
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER]. God, I kissed Annie. I kissed Annie. How long, how long I've been waiting to kiss you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F021
label: hap
text: I don't know if I ever can forgive you for that. Why'd you wait so long? I sat in my room wondering if I was crazy for thinking about you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M023
label: hap
text: We're going to live now. I'm going to make you so happy.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F022
label: xxx
text: Not like that, you're not.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M024
label: hap
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F023
label: hap
text: Like Larry's brother. Do it like you, Chris.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F024
label: xxx
text: What is it?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: Let's drive somewhere. I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F025
label: sad
text: No. What is it? Is it your mother?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M026
label: neu
text: No, no, no, no. Nothing like that.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F026
label: sad
text: Well then tell me what's wrong. I mean, even in your letters there's something ashamed.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: Yeah. I guess there is. I guess I was, but uh- it's going from me now.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F027
label: sad
text: You should tell me.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: I don't know where to start.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F028
label: sad
text: But, Chris, it wouldn't work like this.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: You know when I went overseas. I said I was in command of a company.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F029
label: sad
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: Well, I lost them.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F030
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F031
label: sad
text: Geez.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: It takes a little while to toss that off. Because they weren't just men.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: For instance, one time, it had to have been raining several days. There was this one kid, he came up to me and he gave me his last pair of dry socks. Put them in my pocket.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: I mean, that's-that's only a little thing, but that's the kind of guys I had. They didn't just die. They killed themselves for each other. And I mean that exactly. A little more selfish and they'd still be here today.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M035
label: sad
text: And I, and I thought something watching them go down.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M036
label: sad
text: Everything was being destroyed, see, but there was one new thing that was being created. A kind of responsibility, man for man. You understand me?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M037
label: sad
text: And to show that-to bring that onto the earth like some sort of monument standing right behind us where everyone could feel it and it would make a difference to him.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M038
label: sad
text: And I came back here and it was incredible. There was no meaning in that here. The whole thing to them was a bus accident.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M039
label: sad
text: And I went to work with dad and that rat race again. And I felt what you said-ashamed somehow. Because nobody was changed at all. It seemed to make a sucker out of a lot of guys.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M040
label: sad
text: And I felt wrong to be alive. To drive the car, to see the new checkbook, to see the new refrigerator. I mean, you can take those things out of the war. But you got to know that when you drive that car that that came out of the love a man can have for another man. And you got to be a little bit better because of that.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M041
label: sad
text: Otherwise, what you have here is loot; and there's blood on it.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M042
label: sad
text: And I didn't want to take any of it.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M043
label: sad
text: And I guess that included you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F032
label: sad
text: And you still feel that way?

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M044
label: xxx
text: I want you now, Annie.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F033
label: sad
text: Because you can't feel that way, never again, Chris. You hear me? Never. I mean, the money and me too.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F034
label: xxx
text: I mean, there's nothing wrong in that money, and your father put good planes up in the air and you should be proud of that. A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M045
label: hap
text: Annie,

name: Ses03F_script01_3_M046
label: hap
text: Annie, I'm going to make a fortune for you.

name: Ses03F_script01_3_F035
label: hap
text: What am I going to do with a fortune?

name: Ses03F_impro06_M000
label: neu
text: How you doing?

name: Ses03F_impro06_F000
label: sad
text: Okay.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F001
label: sad
text: Yeah. Wow.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M001
label: neu
text: We're all going to miss him.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: Mmm hmm. I never knew it was going to be this hard, you know.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: It's weird 'cause it's like you expected it to happen and eventually-

name: Ses03F_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: he had cancer, you know?

name: Ses03F_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: They thought he got--would get better and he did, and then it just- things turned bad.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: Turned around for the worst, you know.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M002
label: sad
text: I didn't know him, Tricia, but uh- I heard that he was a great man.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: He was amazing.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: I loved that boy.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F009
label: sad
text: We did everything together, you know.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: It's weird, I think. I feel so alone, you know? What am I going to do now? Now that he's gone.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F011
label: sad
text: He's so young. It seems so--

name: Ses03F_impro06_F012
label: sad
text: so wrong in so many ways.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F013
label: sad
text: His poor parents. You know, it's their only son.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M003
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F014
label: sad
text: Kind of a whole year. I mean, he suffered with this, this monster, this thing, this disease.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M004
label: sad
text: He was in chemo the whole time, right?

name: Ses03F_impro06_M005
label: sad
text: And he just got that baseball scholarship.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F015
label: sad
text: I know. He was, he had so much going for him.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F016
label: sad
text: So handsome, so young, so gifted.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F017
label: sad
text: So talented.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F018
label: sad
text: Such a sweet person, you know?

name: Ses03F_impro06_M006
label: sad
text: How's his parents doing?

name: Ses03F_impro06_F019
label: sad
text: Not very good.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F020
label: sad
text: Can you imagine, though, you know, as a parent, just losing a kid? Twenty-two years old.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F021
label: sad
text: It's weird, I kind of feel like part of me is gone now, you know?

name: Ses03F_impro06_F022
label: sad
text: Because this other half was just kind of like ripped away.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M007
label: sad
text: You guys were pretty close, weren't you?

name: Ses03F_impro06_F023
label: sad
text: He was like, he was like my brother, you know.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F024
label: sad
text: He was my brother.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F025
label: sad
text: Just seems so unfair, is the way it is.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F026
label: sad
text: You know, he had that really pretty girlfriend for like about a year and-

name: Ses03F_impro06_M008
label: sad
text: What was her name?

name: Ses03F_impro06_F027
label: sad
text: Kelly. Kelly Uveny.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F028
label: sad
text: They talked about getting married and--

name: Ses03F_impro06_M009
label: sad
text: Trying to have a baby.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F029
label: sad
text: Yeah. But then when he got cancer and it got bad, you know, she just took off and-

name: Ses03F_impro06_F030
label: sad
text: so I was there for him.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M010
label: sad
text: Some people.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M011
label: sad
text: Yeah, but you were there all the hospital days. By his bed-

name: Ses03F_impro06_F031
label: sad
text: Yeah. God, I loved that kid.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M012
label: sad
text: So nice, so positive.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F032
label: sad
text: yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M013
label: sad
text: We need more people like him.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F033
label: sad
text: Joe, do you think he knew I loved him?

name: Ses03F_impro06_M014
label: sad
text: I don't know.

name: Ses03F_impro06_F034
label: sad
text: I never told him, I love you, but-

name: Ses03F_impro06_F035
label: sad
text: I loved him so much.

name: Ses03F_impro06_M015
label: sad
text: I don't know if Benny was smart like that- but-

name: Ses03F_impro06_M016
label: sad
text: I'm sure he loved you too. He just didn't know it.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F000
label: neu
text: How's it going, babe?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F001
label: neu
text: Yeah?

name: Ses03F_impro02_M000
label: neu
text: All right.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F002
label: xxx
text: Good.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F003
label: xxx
text: Hey listen,eh- I've been wanting to talk to you. I have something to tell you. How's Amy doing?

name: Ses03F_impro02_M001
label: hap
text: She's doing fine. She just took her first steps today actually. I videotaped it for you so you can watch it.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F004
label: xxx
text: yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F005
label: exc
text: oh.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F006
label: xxx
text: I really want to say that. Well I, so, you know, at the center department they called me in and I talked to-

name: Ses03F_impro02_M002
label: xxx
text: Oh, yeah? What did they say?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F007
label: exc
text: Well umm- actually they--I was promoted.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M003
label: xxx
text: Oh, wow. That's great.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F008
label: sad
text: And Uh- Yeah. Uh- They're going to need um- more nurses on call for uh- to go overseas to help out with the war.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F009
label: xxx
text: And uh - seeing as I was uh- promoted and head of the department now, and so- well, they asked me to go.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F010
label: sad
text: yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M004
label: sur
text: when?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F011
label: sad
text: It's going- It's going to be probably in about three weeks.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M005
label: sur
text: What? You can't do that. Three weeks?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F012
label: sad
text: yeah

name: Ses03F_impro02_F013
label: xxx
text: Well, I'm leaving in three weeks, but-- Yeah.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M006
label: fru
text: God, we're supposed to take a look at a house next week.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F014
label: fru
text: Maybe we can still do that

name: Ses03F_impro02_M007
label: ang
text: I can't- No, I can't do this alone.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F015
label: sad
text: Yeah, and uh--

name: Ses03F_impro02_M008
label: xxx
text: Amy's starting school in a month.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F016
label: fru
text: I know, but look, I have to take this. I mean, if I don't, I mean, I could get fired.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F017
label: fru
text: And we know you need-we need the money. We couldn't even- purchase a house if I didn't take this.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M009
label: fru
text: God.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M010
label: fru
text: You know what happened to my cousin. She went and she never came back.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F018
label: sad
text: Honey, I'm going to come back. It's not like that.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F019
label: sad
text: But it- it is for a year.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M011
label: fru
text: Oh

name: Ses03F_impro02_F020
label: sad
text: Babe, I'm sorry. But I don't want to do.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M012
label: fru
text: I can't-

name: Ses03F_impro02_F021
label: sad
text: You know as much as -as much as me that I-I want to stay here with you and Amy so bad, but I can't.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M013
label: xxx
text: You remember the last time you went? You know how hard it was for me? Now we have a kid.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F022
label: fru
text: But you're so good with her. You know, she knows you better than she knows me 'cause I'm at work every day.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M014
label: sad
text: I have to work.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M015
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses03F_impro02_F023
label: sad
text: Babe, I love you.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M016
label: sad
text: You can't leave your daughter alone like this.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F024
label: sad
text: But she has you. I mean, that's what you're there for. You're my right-hand man.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F025
label: sad
text: It's going to be okay.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M017
label: sad
text: You can't postpone it?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F026
label: sad
text: No, I have to go.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F027
label: sad
text: Wait, you can write me and as you know, send me pictures.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M018
label: sad
text: I don't know if I can handle you going another year.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F028
label: sad
text: What do you mean?

name: Ses03F_impro02_M019
label: sad
text: I don't know if I- if I could take it.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F029
label: sad
text: Look, I need you to be strong for me. 'Cause I can't be the only one that's strong right now, really, I--

name: Ses03F_impro02_M020
label: sad
text: I can't be that strong. A whole year.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M021
label: sad
text: me, oh my god.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F030
label: xxx
text: But we can work, you know, we--you can write me and we could see pictures

name: Ses03F_impro02_M022
label: fru
text: What if you don't come back?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F031
label: sad
text: and if we survive, if we survive that then babe, you know you know we could survive any--

name: Ses03F_impro02_F032
label: sad
text: I will come back.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M023
label: xxx
text: What am I supposed--oh, one out of five people aren't coming back.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M024
label: sad
text: It doesn't look very good.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F033
label: xxx
text: I can do it. I'm going to do it. And I'll be back safe and sound and-

name: Ses03F_impro02_F034
label: sad
text: we'll have all the money that we ever needed.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F035
label: sad
text: And- And then I'll stop working and- I'll stay home with the baby.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M025
label: sad
text: I don't want the money. I want-you here

name: Ses03F_impro02_M026
label: xxx
text: we'll get money, all right? You don't need the job, all right?

name: Ses03F_impro02_M027
label: ang
text: If your life is going to be in danger and this family is going to be in danger we don't need the job. We'll find the money.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F036
label: sad
text: It's all I ever knew how to do. I can't quit now.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M028
label: sad
text: How are we supposed to tell Amy? How's she supposed to understand that?

name: Ses03F_impro02_F037
label: sad
text: Well, we- we tell her mommy's going on va- on a trip for for- a while.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M029
label: sad
text: How is she going to feel the first year in school, no mom.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F038
label: sad
text: Don't do that to me.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F039
label: sad
text: It's hard enough already, Brian, I can't.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M030
label: xxx
text: I'm not thinking about just me; I'm thinking about our child.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F040
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F041
label: sad
text: I didn't expect this to happen. I never planned for this. Some things you just don't plan for, you know.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F042
label: sad
text: I'm sorry, babe.

name: Ses03F_impro02_F043
label: sad
text: I'm so sorry.

name: Ses03F_impro02_M031
label: sad
text: All right, then.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F000
label: fru
text: Look sir, I've been waiting for about an hour and my luggage still hasn't come. What's going on?

name: Ses03F_impro05_M000
label: fru
text: I'm sorry, Mrs. Rosenkrantz, but uh- I don't know what to tell you.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F001
label: fru
text: What do you mean, you don't know what to tell me? I have two luggage that I've been coming--they're coming--from France and I need them here. I'm home now. I need to go start working.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M001
label: fru
text: Did you- Did you check with the lost and found?

name: Ses03F_impro05_F002
label: ang
text: Where? I don't know. The lost and found. What do you mean, lost and found?

name: Ses03F_impro05_F003
label: fru
text: I had my luggage transferred here from Paris to L.A. and now I'm here and I need to be working and I have all my stuff in there.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M002
label: fru
text: Maybe it got lost. Did you think about that, mom?

name: Ses03F_impro05_F004
label: fru
text: Well, that's what I'm asking you. What--I don't know what happened to it.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M003
label: neu
text: Oh, not--we didn't lose it; maybe the airport lost it. Maybe someone stole it.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F005
label: ang
text: Wait, sir. You're- You're completely not--what do you mean, stole it? How can they just steal it from an airplane? It was up in the air?

name: Ses03F_impro05_M004
label: fru
text: No, I mean, maybe in the little--going around thingy thing where bopper stole it from there.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F006
label: fru
text: Okay. All I know is that I am supposed to have my language here right now. Right now. And it's not there. And you're supposed to help me because you work at the airport. So give me my luggage or tell me where the hell it is.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M005
label: fru
text: Okay. What can we do is we can get your name and information and if it shows up we can send it to you so-- Wherever you stay

name: Ses03F_impro05_F007
label: ang
text: What do you mean, if it shows up? No, I need it now. I have my keys, I have my wallet, I have my money. I have thousands and thousands of dollars worth of stuff in there.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F008
label: ang
text: Not to mention I have my work in there.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M006
label: fru
text: Well, I'll have you fill out some paperwork and see if you can get started on something.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F009
label: ang
text: And what if- what if it is lost? Well, what are you guys going to do for me?

name: Ses03F_impro05_M007
label: xxx
text: You know, we'll file a complaint and we could possibly, you know, replace some of the things. I think-

name: Ses03F_impro05_M008
label: neu
text: and when you sign your ticket we could replace about fifteen percent of what's in the bag.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F010
label: ang
text: Fifteen percent?

name: Ses03F_impro05_M009
label: neu
text: Up to a limit of twenty five dollars.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F011
label: ang
text: What? There- There's hundreds of thousands of dollars worth of stuff in there.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M010
label: fru
text: Whoa, maybe you should uh- have thought of a better way to send it than just in a bag, hmm? Did you think about that?

name: Ses03F_impro05_F012
label: fru
text: No, no, no. You don't understand. This is--these are my belongings in the luggage. And I went to Paris.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F013
label: fru
text: Sir, why are you laughing at me? This isn't funny.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M011
label: neu
text: I think that's kind of stupid, that you put a hundred thousands of dollars in the bag.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F014
label: xxx
text: Well I'm sorry, if I--no, it's not stupid. You are supposed to have my luggage.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M012
label: fru
text: Did you lock- Did you lock it even? You probably didn't even lock it.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F015
label: ang
text: No, they said I couldn't lock it.

name: Ses03F_impro05_F016
label: ang
text: Give me--I'm going to talk to your supervisor. Give me your supervisor. I want to talk to your supervisor right now.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M013
label: neu
text: Okay, let me get him.Oh, guess who the supervisor is? It's me.

name: Ses03F_impro05_M014
label: neu
text: What, do you have questions?

name: Ses03F_impro05_F017
label: ang
text: Well, get- I want the C.E.O. then.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F000
label: neu
text: Can I help you sir?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M000
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M001
label: fru
text: I've been here for four hours and I don't know where one piece of my luggage is

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F001
label: neu
text: Okay.  Well let's...well I'm going to go ahead and check on that for you.  You're coming from...where are you coming from?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M002
label: fru
text: Baltimore.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F002
label: neu
text: Baltimore and this is a direct flight to LAX

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M003
label: fru
text: Yes.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F003
label: neu
text: Okay.  Let's look up here

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M004
label: fru
text: You know and they've looked it up before and it's not there.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F004
label: neu
text: Okay.  Well you um-...

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M005
label: fru
text: Now what are you going to do for me different? Hmm?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F005
label: neu
text: What I can do for you is uh we can uh report lost, lost property.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M006
label: fru
text: You can report lost property?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F006
label: neu
text: Yes.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M007
label: fru
text: Okay.  I'm leaving LA tomorrow for San Diego, driving there.  So, I'm going to leave without all my lost property?  That's what you want me to do? um

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F007
label: neu
text: Well sir, if if...what I believe has happened is most of the flight was left--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F008
label: neu
text: the luggage was left in Baltimore.  Therefore--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M008
label: ang
text: Most of the...

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F009
label: neu
text: Like the luggage, the luggage on the flight.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M009
label: xxx
text: Wow.  This is an incompetent airline isn't it?  Are you--?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F010
label: neu
text: No actually it was...this is the first time this has ever happened.  I don't know what happened--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M010
label: fru
text: Are you going to refund us for our luggage, refund us for our tickets for this?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F011
label: neu
text: Well, we can give you um- hotel lodging for a night if that--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M011
label: ang
text: I'm going to San Diego tomorrow to stay with my family.  What do I need hotel lodging for hmmm?  Can you tell me that?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F012
label: neu
text: For tonight- For tonight sir.  Would you need to stay somewhere tonight?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M012
label: xxx
text: Tonight no.  I'm driving tomorrow.  Tonight I'm staying with a friend alright?  I don't need hotel reservations...where?  What hotel?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F013
label: neu
text: We can do Holiday Inn or...?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M013
label: ang
text: Wow.  Thank you.  Holiday Inn.  Wow.  Thank...the flight cost five hundred dollars.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F014
label: neu
text: Sir I understand that but just--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M014
label: ang
text: Okay, so you can put me in Holiday Inn for twenty dollar a night?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F015
label: neu
text: Did you have your name tags on the luggage?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M015
label: ang
text: Of course I had my name tags on the luggage.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F016
label: neu
text: Okay.  So if you can just give me your name, your name and your address and your phone number I can contact you as soon as we find out more information.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M016
label: ang
text: Soon as you...that's not good enough okay?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F017
label: fru
text: Sir, please calm down.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M017
label: fru
text: I need you to help me out here.  Can you get on the phone and get the luggage over on the fastest flight you can and then maybe I won't get you fired.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M018
label: fru
text: If not, I'm going to get your name, I'm going to talk to your boss, whoever...I'm never going to fly...my business is never going to fly Delta again.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F018
label: neu
text: What is your business?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M019
label: neu
text: I work for IBM.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F019
label: neu
text: Okay.  Sir?  I am sorry to tell you this but this does happen. Uh- This is not uh- really,

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F020
label: neu
text: I mean, our airline's fault.  I don't know what happened, misplaced, something happened but we will get you--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M020
label: ang
text: You misplace a lot of, eight pieces of luggage.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F021
label: neu
text: Well, the entire flight, sir, the luggage was placed on another plane that never actually left Baltimore.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F022
label: neu
text: Uh no I'm not.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M021
label: ang
text: Are you kidding me?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M022
label: ang
text: Who are you going to fire because of that?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F023
label: neu
text: Well we have some people back there that need some firing so, but I would just really appreciate--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M023
label: ang
text: Wow.  This has never happened before.  I've not lost,

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M024
label: ang
text: in all thousand flights I've been on probably I can't even count how many flights I've been on.  This has never happened before.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M025
label: ang
text: This is the worst customer service I've ever gotten before.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F024
label: fru
text: Okay sir.  I'm sorry you can--um-

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M026
label: ang
text: Okay.  Get on the phone and figure out where my luggage is and tell me when it's going to get there alright?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F025
label: fru
text: We already have been confirmed that it will be arriving in--uh--in about two days.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M027
label: ang
text: And and, in about...

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M028
label: fru
text: Two days I'll be in San Diego and how's it going to get to me in San Diego?  You going to make sure it gets to the San Diego airport?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F026
label: fru
text: Uh, we can't--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M029
label: ang
text: Can you get it to the San Diego airport?  You get someone to drive it to my place alright? Then I get a refund for some...I get a free flight alright? I get free whatever.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F027
label: neu
text: Yes sir, Yes.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F028
label: neu
text: We can have them direct your luggage to San Diego.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M030
label: fru
text: Okay.  And you're going to give me what for my inconvenience?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F029
label: neu
text: Uh--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F030
label: neu
text: Some refreshments in the lobby?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M031
label: ang
text: Some peanuts?  Wow.  That helps a lot.

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M032
label: ang
text: Thanks you, thank you I don't have my luggage so you gave me a Holiday Inn stay and peanuts.  Wow.  You know what?

name: Ses03M_impro05b_F031
label: fru
text: eh- we actually--

name: Ses03M_impro05b_M033
label: ang
text: I will never do business with Delta again.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M000
label: xxx
text: Good God.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F000
label: xxx
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M001
label: xxx
text: I wonder.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F001
label: xxx
text: And nobody knows we're here except for Freda and she wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M002
label: xxx
text: Well it must be them then.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F002
label: xxx
text: What are you going to do?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M003
label: xxx
text: We're fine right?  Aren't we?  Whatever happens darling.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F003
label: exc
text: Now and always sweet.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M004
label: exc
text: I don't care then.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F004
label: exc
text: I mean, it was, it's bound to come out sooner or later.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M005
label: xxx
text: Hello?  Hello?  What?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F005
label: exc
text: That sent shivers up my spine.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M006
label: exc
text: No, wrong number.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M007
label: xxx
text: What are we to do if they suddenly walk in on us?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F006
label: exc
text: Behave exquisitely.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M008
label: xxx
text: With the most perfect poise?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F007
label: xxx
text: Certainly.  And I shall probably do a court courtesy.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M009
label: xxx
text: um- Things that should matter dreadfully don't seem to matter at all when one's happy do they?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What is so horrible is that one cannot stay happy.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M010
label: xxx
text: Oh, darling.  Don't say that.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F009
label: xxx
text: It's true.  I mean, the whole business it's a very poor joke.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M011
label: xxx
text: You mean that, that sacred and beautiful thing love?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F010
label: xxx
text: Yes.  I mean just that.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M012
label: xxx
text: What does that all mean?  That's what I asked myself on my quest for ultimate truth.  What does it all mean?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F011
label: xxx
text: Don't laugh at me.  I'm serious.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M013
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] Oh, darling.  You mustn't be serious, that's just what they want.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F012
label: xxx
text: Who's they?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M014
label: xxx
text: All the futile moralists who try to make life unbearable.  Laugh at them.  Be flippant.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M015
label: xxx
text: Laugh at all their sacred shibboleths.  Flippancy brings the acid in their damn sweetness and light.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F013
label: xxx
text: So if I'm to laugh at everything then I must laugh at us too.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M016
label: xxx
text: Oh, certainly, you must.  We're figures of fun alright.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F014
label: xxx
text: How long will it last?  This ludicrous overbearing love of ours?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M017
label: xxx
text: Who knows?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F015
label: xxx
text: Shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M018
label: xxx
text: No.  That fire will fade along with our passion.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Well, dear, shall we want that?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M019
label: xxx
text: Well, it depends on how well we've played.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F017
label: xxx
text: What happens if one of us dies?  I mean, does the other one still laugh?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M020
label: xxx
text: Of course, yes, yes, with all his might.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F018
label: sad
text: That's serious enough.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M021
label: xxx
text: No.  No it isn't.  That's very laughable, a cunning little mystery all done with mirrors.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F019
label: xxx
text: Darling I believe you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M022
label: xxx
text: Oh, and who isn't talking nonsense?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers hmmm?  Let's blow trumpets and squeakers and party as much as we can like quite idiotic school children.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M024
label: xxx
text: Let's savor the delight of the moment.  Come kiss me darling before worms pop in and out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Elliot, worms don't pop.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M025
label: xxx
text: I don't care what you do, you see?  As long, no I don't care what you do, see?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M026
label: xxx
text: You can put green paint all over your body and dance naked in the Place Vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F021
label: xxx
text: Thank you dear.  The same applies to you...

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F022
label: xxx
text: ...only if you ever so much as look at another woman I'll kill you.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M027
label: xxx
text: Remember that awful scene we had in Venice?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F023
label: xxx
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M028
label: xxx
text: The one when you bought a little painted wooden snake in the Piazza and put it in my bed.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F024
label: xxx
text: Charles, that was his name, Charles.  Oh, God he was so wiggled so beautifully.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M029
label: xxx
text: Horrible little thing.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F025
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  I know you did.  You threw it out the window and into the Grand Canal.  I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M030
label: xxx
text: I hated it.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M031
label: xxx
text: How long did that rile last?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F026
label: xxx
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M032
label: xxx
text: Oh, the worst one was in Cannes when you-

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F027
label: xxx
text: I burnt a hole in my comb too and all the towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M033
label: xxx
text: you're curling iron burnt a hole in my dressing gown.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M034
label: xxx
text: That was a rouser wasn't it?

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F028
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] Yeah.  That was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M035
label: neu
text: I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F029
label: xxx
text: The manager came in and saw us rolling on the floor, scratching and biting like panthers.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M036
label: xxx
text: I will never forget his face. Ooh-rah [LAUGHTER].

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F030
label: xxx
text: How ridiculous.  How utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M037
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_F031
label: xxx
text: And much sillier too.

name: Ses03M_script03_1_M038
label: xxx
text: The real cause of that rile was Peter Burden.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F000
label: neu
text: What's he going to say?  Maybe we ought to talk to him before he sees it.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M000
label: sad
text: He saw it.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F001
label: sur
text: What do you mean. He couldn't have seen it. I was the first one up, he was still in bed.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M001
label: sad
text: He was out there when it happened.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F002
label: sur
text: When?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M002
label: sad
text: About four in the morning.  I heard a crack and I looked out and he was standing right there when it happened.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: Well what was he doing out at four in the morning?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M003
label: sad
text: I don't know. But after it cracked he ran back into the house and he cried in the kitchen.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F004
label: sad
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M004
label: sad
text: No.  I figured the best thing to do was leave him alone.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F005
label: sad
text: He cried hard?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M005
label: sad
text: I could hear it right through the floor.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F006
label: xxx
text: God, what was he doing out there anyway?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F007
label: fru
text: Starting to dream about him again.  He's walking around at night again.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M006
label: sad
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F008
label: sad
text: He's getting just like he did after he died, you know?  What, what, what's the meaning of this?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M007
label: sad
text: I don't know.  But I know one thing mom, we made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M008
label: fru
text: Being dishonest with him.  That kind of thing always pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F010
label: xxx
text: What do you mean dishonest?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M009
label: ang
text: You know that Larry's not coming back and I know that too.  Why we both go on letting him think that we both believe with him.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F011
label: xxx
text: What are you going to do?  You want to argue with him?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M010
label: fru
text: No I don't want to argue with him but, it's time that he realizes that nobody believes Larry's coming back anymore.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M011
label: ang
text: Why shouldn't he walk around and dream at him at night.  Walk around.  Why shouldn't he walk around?  Why shouldn't he dream of him, walk around at night waiting for him?  Do we contradict him?  Do we say flat out that we don't have anymore hope?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M012
label: ang
text: That we haven't had any hope for years now?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F012
label: xxx
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M013
label: xxx
text: We got to say it to him.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F013
label: fru
text: How are you going to prove it?  Can you prove it?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M014
label: fru
text: Larry's been gone for three years.  For god sakes no one comes back after three years.  It's insane.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F014
label: xxx
text: To you maybe, to me, but not to your father.  I mean,

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F015
label: fru
text: he still thinks he's alive still.  I mean you could talk yourself blue in the face and there's no body and there's no grave so where are you?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: Listen mom, just, sit down.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F016
label: ang
text: No.  It's his god damned newspapers is what it is.  Now every month there's a new boy comes home and Larry's going to be the next one.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M016
label: fru
text: Alright. Alright. Alright just listen.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: You know why I asked Annie here, right?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F017
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M018
label: xxx
text: You know.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Well I have an idea but I don't know.  What's the story?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M019
label: neu
text: I want to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F019
label: xxx
text: Well that's your business Chris.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M020
label: fru
text: You know it's not just my business.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F020
label: ang
text: Well what do you want me to do?  I mean, you're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M021
label: neu
text: Okay.  So then it's alright.  I'll go ahead with it.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F021
label: neu
text: Well, I mean, you got to make sure your dad's not going--

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M022
label: ang
text: Oh see then it's just not my business. God you infuriate me sometimes.  Isn't my business too if dad throws a fit?  Huh?  God you have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F022
label: fru
text: Well I'm just saying--

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F023
label: xxx
text: You know I ignore what I got to ignore.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F024
label: xxx
text: She's not...she's Larry's girl.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M023
label: fru
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F025
label: fru
text: From your father's point of view he is still alive and if you try and take her that's just not fair.  You can't do that.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M024
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is but every time I reach out for something I want I have to pull back

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F026
label: fru
text: And-And-And if you go on from there if you know already to go on from there, then you can.  But I'm telling you something that I don't know where to go.  You got it?  I mean, do you?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M025
label: xxx
text: Because other people will suffer.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M026
label: fru
text: My whole entire, bloody life time and time again.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F027
label: xxx
text: You're a considerate fellow.  There is nothing wrong in that.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M027
label: ang
text: Well to hell with that.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F028
label: neu
text: Did you ask Annie yet?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M028
label: neu
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F029
label: xxx
text: And what if she doesn't marry you huh?  What if she feels the same way your father does?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M029
label: neu
text: Then I guess that's the end of it.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M030
label: sad
text: But from her letters I think she's forgotten him.  I'll find out.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M031
label: neu
text: And then we'll thrash it out with dad right?  Mom, don't avoid me.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F030
label: neu
text: Look, you never had seen many, many women.  You know?  I mean...

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M032
label: xxx
text: Well so what?  I'm just not fast with women.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F031
label: fru
text: Well I just don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M033
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F032
label: xxx
text: Well that's a good answer but, it doesn't answer anything.  You haven't seen her since you left to go to the war and it's been five years.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M034
label: fru
text: It's just...that's just the way it is.  That's how I feel.  You know these years when I think of someone I want to marry I think of Annie.  What do you want a diagram?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F033
label: fru
text: No I don't want a diagram.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F034
label: fru
text: He thinks he's coming back. And you go off and marry that girl and you're just pronouncing him dead and what's going to happen to him?  I don't know.  Do you?  I mean, I don't know.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M035
label: fru
text: Alright then.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F035
label: xxx
text: Look, just give it some thought okay?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M036
label: sad
text: I've given it three years of thought and I thought that if I waited then dad would forget about Larry and then we could have a regular wedding and everything happy.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M037
label: neu
text: But if I can't have that here I'll get out.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F036
label: xxx
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M038
label: neu
text: I'll get out.  I'll marry her somewhere else.  Maybe New York.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F037
label: xxx
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M039
label: ang
