text: I've been a good son too long.  A good sucker and I'm through with it.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F038
label: ang
text: You're just going to leave the business?  You have a business here.  You can't do that.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M040
label: ang
text: The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F039
label: xxx
text: Oh, you have to be inspired.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M041
label: ang
text: Yes.  I like it an hour out of the day.  If I have to grub for money all day long at least at evening I want it beautiful.  I want a family.  I want a wife.  I want some kids.  I want to build something I can give myself to.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M042
label: fru
text: Now Annie is in the middle of all that.  Where do I find it?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F040
label: sad
text: Tell me something.  You can leave this business?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M043
label: neu
text: Yes.  On this I would.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F041
label: xxx
text: You can't talk like that.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M044
label: xxx
text: Then help me stay here.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F042
label: fru
text: Alright but you can't talk like that you hear?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F043
label: ang
text: I mean what the hell have we worked for then?  I mean, it's all for you Chris.  The whole shooting match is for you.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M045
label: sad
text: I know.  Just you help me stay here.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F044
label: fru
text: Alright but you don't talk like that you hear?  You don't.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M046
label: sad
text: I am thinking like that.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F045
label: sad
text: I don't understand you do I?

name: Ses03M_script01_1_M047
label: sad
text: No you don't.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses03M_script01_1_F046
label: sad
text: Yeah.  I can see that.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M000
label: sad
text: Hey sweetie.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M001
label: sad
text: Hey.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F000
label: hap
text: Um.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F001
label: xxx
text: How's it- going?  Oh I'm so tired.  Oh, I just woke up. Mmm.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F002
label: xxx
text: What's going on?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M002
label: sad
text: Uh, -Um

name: Ses03M_impro02_F003
label: hap
text: Why the sad face?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M003
label: sad
text: they need me out there sooner than I thought

name: Ses03M_impro02_F004
label: sur
text: Where?  Who?  What are you talking about?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M004
label: sad
text: They want to deploy me next week.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F005
label: sur
text: Next week?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F006
label: xxx
text: Overseas?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M005
label: sad
text: For--

name: Ses03M_impro02_F007
label: xxx
text: For how long this time?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M006
label: sad
text: They said anywhere from two to three years.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F008
label: xxx
text: What?  What do you mean two to three years?  Don't they know that you have a wife and an expectant child?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M007
label: xxx
text: I told them that but they--

name: Ses03M_impro02_F009
label: fru
text: Honey--

name: Ses03M_impro02_M008
label: fru
text: --need me on the specialist honey.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F010
label: fru
text: You can't.  We need you.  I need you.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M009
label: fru
text: I don't want to go but,-

name: Ses03M_impro02_F011
label: fru
text: I don't care about the money.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M010
label: fru
text: but they said they'd increase my pay by triple-there promotion.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F012
label: xxx
text: And you're leaving next week so you won't even be here for Anna's birth?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M011
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F013
label: sad
text: Do this whole thing by myself?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M012
label: sad
text: Honey you're not going to be by yourself--

name: Ses03M_impro02_M013
label: neu
text: We'll have internet set up, we'll get web cameras and everything.  My whole family's here too.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F014
label: sad
text: Carry her for nine months and then yes.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M014
label: xxx
text: Honey.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F015
label: sad
text: It's not the same thing.  It's not like having you here.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F016
label: sad
text: I can't do this.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M015
label: neu
text: You can do it.  Alright?  You can, you can be strong, you can be strong for both of us alright?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F017
label: sad
text: I'm sick of being strong-- --for us.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M016
label: sad
text: I don't know what to do.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M017
label: fru
text: I don't want to - I don't- I don't want to go.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M018
label: fru
text: What am I supposed to do?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F018
label: fru
text: You can say no?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M019
label: sad
text: You know I can't say no.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F019
label: fru
text: You could.  You really could.  You could-- --get into another line of work.  I could start working after Anna's born?

name: Ses03M_impro02_M020
label: fru
text: The last guy who said no was fired.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M021
label: fru
text: I put in fifteen years in this job.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F020
label: fru
text: I know.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M022
label: fru
text: I'm so close.  Five more years and I retire-

name: Ses03M_impro02_M023
label: fru
text: and we'll have that happy life.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F021
label: xxx
text: Happiness for me is having you here with me

name: Ses03M_impro02_F022
label: sad
text: and watch our child grow, see her take her first steps, her first words.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M024
label: sad
text: Honey after a year I can be back.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F023
label: sad
text: You said two years.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M025
label: sad
text: They want me there two years but I could probably get

name: Ses03M_impro02_M026
label: sad
text: maybe get some vacation-- --once it quiets down there.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F024
label: sad
text: A whole year? --We're not talking about like a couple months here.  I mean this is a whole year.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M027
label: sad
text: I know.  I know.  But they really need some good guys there.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F025
label: sad
text: What could happen in a year?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F026
label: sad
text: And this isn't the first time you know?  I mean you always...sending you off to different places and...

name: Ses03M_impro02_M028
label: sad
text: Well that's the kind of work I'm in honey.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F027
label: sad
text: I don't know if that's how I want to live my life.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M029
label: sad
text: It's just going to be--it's going to go faster than you think.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F028
label: sad
text: Joe I'm serious I don't want to have to have a little girl to tell...asking every day where's daddy, where's daddy and have to tell her that he's away--

name: Ses03M_impro02_F029
label: sad
text: far away and he won't be here.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M030
label: sad
text: You tell her-- [BREATHING]

name: Ses03M_impro02_F030
label: sad
text: I'm done.  I can't honey.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M031
label: sad
text: What do you mean?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F031
label: sad
text: It's over.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M032
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F032
label: sad
text: Honey I can't do it anymore.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M033
label: sur
text: Are you kidding me?  No.

name: Ses03M_impro02_F033
label: sad
text: I need you here.  Anna needs you.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M034
label: fru
text: So I have--you want me to choose between you guys or my career?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F034
label: sad
text: yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M035
label: fru
text: What am I going to do?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F035
label: fru
text: Priorities honey, priorities.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M036
label: fru
text: I want to--what am I going to do if I leave this job?

name: Ses03M_impro02_F036
label: fru
text: You're smart.  You could go back to school--

name: Ses03M_impro02_F037
label: fru
text: finish your Master's that you were started never finished.

name: Ses03M_impro02_M037
label: fru
text: Fine.  I'll see if I can talk to them.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M000
label: ang
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F000
label: xxx
text: You knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M001
label: ang
text: I knew nothing of the sort. You took presents from him.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F001
label: xxx
text: Presents? It was only a small trivial little broach.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M002
label: ang
text: I remember it well. Bristling with diamonds. In the worst possible taste.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Not at all. It was very pretty. And I wear it all the time. I still have it.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M003
label: xxx
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F003
label: xxx
text: No, I didn't. You made that up all in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M004
label: xxx
text: You must admit that he was in love with you.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F004
label: neu
text: Just a little perhaps, but it was nothing serious.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M005
label: ang
text: You let him kiss you. You said so.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F005
label: xxx
text: Well, what of it?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M006
label: xxx
text: What of it?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F006
label: xxx
text: Oh come on, it gave him a lot of pleasure and it didn't harm me.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M007
label: ang
text: What about me?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Well, if you hadn't been so suspicious and nosey you'd have never known anything about it.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M008
label: ang
text: That's a nice point of view, I must say.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F008
label: neu
text: Well, it's true.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M009
label: neu
text: Are you bored with this conversation?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F009
label: xxx
text: I definitely, most definitely am.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: So am I. Bored stiff. Want some brandy?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F010
label: xxx
text: No, thanks.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M011
label: neu
text: I'll have a little, I think.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F011
label: xxx
text: I don't see why you want it; you've already had two glasses.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M012
label: neu
text: No particular reason. Anyhow, they were very small ones.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F012
label: xxx
text: I don't see what's the point of going on and on about something like this.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M013
label: xxx
text: Oh, my-you can hardly call three minute liquor glasses in the evening going on and on and on.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F013
label: neu
text: It's become a habit with you.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M014
label: ang
text: You needn't be so grand just because you don't happen to want some yourself at the moment.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: Don't be so stupid.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M015
label: ang
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F015
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M016
label: ang
text: Nothing.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M017
label: ang
text: Going somewhere, dear?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F016
label: xxx
text: No. Just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M018
label: xxx
text: That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F017
label: neu
text: It's a woman's job to allure the man. Watch me, won't you, a minute?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M019
label: xxx
text: As a matter of fact, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F018
label: ang
text: No, it isn't.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M020
label: ang
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F019
label: xxx
text: No, it's not. I don't care.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M021
label: xxx
text: It's a pity you didn't have more brandy. It might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F020
label: xxx
text: Well, it didn't seem to do such wonders with you, now did it?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M022
label: xxx
text: Oh, snap, snap, snap, like a little adder.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F021
label: fru
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M023
label: xxx
text: Yes, they do. They have a big bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F022
label: fru
text: They sting.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M024
label: ang
text: They snap.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: I don't care. I don't care, do you understand? I don't care if they bark, if they roll over on the floor like hoops.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M025
label: xxx
text: Uhh,

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M026
label: ang
text: did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F024
label: xxx
text: Yes, I did, quite a lot actually.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: I imagine that you let him kiss you quite a bit more then, didn't you?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F025
label: fru
text: Mind your business.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M028
label: ang
text: You had a riotous-must have had a riotous time. No restraint at all. Very enjoyable. You never had much anyhow.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F026
label: ang
text: You are quite insufferable. I suppose it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M029
label: ang
text: I'm not in the least bit drunk.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F027
label: fru
text: You've always had a weak head.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: Okay. As I mentioned before, I said I had three very minute liquor glasses. That's hardly enough to get a child of two drunk.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F028
label: xxx
text: On the contrary, a child of two can get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M031
label: xxx
text: Oh, very interesting indeed. How about a child of four or a child of six or a child of nine. We might have a splendid little debate about this intemperate tots.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F029
label: fru
text: Do shut up. Shut up.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F030
label: fru
text: I don't want to talk about this anymore.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M032
label: xxx
text: You better turn that off.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F031
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M033
label: xxx
text: It's very late and it will annoy the people upstairs.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F032
label: xxx
text: There aren't any people upstairs. It's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: Well, I suppose the people downstairs then.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F033
label: xxx
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M035
label: neu
text: This is no time of the year for Tunis.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F034
label: xxx
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M036
label: xxx
text: No, I will do no such thing.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: Turn it on.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M037
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F036
label: xxx
text: You've always had far too temperamental for yourself. You should try to control it.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: I will not. Go away. Go away. I hate you.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Oh, very amusing, indeed. Amanda, listen-

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: Listen, indeed. No, no, no, no. I am sick and tired of listening to you, you sadistic bully.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Very amusing indeed.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: Stop it, stop it, I hate you, I loath you, you are overbearing and conceited and utterly impossible.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: You know, you're a vile, ill-tempered, wicked little beast and I hope that I never see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: This is the end. Do you hear? The end. Now and forever.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: No, you're not going out like this. No you're not.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: Oh, yes I am.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: Yes I am. Let go of me. I hate you and I loath you. God, I can't believe I just finally realized how you are. I am never marry you. Never. Never, never, never. I would rather die in torment.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: Oh, shut up. Shut up. Shut up.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_M044
label: ang
text: I wouldn't marry you again if you came back crawling to me on your hands and knees because you're vile. You're a mean, evil-minded little vampire and I hope to God I never set eyes on you again.

name: Ses03F_script03_2_F043
label: ang
text: Beast or brute cad, swine beast beast brute.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F000
label: xxx
text: What's going on man?  What's wrong?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M000
label: sad
text: I'm just so tired all the time.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F001
label: neu
text: Well have you been trying to get a job, look for a job or...?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M001
label: fru
text: I've been looking for like eight months.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F002
label: fru
text: I know.  It- It's really tough out there.  It's really hard to find a job.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M002
label: fru
text: I'm tired of the same excuses.  No, no you're not qualified enough, wish you had more education.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F003
label: neu
text: Well what are you looking for?  I mean--

name: Ses03M_impro04_M003
label: xxx
text: Last time someone told me I was too qualified.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F004
label: neu
text: Well, okay. Well that's--

name: Ses03M_impro04_M004
label: ang
text: Cause I went to Harvard.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F005
label: sur
text: Well, that's what?  For what job?  Who...what jobs are you looking for?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M005
label: fru
text: I applied as restaurant manager at P.F. Chang.  I applied at----Macy's store manager. Tried to get investment banking job with Deloitte and Touche.  I'm trying everywhere.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F006
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  Well it seems to me, you know, you just got to keep going out there, you know, pushing through.  You got a Harvard degree.  I mean, you can get a job anywhere.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M006
label: fru
text: You know what?  I've been working at temp jobs for the past six months.  You know how degrading it is?

name: Ses03M_impro04_F007
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M007
label: xxx
text: To be a receptionist?  Oh I spent forty thousand dollar a year for my college degree and I'm a receptionist.  God.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F008
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M008
label: ang
text: I'm smarter than half the people I work for.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F009
label: xxx
text: Well, what do you...what would ideally like to do, you know?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M009
label: fru
text: I don't know astronaut?  I don't know something crazy like that.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F010
label: exc
text: Well what'd you major in?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M010
label: fru
text: Biomedical Engineering.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F011
label: xxx
text: You-You can't be working as a restaurant manager, I mean, come on.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M011
label: fru
text: I don't want to do engineering though.  It's so...I had the internship what, last summer,

name: Ses03M_impro04_M012
label: fru
text: and I was pulling my hair out and it was like, oh my God.  So I just had to finish the major so now they're like, why are you an engineering major, and why are you working, trying to work at a restaurant.  And it's like I don't know just give me the damn job.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F012
label: xxx
text: Look I'm sorry-

name: Ses03M_impro04_M013
label: fru
text: Why all these questions?

name: Ses03M_impro04_F013
label: xxx
text: You know if you need any help finding a place I can, I can talk to my work you know I work at that law firm downtown and I can ask if they're looking for anybody.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M014
label: neu
text: Oh yeah?  What kind of jobs they got?

name: Ses03M_impro04_F014
label: neu
text: I am...just like a law clerk.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M015
label: dis
text: I don't want to be a law clerk.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F015
label: neu
text: Well, I'm moving up.  I mean it could be...

name: Ses03M_impro04_M016
label: fru
text: To be a lawyer?  You go to law school now?  God this is, all these dead ends.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M017
label: fru
text: And plus my car is breaking down-

name: Ses03M_impro04_M018
label: fru
text: -they're evicting me from my apartment.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F016
label: xxx
text: Well it doesn't make any sense though.  Like, with a Harvard degree you should be able to--

name: Ses03M_impro04_M019
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  I know.  You'd think I would be able to be C.E.O. of a company right?

name: Ses03M_impro04_F017
label: xxx
text: Just, you got to hang in there.  Can you ask your parents for help or anybody?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M020
label: fru
text: No.  I'm not going to...yeah, they'd laugh in my face.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F018
label: xxx
text: Just for a little bit, you know?  Cause I-I guarantee you're going to find something.  When you find something it's just going to be huge and you're going to get money.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M021
label: fru
text: No. I got a sixteen hundred on my S.A.T..

name: Ses03M_impro04_F019
label: xxx
text: Something-- How are you going...?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M022
label: fru
text: I'm freaking----typing sixty words a minute.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F020
label: xxx
text: How many words a minute?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M023
label: fru
text: Sixty words.  Sixty words a minute.  Hey how are you doing Mr. Smith?  Oh, you know, it's just like God, I just want to shoot you Mr. Smith.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F021
label: xxx
text: Sixty words a minute.  That's a min...a word per min uh second.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M024
label: neu
text: Yeah.  It's alright.  But--

name: Ses03M_impro04_F022
label: xxx
text: You could be an amazing receptionist.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M025
label: fru
text: I'm not cut to be a receptionist.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M026
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M027
label: fru
text: Oh yeah.  I will be a full time receptionist.  Harvard degree, sixteen hundred on my S.A.T.--

name: Ses03M_impro04_F023
label: neu
text: Well... If you need something, I mean, you're just going to---can get a temporary thing right now and then look for something--

name: Ses03M_impro04_M028
label: fru
text: --you know? Head of the Science Club.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M029
label: fru
text: That's what I've been doing, temporary things

name: Ses03M_impro04_F024
label: fru
text: Oh I know.  But--

name: Ses03M_impro04_F025
label: neu
text: -it's going to get better I promise you. You just got to hang in there. Everyone, I mean, you know?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M030
label: sad
text: Maybe I'll just kill myself.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F026
label: sur
text: What?  You can't...what?  Now come on.  Stop it.  Don't be talking like that.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M031
label: sad
text: I was just joking...

name: Ses03M_impro04_M032
label: xxx
text: I don't know.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F027
label: xxx
text: My, what I would do was just, you know, what about can you call Harvard and see...don't they have connections?  Don't they have like career center and you can find some stuff that's going on?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M033
label: fru
text: Yeah.  I--they said Brian you're too smart.  You don't need us.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M034
label: fru
text: Go out and take over the world by yourself and I'm like what?

name: Ses03M_impro04_F028
label: fru
text: Well obviously it's not working.  Just cause you got sixteen hundred on your S.A.T. doesn't guarantee you a job.  I mean it should really but--

name: Ses03M_impro04_M035
label: fru
text: I don't know.  I don't know.  I know I'm just going to have to keep on looking, keep on searching-

name: Ses03M_impro04_M036
label: fru
text: and I'm never going to find anything probably but I'll just keep working hard at it-- Yeah. Okay.  Positive, I'm going to do good, find that job.

name: Ses03M_impro04_F029
label: neu
text: You got to be positive man.  You got to try to just--

name: Ses03M_impro04_F030
label: neu
text: But you got to be real about it.  You have to...

name: Ses03M_impro04_M037
label: fru
text: Yeah.  I got eighteen hundred on my S.A.T..

name: Ses03M_impro04_F031
label: neu
text: Sixteen hundred.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M038
label: neu
text: Same difference.

name: Ses03M_impro04_M039
label: xxx
text: Twenty-one hundred on my S.A.T..

name: Ses03M_impro04_F032
label: neu
text: Twenty-one hundred?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M040
label: fru
text: But I'm doomed.  Yeah I got so good I was over twenty one hundred.  Now what am I doing?

name: Ses03M_impro04_M041
label: hap
text: Like, wow you're really smart we're going to give you an extra [GARBAGE].

name: Ses03M_impro06_F000
label: sad
text: How's it going?  How are you feeling?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M000
label: sad
text: I ah--

name: Ses03M_impro06_M001
label: sad
text: alright.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F001
label: sad
text: Hanging in there?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M002
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: So sad.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: It just feels like I was talking to him yesterday.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: You guys were real close huh?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M004
label: sad
text: He was my only friend growing up.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M005
label: sad
text: no one else would talk to me but he would.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M006
label: sad
text: He was supposed to be the best man at my wedding.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: I'm so sorry.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M007
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M008
label: sad
text: You know I was always the one to tell him to be more wild you know?

name: Ses03M_impro06_F006
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M009
label: sad
text: And he just took it overboard.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: What happened?  What went wrong?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M010
label: sad
text: You know a stupid case of drunk driving it's just...

name: Ses03M_impro06_M011
label: sad
text: and the worst part of it is that he was in the car with his girlfriend,

name: Ses03M_impro06_M012
label: sad
text: his girlfriend got killed too.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: Oh man.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M013
label: sad
text: And the car that he hit was his family.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F009
label: sad
text: How are they?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M014
label: sad
text: The mother and father died--

name: Ses03M_impro06_M015
label: sad
text: and the kids are paralyzed in a coma right now.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M016
label: sad
text: and just going to the funeral it's-

name: Ses03M_impro06_M017
label: sad
text: -do I miss him or do I hate him, you know?

name: Ses03M_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: Yeah.  Like I mean if you need anyone to talk to or anything I'm here for you okay?

name: Ses03M_impro06_F011
label: sad
text: We're all here for you.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M018
label: sad
text: I was supposed to see him last summer

name: Ses03M_impro06_M019
label: sad
text: then I got busy with work and stuff and three years go by

name: Ses03M_impro06_M020
label: sad
text: and then something like this happens you know?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M021
label: sad
text: I mean I haven't even talked to him on the phone for the past three months.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M022
label: sad
text: He's supposed to be my best friend.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F012
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F013
label: sad
text: just things happen in life and you just...there's just no explanation you know?  We just don't...

name: Ses03M_impro06_M023
label: sad
text: It's so fucked up.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F014
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F015
label: sad
text: I'm so sorry.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M024
label: sad
text: Why is that?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M025
label: sad
text: He was studying to be a doctor.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M026
label: sad
text: I mean he was...he wanted to help people in poor countries, that is his goal.  He didn't care about the money.  He just wanted to go and help people.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M027
label: sad
text: What the...what am I doing?

name: Ses03M_impro06_M028
label: sad
text: Working for corporate America?  Wow.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M029
label: sad
text: He actually wanted to do something.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F016
label: sad
text: Well now you can follow his footsteps, you know?  Carry out what he wanted to do.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M030
label: sad
text: I can't do that.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F017
label: sad
text: Well sure you could.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M031
label: sad
text: You should've met him.

name: Ses03M_impro06_M032
label: sad
text: He is the greatest...everyone liked him.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F018
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F019
label: sad
text: I would've loved to.

name: Ses03M_impro06_F020
label: sad
text: Now I can't.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M000
label: exc
text: Oh, my God, look at that. Huh-oh, how many carats is that?

name: Ses03F_impro03_F000
label: xxx
text: I know. [LAUGHTER]. Dude, I don't know. It's- Probably. It's huge. I don't even know how to like wear it. My hand is like going down like really low. I can't believe it.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M001
label: exc
text: Like eighteen? [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses03F_impro03_M002
label: exc
text: Oh, Jesus.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M003
label: xxx
text: Is it-

name: Ses03F_impro03_F001
label: xxx
text: I- Yeah, it's-

name: Ses03F_impro03_M004
label: xxx
text: So how did he do it?

name: Ses03F_impro03_F002
label: xxx
text: Oh, man. So I was--okay, so we went to go see this show on Broadway, right? And it was The wed- the wed- The Lousy Chaperone. Have you seen that one?

name: Ses03F_impro03_M005
label: exc
text: yeah [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses03F_impro03_M006
label: exc
text: Yeah, The Lousy Chaperone. [LAUGHTER] Uh huh.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F003
label: xxx
text: Right. Right. Right. So, and there's like a whole like wedding scene in it. All right, not the--Drowsy, Drowsy [LAUGHTER] --not the Lousy. [LAUGHTER]. Um - So Drowsy. So I go to see this Drowsy Chaperone. And uh-

name: Ses03F_impro03_M007
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER] Uh- Drowsy.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F004
label: exc
text: at the end of the performance, you know, like we're all clapping and stuff. And all of a sudden I look over and

name: Ses03F_impro03_F005
label: exc
text: Joe's gone. -where did he go, you know?

name: Ses03F_impro03_M008
label: xxx
text: Uh huh. Oh-

name: Ses03F_impro03_F006
label: exc
text: And I'm like oh, he went to the- -the bathroom, but he didn't tell me, I didn't even notice him leaving. And all of a sudden, I swear to God, I'm sitting there and-

name: Ses03F_impro03_F007
label: exc
text: he comes up onstage-- And the entire cast everyone just like

name: Ses03F_impro03_M009
label: sur
text: oh-

name: Ses03F_impro03_F008
label: exc
text: goes up there and everyone's clapping and he's standing there and they put a spotlight on him.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M010
label: exc
text: Oh, my God.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F009
label: exc
text: And I'm like freaking out. I'm like what the hell's going on, you know. I don't know what's going on. And so he's like standing there and then all of a sudden they give him a microphone-

name: Ses03F_impro03_F010
label: xxx
text: and he just starts doing like this little spiel about me and like

name: Ses03F_impro03_F011
label: exc
text: he asked me to marry him, like- onstage. I was like, I couldn't believe--and I had to walk up there and I was, like I think I tripped or something.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M011
label: xxx
text: Are you kidding me?

name: Ses03F_impro03_M012
label: xxx
text: Wha- What'd you say? You said yes, right? [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses03F_impro03_F012
label: exc
text: Yeah, I said yes, but I, yeah, I mean,

name: Ses03F_impro03_F013
label: exc
text: I don't know- it just like took me, took me by surprise.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F014
label: hap
text: He scored points.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M013
label: xxx
text: Did you get a standing ovation?

name: Ses03F_impro03_F015
label: hap
text: Oh, yeah. Everyone--yeah. And people--friends of ours were in the audience, I didn't know about, like family members.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F016
label: exc
text: Yeah. It was great.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M014
label: xxx
text: Are you serious?

name: Ses03F_impro03_F017
label: exc
text: It was--I cried,

name: Ses03F_impro03_M015
label: hap
text: No, you deserve to cry. I mean, tears of happiness.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F018
label: hap
text: like a loser, I cried.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F019
label: hap
text: But, I don't know, I--it's so weird to think I'm marrying somebody 'cause I feel so young, you know?

name: Ses03F_impro03_M016
label: xxx
text: So where- where- where is this--have you talked about where it's going to be?

name: Ses03F_impro03_F020
label: hap
text: No. No plans. or any- and probably

name: Ses03F_impro03_F021
label: hap
text: like I think I want to get married--I want to have two weddings. One here, then one in Europe.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M017
label: xxx
text: Hawaii? No.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F022
label: xxx
text: No. Hawaii's for honeymoons. But uh--

name: Ses03F_impro03_M018
label: xxx
text: Oh. Like Paris? On the Eiffel Tower?

name: Ses03F_impro03_F023
label: xxx
text: Oh, maybe. I don't know. I've been there so many times. I think it's--we're going to get married in Spain and then we're going to get married here.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M019
label: xxx
text: He's rich enough. Maybe you can rent out the Eiffel Tower for your--

name: Ses03F_impro03_M020
label: xxx
text: Oh, Jesus.

name: Ses03F_impro03_M021
label: exc
text: That's awesome. [LAUGHTER] Marriage.

name: Ses03F_impro03_F024
label: exc
text: Yeah. I'm so excited. [LAUGHTER].

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F000
label: ang
text: Why did he invite her here?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M000
label: fru
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F001
label: ang
text: Well she's been away for three and a half years in New York and suddenly she just shows up.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well maybe, maybe he just wanted to see her.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Nobody travels seven hundred miles just see.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M002
label: fru
text: uh-uh What do you mean?  They grew up next to each other their entire lives.  Why shouldn't he want to see her?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M003
label: fru
text: Hey don't look at me like that.  I don't know anymore than you.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M004
label: neu
text: Who said he even thought about that?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F004
label: xxx
text: I see it.  It has the appearance of it.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M005
label: neu
text: Well, so what?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F005
label: xxx
text: What's going on here Joe?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M006
label: fru
text: Now listen kid...

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F006
label: ang
text: No.  She's not his girl Joe and she knows that.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M007
label: xxx
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Then why is still single?  I mean there's plenty of single men in New York.  Why isn't she married by now?  Probably a hundred men has told her that she's foolish but, she's waiting.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M008
label: neu
text: How do you know why she's waited?  Hmmm?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F008
label: xxx
text: Because she knows what I know, that's why.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F009
label: ang
text: I mean, her faith is stronger than a rock.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F010
label: sad
text: My worst times I think about her, you know, and I

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F011
label: sad
text: it's like I know as long as she's waiting I'm right again.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: Look at how nice the day is.  What are we arguing for?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F012
label: ang
text: No.  Nobody in my house better dare and challenge her faith.  You know and maybe strangers but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do?  What do you want?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F013
label: xxx
text: I want-I want you to act like he's still alive.  I mean don't think I haven't seen the way that you've been since he invited her here.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: But Kate...

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F014
label: xxx
text: But I won't have any of this nonsense because you know what happens?  If he doesn't come back I'll kill myself.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F015
label: ang
text: Laugh, laugh at me but I will.  Because you know what happened when she came here?  When she came back she slept in his room, the memorial broke into pieces. Joe, look. Look at it. You got to believe with me.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: Okay. Calm yourself. Just calm yourself.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F016
label: xxx
text: I can't do it all alone.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M013
label: xxx
text: Calm yourself, alright?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F017
label: sad
text: Look, it was just last week that Detroit, some boy came back he had been away longer than Larry, you can read it for yourself. You above all people have got to believe.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M014
label: ang
text: Alright, alright, calm yourself okay?  Calm yourself. Wait, wait.  What do you mean, me above all?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F018
label: xxx
text: Look, just keep believing okay?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M015
label: ang
text: Wait, what does that mean?  Me above all?

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: Look at you, you're shaking.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_F019
label: sad
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses03M_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: What do I got to hide?  Huh?  What the hell's the matter with you Kate?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M000
label: exc
text: So what do you think?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F000
label: ang
text: About what?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M001
label: fru
text: About what I just said?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F001
label: ang
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M002
label: fru
text: It certainly is not.  It's a slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F002
label: ang
text: It's PR.  I mean, somebody sold you a good bill about this wonderful event that going to happen on the beach.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M003
label: fru
text: I'm not the only one.  Look at all these people.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F003
label: ang
text: Yeah.  Everyone else was sold the same thing.  I mean, look, it keeps us excited, it keeps us coming back for more and you know, keeps us thinking life's going to start any minute now.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M004
label: fru
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F004
label: ang
text: Look, I'm sorry but it's still just fish to me.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M005
label: fru
text: I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F005
label: xxx
text: It's just...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F006
label: xxx
text: Look, we just have different ideas of what this night is supposed to be like.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: There's nothing to it.  The Grunions arrive, they do their little fish business, you know?  We go oh, ahh, look at the fish and they go home and we go home.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F007
label: fru
text: For heavens sake, grow up.  We're not going to see the Grunions.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M007
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: We never do, do we?  Have we ever?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M008
label: fru
text: Oh my gosh.  We missed them twice, that's hardly ever.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F009
label: ang
text: Okay.  Twice is as many times as we've tried and that's ever.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M009
label: fru
text: Carla, can I ask you something?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F010
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M010
label: fru
text: Don't take this wrong but, are you having your period?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F011
label: ang
text: Augie, god dammit, don't ask me that.  You always ask me that.  I hate it when you ask me that.  It's insulting.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: What's bugging you then?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: Look, it's pointless.  It's...we're not going to see the Grunions I mean, it's like waiting around to see Santa Claus, you know, it's...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F013
label: ang
text: Listen, I've waiting my entire life on this beach just standing there waiting for this fish to show up and these fish never show up.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F014
label: fru
text: God, you don't understand anything.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: No, of course not.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F015
label: fru
text: I do.  I always do.  I keep thinking, this time will be the time and it never is.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M014
label: neu
text: Well, we're going to see it.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F016
label: ang
text: No we won't.  I mean, God, this isn't about the fish Augie.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M015
label: fru
text: What...I've been trying to, I've been trying to figure out the point where we went wrong and I can't seem to pinpoint that moment.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M016
label: xxx
text: You were fine during the phone call with Marge, dinner was okay, doing the dishes was no problem.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M017
label: neu
text: Let's see I took a shower, you were watching the news, you said hey, hey the Grunions are running tonight and I said great let's go, I feel lucky tonight.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M018
label: fru
text: And then I'm putting the animals out in the yard, I'm pulling the car out of the garage, putting my jacket on.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F017
label: fru
text: Look, do you remember the first time we came here?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: We thought I was pregnant.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F019
label: xxx
text: We brought a bottle of champagne and we took off our shoes and danced barefoot in the sand...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F020
label: xxx
text: Under the moon and you whispered so softly into my ear so I could feel your words.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F021
label: xxx
text: And I thought, this is it.  This is how happy I'm supposed to be.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M019
label: neu
text: Wait a minute.  I've got it.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F022
label: xxx
text: What?  Dancing barefoot in the sand?  Drinking out of a bottle of champagne?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M020
label: neu
text: It was in the car right?  Driving past the Knickerbocker Liquor Locker...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M021
label: neu
text: And you said let's get some champagne and I said time's a wasting or something like that.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M022
label: neu
text: You want this to be like the other time right?  That's it right?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F023
label: sad
text: I'd rather not remember something...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F024
label: sad
text: Rather not hope for something.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M023
label: xxx
text: Okay, right.  I got it.  Sure.  Of course.  Listen, do you want to dance?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F025
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M024
label: fru
text: Do you want me to get some champagne?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F026
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M025
label: fru
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F027
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M026
label: fru
text: What?  Do you want me to breathe in your ear?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F028
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M027
label: xxx
text: Do you want to get married again? What? What?  Do you want a divorce? A vacation? What?  A carpet?  A poodle?  A basket of fruit?  What?  A suicide pact?  What the hell do you want Carla?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F029
label: fru
text: No...No...No...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F030
label: fru
text: No...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F031
label: ang
text: I want things to turn out the way that they're supposed to be.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M028
label: ang
text: Welcome to the human race.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M029
label: ang
text: Do you think that this is what I had in mind?  That four years down the line that we'd get married and come to the beach and argue with each other over fish?  No.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M030
label: ang
text: I was just like you.  I thought it was going to be all peaches and roses and everything great and the sand in our toes and the wind in our hair and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves and we'd have three big fat rosy kids...

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M031
label: ang
text: ...and you know?  Baby the jokes on us.  Because you know what you get?  Do you know what you get Carla?  You get this.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F032
label: fru
text: This what...what's this?  This isn't anything. Alright.  Sure.  Standing on the beach, fighting and waiting.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M032
label: ang
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M033
label: ang
text: Right.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F033
label: ang
text: Cause everything isn't anything like I thought it would be.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M034
label: xxx
text: No.  I know.  Me neither.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F034
label: sad
text: This is just this.  You know?  I mean it's a lot and everything but it isn't somewhere else.  Do you know what I'm trying to say?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M035
label: fru
text: I'm trying to do the best I can.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F035
label: sad
text: I know you are Augie.  I know you wanted this evening to be nice.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F036
label: sad
text: I can't help thinking about being somewhere else.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M036
label: sad
text: Maybe if you were with someone else too.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F037
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M037
label: sad
text: I know.  But I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F038
label: sad
text: Augie, whatever I'm doing I'd rather be doing with you.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M038
label: xxx
text: Yeah?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F039
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  Don't you know that?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F040
label: sad
text: If anybody wants to be with anybody else it's probably you.  Probably somebody who enjoys herself a little more and is not so hard.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M039
label: xxx
text: Actually, now that you mention it, no I don't.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F041
label: sad
text: Well, I guess this is the wrong spot for the right people.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M040
label: xxx
text: It seemed like a good spot to me.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M041
label: hap
text: I mean look at the view of the moon we got from here.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F042
label: hap
text: Yeah.  I noticed that.  It's real pretty on the water.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F043
label: xxx
text: Big old white moon.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M042
label: hap
text: Hey, look what we got here.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F044
label: hap
text: Oh you brought refreshments.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M043
label: xxx
text: It's not champagne.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F045
label: xxx
text: Well at least we won't need glasses.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M044
label: xxx
text: Are you still cold?  Do you want to go home?

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F046
label: hap
text: No I'm beginning to think you might be right.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F047
label: hap
text: I think this may be the place for us after all.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F048
label: hap
text: I am sorry Augie.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M045
label: hap
text: Shh.  If we're very quiet the fish might come.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_F049
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses03M_script02_2_M046
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses03M_impro07_M000
label: xxx
text: Hey.

name: Ses03M_impro07_F000
label: hap
text: Hey.  How's it going?  I haven't seen you in awhile.

name: Ses03M_impro07_M001
label: xxx
text: Pretty good Susanna.

name: Ses03M_impro07_F001
label: hap
text: What's going on Joe?

name: Ses03M_impro07_M002
label: exc
text: Guess who got into U.S.C.?

name: Ses03M_impro07_F002
label: xxx
text: Um--

name: Ses03M_impro07_M003
label: exc
text: Me. Yeah, I did.

name: Ses03M_impro07_F003
label: sur
text: No way. Are you serious? Oh my God.  Congratulations. I'm so excited.

text: I'm sorry it has to do with an electrical power outage and stuff--

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F026
label: xxx
text: Well then go up the freaking pole and fix it like, you need to help me.  You don't understand I'm in dire, dire need of a phone right now.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M021
label: neu
text: Well, okay I'm going to give you a free phone card that you can use at any payphone and that's on us. Okay?

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F027
label: fru
text: Yeah yeah, woman going out in South Central on the payphone at night.  Oh that's real safe.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M022
label: neu
text: I'm, I'm sorry you chose to live there um--

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F028
label: fru
text: No, no, no.  I didn't choose to live here.  I work there.  Okay?  Yeah. work work work

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M023
label: neu
text: Well I'm sure maybe there's a phone at work you could use.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F029
label: fru
text: We can't call out.  We can't make out-- line.  I don't work, I work at another office.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F030
label: fru
text: A law firm.  Thank you very much.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M024
label: neu
text: All right um--

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F031
label: fru
text: I work out of my home as a realtor and because I don't have a land line, I need a phone and because of now I don't have one I don't know what to do.  And you're not helping me at all.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F032
label: fru
text: In fact, give me your name sir, what's your name again?

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M025
label: neu
text: My name is Sara.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F033
label: fru
text: Okay.  Sara what?

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M026
label: neu
text: Sara Brown.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F034
label: fru
text: Sara Brown.  Sara Brown, um- yeah, I'm going to get off the phone with you. And then I'm going to call back and I'm going to give your supervisor your name because you're obviously incompetent to work here.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_M027
label: neu
text: You know maam, we record this conversation so anything you say can be proven in a law of court so keep that in mind.

name: Ses03M_impro08a_F035
label: fru
text: What are you, what are you a police officer now?  You know, like I'm done, I'm over it.  Goodbye and I hope that you lose your job.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M000
label: xxx
text: Oh.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F000
label: neu
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M001
label: xxx
text: Good God.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F001
label: neu
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M002
label: xxx
text: I wonder.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F002
label: fea
text: I mean, nobody knows we're here except for Freda and she wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M003
label: xxx
text: It must be them then.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F003
label: fea
text: What are we to do?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M004
label: neu
text: We're all right, aren't we darling? Whatever happens.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F004
label: xxx
text: Yes. Now and always, sweet.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M005
label: neu
text: Then I don't care.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F005
label: xxx
text: It was bound to come sooner or later.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M006
label: xxx
text: Hello? Hello? What? Ugh, wrong number.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F006
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] God, it sent shivers up my spine.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M007
label: exc
text: things that should matter dreadfully don't seem to matter at all when one's happy, do they?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F007
label: xxx
text: Um terrible thing is one can't stay happy. Well, it's true. I mean, the whole business is a very poor joke.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Ooh darling, don't say that.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M009
label: xxx
text: You mean that sacred and beautiful thing, love?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F008
label: xxx
text: Yes, meaning just that.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M010
label: xxx
text: What does it all mean? That's what I ask myself in my quest for ultimate truth. What does it all mean?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F009
label: exc
text: Don't laugh at me. I'm serious.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M011
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER]. You mustn't be serious, my dear one, that's what they want.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F010
label: xxx
text: Who's they?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M012
label: xxx
text: All the futile moralists who try to make life unbearable. Laugh at them. Be flippant. Laugh at all the sacred shibboleths. Flippancy brings out the acid in their damn sweetness and light.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F011
label: xxx
text: Well, if I laugh at everything I'm going to have to laugh at us too.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M013
label: exc
text: Ooh, certainly you must. We're figures of fun, all right.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F012
label: xxx
text: So how long is it going to last? This ludicrous, overbearing love of ours?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Who knows?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F013
label: xxx
text: Shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M015
label: xxx
text: No. The fire will fade along with our passion.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F014
label: sad
text: Oh dear, well, shall we want that?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M016
label: xxx
text: Depends on how well we play it.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F015
label: sad
text: Well, what if happens if one of us is to die? Does the one that's left still laugh?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M017
label: xxx
text: Yes, yes. Yes, he must with all his might.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Well, that's serious enough.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M018
label: xxx
text: No. No, it isn't. Death's very laughable. A cunning little mystery. All done with mirrors.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Darling, I believe you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M019
label: xxx
text: So is everyone else in the long run. Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M020
label: exc
text: Let's blow strumpets, blow-blow trumpets and squeakers and party as much as we can like small quite idiotic school children. Let's savor the delight of the moment. Come, kiss me darling, before worms pop in and out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Elliott, worms don't pop.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M021
label: xxx
text: I don't care what you do, see? As long-you can paint yourself bright green all over and dance naked in the Place Vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F019
label: exc
text: Thank you, dear. The same applies to you. Except that if I ever so much as catch you looking at another woman I'll kill you.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M022
label: exc
text: Remember that awful scene we had in Venice?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: The one when you bought that little painted wooden snake in the Piazza and put it in my bed.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F021
label: hap
text: Oh Charles. That was his name. Charles. He did wiggle so beautifully.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M024
label: xxx
text: Horrible little thing. I hated it.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F022
label: xxx
text: I know you did. You threw it out the window and into the Grand Canal. I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M025
label: xxx
text: How long did that row last?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F023
label: xxx
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M026
label: xxx
text: The worst one was in Cannes when your-your curling iron burnt a hole in my dressing gown.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F024
label: xxx
text: Well, I burnt a hole in my comb too, and all the towels in the bathroom. [LAUGHTER].

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F025
label: hap
text: yeah. And that was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M027
label: exc
text: That was a rouser, wasn't it?

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F026
label: hap
text: The manager came in and found us rolling on the floor and biting and scratching like panthers. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M028
label: xxx
text: I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F027
label: exc
text: I know. Oh man. Couldn't believe it.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M029
label: xxx
text: Oh, I will never forget his face. Ooh-rah [LAUGHTER].

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M030
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_F028
label: xxx
text: Yeah, and very much sillier.

name: Ses03F_script03_1_M031
label: xxx
text: Oh, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M000
label: fru
text: Hey listen here missy, I've been in this line for an hour and now I'm finally here.  So you're going to take my application.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F000
label: neu
text: Is that a demand sir?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M001
label: fru
text: It's not a demand it's a request.  Will you just take it?  Come on.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F001
label: xxx
text: I must see it before I just take it.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M002
label: xxx
text: Oh.  Look at it.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F002
label: fru
text: Sir, you completely filled this out wrong.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F003
label: neu
text: No.  You filled out the back part.  You were supposed to fill out the front portion only.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M003
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M004
label: ang
text: What are you talking about?  It says fill out that part.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F004
label: fru
text: No, no, no, no, no.  You're going to have to go back over on the other side-- --second door, up the stairs...

name: Ses03M_impro01_M005
label: fru
text: Okay.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: Oh my God. Can you just transfer it yourself?

name: Ses03M_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: No I can't just transfer it myself sir.  You got to do this.  Everyone else is doing the same thing.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: You don't know! you can't write?  You don't know how to write?

name: Ses03M_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: Excuse me sir?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: What's wrong with you people?  God.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: I think you're being a little condescending.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F008
label: fru
text: You need to go back over there and fill it out again.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: The information is on there.  Here I'll just fill it out right here.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F009
label: fru
text: No, no, no, because there are other people in line.  You have to go get a complete new application.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M010
label: fru
text: This will take like a minute, okay? Jesus.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F010
label: xxx
text: No, no, no. Sir,you need to get out of the line--

name: Ses03M_impro01_M011
label: ang
text: I'm not going anywhere.  I'm staying right here.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F011
label: xxx
text: Well I'm going to have to call- security because sir, you- there are hundreds of people waiting in line at this D.M.V.-- --We're closing in about half an hour...

name: Ses03M_impro01_M012
label: ang
text: Hey,uh-- Well that's too bad cause I'm getting my license right now.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F012
label: fru
text: You will get your license, sir, you have to go fill out-- --another copy...excuse me?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M013
label: fru
text: Give me my--

name: Ses03M_impro01_M014
label: ang
text: Hey, no, give me that back.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F013
label: xxx
text: No.  Now I'm going to take this from you because you are obviously misleading

name: Ses03M_impro01_M015
label: ang
text: -- No.  I'm not waiting...I'm not coming back again.  I don't have time to come back five days.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F014
label: xxx
text: No.  You couldn't go get another one.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F015
label: xxx
text: Well then you won't have a license will you?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M016
label: fru
text: I'll have a license.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F016
label: fru
text: Well not from this department you won't.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M017
label: ang
text: Yes I will.  I'll have this [GARBAGE]

name: Ses03M_impro01_F017
label: fru
text: Sir-

name: Ses03M_impro01_M018
label: fru
text: just as I want.  Ugh.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F018
label: fru
text: Sir?  I'm going to ask you one more time and then I'm going to call my supervisor

name: Ses03M_impro01_F019
label: fru
text: who will proceed to call-- security if you can't remove yourself--

name: Ses03M_impro01_M019
label: ang
text: Fine.  Call your supervisor.  Ask supervisor over

name: Ses03M_impro01_M020
label: fru
text: and I'll tell her how you've been behaving.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F020
label: fru
text: Really?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M021
label: fru
text: How would you like that hmm?

name: Ses03M_impro01_F021
label: fru
text: She's not actually in the building.  She's only on the phone. Sir, please leave this line immediately.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M022
label: fru
text: Oh, okay.  Wow.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M023
label: ang
text: No.  I'm not going anywhere.  I'm staying here-- I am filling out right now okay just calm down. I'm filling out right now-- Just take the god damn piece of paper.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F022
label: ang
text: Okay.  I'm going to call security. Security!

name: Ses03M_impro01_F023
label: xxx
text: I have it.  I'm taking it.  Doesn't mean I'm going to do anything with it.--Get out of my line!  This is my line.  Get out.  All these people--Sir, you are causing a mob in this department.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M024
label: xxx
text: Okey This is a new one.  Take the new one.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M025
label: xxx
text: Do you own the D.M.V.?

name: Ses03M_impro01_M026
label: fru
text: I'm sorry she's--these people they just want to get their license--

name: Ses03M_impro01_F024
label: fru
text: No, You cannot get your license.  You filled out the wrong part of the form.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M027
label: xxx
text: What are you talking about?  Just transfer it over.  I filled out the new one.

name: Ses03M_impro01_F025
label: ang
text: This entire time you're fighting with me sir, you could've finished the form and already been half way-- No.  Get out.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M028
label: ang
text: I did finish one.  Take it.

name: Ses03M_impro01_M029
label: ang
text: What is wrong with you?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M000
label: xxx
text: So what do you think?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F000
label: neu
text: About what?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M001
label: neu
text: About what I was just saying.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F001
label: xxx
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M002
label: fru
text: It certainly is not. It is slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: It's so P.R. I mean, somebody's giving you a good bill about this wonderful event that's going to happen on the beach.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M003
label: fru
text: Well, I'm not the only one. Look at all these people.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: Exactly. Everyone else is told the same thing. It keeps them feeling excited. Keeps them coming back. Keeps them thinking life's going to start at any minute now.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M004
label: fru
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F004
label: xxx
text: I don't care. It's still fish to me.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M005
label: neu
text: Carla, can I ask you something? Don't take this wrong, but are you having your period?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F005
label: ang
text: Augie, Goddamn it, don't ask me that. You always ask me that. Why do you ask me that? I hate it. It's insulting.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: Okay, then what's bugging you?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F006
label: fru
text: Look, it's-we just-we're looking at this evening in a different way, both of us. We both have different ideas of it.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M007
label: fru
text: There's nothing to it, alright? We come down here, the grunion arrive, they do their little fish business, we go ooh, ah, look at the fish, and then they go home and we go home.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F007
label: xxx
text: It's not like that.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M008
label: neu
text: We're not seeing the grunions?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: Look, Augie, we've never seen them. They're never going to come.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M009
label: fru
text: We missed them twice. That's not ever.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F009
label: xxx
text: Twice is as many times as we've tried. That's ever.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M010
label: fru
text: We'll see them this time.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F010
label: xxx
text: No, we won't.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F011
label: xxx
text: It's impossible. It's like waiting around. Waiting to see Santa Claus, you know?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F012
label: ang
text: Like I feel like my whole life I've been just standing on this beach with my hands clasped waiting for these fish to show up and these fish never show up.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: God, I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F013
label: fru
text: I do.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F014
label: fru
text: Look, I did. I always do. But it's like every time I try nothing ever happens.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: It's just fish. Nothing to get traumatized over.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F015
label: fru
text: For God's sake, Augie, this is not about fish.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: I've been turning this thing over in my head trying to figure out when the point was when we took a turn for the worse, and I can't seem to pinpoint it.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: You were fine during the phone call from Marge. Dinner was okay. Doing the dishes was no problem. Let's see. I took a shower. You were watching the news. You said Augie, I think the grunion are running. I said great, let's go. I feel lucky tonight.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M015
label: fru
text: And so I'm getting the animals, putting the animals out in the yard. I'm putting on my jacket, getting the car out of the garage-

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F016
label: sad
text: Do you remember the last time we came here?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F017
label: sad
text: We thought I was pregnant.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: You brought a bottle of champagne.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F019
label: hap
text: We took off our shoes and we danced barefoot in the sand. Under the moon.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F020
label: hap
text: And you whispered so intimately in my ear so I could feel your words.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F021
label: hap
text: Oh, that moment-that was it.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: I told myself finally, this is how happy I'm supposed to be.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M016
label: neu
text: Wait a minute. I got it.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F023
label: hap
text: Dancing barefoot in the sand. Drinking out of a bottle of champagne.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M017
label: xxx
text: It was driving past the Knickerbocker Liquor Locker, right? You said let's get some champagne, and I said time's-a-wasting or something like that.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M018
label: xxx
text: You want this to be like the other time, right? That's it. Right?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F024
label: sad
text: I don't want to remember something.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F025
label: sad
text: Hope for some things.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M019
label: xxx
text: Right. I got it. Of course. Listen, do you want to dance?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F026
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M020
label: xxx
text: Do you want me to get some champagne?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F027
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M021
label: xxx
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F028
label: sad
text: No, no.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M022
label: fru
text: What? What? Do you want me to breathe in your ear?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F029
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M023
label: fru
text: Do you want to get married again? What? What? Do you want to get a divorce?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F030
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F031
label: ang
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M024
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F032
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M025
label: fru
text: A new carpet? A poodle?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M026
label: ang
text: A-a back rub, some ice cream, a suicide pact. What the hell do you want, Carla?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F033
label: fru
text: I want things to turn out the way that they're supposed to be.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M027
label: fru
text: Jesus, welcome to the human race.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M028
label: xxx
text: Did you think this is how I thought it was going to turn out? Do you think I had some great fantasy down the line? That four years down the line that we'd come to the beach and argue with each other over fish?

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M029
label: fru
text: No, I was just like you. I thought it was going to be all peaches and roses and everything great. And the wind in our hair and the sand in our toes, and the fish will always come and the bills will pay themselves, and we'll have three big fat rosy kids. And oh God.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_M030
label: fru
text: You know what you get? The jokes on us, baby. Because do you know what you get? Huh? Carla? Do you know what you get? You get this.

name: Ses03F_script02_2_F034
label: fru
