name: Ses04F_script02_2_M009
label: xxx
text: There's nothing to it.  We come down here.  The grunions arrive.  They do the little fish business.  We go oh, ah look at the fish.  They go home.  We go home.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F009
label: ang
text: For heaven's sake, grow up we are not going to see the Grunions.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M010
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F010
label: ang
text: We never do.  Do we have we ever?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: We've missed them twice that's not ever.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F011
label: ang
text: Twice is every time we've tried that's ever.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: We'll see them this year.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F012
label: xxx
text: No, we won't.  It's pointless.  It's like waiting up to see Santa Clause.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F013
label: xxx
text: God I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up,

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F014
label: ang
text: and the fish won't show up.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F015
label: fru
text: You don't understand anything I'm saying.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: No, of course not.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F016
label: fru
text: I did want to see it.  I always do.  I keep thinking that this time will be the time but it never is.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M015
label: fru
text: It's just a fish.  Nothing to get traumatized over.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F017
label: xxx
text: For heaven's sake, this is not about fish.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M016
label: fru
text: I've been trying to work this backwards but I can't seem to pinpoint the moment when we took a turn for the worse.  You were fine during the phone call from Marge.  Dinner was okay.  Doing the dishes was no problem.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M017
label: xxx
text: Let's see I took a shower.  You watched the news.  You said the Grunions are running tonight. I said great let's go.  I feel lucky tonight.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M018
label: xxx
text: Okay.  Uh, so I'm putting on my jacket, putting out the animals.  We're getting the car out of the garage.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F018
label: xxx
text: Do you remember the first time we came to see it?  It was about four years ago right after we got married.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F019
label: sad
text: We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne but no glasses.  You asked me to dance.  So we took off our shoes

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F020
label: sad
text: and you popped the cork and while we were dancing, you said the softest most intimate things to me

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F021
label: sad
text: right into my ear so that I could hear them as much as- so that I could feel them as much as hear them.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: And I remember thinking this is it.  At last, at last I'm as happy as I'm supposed to be.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M019
label: neu
text: Wait a minute.  I've got it.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F023
label: sad
text: Dancing barefoot in the sand, drinking champagne from the bottle.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M020
label: neu
text: It was in the car right.  Driving past the Knickerbocker Liquor Locker, you said let's get some champagne and I said times a wasting or something like that.  Right?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M021
label: exc
text: That's it, right?  You want this to be like the other time, right.  That's it.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F024
label: sad
text: I would rather not remember some things.  I would rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M022
label: xxx
text: Okay.  Right.  I got it.  Sure.  Of course.  Listen you want to dance?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F025
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M023
label: neu
text: You want me to get some champagne?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F026
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M024
label: xxx
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F027
label: fru
text: No.  No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M025
label: fru
text: Well what?  Want me to breath in your ear?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F028
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M026
label: fru
text: Want to get married again?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F029
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M027
label: fru
text: What?  What do you want a divorce?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F030
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M028
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F031
label: ang
text: No.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M029
label: fru
text: A new carpet, a poodle, a backrub, ice cream, a suicide pact.  What?  What?  Carla what the hell do you want?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F032
label: xxx
text: I want something to turn out the way it's supposed to.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M030
label: xxx
text: Well welcome to the human race.  You think this is what I had in mind.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M031
label: fru
text: Do you think that when I proposed, I had this great fantasy going that four years down the line we'd come to the beach and yell at each other over fish.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M032
label: fru
text: Do you think that I knew that there'd be times when you'd look at me like I'm a used Kleenex and times I would look at you and think holy hell when's the next flight to Alaska.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M033
label: fru
text: No, no I'm just like you.  I thought it was going to be all peaches and roses and sand in our hair and wind in our

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M034
label: fru
text: Sand in our toes and wind in our hair and the fish will always come and the bills will always pay themselves and ha, ha baby the jokes on us.  Because you know what you get,

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M035
label: xxx
text: you know what you get Carla, this.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F033
label: ang
text: This what, what is this?  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M036
label: xxx
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F034
label: ang
text: Oh, right, sure this is standing on the beach.  This is waiting.  This is fighting.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M037
label: xxx
text: Right.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F035
label: xxx
text: But this isn't anything like I thought anything would be like.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M038
label: xxx
text: No, I know me either.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F036
label: xxx
text: This is just this.  I mean it includes a lot in everything but it's just not, you know, something else.  Do you have any idea what I'm trying to say?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M039
label: fru
text: I'm doing the best I can.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F037
label: sad
text: I know you are, Augie.  Really I do.  I know you wanted this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and all but I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M040
label: sad
text: Maybe if you were with somebody else too.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F038
label: fru
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M041
label: sad
text: No, I know but still.  I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F039
label: fru
text: For heaven's sake, whatever I'm doing I'd rather be doing it with you.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M042
label: sur
text: Yeah?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F040
label: fru
text: Well don't be ridiculous.  Don't you know that?  You're the one who probably wishes you were with somebody else

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F041
label: sad
text: somebody who knew how to enjoy herself and didn't take everything so hard.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M043
label: neu
text: Actually now that you mention it, no I don't.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F042
label: xxx
text: Okay.  Fine.  So we're in the wrong spot but we're with the right person.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M044
label: neu
text: I don't know.  It seemed like a good spot to me.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M045
label: xxx
text: I mean look at the view you've got of the moon from here.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F043
label: hap
text: Yeah, I noticed that.  Looks pretty on the water doesn't it, big old white moon.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M046
label: exc
text: Well look at what we got here.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F044
label: hap
text: Oh, Augie you brought refreshments.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M047
label: neu
text: It's not champagne.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F045
label: hap
text: Well then I guess we don't need glasses.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M048
label: xxx
text: You still cold?  Do you want to go home?

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F046
label: hap
text: I'm beginning to think you might be right.  I think this may be the spot after all.  Augie I'm sorry.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M049
label: xxx
text: Shh.  If we're very quiet, the fish might come.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_F047
label: xxx
text: Or not.

name: Ses04F_script02_2_M050
label: xxx
text: Or not.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M000
label: xxx
text: That was a rouser, wasn't it?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F000
label: ang
text: That was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M001
label: neu
text: I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F001
label: hap
text: The manager came in and found us rolling about on the floor, biting and scratching like panthers.  Oh, dear.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: I shall never forget his face.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F002
label: hap
text: How ridiculous.  How utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M003
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F003
label: hap
text: And very much sillier.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M004
label: fru
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F004
label: xxx
text: You knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M005
label: fru
text: I knew nothing of the sort.  You took presents from him.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F005
label: xxx
text: Presents?  A trivial little brooch.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M006
label: xxx
text: I remember it well, bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F006
label: exc
text: Not at all.  It was very pretty.  I still have it and I wear it often.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M007
label: fru
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: I did not.  You made the whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M008
label: ang
text: You must admit that he was in love with you, wasn't he?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F008
label: hap
text: Just a little, perhaps, nothing serious.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M009
label: neu
text: Line?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F009
label: neu
text: Let him kiss you.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M010
label: ang
text: You let him kiss you.  You said you did.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F010
label: ang
text: What of it?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M011
label: ang
text: What of it?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F011
label: xxx
text: It gave him a lot of pleasure and it didn't hurt me.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M012
label: ang
text: What about me?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F012
label: fru
text: If you hadn't been so nosey, you never would have known a thing about it.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M013
label: ang
text: That's a nice point of view, I must say.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F013
label: fru
text: Oh, dear.  I'm bored with this conversation.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M014
label: ang
text: So am I; bored stiff.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M015
label: xxx
text: You want some brandy?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: No, thanks.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M016
label: fru
text: I'll have a little myself, I think.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F015
label: fru
text: I don't see why you want it.  You've already had two glasses.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M017
label: fru
text: No particular reason.  Anyhow, they were very small ones.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F016
label: fru
text: It seems so silly to go on and on and on with such a thing.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M018
label: fru
text: You can hardly call three liquor glasses in a whole evening going on and on and on.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F017
label: ang
text: It's become a habit with you.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M019
label: fru
text: You needn't be so grand just because you don't happen to want any at the moment.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F018
label: fru
text: Oh, don't be so stupid.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M020
label: ang
text: Really, Amanda

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F019
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M021
label: ang
text: Nothing.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M022
label: ang
text: Going out somewhere, my dear?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F020
label: fru
text: No, just making myself fascinating for you

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M023
label: fru
text: Oh.  That reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F021
label: xxx
text: The woman's job is to allure the man.  Watch me a minute, will you?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M024
label: ang
text: As a matter of fact, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F022
label: ang
text: Oh, no, it isn't.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M025
label: ang
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: Oh, be quiet.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M026
label: neu
text: Line?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F024
label: neu
text: It's a pity you didn't- It's a pity you didn't have more brandy.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: It's a pity you didn't have any more brandy.  It might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F025
label: fru
text: It doesn't seem to have worked such wonders with you.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M028
label: neu
text: Line?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M029
label: ang
text: Snap.  Oh, snap, snap, snap, like a little adder.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F026
label: ang
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: They -- nonsense, they have a little bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F027
label: fru
text: They sting.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M031
label: ang
text: They snap.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: I don't care.  Do you understand?  I don't care.  I don't mind if they bark and roll about like hoops.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M032
label: xxx
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: Yes, I did, quite a lot.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M033
label: ang
text: I suppose you let him kiss you a good deal more then, hmm?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F030
label: ang
text: Mind your own business.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: You must have had a riotous time.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M035
label: ang
text: No restraint at all, very enjoyable.  You never had much anyhow.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F031
label: ang
text: You're quite insufferable.  I expected it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M036
label: ang
text: I'm not in the least drunk.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F032
label: ang
text: You always had a weak head.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M037
label: fru
text: I think I mentioned once before that I've only had three minute liquor glasses of brandy this whole evening.  That's hardly enough to get a child of two drunk.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F033
label: ang
text: On the contrary, a child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: Very interesting.  And how about a child of four and a child of six and a child of nine?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Oh, shut up.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M039
label: xxx
text: We might get up a splendid little- a splendid little debate about this, you know, intemperate tots.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: Not very funny, dear.  You'd better have some more brandy.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Very good idea.  I will

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: You better turn that off I think.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M042
label: xxx
text: It's late and the people upstairs will get annoyed.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: There aren't any people upstairs.  It's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: There are people downstairs, I suppose

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F038
label: xxx
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M044
label: xxx
text: This is no time of year for Tunis.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M045
label: xxx
text: I will do no such thing.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: Very well, if you insist on being boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M046
label: ang
text: Turn it off.  It's driving me mad.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: Go away.  Go away.  I hate you.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M047
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: You are far too temperamental.  Try to control yourself.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F043
label: neu
text: We swapped. Listen.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M048
label: ang
text: Listen--

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F044
label: ang
text: Listen, indeed.  I am sick and tired of listening to you, you damn sadistic bully.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M049
label: ang
text: You're a vile tempered, loosed living

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F045
label: ang
text: Stop.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M050
label: ang
text: wicked little beast. And I- I hope I never see you again as long as live.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F046
label: ang
text: Stop.  I hate you.  Do you hear me? You're conceited and overbearing and utterly impossible.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F047
label: ang
text: This is the end.  Do you understand, the end?  Finally and forever.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M051
label: ang
text: You're not going like this.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F048
label: ang
text: Oh, yes, I am.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M052
label: ang
text: No, you're not.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F049
label: ang
text: Let go of me.  You're a cruel fiend and I hate and loath you.  Thank God, I discovered in time what you're really like.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M053
label: ang
text: Shut up. Shut up.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M054
label: ang
text: You're a mean, evil minded

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F050
label: ang
text: Marry you again? Huh.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M055
label: ang
text: little vampire And I hope to God I never set eyes on you as long as I live.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F051
label: ang
text: Never, never, never.  I'd rather die in torment. Beast brute.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_M056
label: ang
text: Whore.

name: Ses04M_script03_2_F052
label: ang
text: Swine.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M000
label: neu
text: Hey, what's up?

name: Ses04F_impro07_F000
label: exc
text: Guess what came today?

name: Ses04F_impro07_M001
label: exc
text: What?

name: Ses04F_impro07_F001
label: exc
text: My acceptance letter.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M002
label: sur
text: Get out.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F002
label: exc
text: From U.S.C..

name: Ses04F_impro07_M003
label: sur
text: You serious?

name: Ses04F_impro07_F003
label: exc
text: Yes, I am.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M004
label: xxx
text: Oh, my god what happened.  You got in. Otherwise you wouldn't be so happy. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro07_F004
label: exc
text: Well yeah, that's the general idea. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro07_M005
label: exc
text: That's awesome.  Congratulations.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F005
label: exc
text: Big bad acceptance packet with all the information.  I'm going to U.S.C..

name: Ses04F_impro07_M006
label: exc
text: That's amazing.  Wow.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F006
label: exc
text: I know. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro07_M007
label: xxx
text: You're going to have to get like a nine millimeter because U.S.C.'s like in South Central.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F007
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER] Yeah, uh. No.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F008
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER] It's safe around there.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M008
label: xxx
text: No, seriously. No, seriously, you should do it.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F009
label: exc
text: The campus is beautiful. I'm so excited.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M009
label: neu
text: I know but you should get like a taser or something.  I mean walking around the campus at night-

name: Ses04F_impro07_F010
label: exc
text: Do you want to buy me some mace for my, you know, going away present?

name: Ses04F_impro07_M010
label: xxx
text: I'll get you- I'll get you a bottle of mace.

name: Ses04F_impro07_F011
label: exc
text: There we go.  Perfect.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M011

label: xxx
text: All hail to the

name: Ses04F_impro07_F079
label: exc
text: me.

name: Ses04F_impro07_M086
label: xxx
text: to you, yes.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F000
label: xxx
text: You're the only one I know who loves his parents.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M000
label: xxx
text: I know.  It went out of style, didn't it?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F001
label: xxx
text: It's okay.  It's a good thing.  You know, it's lovely here and the air is sweet.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M001
label: xxx
text: So you're not sorry you came?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F002
label: xxx
text: No, not sorry, but I'm not going to stay.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M002
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F003
label: xxx
text: In the first place, your mother as much as told me to go.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F004
label: xxx
text: You saw that and then you've been kind of--

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M003
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F005
label: xxx
text: Well, kind of embarrassed ever since I got here.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M004
label: xxx
text: The trouble is I planned on sneaking up on you over a period of a week or so.  But they take it for granted that we're all set.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F006
label: xxx
text: I knew they would, your mother, anyway.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: How did you know?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F007
label: xxx
text: From her point of view, why else would I come?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: Well wouldn't you want to?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: I guess you know this is why I asked you to come.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F008
label: xxx
text: I guess this is why I came.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M008
label: xxx
text: Ann, I love you.  I love you a great deal.  I love you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M009
label: xxx
text: I have no imagination.  That's all I know to tell you.  I'm embarrassing you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M010
label: xxx
text: I didn't want to tell it to you here.  I wanted someplace we'd never been; someplace where we'd be brand new to each other.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: You think this is wrong, don't you; this yard, this chair?  I want you to be ready for me.  I don't want to win you away from anything.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F009
label: xxx
text: Chris, I've been ready a long, long time.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: Then he's gone forever?  You're sure?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F010
label: xxx
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M013
label: xxx
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F011
label: xxx
text: You started to write me.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M014
label: xxx
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M015
label: xxx
text: Anne, why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: I was waiting for you, Chris.  'Til then, you never wrote and when you did, what did you say?  You sure can be ambiguous, you know.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M016
label: xxx
text: Anne, give me a kiss.  Give me a -

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M017
label: xxx
text: I kissed you.  I kissed Annie.  How long, how long I've waited to kiss you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F014
label: hap
text: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  All I've done is sit around and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M018
label: xxx
text: Anne, we're going to live now.  I'm going to make you so happy.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F015
label: xxx
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M019
label: xxx
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F016
label: xxx
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you, Chris.  What is it, Chris?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M020
label: xxx
text: Let's drive somewhere.  I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: No, what is it, Chris?  Your mother?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M021
label: xxx
text: No, no, nothing like that.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F018
label: xxx
text: Then what's wrong.  Even in your letters, there was something ashamed.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M022
label: sad
text: Yes, I suppose there has been.  But it's going from me.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F019
label: xxx
text: You've got to tell me.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: I don't know where to start.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F020
label: xxx
text: It wouldn't work this way.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M024
label: sad
text: It's all mixed up with so many other things.  You remember overseas, I was in command of a company?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F021
label: xxx
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: Well I lost them.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F022
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F023
label: sad
text: Oh, gees.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: It takes a little time to toss that off because they weren't just men.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: For instance, one time it'd been raining several days.  And this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks; put them in my pocket.  That's only a little thing, but that's the kind of guys I had.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M029
label: xxx
text: They didn't die.  They killed themselves for each other.  I mean that exactly.  A little more selfish and they'd have been here today.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: And I got this idea watching them go down, everything was being destroyed, see?  But, to me, it seemed there was one new thing that was made,

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: a kind of responsibility.  Man for man.  You understand me?  And then I went home and it was incredible.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: There was no meaning in it here.  The whole thing to them was some sort of bus accident.  Then I went to work for dad and that whole rat race again.  I felt, what you said, ashamed somehow

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: because nobody was changed.  It seemed to make suckers out of a lot of guys.  I felt wrong to be alive;

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: to open that bank book; to drive the new car; to see the new refrigerator.  I mean, you can take these things out of a war, but when you drive the new car, you have to know that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M035
label: sad
text: You have to be a little better because of that.  Otherwise, we have is really loot and there's blood on it.  I don't want to take any of it.  I guess that included you.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F024
label: xxx
text: And do you still feel that way?

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M036
label: xxx
text: I want you now, Annie.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F025
label: xxx
text: Because you mustn't feel that way anymore, Chris.  Because you have a right to everything you have, everything, Chris; to me, too.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F026
label: xxx
text: And your money, there's nothing wrong in your money.  Your father put hundreds of planes in the air.  You should be proud.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_M037
label: hap
text: Annie, Annie, I'm going to make you a fortune.

name: Ses04M_script01_3_F027
label: hap
text: What'll I do with a fortune?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M000
label: neu
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F000
label: xxx
text: There was nothing in that, you know that.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M001
label: ang
text: I knew nothing of the sort.  You took presents from him.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F001
label: xxx
text: Presents a trivial little broach.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: I remember it well bristling with diamonds in the worst possible taste.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Not at all.  It was very pretty.  I still have it and I wear it often.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M003
label: ang
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F003
label: xxx
text: I did not.  You made the whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M004
label: xxx
text: You must admit that he was in love with you, wasn't he?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Just a little perhaps, nothing serious.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M005
label: ang
text: You let him kiss you.  You said you did.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F005
label: ang
text: What of it?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M006
label: ang
text: What of it?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F006
label: xxx
text: It gave him a lot of pleasure and it didn't hurt me.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M007
label: ang
text: What about me?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: If you hadn't been so nosey, you never would have known a thing about it.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M008
label: ang
text: That's a nice point of view, I must say.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F008
label: fru
text: Oh, dear.  I'm bored with this conversation.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M009
label: xxx
text: So am I.  Bored stiff.  Want some brandy?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F009
label: fru
text: No thanks.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: I'll have some myself, I think.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F010
label: xxx
text: I don't see why you want it.  You've already had two glasses.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M011
label: xxx
text: No particular reason.  Anyway they were very small ones.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F011
label: xxx
text: seems so silly to go on and on and on with such a thing.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M012
label: fru
text: You can hardly call three liquor glasses in the whole evening going on and on and on.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F012
label: ang
text: It's become a habit with you.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M013
label: xxx
text: You needn't be so grand just because you don't happen to want any at the moment.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F013
label: ang
text: Oh, don't be so stupid.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M014
label: ang
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F014
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M015
label: ang
text: Nothing.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M016
label: ang
text: Going somewhere, my dear?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F015
label: fru
text: Just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M017
label: xxx
text: Ah, that reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F016
label: fru
text: The woman's job is to allure the man.  Watch me a minute will you.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M018
label: xxx
text: As a matter of fact, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F017
label: fru
text: Oh, no it isn't

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M019
label: xxx
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F018
label: xxx
text: Oh, be quiet.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M020
label: xxx
text: It's a pity you don't have anymore brandy.  It might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F019
label: ang
text: It doesn't seem to have worked such wonders with you.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M021
label: fru
text: Snap, snap, snap like a little adder.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F020
label: ang
text: Adders don't snap they sting.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M022
label: xxx
text: Non-sense they have bags of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F021
label: ang
text: They sting.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M023
label: xxx
text: They snap.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F022
label: ang
text: I don't care, okay.  Do you understand?  I don't care.  I don't mind if they bark and roll about like hoops.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M024
label: neu
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after our divorce?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: Yes, I did quite a lot.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M025
label: xxx
text: I suppose you let him kiss you a good deal more then.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F024
label: ang
text: Mind your own business.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M026
label: xxx
text: You must have had a riotous time.  No restraint at all, very enjoyable, you never had much anyhow.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F025
label: ang
text: You're quite insufferable.  I expect it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: I'm not in the least drunk.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F026
label: ang
text: You always had a weak head.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M028
label: fru
text: I think I mentioned once before that I had three minute liquor glasses of brandy the whole evening long.  A child of two couldn't get drunk on that.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F027
label: ang
text: On, the contrary.  A child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass of brandy.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M029
label: xxx
text: Very interesting and how about a child of six and a child of four and a child of nine.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: Oh, shut up.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M030
label: xxx
text: They'd get up a splendid little debate about that, you know.  Intemperate tots.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: Not very funny, dear.  You'd better have some more brandy.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M031
label: ang
text: Very good idea.  I will.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M032
label: xxx
text: You'd better turn that off I think.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F030
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M033
label: xxx
text: It's very late and it will annoy the people upstairs.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F031
label: ang
text: There is no one upstairs.  It's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: There are people downstairs I suppose.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F032
label: xxx
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M035
label: ang
text: This is no time of year for Tunis.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F033
label: xxx
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M036
label: xxx
text: I'll do no such thing.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Very well if you insist on being boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M037
label: ang
text: Turn it off.  It's driving me mad.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: You're far too temperamental.  Try to control yourself.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M038
label: xxx
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: Go away, go away.  I hate you.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Amanda, listen.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: Listen? Listen indeed.  I'm sick and tired of listening to you.  You damn sadistic bully.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: Stop.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Very amusing.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: Stop, stop.  I hate you.  Do you hear?  You're conceited and overbearing and utterly impossible.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: You're a vile tempered, loose living, wicked little beast. And I hope I never see you again as long as I live.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: This is the end do you understand?  The end,

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: You're not going like this.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: finally and forever

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: Oh, I am.  Let go of me.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: You're not.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F043
label: ang
text: Oh, I hate you. It's a good thing that I found out in time what you're really like. Marry you again?  Never, never, never.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M044
label: ang
text: Shut up.  Shut up. I wouldn't marry you again if you came crawling to me on your bended knees.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_M045
label: ang
text: You're a mean, evil minded, little tempered witch. I hope to God I never set eyes on you again as long as I live. Whore.

name: Ses04F_script03_2_F044
label: ang
text: I'd rather die in torment. Beast.  Brute.  Calf swine.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F000
label: hap
text: Hello.  Thank you for calling Dell Taco Corporate.  Can I help you?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M000
label: fru
text: Yeah, um.  I have been trying to reach somebody who will refund, uh, my money.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M001
label: neu
text: Um, I basically, um I- I ordered some food

name: Ses04F_impro08_M002
label: fru
text: um and everything was pretty much uh- uh- just not done right. All the orders were messed up.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F001
label: neu
text: Okay.  Well, Did you go through the automated menu?  Most of your requests can be taken care of through that.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M003
label: fru
text: Yes, I did and that didn't- I got through to, like, one operator and she sent me to like three others

name: Ses04F_impro08_M004
label: xxx
text: and now I'm talking to you.  And all I want is my money back.  That's all I'm asking for. It's not much.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F002
label: neu
text: Okay.  Well I'd be happy to-

name: Ses04F_impro08_M005
label: fru
text: If you could just give me that, then I will leave you alone. And just- if i could also- What?

name: Ses04F_impro08_F003
label: fru
text: Okay, sir.  I'd be happy to help you.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F004
label: neu
text: Sir, can- can you tell me which branch you went to.  We can start there.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M006
label: xxx
text: Yeah, Beverley Hills.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F005
label: neu
text: Okay.  Um, and what was the complaint?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M007
label: fru
text: The food was prepared incorrectly.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M008
label: fru
text: I asked for no tomatoes.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F006
label: neu
text: Can you be a little more specific, sir?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M009
label: xxx
text: I asked for no tomatoes on six tacos.  I got tomatoes and onions on all of them,

name: Ses04F_impro08_M010
label: xxx
text: Um, hairs were found in three out of the six.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F007
label: fru
text: Did you try to take them back and get your order fixed, sir?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M011
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  I did and they're like you've got to take it up with corporate, and I'm like well fine.  I'll have your ass by the end of the day and so now I'm trying to do that.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F008
label: neu
text: Well I'm very sorry, sir.  They should have dealt with it at that particular branch.  I apologize for that, uh, but we can help you.  That's no worries.  We can take care of that.  So how much did you need to be refunded?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M012
label: neu
text: It was a hundred a sixty dollars.  I'm sorry, uh, sixteen dollars.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F009
label: neu
text: Okay.  Um, I'm going to go ahead and transfer you over to another department.  They'll need your address.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M013
label: ang
text: Look, I don't want to be transferred over to another- All I want to do is just give you my name and address so you can send me a check.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M014
label: ang
text: Okay.  You understand that's all I want. Just don't give me a problem with this.  Okay, please because I'm very sensitive right now

name: Ses04F_impro08_M015
label: ang
text: and if I get sent to another operator, I'll have to tell them the same damn story again.  I don't- I think I'm just going to lose my mind.  So if you could please just not do that, that would be great.  Thank you.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F010
label: fru
text: I understand, sir.  I will explain to them what the situa-

name: Ses04F_impro08_M016
label: ang
text: You don't understand because you've never gone to Del Taco and gotten the service that I've gotten.  You don't understand.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F011
label: xxx
text: You're right sir.  It is your particular situation but I will call the other operator.  I will explain to them what's going on. You won't have to tell your story again.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M017
label: ang
text: You're not going to call the other operator. You're not going to call the the other operator.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M018
label: ang
text: You're going to fill out a form on your desk

name: Ses04F_impro08_M019
label: ang
text: because I know you're at a desk right now in your stupid corporate building and you're going to send me a check for sixteen dollars and forty two cents.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F012
label: fru
text: Okay, sir.  They- they have to-

name: Ses04F_impro08_F013
label: fru
text: Sir.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F014
label: fru
text: Sir, they have to take down your address at the other station.  I will transfer.  I will explain everything to them.  It will all be fine.  I promise.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M020
label: fru
text: What's your name?

name: Ses04F_impro08_F015
label: fru
text: Cindy?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M021
label: xxx
text: Cinnee?

name: Ses04F_impro08_F016
label: xxx
text: Cindy.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M022
label: ang
text: Cindy?  Cindy what?

name: Ses04F_impro08_F017
label: fru
text: Sir, I don't think my name is really relevant-

name: Ses04F_impro08_M023
label: ang
text: Cindy, look.  If you don't get your ass a piece of paper that has a check

name: Ses04F_impro08_M024
label: ang
text: attached to it and you don't send it to me, I'm going to get very upset.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F018
label: fru
text: Alright, sir. Sir.  I'm going to transfer you to the address.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F019
label: fru
text: Alright.  You know what, sir.  The customer is always right.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M025
label: fru
text: You know what.  I- You know what? You know what? No, it's fine. it's fine it's fine You know what?

name: Ses04F_impro08_F020
label: fru
text: I will go ahead and I will take- I will take

name: Ses04F_impro08_M026
label: fru
text: Hey, Cindy. Cindy, look I know this is not your fault.  Do whatever you want.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M027
label: fru
text: Send me to whatever operator. I just- You know what?  I'm just done.  I'm just done.  I've lost all hope.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F021
label: xxx
text: Sir, customer satisfaction is our first goal.  I will go ahead and take your number and your address down myself.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M028
label: fru
text: of getting my sixteen dollars back. It fine, no honestly.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M029
label: fru
text: No, Cindy just don't even-look don't even.  Cuz I- look Cindy I know you don't care about me, okay.  I know that I'm just like another person who calls-

name: Ses04F_impro08_F022
label: xxx
text: Wait. But I-

name: Ses04F_impro08_F023
label: ang
text: But I'm giving you what you want.

name: Ses04F_impro08_M030
label: fru
text: No it doesn't matter.  It's fine.  It's fine.  Just send me to the next operator.  That's fine.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F024
label: fru
text: Okay.  If that's what you want, you want to go to the next person?

name: Ses04F_impro08_M031
label: xxx
text: Yes.

name: Ses04F_impro08_F025
label: fru
text: Okay.  Great.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F000
label: neu
text: Look at this, goose bumps.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M000
label: neu
text: Well so what'd you think?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F001
label: xxx
text: About what?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M001
label: neu
text: What I said.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M002
label: fru
text: Certainly is not.  It's slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: It's PR.  Somebody sold you a bill of goods that this wonderful event is going to take place on the beach.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M003
label: xxx
text: I'm not the only one.  Look at these people.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F004
label: xxx
text: Sure.  They're all told the same story.  It's what keeps us coming back for more; keeps us excited; keeps us thinking that life is going to start any minute now if we could just find the right spot; get in on the action.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M004
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F005
label: xxx
text: Well, I'm sorry, but it's still just fish to me.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M005
label: fru
text: Carla, can I ask you something?  Don't take this the wrong way, but are you having your period?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F006
label: ang
text: Goddamn it, Augie, don't ask me that.  I hate it when you ask me that.  You always ask me that.  It's insulting.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M006
label: ang
text: Well what's bugging you?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F007
label: ang
text: We just have different ideas about what this evening is supposed to look like.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M007
label: ang
text: There's nothing to it.  We come down here.  The grunions arrive.  They do their little fish business.  We go ooh, ah, look at the fish.  They go home.  We go home.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F008
label: xxx
text: For heaven's sake, we are not going to see the grunions.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M008
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F009
label: ang
text: We never do, do we?  Have we ever?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M009
label: xxx
text: We've missed them twice.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M010
label: xxx
text: That's not ever.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F010
label: fru
text: Twice is every time we've tried.  That's ever.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: We'll see them this year.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F011
label: xxx
text: No, we won't.  It's pointless.  It's like waiting up to see Santa Claus.  I feel as though my entire life is going to be spent standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasped expectantly waiting for the fish to show up.  And the fish won't show up.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M012
label: xxx
text: I thought you wanted to see them.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: You don't have any idea what I'm saying.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: No, of course, not.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F013
label: ang
text: I did want to see it.  I always do.  I keep thinking this time will be the time, but it never is.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: It's just fish; nothing to get traumatized over.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F014
label: xxx
text: For heaven's sake, this is not about fish.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M015
label: fru
text: I've been trying to work this backwards, but I can't seem to pinpoint the moment when we took a turn for the worse.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M016
label: fru
text: You were fine during the phone call from Marge.  Dinner was okay.  Doing the dishes was no problem.  Let's see, I took a shower.  Uh, you watched the news.  You said the grunions are running tonight.  I said great, let's go.  I feel lucky tonight.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M017
label: fru
text: Uh,okay.  So I'm putting on my jacket; putting out the animals;

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F015
label: xxx
text: Do you remember the first time we came to see it?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M018
label: fru
text: uh, taking the car out of the gara- out of the garage.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M019
label: fru
text: Uh.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F016
label: sad
text: It was about four years ago, right after we got married.  We thought I was pregnant and we had a bottle of champagne but no glasses.  You asked me to dance.  So we took off our shoes and you popped the cork.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F017
label: xxx
text: And while we were dancing, you said the softest, most intimate things to me, right into my ear so that I could feel them as much as hear them.  And I remember thinking this is it.  At last, at last I'm as happy as I'm supposed to be.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M020
label: neu
text: Wait a minute, I've got it.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: Dancing barefoot in the sand; drinking champagne from the bottle.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M021
label: neu
text: It was in the car, right?  Driving past the Knickerbocker Liquor Locker?  You said let's get some champagne and I said times a wasting or something like that.  Right?  That's it, right?  You want this to be like the other time.  That's it.  Of course.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F019
label: sad
text: I'd rather not remember some things.  I'd rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M022
label: xxx
text: Sure.  Okay.  Alright.  I've got it.  Listen do you want to dance?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F020
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M023
label: xxx
text: You want to get some champagne?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F021
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M024
label: fru
text: What, you want me to breathe in your ear?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F022
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M025
label: fru
text: You want to get married again?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F023
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M026
label: fru
text: What, you want a divorce?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F024
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M027
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F025
label: ang
text: No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M028
label: xxx
text: A new carpet?  A poodle?  An ice cream?  A back rub?  A suicide pact?  What?  What, Carla?  What the hell do you want?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F026
label: ang
text: I want something to turn out the way it's supposed to.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M029
label: ang
text: Well welcome to the human race.  You think this is what I had in mind?  You think that when I proposed, I had this great fantasy going that four years down the line, we'd come to the beach and yell at each other over fish?  No.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M030
label: xxx
text: No, I'm just like you.  I thought it was going to be all peaches and roses and wind in our hair and sand in our toes and the fish will always come and the bills will always pay themselves.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M031
label: ang
text: And we'll have three fat rosy kids and ha, ha, ha, baby, the joke's on us, 'cause you know what you get, Carla?  You know what you get?  This.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F027
label: ang
text: This what?  What is this?  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M032
label: fru
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F028
label: ang
text: Oh, right, sure.  This is standing on the beach.   This is waiting.  This is fighting.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M033
label: fru
text: Right.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F029
label: ang
text: But this isn't anything like I thought anything would be like.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M034
label: ang
text: No, I know, me neither.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F030
label: xxx
text: This is just this.  I mean, it includes a lot and everything, but it's just not, you know, something else.  Do you have any idea what I'm trying to say?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M035
label: fru
text: I'm doing the best I can.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F031
label: fru
text: I know you are, Augie.  Really, I do.  I know you meant for this to be special and nice and it's the full moon and the sand and everything.  But I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M036
label: xxx
text: Maybe if you were with somebody else, too, huh?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F032
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M037
label: sad
text: No, I know.  But still.  I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F033
label: xxx
text: For heaven's sake, whatever I'm doing, I'd rather be doing it with you.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M038
label: sur
text: Yeah?

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F034
label: xxx
text: Well don't be ridiculous.  Don't you know that?  You're the one who probably wishes you were with somebody else; somebody who knew how to enjoy herself and didn't take everything so hard.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M039
label: hap
text: Actually, now that you mention it, no.  I don't.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F035
label: hap
text: Okay, fine.  So we're in the wrong spot, but we're with the right person.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M040
label: hap
text: I don't know.  It seemed like a good spot to me.  I mean, look at the view you've got of the moon from here.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F036
label: hap
text: Yeah, I noticed that.  Looks pretty on the water, doesn't it?  Big ol' white moon.  I'm sorry, Augie.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M041
label: hap
text: Shh.  If we're very quiet, the fish might come.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_F037
label: xxx
text: Or not.

name: Ses04M_script02_2_M042
label: xxx
text: Or not.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M000
label: fru
text: Thank you for calling Sprint.  We care about everybody.  How can I help you?

name: Ses04M_impro08_F000
label: fru
text: Hi.  I've been on the phone for an hour trying to get a little discrepancy on my bill fixed.  I was charged for two hundred dollars worth of calls that I didn't make.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M001
label: neu
text: Are you sure you didn't make them?

name: Ses04M_impro08_F001
label: fru
text: I'm positive.  They came from like another state.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M002
label: fru
text: Can I get your phone number, please?

name: Ses04M_impro08_F002
label: fru
text: Uh. Yeah, I just gave it to the automated thing like five times.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M003
label: fru
text: I'm going to need it again.  I need to look at your file.  If you want me to look at your file--

name: Ses04M_impro08_F003
label: fru
text: Okay.  three two three six nine seven five zero six six.  Can we move on?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M004
label: neu
text: Okay.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F004
label: xxx
text: Okay, cool.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M005
label: neu
text: Umm, Miss Aruckman

name: Ses04M_impro08_F005
label: xxx
text: Yes.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M006
label: neu
text: I am seeing the two hundred dollar charge.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F006
label: fru
text: Yes, and I've been through all of the menus, pushed one and star and pound and all of that stuff and I'm just trying to get through to a person who can

name: Ses04M_impro08_M007
label: fru
text: Well I'm looking at these.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F007
label: fru
text: take off the charges that came from like Nebraska or wherever because, obviously, I didn't make those.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F008
label: fru
text: So can you please refund the mischarged charges

name: Ses04M_impro08_M008
label: neu
text: So you're saying that you didn't make these calls.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F009
label: fru
text: I did not make the calls from B.F.E. Nebraska.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M009
label: fru
text: Well I mean, I'm supposed to use discretion in the situation and, um--

name: Ses04M_impro08_F010
label: fru
text: So could you discretion it back?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M010
label: neu
text: All I can do for you right now is give you a hundred dollars.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F011
label: fru
text: Okay, but that's like half

name: Ses04M_impro08_M011
label: neu
text: What I can

name: Ses04M_impro08_F012
label: fru
text: of the money that I was charged that I didn't make those calls.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M012
label: neu
text: What I can do for you is give you a hundred dollars right now and fill out complaint form

name: Ses04M_impro08_M013
label: neu
text: which you- which you'll have to go into a local Verizon dealer--  or Sprint.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F013
label: fru
text: Okay, no, look, I- I- I- I'm really -- I'm trying to be patient.  I know this isn't your fault.  I know that you didn't do it

name: Ses04M_impro08_F014
label: fru
text: but, at the same time, I have been through an hour of little robot voices telling me what I needed to do.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M014
label: fru
text: Ma'am, I understand that.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F015
label: xxx
text: And I did everything they said.  And now i'm talking to you and you're supposed to put the money back on my account because I didn't make the calls and I'm really tired of dealing with this because I didn't even

name: Ses04M_impro08_M015
label: fru
text: Ma'am, I - I - I understand that. I understand that. What I can do for you right now is what I'm telling you is that I can do- I can give you a hundred dollars back and then you'll have to fill out a complaint form and then you'll get -- there'll be some investigation. Some men will show up at your house and go through your things.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F016
label: fru
text: Excuse me?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M016
label: fru
text: And then then you'll get some money back.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F017
label: fru
text: How long does that take?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M017
label: neu
text: A few weeks.  You won't even know that they were there.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F018
label: fru
text: I have to wait a few weeks for people come go through my things to get the money back that I didn't spend?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M018
label: fru
text: Okay.  You know what?  I just don't feel like doing this anymore.  Um, you can have all the money back, two hundred dollar, right now.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F019
label: sur
text: Really?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M019
label: neu
text: Yeah.  That's fine.  I just -- that's fine. Yeah, I mean, it doesn't make any difference to me.  I mean, it's not like it's going to cost my job or anything.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F020
label: neu
text: You're just going to put it back on my account.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M020
label: neu
text: I mean, technically, that's policy.  But, like, I mean, I don't really care about -- nobody really cares about policy here.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F021
label: sur
text: So you're just going to take care of this for me?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M021
label: neu
text: Sure.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F022
label: hap
text: Oh, my God, thank you so much.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M022
label: neu
text: You're welcome.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F023
label: hap
text: I really appreciate this. I know it's not policy or whatever but, seriously

name: Ses04M_impro08_M023
label: neu
text: No, no, no, it's cool.  It's cool.  It's cool.  So, um

name: Ses04M_impro08_F024
label: hap
text: make my life a lot easier.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M024
label: neu
text: You know, so- I mean, are you doing anything later?  Or um

name: Ses04M_impro08_F025
label: sur
text: Really?

name: Ses04M_impro08_M025
label: neu
text: Oh, I don't know.  I mean, I don't know.  I just thought, you know, maybe you want to get some co--I mean, I'm actually -- wait, where do you live?  Oh, you're in Los Angeles, I see.  Oh, no, that sucks 'cause I'm in, actually in Alabama.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F026
label: xxx
text: Right. Um, Thanks for asking, though. I mean, you sound nice, you know.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M026
label: neu
text: God, that's like a whole problem with like-- But, no, I mean, hey-- if you ever

name: Ses04M_impro08_M027
label: neu
text: if you ever come out to Montgomery, I mean, you know, just -- just call up, you know, call up the operator and I'll-- I'll be here. So, um.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F027
label: neu
text: I'll

name: Ses04M_impro08_F028
label: neu
text: call up the Sprint call center and, uh, you know. cool

name: Ses04M_impro08_F029
label: xxx
text: Wow, alright. Well, thanks. And, uh, you- you have a good one.

name: Ses04M_impro08_M028
label: neu
text: Alright. Take Care.

name: Ses04M_impro08_F030
label: neu
text: You too.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F000
label: ang
text: Why did he invite her?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M000
label: neu
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F001
label: ang
text: It's been three years.  Why all of a sudden?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well maybe- maybe he just wanted to see her again.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F002
label: fru
text: Nobody comes seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M002
label: xxx
text: What do you mean?  He was brought up next door to the girl his whole life.  Why shouldn't he want to see her again?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M003
label: xxx
text: Don't look at me like that.  He didn't tell me anymore than he told you.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: She's not going to marry him.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M004
label: neu
text: How do you know he's even thinking about it?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F004
label: xxx
text: It's got that about it.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M005
label: xxx
text: Well so what.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F005
label: ang
text: What's going on here, Joe?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M006
label: fru
text: Listen kid.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F006
label: ang
text: No, line.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M007
label: neu
text: Uh, Then why is she still-she's not his girl, Joe

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F007
label: ang
text: She's not his girl, Joe.  She knows she's not.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M008
label: neu
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F008
label: ang
text: Then why is she still single?  New York is full of men.  Why hasn't she married?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F009
label: ang
text: Probably a hundred people told her she's foolish but she's waited.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: How do you know why she waited?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F010
label: ang
text: Because she knows what I know that's why.  She's faithful as a rock.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F011
label: fru
text: In my worst moments, I think of her waiting and I know again that I'm right.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: Look it's a nice day.  What are we arguing for?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F012
label: fru
text: Nobody in this house dares take her faith away, Joe.  Strangers might but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F013
label: xxx
text: I want you to act like he's coming back, both of you.  Don't think I haven't noticed you since he invited her.  I won't stand for any nonsense.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: But Kate-

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F014
label: fru
text: Because if he's not coming back, I'll kill myself.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F015
label: xxx
text: Laugh, laugh at me, but why did that happen the very night she came back?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F016
label: ang
text: She goes to sleep in his room and his memorial breaks in pieces.  Look, look at it.  Joe-

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F017
label: fru
text: Believe with me, Joe.  I can't stand alone.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M014
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F018
label: fru
text: Just last week a man showed up in Detroit missing longer than Larry.  You read it yourself.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M015
label: fru
text: Alright.  Alright.  Calm yourself.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F019
label: fru
text: You above all have got to believe.  You.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M016
label: fru
text: Why me above all?

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F020
label: fru
text: Just don't stop believing.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: What does that mean, me above all?  Look at you.  You're shaking.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_F021
label: fru
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses04F_script01_2_M018
label: fru
text: What have I got to hide?  What the hell is matter with you Kate?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M000
label: sad
text: So you're leaving tomorrow.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F000
label: sad
text: Yeah.  They just called.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M001
label: sad
text: This is really-this is unfair.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F001
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M002
label: fru
text: I don't see [BREATHING]

name: Ses04F_impro02_F002
label: sad
text: I don't know what to say.  I don't want to go but I don't have a lot of choice.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M003
label: fru
text: I mean we both knew that this was going to happen.  It's just that I feel that, you know, I don't want Susie growing up without a mother.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M004
label: sad
text: And, uh, I'm afraid that if you, you know, when you leave, you won't come back.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F003
label: sad
text: I'm going to come back.  I need you to believe that.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M005
label: fru
text: You don't know that.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F004
label: xxx
text: I need you to believe that too.  How am I supposed to believe everything's going to be okay if you don't?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M006
label: fru
text: I'll believe it, but- I'll believe it but it- I don't know that that's going to happen.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F005
label: sad
text: Well you have to have faith because I don't have a choice and I have to go.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M007
label: xxx
text: You do have a choice.  You don't have to go.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F006
label: sad
text: Do you think I want to leave you?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M008
label: fru
text: You have a choice.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F007
label: sad
text: I have to do this.  I don't want to leave.  Do you think I want to miss seeing her grow up?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M009
label: fru
text: I know.  It's just you don't have to do this for a living you know.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M010
label: fru
text: You're a smart person.  There are other things you can do.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F008
label: fru
text: Look we both knew what this meant when I signed on

name: Ses04F_impro02_F009
label: sad
text: And now- and now it's really shitty timing but now I have to go.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F010
label: fru
text: I mean I'm the one who has to leave here.  I'm the one who has to leave the two of you.  At least you get to be together.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M011
label: xxx
text: It's just not going to work out without you here.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F011
label: sad
text: What's that supposed to mean?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M012
label: sad
text: I mean we can't-we're not a complete family without you here.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F012
label: ang
text: Well I'll come back.  What is that supposed to mean?  You're not willing to wait for me to come back?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M013
label: fru
text: Of course I'm going to wait.  I just- I just don't like the idea of this happening because this isn't the last time this is going to happen. You're going to go on more tours and stuff.  I just- I can't-

name: Ses04F_impro02_M014
label: fru
text: I can't deal with this emotionally.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F013
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M015
label: fru
text: I want you to leave.  I want you to leave the service.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F014
label: fru
text: Well I can't very well do it today.  I still have to leave tomorrow.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M016
label: fru
text: You can do it today.  You don't have to do anything.  You don't have to do anything you don't want to do.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F015
label: fru
text: You're not making this any easier for me, you know.  I'm the one who has to go and you're really not helping.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M017
label: fru
text: Look I'm just telling you that you don't have to go.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F016
label: fru
text: I do have to go. And I need to know that you're here waiting for me and that you believe that I'm coming back.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M018
label: ang
text: That's all I'm saying... No you don't.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F017
label: ang
text: Thanks that helps.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M019
label: fru
text: It's just really unfair.  This is- this is bullshit.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F018
label: ang
text: I feel much better now.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M020
label: ang
text: You're acting like, you know, you're the one who's going all through, you know, all this shit and it's really- it's really not.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F019
label: fru
text: I know I'm leaving you here with all the responsibility but at least you get to be with her.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M021
label: ang
text: Yeah.  Of course I do because I didn't enlist in this stupid thing.  Why don't you just get out now and then-

name: Ses04F_impro02_F020
label: fru
text: I will but I can't right now.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M022
label: xxx
text: Yes- You don't have to go.  What are they going to do?  Huh?  Put a gun to your head?

name: Ses04F_impro02_F021
label: xxx
text: You know- you know how this works.  I have to go.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M023
label: fru
text: Then go.  We'll be here when you get back.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F022
label: ang
text: That's how you want to leave it?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M024
label: sad
text: I don't know how else to leave it.  What, do you want me to lie to you?

name: Ses04F_impro02_M025
label: sad
text: You want me tell you that I'm okay with it?

name: Ses04F_impro02_F023
label: sad
text: I want you to be okay with it as much as you can be.  I mean it's not a great situation but we don't have an option here.

name: Ses04F_impro02_M026
label: sad
text: Well I can't be okay with it the same way you can't not go.  It just doesn't work that way.

name: Ses04F_impro02_F024
label: sad
text: Fine.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F000
label: exc
text: I have something to tell you.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M000
label: neu
text: What?  You seem so excited.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F001
label: exc
text: It's really exciting.  Don't you want to guess?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M001
label: neu
text: Uh, you got a new car, a new house. Uh, a dog.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F002
label: exc
text: Look.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M002
label: sur
text: Are you serious?  You're getting married.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F003
label: exc
text: Yes.  He finally proposed.  I'm getting married.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M003
label: exc
text: Holy shit that's amazing.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F004
label: exc
text: I know. I'm so-

name: Ses04F_impro03_M004
label: exc
text: Congratulations.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F005
label: exc
text: Thank you. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro03_M005
label: exc
text: I'm invited, right.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F006
label: exc
text: You think. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro03_M006
label: xxx
text: I'll have to, uh, I'll have to get myself a new tux.  My, uh, the old one is a little worn and dirty.  That's awesome.  Where are you guys going to have it?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F007
label: exc
text: Well actually we were just talking about today and I don't really want to do like the traditional church thing, you know.  So we are going to get married in the meadow.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F008
label: xxx
text: Do you remember up by Yosemite? Yeah.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M007
label: xxx
text: Well, that's- that's- that's beautiful. That's a beautiful place to do it.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F009
label: exc
text: We're going to get married in the middle of a meadow. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro03_F010
label: hap
text: Everybody's going to come up. We're going to stay in all the pretty cabins up there and, um, everybody's going to have, you know, really flowery sort of naturey stuff.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F011
label: exc
text: So pretty.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M008
label: xxx
text: That's great

name: Ses04F_impro03_M009
label: xxx
text: I hope- they're not like

name: Ses04F_impro03_F012
label: hap
text: Very Midsummer Night's wedding.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M010
label: xxx
text: Right.  Nice.  That's great.  I hope while we're up there nobody gets attacked by any, like, bears or wolves or anything.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F013
label: exc
text: Thanks. Thanks a lot.  You're really helping the Excitement here. I hope no one dies.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M011
label: xxx
text: Well no, I am- I'm trying to be positive

name: Ses04F_impro03_M012
label: xxx
text: I'm trying to be positive.  I'm trying to say I hope that doesn't happen.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F014
label: exc
text: Okey Well- well-, you know what?  I was hoping that you would help

name: Ses04F_impro03_M013
label: xxx
text: We're going to be in the middle of the wilderness. These kind of things happen

name: Ses04F_impro03_F015
label: exc
text: plan everything.  So then you can make sure that no one gets attacked by bears.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M014
label: exc
text: Yeah.  I'll help plan.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F016
label: exc
text: Yeah?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M015
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F017
label: exc
text: Really?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M016
label: xxx
text: Sure.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F018
label: exc
text: Okay.  It's going to be in, like, six months.  So we don't have a really long time.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M017
label: xxx
text: I'm thinking greens, lots of greens. Greens and browns.  We're nature.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F019
label: xxx
text: Okay.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F020
label: xxx
text: No.  No browns.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M018
label: neu
text: Why not browns?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F021
label: xxx
text: It's a wedding.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M019
label: neu
text: It's a light brown, tanish.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F022
label: xxx
text: Blue for the sky.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F023
label: xxx
text: Come on.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M020
label: neu
text: I just think browns are really what you want to go with.  I mean I think there's more contrast between brown and green than there is-

name: Ses04F_impro03_F024
label: xxx
text: who- Who's getting married though?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M021
label: neu
text: I know but you just asked me to-

name: Ses04F_impro03_F025
label: xxx
text: to help plan because I'm getting married. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro03_M022
label: xxx
text: So we're going to go greens and browns.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F026
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M023
label: fru
text: Come on.  Please will you do the greens and browns, just the browns for me?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M024
label: xxx
text: Just for me.  Come on.  I'm your best friend.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F027
label: xxx
text: It's not your wedding. You can-

name: Ses04F_impro03_M025
label: xxx
text: I'm your best friend

name: Ses04F_impro03_F028
label: xxx
text: You know what? You know what?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M026
label: xxx
text: Give me the browns.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F029
label: xxx
text: You can't ruin my mood today.  If you want to wear a brown tux, you go ahead and wear a brown tux

name: Ses04F_impro03_M027
label: neu
text: Okay.  Fine.  So green and what?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F030
label: xxx
text: but bridesmaids aren't wearing brown and I'm not wearing brown.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M028
label: neu
text: Blue?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F031
label: xxx
text: Maybe

name: Ses04F_impro03_M029
label: neu
text: Okay, fine. Greens and blues.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F032
label: xxx
text: I like blue.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M030
label: neu
text: Greens and blues and maybe a little light yellow?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F033
label: xxx
text: That would work.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M031
label: neu
text: Yeah?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F034
label: exc
text: Throw in a little- little, uh, trim in yellow.  Maybe some yellow flowers.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M032
label: neu
text: Okay.  That sounds good. Um, and, uh, we're going to get like a five, uh, story cake, right?

name: Ses04F_impro03_F035
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  I hadn't actually thought about the cake yet, but

name: Ses04F_impro03_M033
label: neu
text: I mean, you know, you're going to have at least, like, two hundred and fifty people come.  So we're going to need, you know, just a huge buffet.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F036
label: exc
text: Yes.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M034
label: neu
text: Fried chicken, mashed potatoes.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F037
label: xxx
text: See this is why you have to help.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F038
label: exc
text: because you're going to take care of everything.  You're going to think of all the details that I forget.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M035
label: neu
text: Well I can't be in charge of this.  I mean I got things I got to do.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F039
label: xxx
text: Well right but you can help.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M036
label: exc
text: Well this is really exciting.  I mean- I just- I couldn't be happier right now.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M037
label: exc
text: I'm thrilled.  God.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F040
label: exc
text: Ha ha ha.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F041
label: exc
text: Ha ha.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M038
label: exc
text: Just ecstatic.  I can't believe you're my best friend

name: Ses04F_impro03_F042
label: exc
text: Just couldn't be any cooler.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M039
label: exc
text: You're my best friend, we're growing up and now you're getting married. that's amazing

name: Ses04F_impro03_F043
label: exc
text: I know.  I've been waiting forever.  I can't believe it's finally happening.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M040
label: exc
text: Wow.  I just- I- I- I feel like I'm going to faint.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M041
label: exc
text: I'm so- all the blood

name: Ses04F_impro03_F044
label: exc
text: You don't look like you're going to faint.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M042
label: exc
text: has just rushed to my head, and I, and I mean honestly.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M043
label: exc
text: I'm getting a little weak in the knees.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F045
label: exc
text: So- So when are you getting married Mr. Excited?

name: Ses04F_impro03_M044
label: xxx
text: You know that I've never-I- I have a long run of bad relationships but, you know, I mean, you got to work through it.  It's fine.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F046
label: xxx
text: What about Kathy?  I mean you guys have been dating for a while.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M045
label: xxx
text: Yeah, but

name: Ses04F_impro03_F047
label: exc
text: You haven't ruined it yet.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M046
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  I know but it's, you know, maybe we'll get married.  I don't know.  Should be pretty-

name: Ses04F_impro03_F048
label: exc
text: You really like

name: Ses04F_impro03_M047
label: neu
text: I don't know.  Okay.  I mean gosh.  There's just- look there's a lot of pressure in getting married, okay.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F049
label: xxx
text: What?  She could be just as excited as I am right now.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F050
label: exc
text: You could make her that excited.  You really like her.  You guys have been together for a really long time now.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M048
label: xxx
text: Oh, I've made her that excited.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F051
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER] That's more than I needed to know.

name: Ses04F_impro03_M049
label: xxx
text: What?  You've heard me talk about it before.

name: Ses04F_impro03_F052
label: exc
text: [laughter]

name: Ses04F_impro03_M050
label: xxx
text: I'm a monster in bed.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M000
label: hap
text: What time is it?  They're supposed to run around midnight.  This is great isn't it?  Look at this night we've got here.  It couldn't be better.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M001
label: xxx
text: Actually, I wanted to go a little farther up the coast, get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid to miss it.  How you doing?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F000
label: neu
text: Fine.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M002
label: exc
text: Is that, is that-that's just foam isn't it?  I can't even tell

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M003
label: xxx
text: although if you can't tell, it probably isn't them.  It will probably be unmistakable.  Don't you think?  How you doing?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M004
label: fru
text: Oh, no you know what I did?  I forgot my flashlight.  How could I be so stupid I forgot my flashlight.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F001
label: xxx
text: What flashlight?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M005
label: fru
text: The flashlight, the silver one.  There's only one isn't there?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F002
label: fru
text: It's not yours.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M006
label: sur
text: Whose is it?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F003
label: xxx
