text: It's ours.  It's mine too.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M007
label: fru
text: Well sure.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F004
label: xxx
text: You kept saying my flashlight as if it somehow is just yours.  How's that supposed to make me feel?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M008
label: fru
text: No of course our flashlight, yours and mine, mi flashlight es su flashlight naturally.  How could we not think to bring it?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M009
label: exc
text: I hope the moon stays out.  I wonder do they always run during a full moon.  I can't remember if it was full last year.  Remember?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F005
label: xxx
text: Yes.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M010
label: neu
text: Are you cold?  Do you want my jacket?  We should have brought the blanket, our blanket.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M011
label: hap
text: Ah, this is great, isn't it?  I didn't even think to bring a six-pack.  A six-pack would be just the ticket right about now.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M012
label: xxx
text: I can't believe I forgot.  I'm like a kid.  It's amazing I got out of the house with my fly zipped.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M013
label: xxx
text: Oh, I wonder if they can hear me talk or feel the vibrations in the sand when we move around?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F006
label: xxx
text: I'm cold.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Do you want my jacket?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F007
label: ang
text: It's after eleven let's go home.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M015
label: fru
text: Are you kidding?  We'd miss it.  We just got here.  What's the point of coming down here if we just turn around and go home?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F008
label: ang
text: There is no point in coming down here.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M016
label: fru
text: Right.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F009
label: fru
text: That's my point.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M017
label: neu
text: That's my point too.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F010
label: fru
text: So let's go home.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M018
label: fru
text: No, no, no.  That's not my point.  My point is is that there's no point in coming down here if we just leave.  Don't you want to see it?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F011
label: fru
text: Not particularly.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M019
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F012
label: ang
text: I just don't.  It's stupid.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M020
label: fru
text: Honey this is natural phenomenon.  I mean this only happens once a year.  This is a great opportunity.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M021
label: exc
text: Think about the people in Kansas.  They'd have to get plane tickets and hotel reservations to come see this.  We're just forty minutes away.  It's too good to pass up.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F013
label: ang
text: Pass up what?  These little fish swim onto the beach, flop around, and then swim away and then they die.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M022
label: fru
text: Yeah but that moment on the beach is the highlight of their little lives.  All that flopping around is laying eggs or what do you, spawning or mating something like that.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M023
label: exc
text: This is the big night for these guys.  Life's last orgy.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F014
label: ang
text: What are you so excited about?  This isn't a moon landing we're talking about.  It's fish.  It's fish nobody even eats.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M024
label: fru
text: Yeah, they do.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F015
label: fru
text: Oh, Augie.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M025
label: fru
text: Okay but it's fish who do something none of the other fish do

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M026
label: exc
text: like the swallows returning to Capistrano or the lemmings throwing themselves off the cliffs, like that.  There's mystery here and magic

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M027
label: fru
text: a little bit of the unexplainable.  I don't see how you cannot be interested.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F016
label: ang
text: I'm just not.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M028
label: sur
text: For real?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F017
label: ang
text: Yes.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M029
label: fru
text: I don't get it.  The first time we came here to see it you said it was the best night of your life and last year I remember distinctly you were so excited to get here.  You stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Last year you will also remember our shoes got wet.  I got sand in my panties.  We got in a big fight over nothing.  You got a sore throat and we did not see the Grunions.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M030
label: fru
text: We weren't in a good spot.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F019
label: ang
text: We didn't see them the first time either.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M031
label: ang
text: We just weren't in a good spot.  This is a much better spot.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M032
label: exc
text: I've got good instincts for these things.  Look there. What's that.  Is that?  Is that, is that-no it's just seaweed isn't it.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M033
label: exc
text: Ah, man this is great.  I wouldn't miss this for anything.  I mean think about this.  I know you're not interested but just think about this for a minute.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M034
label: exc
text: Out there someplace there's this huge mass of silver fish heading this way.  They don't know why.  We don't know why.  It wasn't a decision.  They didn't take a vote.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M035
label: exc
text: No one sent them a map or an invitation.  Just some little instinctual time release firecracker went off in their little bodies and all as one. They turned and formed a line as long as the California coast and started swimming.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M036
label: exc
text: They're swimming right now as if that's the only thing that matters.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M037
label: exc
text: It's single mindedness with no mind.  Urgency that's pure urge.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M038
label: exc
text: They don't know what drives them.  They don't give it a name or ask question.  They just turn as one and start the swim that brings them here to this place

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M039
label: exc
text: where we stand for massive celebration of sex and death.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M040
label: exc
text: Ah, I'm giving myself goose bumps.  All my hairs are popping up.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F020
label: fru
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M041
label: xxx
text: Well so what do you think?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F021
label: ang
text: About what?

name: Ses04F_script02_1_M042
label: xxx
text: What I said.

name: Ses04F_script02_1_F022
label: ang
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M000
label: neu
text: Yeah, hi.  Um, look, I -- all I'm trying to do right now is renew my license plate.  That's all.  I just need to get one of those little stickers.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F000
label: neu
text: Okay.  What's the problem?

name: Ses04M_impro01_M001
label: fru
text: And I've- I've- some lady -- I got in line.  I waited for about two hours um, and, I gave her this form

name: Ses04M_impro01_M002
label: fru
text: that she gave to me earlier. And she said oh, I gave you the wrong one by accident.  So I was hoping I could just fill out a new one, give it to you and sort of skip this whole line business.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F001
label: neu
text: Okay, um.  Do you have your photo ID with you?

name: Ses04M_impro01_M003
label: neu
text: Yes, I do.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F002
label: neu
text: Okay.  This is the wrong form.  I'm sorry.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M004
label: fru
text: This is -- okay, then just can I have the form that I need.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F003
label: fru
text: I don't have the form.  You're going to have to go get in that line over there and they will give you the right form.  And after you fill it out, you can bring it back to me.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M005
label: fru
text: Don't you -- you don't have-

name: Ses04M_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: are you telling me you don't have a stack of them behind the desk?

name: Ses04M_impro01_F004
label: fru
text: I don't have any of

name: Ses04M_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: I don't have any of them over here.  You're gonna have to go get in that line over there.  And they will give you a copy of the form.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: But you're -- it's the same -- I mean, you can -- like I can't go behind your desk--

name: Ses04M_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: Nope, I don't. I don't have-

name: Ses04M_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: or I can't go behind there- you can go behind this person's desk and just grab the form. So if you could just do that; that would help me out a lot.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: No, I can't. That's-

name: Ses04M_impro01_F008
label: fru
text: I'm sorry.  You have to do things the way you have to do things here.  We have rules.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: Look, can you please just-- --make this -- look, I look--

name: Ses04M_impro01_F009
label: fru
text: Go get in that-- Sir-- Sir, there are people in line behind you. you need

name: Ses04M_impro01_M010
label: fru
text: look-- It's  been- it's been two hours.  Can you please just make this easier on me and just go and get the form?  It's not- it's really not

name: Ses04M_impro01_F010
label: fru
text: I'm sorry.  I'm sorry you're having a hard time,

name: Ses04M_impro01_F011
label: fru
text: but you're gonna have to go get in  that line to

name: Ses04M_impro01_M011
label: fru
text: What if I pay you money?

name: Ses04M_impro01_M012
label: fru
text: Can I pay you money?  Can I give you, like, twenty bucks and you'll go back there and get the form?

name: Ses04M_impro01_F012
label: neu
text: twenty bucks? Please. Go get in that line over there.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M013
label: fru
text: Come on.  Will you please?  I just --I look, I  cannot-- --just if I --

name: Ses04M_impro01_F013
label: fru
text: Look, I'm having a really bad day.  I'm off in twenty minutes and I just really don't need this right now, okay.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M014
label: fru
text: I don't care, well- You're having a bad -- I just waited in line for two hours.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F014
label: fru
text: And you're gonna have to go wait again, because that's the line you need.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M015
label: xxx
text: Well I just -- I can't do that right -- can you please just grab the form? All you have to do is grab the form.  I'm not gonna ask anything else of you.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F015
label: fru
text: I can't do that. It's against our rules. You can go get in that line over there or you can just go ahead and leave and come back another day.  Maybe there will be a shorter line.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M016
label: fru
text: That's all I- I just- That's all i want you to-

name: Ses04M_impro01_M017
label: fru
text: Rules, you just have to grab a piece of paper behind from somebody's desk

name: Ses04M_impro01_M018
label: ang
text: It's not rocket science.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M019
label: fru
text: Come -- just, please, just grab the form.  It's right over there.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F016
label: fru
text: I can't do that.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M020
label: xxx
text: I know it's right over there.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M021
label: fru
text: Why are you being such a bitch?

name: Ses04M_impro01_F017
label: fru
text: I'm sorry, but I can't do that.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M022
label: fru
text: Please, will you please -- will you please just grab the form?

name: Ses04M_impro01_F018
label: ang
text: So go get in the other line or leave.  Or I will have you escorted out by security.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F019
label: ang
text: Would you like to be kicked out of the D.M.V.?  You don't think that'll be a little embarrassing?

name: Ses04M_impro01_M023
label: fru
text: Fine, which line is it?

name: Ses04M_impro01_F020
label: fru
text: The one you just came from.

name: Ses04M_impro01_M024
label: ang
text: Okay, fine.  I'll go over there.  Thanks, a lot.  You've been really helpful.

name: Ses04M_impro01_F021
label: ang
text: Yeah.  Thank you.  Have a pleasant day.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M000
label: fea
text: Good God.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F000
label: xxx
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M001
label: fea
text: I wonder.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F001
label: fea
text: Nobody knows we're here, except Freda and she wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M002
label: fea
text: It must be them, then.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F002
label: fea
text: What are we to do?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M003
label: neu
text: We'll be alright, darling.  Whatever happens, aren't we?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F003
label: xxx
text: Now and always sweet.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M004
label: exc
text: I don't care, then.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F004
label: xxx
text: It was bound to come sooner or later.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M005
label: xxx
text: Hello, hello.  What?  Wrong number.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F005
label: exc
text: Oh, it sent shivers up my spine.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M006
label: exc
text: What shall we do if they suddenly walk in on us?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F006
label: exc
text: Behave exquisitely.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M007
label: exc
text: With the mo- with the most perfect poise?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F007
label: exc
text: Certainly.  I shall probably do a court curtsey.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Ah.  Things that ought to matter dreadfully don't matter when one's happy, do they?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F008
label: exc
text: But what's so horrible is that one can't stay happy.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M009
label: xxx
text: Don't say that, darling.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F009
label: exc
text: It's true.  The whole business is a very poor joke.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M010
label: neu
text: Meaning that sacred and beautiful thing, love?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F010
label: xxx
text: Yes, meaning just that.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M011
label: xxx
text: What does it all mean?  That's what I ask myself in my ceaseless quest for ultimate truth.  Dear God, what does it all mean?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F011
label: xxx
text: Don't laugh at me.  I'm serious.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M012
label: neu
text: You mustn't be serious, my dear.  That's just what they want.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F012
label: exc
text: Who's they?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M013
label: ang
text: All the futile moralists who try to make life unbearable.  Laugh at them.  Be flippant.  Laugh at everything.  All their sacred shibboleths.  Flippancy brings out the acid- acid in their damn sweetness and light.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F013
label: neu
text: If I laugh at everything, I must laugh at us, too.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Certainly you must.  We're figures of fun alright.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F014
label: exc
text: How long will it last, this ludicrous and overbearing love of ours?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M015
label: xxx
text: Who knows.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F015
label: exc
text: Shall we always want to bicker and fight?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M016
label: sad
text: No.  That fire will fade along with our passion.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Oh, dear.  Should we like that.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M017
label: xxx
text: It all depends on how well we've played.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F017
label: exc
text: What happens if one of us dies?  Does the one that's left, still laugh?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M018
label: xxx
text: Yes.  Yes, with all his might.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F018
label: exc
text: Well that's serious enough, isn't it?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M019
label: xxx
text: No, no, it isn't.  Death's very laughable; such a cunning little mystery, all done with mirrors.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F019
label: xxx
text: Darling, I believe you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M020
label: xxx
text: So is everyone else in the long run.  Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers.  Let's blow trumpets and squeakers and- and enjoy the party as much as we can, like very small, quite idiotic little school children.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M021
label: exc
text: Let's savor the delight of the moment.  Come and kiss me, darling, before your body rots and worms pop in and out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Elliot, worms don't pop.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M022
label: xxx
text: I don't mind what you do, see?  You can paint yourself bright green all over and dance naked in the Place Vendome and rush off madly with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F021
label: exc
text: Thank you, dear.  The same applies to you, except that if I catch you so much as looking at another woman, I will kill you.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: Do you remember that awful scene we had in Venice?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F022
label: exc
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M024
label: xxx
text: The one when you bought that little painted wooded snake and put it on my bed?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F023
label: exc
text: Oh, Charles; that was his name, Charles.  Oh, he did wriggle so beautifully.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M025
label: ang
text: Horrible thing.  I hated it.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F024
label: exc
text: I know you did.  You threw it out of the window into the Grand Canal.  I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M026
label: xxx
text: How long did that row last?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F025
label: exc
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M027
label: xxx
text: The worst one was in Cannes when your curling irons burnt holes in my dressing gown.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F026
label: exc
text: It burnt my comb, too, and all the towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M028
label: neu
text: Line?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M029
label: exc
text: How -- that was a rouser wasn't it?

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F027
label: exc
text: That was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M030
label: xxx
text: I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F028
label: exc
text: The manager came in and found is rolling about on the floor, biting and scratching like panthers.  Oh, dear.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M031
label: xxx
text: Ah, I shall never forget his face.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F029
label: exc
text: How ridiculous. How utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M032
label: xxx
text: Yes.  We were very much younger then.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_F030
label: exc
text: And very much sillier.

name: Ses04M_script03_1_M033
label: neu
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M000
label: xxx
text: So, um, well, I just -- I kind of wanted to, you know, tell you that I'm actually -- I proposed to Kate and we're going to get married.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F000
label: xxx
text: Wait, what?

name: Ses04M_impro03_M001
label: xxx
text: Yeah. Yeah, I proposed to her yesterday. We're getting -- we're engaged now and we're going to -- we're going to get married in about eight months.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F001
label: xxx
text: Oh, my God.  Congratulations.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M002
label: exc
text: Yeah, it's pretty amazing, huh?

name: Ses04M_impro03_F002
label: exc
text: I can't -- how did you do it?  What happened?

name: Ses04M_impro03_M003
label: xxx
text: Well I decided to take her sailing

name: Ses04M_impro03_M004
label: xxx
text: and we were just out on the water and, you know, I just -- I had the ring with me.  And I was like let's do this.  And she was like okay and then we're getting married.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F003
label: exc
text: [LAUGHTER] Well you paint a romantic picture.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M005
label: hap
text: Well I didn't want it to be like cheesy, you know.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F004
label: exc
text: Did she cry?

name: Ses04M_impro03_M006
label: hap
text: She didn't cry, but she was laughing a lot and it was very exciting, so...

name: Ses04M_impro03_F005
label: exc
text: Oh, my God.  How long have you been planning on doing this?

name: Ses04M_impro03_M007
label: hap
text: Honestly, it was kind of quickly.  It was actually only in the past couple months.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F006
label: exc
text: I can't believe this.  You're getting married. It's crazy!

name: Ses04M_impro03_M008
label: hap
text: Yeah. Yeah. So- I know.  I know. I know.  It's weird 'cause it's like the beginning of the rest of my life, you know.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F007
label: exc
text: Yeah, it is.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M009
label: hap
text: But uh- no, I mean, you know.  You know, I really want you to like, you know, sort of

name: Ses04M_impro03_M010
label: xxx
text: help Kate out with like planning stuff. I mean, if you want to.  I mean, you guys are good friends anyway so I figured, you know, if you guys want to like -- I mean, you know, I'm sure you enjoy that kind of thing.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F008
label: exc
text: Yeah, I would love to. Thanks. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04M_impro03_M011
label: exc
text: Okay. Well there you go.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F009
label: exc
text: Oh, my God, where -- have you guys talked about where you're going to get married or--

name: Ses04M_impro03_M012
label: xxx
text: I think we're going to -- we're going to -- we want to do it in Hawaii and just fly everybody in.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F010
label: exc
text: Oh, my God.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M013
label: xxx
text: I just -- 'cause, I mean, Hawaii just has like the best fruit buffets.  And so I'm just going to say forget, you know, all like kind of meats and all that stuff.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M014
label: xxx
text: It's just going to be like a all fruit--fruit buffet wedding, plus a cake.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F011
label: exc
text: Are you going to get married like on the beach barefoot or like fancier?  Like in a church.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M015
label: exc
text: Barefoot?

name: Ses04M_impro03_F012
label: exc
text: Well I don't know.  Throwing it out there.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M016
label: xxx
text: Um, no, no, no.  It'll be in like a park near the beach.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F013
label: xxx
text: Okay.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M017
label: exc
text: Yeah.  But I'm really excited.  So and everybody's going to come out and it'll be a great time.  And--

name: Ses04M_impro03_F014
label: xxx
text: Are you going to have a big wedding or like keep it really small like just, you know, family and really close friends?  Or, I mean--

name: Ses04M_impro03_M018
label: xxx
text: It'll be kind of small, but not, you know, not tiny, you know.  I want to have, you know, as many people as we can afford to fly out to Hawaii and put up there for--

name: Ses04M_impro03_F015
label: exc
text: It's so exciting.  What's the ring look like?

name: Ses04M_impro03_M019
label: exc
text: It's big and shiny.  I don't know.  It's silver and--

name: Ses04M_impro03_F016
label: exc
text: Big and shiny.  You're such a guy. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04M_impro03_M020
label: hap
text: Yeah, I don't know. [LAUGHTER] But, yeah, so anyway -- well I wanted to tell you that, you know, 'cause you're one of my good friends and you're Kate's- one of her best friends and-

name: Ses04M_impro03_F017
label: exc
text: I'm so excited for you. That's great. I'm so-

name: Ses04M_impro03_M021
label: hap
text: Yeah, yeah. She was actually -- she was going to tell you but I told her that I wanted to tell you and she had to work today anyway, so I decided to-

name: Ses04M_impro03_F018
label: xxx
text: Well I'm glad you told me.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M022
label: hap
text: Yeah, yeah.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F019
label: exc
text: It's fantastic.  I -- congratulations. It's amazing.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M023
label: exc
text: Thank you.  I'm really -- I'm really excited.  And it's -- I don't know, it's like a little -- it's like a little scary, 'cause I'm like, ah, you know, it's the first time I've ever done anything like this.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M024
label: hap
text: But, you know, it's like I really love her and I really just -- I can't imagine spending my life with anybody else but her.  So, you know, it's like I know that's the right thing.  And if you have to, you know, if you have to question that, you know, don't- don't do it.  So we're going to do it.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M025
label: hap
text: And it's going to -- the -- you know, I told her that I just -- I want the color brown to be as an integral in the wedding.  And, um, maybe some greens and blues.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F020
label: xxx
text: And how did she feel about that?

name: Ses04M_impro03_M026
label: hap
text: She's okay with it.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F021
label: xxx
text: Well that's good.  It'll be a great wedding.  You're willing to compromise on things.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M027
label: xxx
text: Exactly, exactly, exactly.  So--

name: Ses04M_impro03_F022
label: xxx
text: She's going to let you have say in the wedding choices?  That's pretty impressive. Very forward-thinking woman. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04M_impro03_M028
label: hap
text: Well, I mean I just told her--Well I just said, you know, hey, these are my suggestions.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F023
label: xxx
text: And brown.

name: Ses04M_impro03_M029
label: hap
text: All fruit and the color brown. Just that. That's all- that's my only request.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F024
label: hap
text: This is why men don't plan weddings. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04M_impro03_M030
label: hap
text: Yeah.  Well maybe--maybe you're right. Maybe there's something to that.

name: Ses04M_impro03_F025
label: exc
text: All fruit and brown. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04M_impro03_M031
label: neu
text: So, um, anyway, do you want to order now?   So, um I mean--

name: Ses04F_impro04_M000
label: xxx
text: Hey.  Get out of the way.  I'm watching TV.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F000
label: neu
text: That's helpful.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F001
label: fru
text: I just don't think I can do this anymore.  It's been a really long time and it's not like I'm not trying.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M001
label: neu
text: Well I guess you're not trying hard enough.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F002
label: fru
text: I am try-  it's been three years

name: Ses04F_impro04_F003
label: fru
text: and I have gone everywhere I can think of.  I have given resumes.  I have done interviews.  I've tried to pull in favors.  I've asked everybody I know for help.  I don't know what else to do.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M002
label: neu
text: Just, I don't know, maybe you're not smart enough.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M003
label: neu
text: I mean I don't know just go out and keep trying. Just-

name: Ses04F_impro04_M004
label: neu
text: I don't know.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F004
label: fru
text: Okay but I've been trying for three years.  Three years and I haven't gotten a bite much less actually gotten hired, and I am smart enough.  Thank you very much.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M005
label: neu
text: Hey.  Look, I mean- you know.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F005
label: ang
text: I'm really good at what I do.  I just don't know how to make someone else see that.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M006
label: neu
text: Look bananas don't grow overnight.  Okay.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F006
label: ang
text: What?  Who says that?  Bananas don't grow overnight.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M007
label: neu
text: You need that- Time-

name: Ses04F_impro04_M008
label: neu
text: You know- You need to just- you need, I mean it takes time to get a good job.  I mean-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F007
label: fru
text: Okay.  I think three years is a little excessive.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M009
label: neu
text: look at me, like, you know. I mean, Hey, I- it took me, you know, like six years to get where I am now. I mean-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F008
label: ang
text: Yeah but you weren't unemployed for three years trying to find any job.  I mean at this point I'm going to go drive a cab or, you know, work at the gas station or something.  I don't even- I don't know what to do anymore.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M010
label: fru
text: I don't know.  I mean whatever.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F009
label: fru
text: Nothing I'm trying seems to work. Just-

name: Ses04F_impro04_M011
label: xxx
text: Clearly.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F010
label: xxx
text: Okay that's helpful.  Thanks.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M012
label: xxx
text: Look I'm sorry okay. It's just-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F011
label: ang
text: Clearly everything you're doing is completely wrong.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M013
label: neu
text: I mean, well I mean i don't know; it doesn't really affect my life, you know.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F012
label: fru
text: Well don't you understand that this is-

name: Ses04F_impro04_M014
label: neu
text: Yeah, I understand, but-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F013
label: ang
text: I don't even- I mean you have to have some kind of an idea.  Something you could possibly throw out there that I could maybe use.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M015
label: neu
text: I don't know. Well like, I don't know. I mean-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F014
label: ang
text: I mean it's not like this is an

name: Ses04F_impro04_F015
label: ang
text: extreme request.  I want to find a job.  Everybody wants to find a job. It's really not that.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M016
label: neu
text: Clearly- cle- clearly you're doing something wrong.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F016
label: ang
text: Okay. Okay, Fine.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M017
label: neu
text: 'Cause if you've been looking, you've been applying for jobs for three years. And-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F017
label: ang
text: Okey So I'm doing something wrong.  What am I doing wrong?

name: Ses04F_impro04_F018
label: ang
text: I'm really good at what I do.  I'm smart.  I'm trained.  I have the education.  I'm talented.  I cannot-

name: Ses04F_impro04_M018
label: neu
text: Are you- I mean do you like get dressed up and everything when you go to the job interview?

name: Ses04F_impro04_F019
label: fru
text: Well yeah I mean I like take a shower and stuff.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M019
label: neu
text: And you like- you know, you shave your legs and everything?

name: Ses04F_impro04_F020
label: fru
text: [LAUGHTER] Yeah.  Usually.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M020
label: neu
text: and I want- I mean you know you've got to, like, do your hair.  I mean- I don't know, it's like,

name: Ses04F_impro04_F021
label: fru
text: Yeah, I- I make my

name: Ses04F_impro04_F022
label: fru
text: I make myself very presentable before I go to any kind of interview.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M021
label: neu
text: you know what I mean? You know, it's like they say presentation is, like eighty percent.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M022
label: neu
text: or some- some large percent of- of success.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F023
label: fru
text: Uhuh. Uhuh. Yeah, yeah. Good quote.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M023
label: neu
text: Because I don't know I mean just, you know, just keep- keep- keep at it.  Keep trying.  Go-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F024
label: fru
text: Buck-O. That's really helpful.  Just keep chugging along.  The little engine that could.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M024
label: xxx
text: What do you want me to? Look, Hey look if I could- Don't get all sassy.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F025
label: ang
text: Well you- just you're doing something wrong.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M025
label: fru
text: Look if I could give you a job,if I could give you a job I would but I mean I'm not in that position. I'm-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F026
label: fru
text: Well maybe you could help.  I mean you've got a job.  I'm willing to look outside of my realm.  I could try something else.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M026
label: neu
text: Hey, I'd love to help you but I- you don't have the kind of training that I-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F027
label: fru
text: I'll get it.  I just need a job.  I don't care what it is.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M027
label: fru
text: So, go to McDonalds.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F028
label: fru
text: Well I mean I need to make a little bit more than the minimum wage fry flipper.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M028
label: neu
text: Well you've got to start somewhere.  I mean-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F029
label: fru
text: I did start somewhere.  I worked my way up.  I'm not going to start at the bottom again.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M029
label: fru
text: Well you're going to have to.  You don't really have an option.  What's your problem?

name: Ses04F_impro04_F030
label: ang
text: What's my problem?  What's my problem? I don't have a job.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M030
label: neu
text: I don't know it's like I'm trying to be-

name: Ses04F_impro04_F031
label: ang
text: I thought I was pretty clear about what the problem was.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M031
label: neu
text: I'm trying to be helpful.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M032
label: xxx
text: I'm trying to be helpful and you're just, like, coming at me with, like, attacks.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F032
label: fru
text: Well maybe you could be a little helpful.  I mean obviously you don't have any problems so would it really take so much time out of your day to just go ahead and help somebody else.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M033
label: neu
text: I'm trying to watch TV.

name: Ses04F_impro04_M034
label: xxx
text: I'm trying to watch TV. TV.

name: Ses04F_impro04_F033
label: fru
text: That's important.  That's really important.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F000
label: xxx
text: You're the only one I know who loves his parents.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M000
label: xxx
text: I know it went out of style didn't it?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F001
label: xxx
text: It's okay.  It's a good thing.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F002
label: xxx
text: You know it's lovely here.  The air is sweet.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M001
label: xxx
text: You're not sorry you came.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F003
label: xxx
text: Not sorry, no but I'm not staying.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M002
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F004
label: xxx
text: In the first place, your mother as much as told me to go.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M003
label: xxx
text: Well.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F005
label: xxx
text: You saw that and you- you've been kind of-

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M004
label: ang
text: What?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F006
label: xxx
text: Well kind of embarrassed ever since I got here.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: The trouble is I planned on sneaking up on you over a period of a week or so but they take it for granted that we're all set.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F007
label: xxx
text: I knew they would, your mother anyway.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: How did you know?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F008
label: xxx
text: From her point of view why else would I come?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: Wouldn't you want to?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M008
label: neu
text: I guess you know this is why I asked you to come.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F009
label: hap
text: I guess this is why I came.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M009
label: hap
text: Ann, I love you.  I love you a great deal.  I love you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M010
label: hap
text: I have no imagination that's all I know to tell you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M011
label: hap
text: I'm embarrassing you.  I didn't want to tell it to you here.  I

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M012
label: xxx
text: wanted some place we'd never been, a place where we'd be brand new to each other.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M013
label: xxx
text: You think this is wrong, this chair, this yard.  I want you to be ready for me.  I don't want to win you away from anything.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F010
label: hap
text: Chris, I've been ready a long, long time.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M014
label: neu
text: And he's gone forever.  You're sure?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F011
label: xxx
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M015
label: xxx
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: You started to write me.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M016
label: xxx
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F013
label: hap
text: Every day since.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M017
label: xxx
text: Ann, why didn't you let me know?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F014
label: hap
text: I was waiting for you, Chris.  Till then you never wrote and then when you did what did you say.  I mean you sure can be ambiguous you know.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M018
label: hap
text: Give me a kiss, Ann.  Give me a-God I kissed you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M019
label: hap
text: I kissed Annie.  How long, how long I've been waiting to kiss you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F015
label: hap
text: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait all these years?  All I've done is sit and wonder if I was crazy for thinking of you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M020
label: hap
text: Annie, we're going to live now.  I'm going to make you so happy.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F016
label: xxx
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M021
label: xxx
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you, Chris.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F018
label: xxx
text: What is it Chris?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M022
label: xxx
text: Let's drive some place.  I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F019
label: xxx
text: No.  What is it Chris, your mother?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: No, nothing like that.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F020
label: xxx
text: Well then what's wrong?  Even in your letters there was something ashamed.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M024
label: sad
text: Yes.  I suppose I have been but it's going from me.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F021
label: xxx
text: You've got to tell me.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M025
label: fru
text: I don't know where to start.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F022
label: xxx
text: It wouldn't work this way.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: There's so many things mixed up.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: You remember overseas I was in command of a company?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F023
label: neu
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M028
label: sad
text: Well I lost them.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F024
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F025
label: xxx
text: Oh, gees.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: It takes a lot of time to toss that off because they weren't just men.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M031
label: sad
text: For instance, one time it had been raining several days and this kid came to me and gave me his last pair of dry socks.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M032
label: sad
text: I put them in my pocket. that's only a little thing but these are the kind of guys I had.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: They didn't die.  They killed themselves for each other.  I mean that exactly.  A little more selfish and they'd have been here today.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M034
label: sad
text: And I got this idea watching them go down.  Everything was being destroyed see, but it seemed to me that there was one new thing that was made

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M035
label: sad
text: a sort of responsibility man for man.  You understand me?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M036
label: sad
text: And then I came home and it was amazing.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M037
label: xxx
text: There was no meaning in it here.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M038
label: xxx
text: The whole thing to them was sort of a bus accident. Then I went to work with father and that whole rat race again.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M039
label: sad
text: I felt, what you said, ashamed somehow

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M040
label: sad
text: because nobody was changed at all.  It seemed to make suckers out of a lot of guys.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M041
label: sad
text: I felt wrong to be alive, to open the new bank book, to drive the new car, to see the new refrigerator.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M042
label: xxx
text: I mean you can take those things out of war but

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M043
label: sad
text: when you drive the new car, you have to know that it came out of the love a man can have for a man.  You've got to be a little better because of that.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M044
label: sad
text: Otherwise what you have is really just loot and there's blood on it.  I didn't want to take any of it.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M045
label: sad
text: I guess that included you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F026
label: xxx
text: And do you still feel that way?

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M046
label: xxx
text: I want you now, Annie.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F027
label: xxx
text: Because you mustn't feel that way anymore because you have a right to whatever you have, Chris, do you understand, everything

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F028
label: xxx
text: that includes me.  And your money there's nothing wrong in your money.  Your father put hundreds of planes in the air.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F029
label: xxx
text: You should be proud.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_M047
label: hap
text: Annie, Annie I'm going to make a fortune for you.

name: Ses04F_script01_3_F030
label: hap
text: What'll I do with a fortune?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F000
label: neu
text: What's he going to say?  Maybe we ought to tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M000
label: neu
text: He saw it.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F001
label: xxx
text: How could he see it?  I was the first one up.  He was still in bed.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M001
label: neu
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F002
label: sur
text: When?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M002
label: xxx
text: About four this morning.  I heard it cracking and I woke up and looked out.  He was standing right there when it cracked.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four in the morning?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M003
label: xxx
text: I don't know.  After it cracked, he ran back in the house and cried in the kitchen.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F004
label: xxx
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M004
label: xxx
text: No.  I - I figured the best thing was to leave him alone.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F005
label: xxx
text: He cried hard?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M005
label: xxx
text: I heard him right through the floor of my room.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F006
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at that hour?  He's dreaming about him again.  He's walking around at night.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M006
label: xxx
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F007
label: sad
text: He's getting just like after he died.  What's the meaning in that?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M007
label: fru
text: I don't know the meaning of it, mom.  But I know one thing; we made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F008
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Being dishonest with him.  That kind of thing always pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F009
label: fru
text: What do you mean, dishonest?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M009
label: xxx
text: You know that Larry's not coming back.  And I know it.  Why do we allow him to go on thinking that we believe with him?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F010
label: fru
text: What do you want to do?  Argue with him?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M010
label: fru
text: I don't want to argue with him but it's time he realized that nobody believes Larry's alive anymore.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M011
label: xxx
text: Why shouldn't he dream of him?  Walk the nights waiting for him.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M012
label: xxx
text: Do we contradict him?  Do we say straight out that we have no hope anymore?  That we haven't had any hope for years, now.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F011
label: ang
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M013
label: ang
text: We've gotta say it to him.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F012
label: ang
text: How are you going to prove it?  Can you prove it?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M014
label: ang
text: For God's sake, three years.  Nobody comes back after three years.  It's insane.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F013
label: ang
text: To you it is and to me, but not to him.  You can talk yourself blue in the face, but there's no body and no grave, so where are you?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M015
label: xxx
text: Sit down, mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F014
label: xxx
text: The trouble is the Goddamn newspapers.  Every month some boy turns up from nowhere, so the next boy is going to be Larry.  So we have to keep--

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M016
label: fru
text: Alright, alright, alright.  Listen.  You know why I asked Annie here don't you?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F015
label: neu
text: Why?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M017
label: fru
text: You know why.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Well I've got an idea, but what's the story?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M018
label: neu
text: Going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F017
label: neu
text: Well that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: You know it's not only my business.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F018
label: ang
text: What do you want me to do?  You're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M020
label: xxx
text: Then it's alright.  I'll go ahead with it?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F019
label: neu
text: Well you want to make sure your father isn't going to have --

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: Well, then you know it's not only my business.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F020
label: fru
text: I'm just saying.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M022
label: ang
text: Sometimes you infuriate me, you know that?  Isn't it your business, too, if I tell this to father and he throws a fit about it?  You have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F021
label: ang
text: I ignore what I got to ignore.  The girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M023
label: fru
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F022
label: ang
text: From father's point of view, he's not dead.  And you have no right to take his girl.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F023
label: fru
text: Now you can go on from there if you know where to go. But I'm telling you I don't know where to go.  See, I don't know.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F024
label: fru
text: Now what can I do for you?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M024
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is but every time I reach out for something I want, I have to pull back because other people will suffer.  My whole bloody life, time after time after time.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F025
label: xxx
text: You're a considerate fellow.  There's nothing wrong in that.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M025
label: fru
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F026
label: xxx
text: Did you ask Annie yet?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M026
label: neu
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F027
label: neu
text: How do you know she'll marry you?  Maybe she feels the same way father does.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M027
label: xxx
text: Well if she does, then that's the end of it.  From her letters, I think she's forgotten him.  We'll find out.  Then we'll thrash it out with dad. Right, mom?  Don't avoid me.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F028
label: neu
text: The trouble is, you don't see enough women.  You never did.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M028
label: xxx
text: So what?  I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F029
label: ang
text: I don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M029
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F030
label: xxx
text: Well that's a good answer, but it don't answer anything.  He thinks he's coming back, Chris.  You marry that girl, you're pronouncing him dead.  Now what happens to your father?  Do you know?  Because I don't.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M030
label: fru
text: Line?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F031
label: fru
text: Alright, then, mom.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M031
label: neu
text: Alright, then, mom.  Did we skip something?  No.  Alright, then, mom.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F032
label: neu
text: Yes we did. Do you want to keep going?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M032
label: neu
text: Yeah, let's keep going.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F033
label: neu
text: Just give it some more thought.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M033
label: fru
text: I've given it three years' of thought.  I'd hope that if

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M034
label: sad
text: father forgot about Larry, we'd have a regular wedding and everything happy.  If I can't get that here, then I'll have to get out.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F034
label: ang
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M035
label: xxx
text: I'll get out.  I'll get married and live someplace else.  Maybe New York.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F035
label: ang
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M036
label: fru
text: I've been a good son too long; a good sucker.  I'm through with it.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F036
label: ang
text: You've got a business here.  What the hell is this?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M037
label: ang
text: The business?  The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F037
label: ang
text: Must you be inspired?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M038
label: ang
text: Yes.  I like getting an hour a day.  If I have to grub for money all day long, at least at evening, I want it beautiful.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M039
label: xxx
text: I want a family.  I want some kids.  I want to build something I can give myself to.  Annie's in the middle of that.  Now where do I find it?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F038
label: xxx
text: You mean -- tell me something.  You mean you'd really leave the business?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M040
label: neu
text: Yes, on this I would.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F039
label: ang
text: You don't want to think like that.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M041
label: neu
text: Then you help me stay here.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F040
label: ang
text: Alright.  But just don't think like that because what the hell did we work for?  That's all for you, Chris.  The whole shooting match is just for you.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M042
label: fru
text: I know that.  Just you help me stay here.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F041
label: ang
text: But don't think that way, you hear me?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M043
label: xxx
text: I am thinking that way.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F042
label: xxx
text: I don't understand you, do I?

name: Ses04M_script01_1_M044
label: fru
text: No, you don't.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses04M_script01_1_F043
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I can see that.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M000
label: sad
text: It's only going to be a year.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F000
label: xxx
text: It's the first year of your child's life.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M001
label: xxx
text: There's really -- there's nothing I can do.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F001
label: xxx
text: You're just fine with this?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M002
label: fru
text: There's nothing I --

name: Ses04M_impro02_F002
label: fru
text: You're just going to pick up and leave me and our baby and miss a year of our lives?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M003
label: fru
text: It's -- look, it's only a year.  It'll go by quickly.  Okay.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F003
label: xxx
text: When you get back, think of all of the things that you're going to have missed.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M004
label: fru
text: I know, but I'll be back then.  And - and- and we'll have -- we have the rest of our lives.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F004
label: xxx
text: Don't go.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M005
label: fru
text: I can't do that.  I have to go.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F005
label: fru
text: Do you want to -- do you want to leave us behind?  I mean, I don't understand why you have to do this.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M006
label: fru
text: I've made a pledge.  I can't not do this at this point.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F006
label: xxx
text: You've made a pledge to us, too.  Remember that day, we stood in front of each other and said 'til death do us part.  Put on some rings and it's supposed to mean something.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M007
label: fru
text: I know that. I know that. I know that.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M008
label: neu
text: There's nothing I can do.  I mean, I have to go.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M009
label: fru
text: And this is what I do.  This is -- I mean, this is my life.  And I know that you're part of my life, too, and I mean, it's only -- it's just going to be a year.  I'll be back.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F007
label: fru
text: Can't you ask them?  Can't you go back and ask them if you could -- I don't know if you could change  assignments or something and you could stay here?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M010
label: fru
text: It's not- it's not- It's not like that.  It's not like that.  I can't do that.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F008
label: fru
text: Why not?  You could, at least, try.  They have to understand

name: Ses04M_impro02_M011
label: fru
text: Because it's impossible.  There's -- I just can't.  I can't.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F009
label: sad
text: You won't even know your child when you come back.  This -- isn't there someone you could talk to?

name: Ses04M_impro02_F010
label: fru
text: Explain the situation to them and then you can stay here.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M012
label: fru
text: Look, honey, it's- it's- it's only going to be a year.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M013
label: fru
text: It's only going to be a year. I'm not going to miss my son's entire life.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F011
label: fru
text: And what happens if, at the end of that year, they ask you to stay longer?  Are you just going to agree?  Are you just going to absentmindedly brainwashedly do whatever it is they tell you to do?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M014
label: fru
text: I'm not going to stay more than a year.  I've  agreed to a year

name: Ses04M_impro02_F012
label: fru
text: Then why do you have to go a year at all?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M015
label: fru
text: Because I've already agreed to that.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F013
label: fru
text: Well unagree.  Tell them that you can't leave right now.  I can't do this by myself.  I can't do this without you.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M016
label: fru
text: Yes, you can.  Yes, you can.  You know you can.  You're a strong person.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F014
label: xxx
text: This is supposed to be a partnership.  We're supposed to do this together. I'm not supposed to be left here to do this by myself while you leave.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M017
label: fru
text: It is. It is. It is. It is. I'm going to write you every day.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F015
label: xxx
text: What am I supposed to do, read your letters?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M018
label: fru
text: What else can we do?  I -- we don't have a choice in this.  Do you understand?  You can't come with me and I can't stay here.  That's all there is to it.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F016
label: fru
text: There has to be something.  I mean, we can't just live with this.  It's not -- it just won't work this way.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M019
label: fru
text: We don't have a choice.  I have to do this.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F017
label: fru
text: Just tell them no.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M020
label: fru
text: I can't do it.  I'd love to.  I mean, I don't - if you understand, I don't want to stay.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M021
label: fru
text: I mean, I don't want to -- I don't want to leave.  I want to stay here with you.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F018
label: fru
text: Then, can't you please try something?  If you go and ask them and they say no, then I would understand, but you're not even willing to ask.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F019
label: fru
text: Can't you just make an effort?  Can't you just try?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M022
label: fru
text: I've asked already.  I can't go back.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M023
label: fru
text: It can't happen.  I have to go.  I want to stay really bad, but I can't.  There's just no -- I don't have an option.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F020
label: sad
text: When do you leave?

name: Ses04M_impro02_M024
label: fru
text: Next week.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F021
label: ang
text: A week.  You're giving me a week to be okay with this.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M025
label: fru
text: You can't make it out like I'm happy about this.  I mean, I didn't -- I didn't want to put you in this situation.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F022
label: fru
text: Well it doesn't seem like you're that bothered by it.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M026
label: fru
text: I am.  I mean, I don't know.  I don't know what else to tell -- you know, I mean, I can tell you.  I don't know what else to do. I mean, I've been forced into this situation.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F023
label: fru
text: If you really cared so much, you'd find a way out.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M027
label: fru
text: There's nothing I can do.  I-- I

name: Ses04M_impro02_F024
label: xxx
text: Fine, fine.  We have to be together.  If you can't stay here, then I'll go with you.  I don't care where you go.  We'll go, too.  I'm not staying behind.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M028
label: fru
text: They won't let you come along.  It's not going to happen.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F025
label: fru
text: It's a free world.  I can go where I want.  Wherever you are, that's where we're going to go.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M029
label: fru
text: Are you kidding? Please don't be difficult about this.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F026
label: xxx
text: Difficult.  You're leaving for a year. We have a newborn child and you're leaving.  I don't think I'm being difficult.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M030
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses04M_impro02_F027
label: fru
text: I'm finding a way to make it work.  And I will go wherever you go.  Whatever I have to do, I will make this work.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M031
label: fru
text: Look, I--

name: Ses04M_impro02_F028
label: fru
text: You're not really giving me a lot of options.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M032
label: fru
text: Where I'm going is not the safest place on the earth.  Okay.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F029
label: fru
text: But I'm supposed to be okay with you going there.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M033
label: fru
text: But I've been trained.  You have no training.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F030
label: xxx
text: I'm not going to stay here and wait.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M034
label: fru
text: You have to.  Do you understand me?  You have to.

name: Ses04M_impro02_F031
label: xxx
text: I can't do it.

name: Ses04M_impro02_M035
label: fru
text: Well I guess we're at a stalemate then, aren't we?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M000
label: xxx
text: Good God.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F000
label: xxx
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M001
label: fea
text: I wonder.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F001
label: xxx
text: Nobody knows we're here except Freda and she wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M002
label: fea
text: It must be them then.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F002
label: xxx
text: Well what are we going to do?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M003
label: xxx
text: We'll be alright, darling.  Whatever happens, aren't we?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F003
label: xxx
text: Now and always sweet.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M004
label: xxx
text: I don't care then.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F004
label: xxx
text: It was bound to come sooner or later.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M005
label: xxx
text: Hello.  Hello.  What?  Wrong number.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F005
label: exc
text: Ahh.  It sent shivers up my spine.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M006
label: exc
text: What shall we do if they suddenly walk in on us?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F006
label: exc
text: Behave exquisitely.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M007
label: exc
text: With the most perfect poise.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F007
label: exc
text: Certainly I shall probably do a court curtsy.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M008
label: exc
text: Things that ought to matter dreadfully don't matter at all when one's happy, do they?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What is so horrible is that one can't stay happy.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M009
label: neu
text: Don't say that, my darling.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F009
label: exc
text: It's true the whole business is very poor joke.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M010
label: xxx
text: Meaning that sacred and beautiful thing love.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F010
label: xxx
text: Yes, meaning just that.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M011
label: xxx
text: What does it all mean?  That's what I asked myself in my ceaseless quest for ultimate truth.  Dear God what does it all mean?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F011
label: exc
text: Don't laugh at me.  I'm serious.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M012
label: xxx
text: You mustn't be serious, my darling.  It's just what they want.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F012
label: neu
text: Who's they?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M013
label: xxx
text: All the futile moralists who try to make life unbearable.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Laugh at them, be flippant, laugh at everything, all their sacred shibboleths

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M015
label: xxx
text: flippancy brings out the acid in their damn sweetness and light.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F013
label: xxx
text: If I must laugh at everything, I must laugh at us too.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M016
label: xxx
text: Certainly you must.  We are figures of fun alright.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F014
label: exc
text: Oh, how long will it last, this ludicrous, over-bearing love of ours?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M017
label: neu
text: Well who knows?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F015
label: xxx
text: We always want to bicker and fight.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M018
label: xxx
text: No that fire will fade long with our passion.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Oh, dear shall we like that?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M019
label: xxx
text: It all depends on how well we've played.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F017
label: neu
text: What happens if one of us dies?  Does the one that's left still laugh?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M020
label: xxx
text: Yes.  Yes.  with all his might.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Well that's serious enough, isn't it?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M021
label: xxx
text: No, no it isn't.  Death is very laughable such a cunning little mystery.  All done with mirrors.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F019
label: xxx
text: Darling, I believe you're talking nonsense.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M022
label: xxx
text: So is everyone else in the long run.  Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M023
label: xxx
text: Let's blow trumpets and squeakers and enjoy the party as much as we can like small quite idiotic little school children.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M024
label: xxx
text: Let's savor the delight of the moment.  Come and kiss me darling before your body rots and worms pop in and out of your eye sockets.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Elliott, worms don't pop.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M025
label: xxx
text: I don't mind what you do, see. you can paint yourself green all over

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M026
label: xxx
text: and dance naked in the place Place Vendome and rush away with all the men in the world and I shan't say a word as long as you love me best.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F021
label: exc
text: Thank you, dear.  The same applies to you except that if I catch you so much as looking at another woman, I'll kill you.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M027
label: neu
text: Do you remember that awful scene in Venice?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F022
label: exc
text: Which particular one?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M028
label: neu
text: The one where you bought that little painted wooden snake and put it on my bed.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F023
label: exc
text: Oh, Charles.  That was his name.  Charles he did wriggle so beautifully.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M029
label: neu
text: Horrible thing.  I hated it.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F024
label: exc
text: Yes, I know you did.  You threw him out of the window into the Grand Canal.  I don't think I'll ever forgive you for that.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M030
label: neu
text: How long did that row last?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F025
label: xxx
text: It went on intermittently for days.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M031
label: neu
text: The worst one was in Cannes when your curling irons burnt holes in my dressing gown.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F026
label: exc
text: It burnt my comb too and all the towels in the bathroom.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M032
label: xxx
text: Ah, we were much younger then.  That was a rouser wasn't it?

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F027
label: xxx
text: That was the first time you ever hit me.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M033
label: xxx
text: You didn't hit me- I didn't hit you very hard.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F028
label: exc
text: Then the manager came in and found us rolling about on the floor biting and scratching like panthers.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M034
label: xxx
text: I shall never forget his face.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F029
label: exc
text: How ridiculous.  How utterly, utterly ridiculous.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M035
label: xxx
text: We were very much younger then.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_F030
label: exc
text: And very much sillier.

name: Ses04F_script03_1_M036
label: xxx
text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M000
label: sad
text: Hey, I'm, uh. I'm really sorry about what happened.  I don't um- I mean what you can you do?  I mean it's-

name: Ses04F_impro06_F000
label: sad
text: Thanks.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M001
label: sad
text: When I was seven, my- my grandmother died and I really- I don't know, I mean it was really hard to let go but the important thing is- is that you do let go and your realize that, you know, they- you know, they- this person had fun while they were- while they were here and, uh, you know, you work- you work through it.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F001
label: sad
text: You know it's just, I just, you know, I mean it just happened.  I just, like- I just keep expecting him to walk in, you know.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M002
label: sad
text: Mmhmm. Yeah.  Yeah.  I mean it's- it's hard.  It's hard.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: I just- I just thought he would have longer, you know, because I'm- I mean when he found out he was sick, we knew that wasn't good but I just- I just thought that it would take longer, you know?

name: Ses04F_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M004
label: neu
text: Well I mean, you know, I mean it was I mean with that kind of condition,

name: Ses04F_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: Yeah. I know. I know.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M005
label: sad
text: you know, it's inevitable  and I mean honestly it's- it's almost like

name: Ses04F_impro06_M006
label: neu
text: you know, you don't- you know, how long do you want the person to go through that, you know.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M007
label: neu
text: It's sort of- it's almost better off to rest in peace than he is to live in pain.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: Yeah, I know. But I'd rather have him here with me, you know. It's just not fair.  I mean he- he didn't get to do like anything. I mean he was-

name: Ses04F_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: He was only twenty four and just so many things that we were going to do, you know, and now he won't get to do them and he won't get to be here when I do.  You know, like I'll get married some day and he won't be there, like, he won't get to see that.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M008
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: It just doesn't seem fair.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M009
label: sad
text: It's not fair but I mean that's, you know, the course of life is that, you know, you meet people and you lose them.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M010
label: sad
text: You're okay

name: Ses04F_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: Thank you for being here.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M011
label: sad
text: You know I think- I think we should celebrate because I think that's what he would have wanted.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F008
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] You're probably right.  He probably would be pissed if we were all sitting around being upset about it. He'd want us to have a party.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M012
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F009
label: hap
text: And to drink in his honor. [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04F_impro06_M013
label: sad
text: That's right.  That's right.  I mean he would want us to, you know, celebrate the life that he- that he lived and, you know, enjoy the rest of ours as much as we can.

name: Ses04F_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: Yeah, I know.

name: Ses04F_impro06_M014
label: sad
text: So-

name: Ses04F_impro01_F000
label: xxx
text: Hi.  Um, excuse me I've been to, like, five of the desks here and nobody seems to be able to tell me what it is I need to do.  I've been here for over an hour.  Can you possibly help me?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M000
label: fru
text: Uh, lets- What do you need exactly?

name: Ses04F_impro01_F001
label: fru
text: Well I filled out all the forms and I've given them to everyone and they keep sending me to someone else.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M001
label: fru
text: You need a new license, is that what you're telling me?

name: Ses04F_impro01_F002
label: fru
text: Yes.  I'm just trying to get a new license.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M002
label: fru
text: Let me see the form. Just let me see the form. Yeah.  You filled this out wrong.  I can't - I can't - I can't do anything with this.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F003
label: fru
text: Okay.  I did-

name: Ses04F_impro01_M003
label: fru
text: Ma'am I cannot help you.  You need to fill out a new form and you need to get in the back of the line.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F004
label: ang
text: I did exactly what they told me to do.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: I have done everything everyone in this entire place has told me to do.  I've been here for over an hour.  They make me wait in line.  Every single time I start over again.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M004
label: fru
text: Ma'am I can't help you.  Do you understand?

name: Ses04F_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: I have a life.  I have things to do.  I have places to go.  Can you not just put this through please?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M005
label: ang
text: I've got a life too ma'am

name: Ses04F_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: and I got to - i got to work here all day long.  Okay.  I've got to deal with you people all day.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: So what I need you to do is I need you to fill out this form correctly and go to the back of the line.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: Okay, that's nice. That's nice but I have done everything you people have told me to do. I don't understand why you can't just help me get this done.  It's simple, right?  License.  I need it. Can we just do this please?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M008
label: ang
text: There's nothing I can do for you.  Do you understand that?  Nothing.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: What I need you to do is go to the back of the line,

name: Ses04F_impro01_F008
label: ang
text: I've been to the back of the line five times.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M010
label: fru
text: fill out this form and wait

name: Ses04F_impro01_M011
label: ang
text: You're going to have to go back again.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F009
label: ang
text: Okay.  What is it that I did wrong on the form that I have to start all over again?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M012
label: xxx
text: This whole area here you didn't initial

name: Ses04F_impro01_M013
label: fru
text: and you filled out-

name: Ses04F_impro01_F010
label: ang
text: Okay.  Well, I can do that right here right now without going to the back of the line again.  See look initialed.  All done. Ready to go.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M014
label: ang
text: Ma'am I have other people waiting in line right now.  I have other people waiting in line right now.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F011
label: fru
text: I have been waiting for over an hour.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M015
label: fru
text: This whole area of the form was not supposed to be filled out and you put the address in the wrong place

name: Ses04F_impro01_M016
label: fru
text: Uhh, and you spelled your own name wrong.  So I need you to take that

name: Ses04F_impro01_F012
label: ang
text: I'm not starting over again.  No I have done this five times.  I am not starting over again.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M017
label: fru
text: and, uh, throw it away. I need you to fill out a new form.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M018
label: fru
text: Ma'am you're going to have- you- look. You really- you really

name: Ses04F_impro01_F013
label: fru
text: Look can you not just help me?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M019
label: xxx
text: I can't help you right now.  Do you understand that?

name: Ses04F_impro01_F014
label: ang
text: I mean look she's -she's perfectly nice.  She doesn't mind waiting for a couple of minutes because I've been here all day. I have a job to get back to.  I have kids to pick up from school.  I can't just stay here.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M020
label: xxx
text: Look I'm going on my lunch break right now.  So you're just going to have to take this form and go to the back of the line.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F015
label: xxx
text: No.  No.  No. No. You have to help me.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M021
label: ang
text: like I said before right now.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F016
label: ang
text: This is your job is to help people like me who need to get a new license.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F017
label: xxx
text: That's like the whole purpose of you being here.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M022
label: fru
text: Ma'am you are testing my patience.  Do you understand me?

name: Ses04F_impro01_F018
label: xxx
text: I- I- I'm testing your patience?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M023
label: ang
text: You're testing my goddamn patience.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F019
label: ang
text: I'm testing your patience?

name: Ses04F_impro01_M024
label: ang
text: I work in this fucking building all day. And I'm sick of it, okay?

name: Ses04F_impro01_F020
label: xxx
text: Yeah.  You have to be here all day.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F021
label: ang
text: I don't need to be.  I need to go and do other things with my time.  Okay.

name: Ses04F_impro01_F022
label: ang
text: Please just put the form in, take the picture, let me get my license and get the hell out of here.  Please.

name: Ses04F_impro01_M025
label: xxx
text: I've walked away already.  I'm not here anymore.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M000
label: xxx
text: What time is it?  They're supposed to run around midnight.  This is great, isn't it?  Look at this night we've got here; couldn't be better.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M001
label: exc
text: Actually, I wanted to go a little farther up the coast, get away from the lights and the people, but I was afraid we'd miss it.  How you doing?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F000
label: neu
text: Fine.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M002
label: exc
text: Is that, is that - is that just foam?  I can't even tell.  Although, if you can't tell, it's probably isn't them.  It'll probably be unmistakable, don't you think?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M003
label: exc
text: How you doing?  Oh, no, you know what I did?  I forgot to bring my flashlight.  How could I be so stupid?  I should have brought my flashlight.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F001
label: xxx
text: What flashlight?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M004
label: xxx
text: The flashlight; the silver one.  There's only one, isn't there?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F002
label: ang
text: It's not yours.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M005
label: neu
text: Whose is it?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F003
label: ang
text: It's ours.  It's mine, too.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M006
label: fru
text: Well, sure.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F004
label: ang
text: You kept saying my flashlight as if it's somehow just yours.  How is that supposed to make me feel?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M007
label: xxx
text: No, of course, our flashlight; yours and mine.  Me flashlight es su flashlight, naturally.  How could we not think to bring it?  I hope the moon stays out.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M008
label: exc
text: I wonder, do they always run during a full moon? I can't remember if it was full last year.  Remember?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F005
label: ang
text: Yes.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M009
label: neu
text: Are you cold?  Do you want my jacket?  We should have brought the blanket, our blanket.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M010
label: xxx
text: Oh, man.  This is great.  I didn't even think to bring a six pack.  Six pack would be just the ticket right about now.  I can't believe I forgot.  I'm like a kid.  It's amazing I got out of the house with my fly zipped.  Oh.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M011
label: xxx
text: I wonder if they can hear me talk or feel the vibrations in the sand when we move around.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F006
label: xxx
text: I'm cold.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M012
label: neu
text: You want my jacket?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F007
label: ang
text: It's after eleven; let's go home.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M013
label: fru
text: Are you kidding?  We'd miss it.  We just got here.  What's the point of coming down here if we just turn around and go home?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F008
label: ang
text: There is no point in coming down here.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M014
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F009
label: fru
text: That's my point.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M015
label: neu
text: That's my point, too.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F010
label: ang
text: So let's go home.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M016
label: fru
text: No, no, no.  That's not my point.  My point is is that there's no point in coming down here if we just leave.  Don't you want to see it?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F011
label: fru
text: Not particularly.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M017
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F012
label: ang
text: I just don't.  It's stupid.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M018
label: exc
text: Honey, this is a natural phenomenon.  I mean, this only happens once a year.  It's a great opportunity.  Think about the people in Kansas.  They'd have to get plane tickets and hotel reservations to come see this.  We're just forty minutes away.  It's too good to pass up.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F013
label: ang
text: Pass up what?  These little fish swim onto the beach, flop around and then they swim away.  And then they die.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M019
label: fru
text: Yeah, but that moment on the beach is the highlight of their little lives.  I mean, all that flopping around is laying eggs or what do you -- spawning or mating, something like that.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M020
label: exc
text: There's mystery here and magic.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F014
label: neu
text: What are you so excited about?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M021
label: exc
text: Oh, it's a big night for these guys.  Uh, life's last orgy.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F015
label: fru
text: This isn't a moon landing we're talking about.  It's fish.  It's fish nobody even eats.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M022
label: exc
text: Yeah, they do. Okay.  But it's fish who do something none of the other fish do; like the swallows are returning to Capistrano; or the lemmings throwing themselves off the cliffs, like that.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M023
label: exc
text: There's mystery here and magic; a little bit of the unexplainable.  I don't see how you can not be interested.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F016
label: fru
text: I'm just not.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M024
label: sur
text: For real?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F017
label: ang
text: Yes.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M025
label: xxx
text: I don't get it.  First time we came here to see it, you said it was the best night of your life.  And last year, I remember distinctly you were so excited to get here, you stubbed your toe rushing me out the door and didn't even notice until we were in the car.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F018
label: ang
