text: Last year, you will also remember, our shoes got wet.  I got sand in my panties.  We got into a big fight over nothing.  You got a sore throat and we did not see the grunions.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M026
label: xxx
text: We weren't in a good spot.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F019
label: fru
text: We didn't see them the first time either.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M027
label: xxx
text: We just weren't in a good spot.  This is a much better spot.  I've got good instincts for these things.  Look there.  What's that?  Is that -

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M028
label: exc
text: no, it's just seaweed, isn't it?  Oh, man, this is great.  I wouldn't miss this for anything.  I mean, think about this.  I know you're not interested, but just think about this for a minute.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M029
label: exc
text: Out there someplace is this huge mass of silver fish heading this way.  They don't know why.  We don't know why.  It wasn't a decision.  They didn't take a vote.  No one sent them an invitation or a map;

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M030
label: exc
text: just some little instinctual time release firecracker went off in their little bodies and all as one, they turned and formed a line as long as the California coast and started swimming.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M031
label: exc
text: They're swimming right now as if that's the only thing that matters.  It's single mindedness with no mind.  Urgency that's pure urge.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M032
label: exc
text: They don't know what drives them.  They don't give it a name or ask a question.  They just turn, as one, and start the swim that brings them here; to this place, where we stand, for a massive celebration of sex and death.  Oh, man, I'm giving myself goose bumps.  All my hairs are popping up.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F020
label: fru
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses04M_script02_1_M033
label: exc
text: Well so what did you think?

name: Ses04M_script02_1_F021
label: fru
text: About what?

name: Ses04M_impro05_M000
label: fru
text: Yeah, hi.  Look--Um, okay.  Here's the thing.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F000
label: neu
text: Hi, how can I help you?

name: Ses04M_impro05_M001
label: xxx
text: Just arrived from London--

name: Ses04M_impro05_F001
label: neu
text: Mmhmm.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M002
label: fru
text: lost my luggage. Your airline--

name: Ses04M_impro05_F002
label: neu
text: I'm sorry.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F003
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M003
label: fru
text: lost my luggage. I didn't lose it. No, it's not like I left it somewhere and somebody took it.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F004
label: xxx
text: Oh, oh, you didn't.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F005
label: xxx
text: I thought you lost your luggage.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M004
label: fru
text: It was lost.  I waited on the conveyor -- near the conveyor belt to see, you know, where -- then the baggage claim and see if it would- it would come out.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M005
label: fru
text: Didn't come out.  I spoke to somebody, a local authority figure.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M006
label: fru
text: And he told me to come to this desk here so I can, uh, at least get, uh, the hundred- hundred and fifty dollars that- that I'm owed for my loss.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M007
label: fru
text: 'Cause that's roughly how much the bag plus all its contents was worth.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F006
label: neu
text: Uh. Okay.  I -- first of all, I'm very sorry you lost your bag.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F007
label: neu
text: Um, but, actually, our policy is a fifty dollar

name: Ses04M_impro05_M008
label: ang
text: fifty dollars?

name: Ses04M_impro05_F008
label: neu
text: refund--coverage of the bag that was lost. yes

name: Ses04M_impro05_M009
label: ang
text: fifty dollars. No way, no.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F009
label: neu
text: That's our policy, sir.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M010
label: ang
text: I don't but the thing is, I don't care about your policy.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M011
label: ang
text: You understand?

name: Ses04M_impro05_M012
label: fru
text: What I want you to do is I want you to write three of those, as if I were three people.  Okay.  You can write -- you can just put my name on all --

name: Ses04M_impro05_F010
label: neu
text: I can't do that.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M013
label: fru
text: But what I'm telling you is that's what you're going to do.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F011
label: xxx
text: Uh, no, actually, no I'm not.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M014
label: ang
text: No, no, because, look, I don't care what your policy says.  I mean--

name: Ses04M_impro05_F012
label: fru
text: I'm very sorry.  I understand you're frustrated. You just got off of a flight.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M015
label: ang
text: You understand that the contents of my bag- The contents of my bag cost a hundred and fifty dollars.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M016
label: ang
text: You--

name: Ses04M_impro05_F013
label: neu
text: We'll cover fifty.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M017
label: ang
text: No.  No.  No.  What I need you to do -- I need you to write checks for -- I need you to write three of them. That'll be satisfactory.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F014
label: fru
text: We only cover fifty do-

name: Ses04M_impro05_M018
label: ang
text: Just -- you can fill out the form--We can fill out - no, no, no, we can fill out the form three times.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F015
label: fru
text: We only cover fifty dollars worth of lost items.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M019
label: fru
text: And then that'll be that. It's going to be fine. Just-

name: Ses04M_impro05_M020
label: xxx
text: I'm going to get very upset.  Like, I mean, I'm- I'm upset right now but I'm going to get really upset if you- if you don't do the check thing.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F016
label: fru
text: I'm very sorry.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F017
label: neu
text: I'm very sorry.  I understand you're upset.  You just got off a long flight.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M021
label: fru
text: You don't understand. You don't understand, actually.  You don't understand because it was my luggage that was lost.  Okay.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F018
label: fru
text: We really -- we want to work with you. We really -- we want to help.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F019
label: neu
text: I understand that.  I would know if it was mine. Um-

name: Ses04M_impro05_M022
label: ang
text: Yeah.  If it was yours, but it's not. It's mine.  Okay. So just--

name: Ses04M_impro05_F020
label: neu
text: But it's not.  It's yours.  I understand.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F021
label: fru
text: I know.  We want to work with you.  We will give you the fifty dollars but I'm--

name: Ses04M_impro05_M023
label: xxx
text: No, it's not going to be -- but it's not going to be fifty, it's going to be a hundred and fifty.  You're going to write three, you understand, three of- of the forms.  You're going to write three of them out and then give it to me.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F022
label: fru
text: Yeah, we don't do that.  I can go ahead and send you--

name: Ses04M_impro05_M024
label: fru
text: You- you- you- you're misunderstanding me.  You're going to do that.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F023
label: fru
text: We will definitely keep an eye out for your bag. We will try to find it.  We will, you know, fill out the form for missing items.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M025
label: fru
text: Look, can I just -- can I speak to your manager, please?  'Cause I- I really -- I don't, um -- I mean, I just don't want to deal with -- I know that -- I mean, I know this isn't your fault,

name: Ses04M_impro05_F024
label: fru
text: No one can make the three check thing happen 'cause we don't do that.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F025
label: fru
text: I can write you the one check.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M026
label: ang
text: but I need to speak to somebody who can make the three check thing happen.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F026
label: fru
text: All- all that my supervisor could do is the exact same thing that I'm offering to do.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M027
label: fru
text: But what I'm talk -- but I'm just,just- please let me--

name: Ses04M_impro05_M028
label: fru
text: But if I could just speak directly -- if I could just speak directly to your-- to your superior person

name: Ses04M_impro05_F027
label: fru
text: I'd be happy to give you a cup of coffee, too.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F028
label: fru
text: We'll just throw that in--gratuitously.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M029
label: fru
text: then that would be helpful to me because I just feel like if- you don't think you have the power to write three checks but you actually do. see?

name: Ses04M_impro05_F029
label: fru
text: No, I don't. See, I could lose my job if I did that.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M030
label: fru
text: But your job is not my concern. My concern is getting my luggage.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F030
label: fru
text: And your bag is not my concern.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F031
label: fru
text: The fifty dollars I'm going to give you for your bag is really all I'm concerned with.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M031
label: fru
text: Look, I don't -- look, can we just not argue about this.  Like--

name: Ses04M_impro05_F032
label: fru
text: I'm more than happy to not argue about it.  I will give you your fifty dollar certificate.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F033
label: fru
text: You can go ahead and go fill out the form. We'll look for your bag.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M032
label: fru
text: So what if- what if we- what if we do three forms

name: Ses04M_impro05_M033
label: fru
text: with different names on them? That-

name: Ses04M_impro05_F034
label: fru
text: Then that would be lying.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M034
label: fru
text: but, no. See, 'cause

name: Ses04M_impro05_M035
label: fru
text: if we have three forms then I can get the hundred and fifty.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F035
label: fru
text: I'm sorry.  We can only issue one fifty dollar certificate to cover the lost bag for one person.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M036
label: fru
text: Just please, will you please just work with me here? Just -- all I'm asking you to do is just work with me. I know -- I know that you get lots of people all day long who give you shit, give you crap, but

name: Ses04M_impro05_F036
label: neu
text: I understand you're frustrated, but--

name: Ses04M_impro05_M037
label: fru
text: um, you know, I -- this is my bag and I need the hundred and fifty dollars. Please.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F037
label: neu
text: I know. I understand it's personal-- It's personal to you. I get that.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M038
label: ang
text: Please.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F038
label: fru
text: But if you want to just sit down, you know, maybe have a cup of tea, calm down a little bit, we'll go ahead and we'll do what we can for you. you okey

name: Ses04M_impro05_M039
label: ang
text: I'm already calm. Okay, I'm calm. I'm calm.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M040
label: fru
text: Just all I need you to do is just fill out three forms and I'll leave you alone forever, forever.  I'll never -- we'll never see each other again.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F039
label: fru
text: And I'm looking forward to that.  However, I can't do that. I would lose my job.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M041
label: fru
text: But that's not going to-- But you don't understand. You're looking forward to never seeing me again.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F040
label: fru
text: Oh, yes.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M042
label: fru
text: But never seeing me again is not going to happen until you give me the three checks.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F041
label: fru
text: I'm sorry, really.  But--

name: Ses04M_impro05_M043
label: fru
text: I don't -- I'm not- I'm not convinced.

name: Ses04M_impro05_F042
label: fru
text: That I'm sorry?

name: Ses04M_impro05_M044
label: ang
text: Yeah.  If you were really sorry, you'd give me the three checks.

name: Ses04M_impro05_M045
label: ang
text: So why don't we just do that and stop this nonsense, hmm?  Hmm?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F000
label: xxx
text: What's he going to say?  Maybe we should tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M000
label: neu
text: He saw it.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F001
label: sur
text: How could he see it?  I was the first one up.  He was still in bed.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M001
label: xxx
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F002
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M002
label: xxx
text: About four this morning.  I heard it cracking and I woke up and looked out.  He was standing right there when it cracked.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four in the morning?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M003
label: xxx
text: I don't know.  When it cracked, he ran back into the house and cried in the kitchen.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F004
label: sad
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M004
label: sad
text: No, I figured the best thing was to leave him alone.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F005
label: xxx
text: He cried hard?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M005
label: sad
text: I could hear him right through the floor of my room.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F006
label: fru
text: What was he doing out here at that hour?  He's dreaming about him again.  He's walking around at night.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M006
label: xxx
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F007
label: xxx
text: He's getting just like after he died.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What's the meaning in that?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M007
label: fru
text: I don't know the meaning of this, mom.  But I know one thing you made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F009
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M008
label: fru
text: Being dishonest with him, that kind of thing always pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F010
label: xxx
text: What do you mean dishonest?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M009
label: ang
text: You know that Larry's not coming back and I know it.  Why do we allow him to go on thinking that we believe with him?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F011
label: ang
text: What do you want to do, argue with him?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M010
label: ang
text: I don't want to argue with him but it's time that he realizes that Larry's not coming back anymore.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M011
label: xxx
text: Why shouldn't he dream of him?  Walk the nights waiting for him?  Do we contradict him?  Do we say straight out that we have no hope anymore, that we haven't had any hope for years now?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F012
label: ang
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M012
label: ang
text: We've got to say it to him.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F013
label: ang
text: How are you going to prove it?  Can you prove it?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M013
label: ang
text: For God's sake three years.  Nobody comes back after three years.  It's insane.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F014
label: ang
text: To you it is and to me but not to him.  You can talk yourself blue in the face but there's no body and no grave so where are you?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M014
label: fru
text: Sit down mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F015
label: ang
text: The trouble is the goddamn newspapers.  Every month some boy turns up from nowhere so the next one is going to be Larry.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: Alright, alright, alright.  Listen. You know why I asked Annie here don't you?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M016
label: neu
text: You know why.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Well I got an idea but what's the story?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: I'm going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F018
label: neu
text: Well that's only your business, Chris.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M018
label: fru
text: You know it's not only my business.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F019
label: ang
text: What do you want me to do?  You're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: Then it's alright.  I'll go ahead with it.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Well you want to make sure that father isn't going to-

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M020
label: ang
text: Then it isn't just my business.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F021
label: fru
text: I'm just saying.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: Sometimes you infuriate me.  You know that?  Isn't it your business too if I tell this to father and he throws a fit about it.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M022
label: ang
text: Sometimes you have a- Sometimes you have a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F022
label: ang
text: I ignore what I got to ignore. The girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M023
label: fru
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F023
label: ang
text: From father's point of view, he's not dead and you have no right to take his girl.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F024
label: ang
text: Now you can go on from there and you know where to go, but I'm telling you I don't know where to go.  See I don't know.  Now what can I do for you?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M024
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is but every time I reach out for something I want, I have to pull back because other people will suffer. My whole bloody life time after time after time.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F025
label: neu
text: You're a considerate fellow.  There's nothing wrong in that.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M025
label: ang
text: To hell with that.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F026
label: xxx
text: Did you ask Annie yet?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M026
label: sad
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F027
label: fru
text: How do you know she'll marry you?  Maybe she feels the same way father does.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M027
label: fru
text: Well if she does, then that's the end of it.  From her letters, I think she's forgotten him.  I'll find out.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M028
label: ang
text: and then we'll thrash it out with dad, right mom.  Don't avoid me.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F028
label: fru
text: The trouble is you don't see enough women.  You never did.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M029
label: ang
text: So what I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F029
label: ang
text: I don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M030
label: ang
text: Because it is.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F030
label: ang
text: Well that's a good answer but it don't answer anything.  You haven't seen her since you went to war.  It's been five years.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M031
label: xxx
text: I can't help it.  I know her best.  I was brought up next door to her.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M032
label: sad
text: These years when I think of someone for my wife, I think of Annie.  What do you want, a diagram?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F031
label: fru
text: I don't want a diagram.  He thinks he's coming back, Chris.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F032
label: ang
text: You marry that girl.  You're pronouncing him dead.  Now what happens to your father?  Do you know because I don't?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M033
label: xxx
text: Alright then mom.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F033
label: xxx
text: Just give it some more thought.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M034
label: ang
text: I've given it three years of thought.  I hoped that if I waited, dad would forget about Larry

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M035
label: fru
text: and everything would be happy and we would have a regular wedding.  But if that can't happen here, then I'll have to get out.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F034
label: xxx
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M036
label: xxx
text: I'll get out.  I'll get married and live someplace else, maybe New York.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F035
label: ang
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M037
label: xxx
text: I've been a good son too long.  A good sucker I'm through with it.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F036
label: ang
text: You've got a business here.  What the hell is this?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M038
label: ang
text: The business, the business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F037
label: ang
text: Must you be inspired?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M039
label: fru
text: Yes, I like it an hour a day.  If I have to grub for money all day long, at least at evening I want it beautiful.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M040
label: fru
text: I want- I want a family.  I want some kids.  I want to build something I give myself to.  Annie is in the middle of that.  Now where do I find it?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F038
label: fru
text: You mean-tell me something you mean you'd really leave the business?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M041
label: xxx
text: Yes on this I would.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F039
label: xxx
text: Well you don't want to think that way.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M042
label: fru
text: Then you help me stay here.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F040
label: ang
text: Alright but don't think that way

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F041
label: ang
text: because what the hell did we work for?  This whole shooting match is just for you, Chris.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M043
label: fru
text: I know.  Just you help me stay here.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F042
label: ang
text: But don't think that way.  You hear me?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M044
label: xxx
text: I am thinking that way.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F043
label: xxx
text: I don't understand you do I?

name: Ses04F_script01_1_M045
label: xxx
text: No.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses04F_script01_1_F044
label: ang
text: Yeah.  I can see that.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M000
label: fru
text: Welcome to Northwest Airlines.  How can I help you?

name: Ses04F_impro05_F000
label: fru
text: You guys lost my bag.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M001
label: fru
text: Did you file a complaint already?

name: Ses04F_impro05_F001
label: fru
text: Yeah.  Yeah I did.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M002
label: fru
text: Where?  Did you do it at the front desk or by the baggage claims?

name: Ses04F_impro05_F002
label: fru
text: I-I don't know.  The place where they told me to go.  Look they told me to come talk to you because you guys lost my bag.  Not it's late.  Not it will be here soon, lost it completely.  What are you going to do about that?

name: Ses04F_impro05_M003
label: fru
text: Ma'am, first of all I'd like you to calm down.  Second of all-

name: Ses04F_impro05_F003
label: fru
text: Look that bag has my entire life in it and you just lost it.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M004
label: xxx
text: I understand that ma'am.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F004
label: ang
text: Lost it just, like, I mean,

name: Ses04F_impro05_M005
label: fru
text: Ma'am, I understand that.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F005
label: ang
text: it's not like it just disappeared into thin air. Somebody wasn't paying attention

name: Ses04F_impro05_F006
label: ang
text: because my bag was very easy to keep track of.  It's got big, you know, rainbow colored crap all over it and no one was paying attention because now it's just gone.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M006
label: fru
text: I understand that.  The best I can do for you, at this moment, is give you fifty dollar check courtesy of Northwest Airlines for inconveniencing you in losing your luggage.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F007
label: sur
text: Wait.  What?

name: Ses04F_impro05_M007
label: fru
text: At this moment in time, all I can do for you is give you-

name: Ses04F_impro05_F008
label: ang
text: No. No. I heard- I heard what you said.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F009
label: ang
text: You're kidding me, right.  You're going to give me fifty dollars to completely cover my bag, everything that was in it, the inconvenience that I've gone through.  I paid for my ticket.  All I expect is to safely get to my destination with my stuff.  Is that so much to ask?  I mean I really don't think that's that big a deal to ask you guys to have my bag in the place where I leave and then put my bag where I end up.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M008
label: fru
text: you're getting very excited right now

name: Ses04F_impro05_F010
label: ang
text: Yeah, well that's got everything I have in it.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M009
label: fru
text: I understand that, ma'am but there's not really much I can do for you right now.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F011
label: ang
text: Look fifty dollars is unacceptable.  My bag itself cost over a hundred and fifty dollars.  You can't just give me fifty dollar gift certificate to Percoes or whatever the hell and then send me off like that's- that's good enough.  Like that's all I needed was fifty dollars.  My bag is worth more than that.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M010
label: fru
text: What I need you to do is file another complaint form. There's a form that you can fill out over by the front desk near the baggage claim.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M011
label: fru
text: If you'd like to take that over to the front desk- Ma'am.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M012
label: fru
text: We're just talking over each other.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M013
label: fru
text: We're not going to communicate anything this way.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F012
label: ang
text: I expect your airline who was responsible for my bag to give me the equivalent of the bag and all of the things in it.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M014
label: fru
text: Ma'am in flying with Northwest Airlines you agreed to

name: Ses04F_impro05_M015
label: fru
text: sign away your luggage to the

name: Ses04F_impro05_F013
label: ang
text: I didn't sign anything. I didn't sign anything. And you people have got to make-

name: Ses04F_impro05_M016
label: fru
text: It's part of the small- it's part of the agreement when you're purchasing an airline ticket, there's- when you-

name: Ses04F_impro05_F014
label: ang
text: You have to make amends for what you did for losing my bag and all of my stuff.  Fifty dollars is unacceptable.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M017
label: fru
text: Ma'am, please calm down.  When you purchase a ticket, there is a terms and agreement,

name: Ses04F_impro05_F015
label: ang
text: No.  No.  I don't know. You know what? I'm going to call my lawyer. You know what?  That's what I'm going to do.  I'm going to call my lawyer and have him get down here and explain to you that this is an unacceptable option.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M018
label: fru
text: terms and conditions- in the agreement of purchasing a ticket. Most people frequently look it over

name: Ses04F_impro05_M019
label: fru
text: The best that we can do for you is give you-

name: Ses04F_impro05_M020
label: fru
text: Ma'am.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F016
label: ang
text: I want to talk to your supervisor.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M021
label: fru
text: I am- I am- I am my own supervisor.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F017
label: ang
text: I've had enough.  I want to talk to-no, no unacceptable I want to your supervisor. I am done with this.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M022
label: fru
text: I am the supervisor, ma'am.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F018
label: ang
text: Really, you don't work for anybody.  It's just you?

name: Ses04F_impro05_M023
label: fru
text: I am the current manager on duty.

name: Ses04F_impro05_F019
label: ang
text: Okay.  Well I want to call whoever you report to, whoever your boss is because I have had enough with this airline and I am finished waiting for my fifty dollar gift certificate.

name: Ses04F_impro05_M024
label: fru
text: Ma'am, I own Northwest Airlines.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M000
label: fru
text: Oh, man, I just -- I don't know what to do.  I don't know what to do.  It's like every job, you know, I go to; every job I apply to,

name: Ses04M_impro04_M001
label: fru
text: it's just like nobody- nobody wants to hire me. It's been years, I mean, do you understand, years?  Like, I'm -- you know what I mean, it's like I've been collecting unemployment for so long now, it's just like I just -- I can't take it.  I don't know what to do.  I mean, I'm just like losing my mind.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F000
label: neu
text: Well there has to be something you haven't tried.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M002
label: fru
text: I-I'm not kidding.  I've tried everything.  Like I've gone to every business and local, you know,

name: Ses04M_impro04_M003
label: fru
text: local business in- in the area and I can't- I can't get anything.  Like, nobody -

name: Ses04M_impro04_F001
label: neu
text: What about like a temp agency?

name: Ses04M_impro04_F002
label: neu
text: Have you gone, like, signed up with a temp agency?  Maybe they can help.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M004
label: neu
text: there's just like no jobs available.  I mean, it's just like, God.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M005
label: fru
text: Yeah, I tried that.  And there was like, yeah, like I did like one thing once.  But, like, that's not -- it doesn't last very long.  And it's not enough to live on.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F003
label: neu
text: Right, but you have -- I mean, you have to keep on them.  You have to keep calling and reminding them that you're still looking and

name: Ses04M_impro04_F004
label: neu
text: I mean, you have to be really aggressive about it.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M006
label: fru
text: Yeah, I do.  I do.  You don't understand.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M007
label: fru
text: I- You don't understand. I don't have a job.  All- My job is to look for a job.  I don't do anything else.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M008
label: fru
text: But, like, it's been years now and I just can't seem to get anything that really fits.  It's just it -- I -- it drives me absolutely insane.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F005
label: neu
text: Well, I mean, if it's that bad, maybe you're gonna have to take something that doesn't really fit, you know.  Like maybe you'll have to do something else for a while.  Find a new field, new skill.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M009
label: fru
text: No, no, no, no, no.  I can't- I can't do that.  I can't, I- because if I'm not- if I'm not- if I'm not doing something that I love, then I can't -- I can't- I mean it's- what's the point?

name: Ses04M_impro04_F006
label: neu
text: Well then you're choosing to be unemployed, really.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M010
label: fru
text: I'm not choosing. I'm not-

name: Ses04M_impro04_F007
label: neu
text: If you're not willing to try and work with it and find something and, you know, I mean, there are things you could do.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M011
label: fru
text: No, but I'm try- but like all the things that I-it's like I apply to all these places and none of them

name: Ses04M_impro04_M012
label: fru
text: -- I mean, I don't understand.  It's like -- I mean, I feel like I'm qualified enough.  I just don't understand.  Like, I mean, it's just like a matter of circumstance, but it's been three years, you know, three years.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F008
label: neu
text: Well maybe, you know, your luck it is just down and the market for your particular field is down and maybe you just need to look into doing something else for a while.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M013
label: fru
text: This is stupid.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F009
label: neu
text: I mean, I'm not saying that you should, you know--

name: Ses04M_impro04_M014
label: fru
text: You know what, this is your fault.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F010
label: sur
text: Excuse me?

name: Ses04M_impro04_M015
label: fru
text: It's your fault 'cause -cause you always told me to- to do this and I did that instead.  And I didn't take your advice and - and- but you sort of were like were telling--

name: Ses04M_impro04_F011
label: neu
text: It's my fault 'cause you didn't do what I told you to?

name: Ses04M_impro04_M016
label: fru
text: Yeah, exactly.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F012
label: neu
text: Well that sounds like your fault.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M017
label: fru
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F013
label: neu
text: You didn't do what I told you to do.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M018
label: fru
text: That's 'cause you always tell me to do the wrong thing.  And I thought this time it was -- I was gonna be right by going with the opposite thing. So it's your fault because

name: Ses04M_impro04_M019
label: fru
text: -because you were always wrong and-and-and this time you were right. And-and I didn't -- yeah, that's why.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F014
label: xxx
text: That's amazing logic that you managed to turn that around and make it my fault.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M020
label: neu
text: Well, I mean, it makes sense, doesn't it, hmm?

name: Ses04M_impro04_F015
label: neu
text: I think maybe you can't get employed because you aren't willing to take responsibility for your own actions.

name: Ses04M_impro04_M021
label: neu
text: That's not true.  I take responsibility for my own actions.

name: Ses04M_impro04_F016
label: neu
text: Really?  Whose fault is it you don't have a job?

name: Ses04M_impro04_M022
label: neu
text: Yours.  I don't--

name: Ses04M_impro04_F017
label: neu
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses04M_impro04_F018
label: xxx
text: You see what you just did there, though?

name: Ses04M_impro04_M023
label: oth
text: I had- No, I don't.  I'm sorry.  I just totally screwed this one up.  You can stop it I guess.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F000
label: sad
text: Hey, how you doing?

name: Ses04M_impro06_F001
label: sad
text: I'm sorry.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M000
label: sad
text: Thanks.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: I know- I know there's nothing I can say that will really help, but--

name: Ses04M_impro06_M001
label: sad
text: I know.  I just -- I don't know.  It's just weird because you have somebody who's, you know,

name: Ses04M_impro06_M002
label: sad
text: a major part of your life and then they're gone.  And I don't know.  That's not really -- it's never really happened to me before.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: I'm sorry.  It's never easy.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: But, I'm here if there's anything you need.  I mean, you just have to ask.  I know --

name: Ses04M_impro06_M004
label: sad
text: Thanks.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: --it doesn't really do anything.  But--

name: Ses04M_impro06_M005
label: sad
text: I just -- it's just not fair.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: I know.  It never is.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: How's, um -- how's his parents doing?

name: Ses04M_impro06_M006
label: sad
text: I mean, they're, you know, they're upset.  It's like you know, they

name: Ses04M_impro06_M007
label: sad
text: feel the same way everybody else does.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: I mean, what do you want to do?  Do you want to- do you want to talk about it?  Do you-

name: Ses04M_impro06_M008
label: sad
text: [BREATHING] I mean, there's nothing really to talk about.  He's gone and I'll never see him again.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F009
label: sad
text: Well I know it's not a lot of help or anything, but at least you got to know him.  I mean, at least you had the time with him that you did.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M009
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: I mean, we can be grateful for that.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M010
label: sad
text: Yeah, I don't know.  Sometimes I wish I didn't know him.  So I wouldn't--

name: Ses04M_impro06_F011
label: sad
text: You feel that way now because you're upset.  But you don't really think that.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F012
label: sad
text: It'll get better.  I know it doesn't help, but it will get better and you will remember all of the good things that you guys had; all of the memories that you have with him that were happy and you'll be grateful for those.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M011
label: sad
text: This is just -- this is a terrible life.  I just don't understand.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F013
label: xxx
text: Just life, in general?

name: Ses04M_impro06_M012
label: sad
text: I mean, it's just not fair.  Like, I don't know.  Why people -

name: Ses04M_impro06_M013
label: sad
text: there should just be some sort of rule that people don't die until they're older, 'cause then, at least, it's expected.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F014
label: sad
text: I agree.  If I knew how to make that happen, I would certainly help you.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M014
label: sad
text: I don't know what to do.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F015
label: sad
text: When's the service? Can- can we help?  Is there anything, I mean--

name: Ses04M_impro06_M015
label: sad
text: I mean, you- you can go.  I don't know.  I don't know what else.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M016
label: sad
text: I hope it rains.  Somehow that'll make me feel more comfortable.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F016
label: sad
text: Seems like if the whole world's sad, then it's okay for you to be.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M017
label: sad
text: Yeah.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M018
label: sad
text: I just wish there was some way to just bring him back to life magically.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F017
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M019
label: sad
text: Just, you know, some thing; some genie. I need to find a genie bottle.

name: Ses04M_impro06_F018
label: sad
text: I don't have any magic answers.  But,

name: Ses04M_impro06_F019
label: sad
text: I mean, as- as cliche as it is, as long as people who loved him remember him, then it's not a waste, you know.

name: Ses04M_impro06_M020
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F017
label: fru
text: Does this happen often?  Do they--you just lose baggage and you just offer people money for it?

name: Ses05F_impro05_M018
label: neu
text: Well, you know, sometimes that's--really, I mean what else could we do?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F018
label: ang
text: Uh- Not lose the baggage in the first place. I mean You're offering a service here. I paid so much money for that ticket.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M019
label: neu
text: Well,

name: Ses05F_impro05_M020
label: fru
text: Obviously ma'am.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M021
label: fru
text: I am sorry, ma'am.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M022
label: neu
text: Let's- Let's just relax for a moment, ma'am.  You understand, obviously, we're going to do everything we can to keep all of your luggage here.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M023
label: neu
text: Obviously, we're not trying to lose your luggage.  Do you really believe that we're trying to lose your luggage ma'am?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F019
label: ang
text: No, but I mean like why can't- why can't you find it?  Where did it go?  Who lost it?

name: Ses05F_impro05_M024
label: xxx
text: Well, if I knew that, then I'd know where it was, wouldn't I?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F020
label: ang
text: Well, I just-I paid so much money for this ticket.  I feel like you guys should be able to get-to offer me more than a fifty dollar voucher.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M025
label: neu
text: Well, we're talking about one bag.  You personally made it here, didn't you?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F021
label: ang
text: Yeah, meaning I didn't die in a fiery plane crash.  How convenient, but um- I paid two thousand dollar to ride your airline, and I would really appreciate getting my bags there to my destination in one place.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M026
label: fru
text: That's what the cost of the ticket was for.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M027
label: fru
text: Ma'am, international flights are not cheap and there's many reasons for that.  It does not have solely to do with your baggage or-

name: Ses05F_impro05_F022
label: ang
text: Right, but part of the agreement is that I'm paying so that I can take myself and my belongings with me.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M028
label: fru
text: Right. Yes, ma'am.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F023
label: ang
text: And that you're going to transport them safely from one place to another.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M029
label: fru
text: Right, and also if you'll read the fine print of your agreement you'll see that while we do bear some responsibility for lost luggage, it is a fifty dollar voucher.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F024
label: ang
text: That's all you can offer me? I mean, my the stuff in there is worth way more than fifty dollar.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M030
label: neu
text: Well, I understand that.  Did you buy flight insurance?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F025
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M031
label: neu
text: Well, my hands are really tied then.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F026
label: fru
text: Why do I need flight insurance?  Why don't you guys just guarantee that you're going to get the stuff that I leave with to my destination?

name: Ses05F_impro05_M032
label: neu
text: Well, it's like any kind of insurance.  You don't-when you get it, then you get more. You know, Like if you--

name: Ses05F_impro05_F027
label: fru
text: Right, but if I'm riding a bus, I don't need to buy luggage insurance that the backpack I take on is going to get to my destination with me.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M033
label: neu
text: Well, of course not because you've got your backpack with you the whole time.  Now, if you--you said this was a travel bag.  Why weren't you carrying it on if it was so important?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F028
label: fru
text: Because they made me check it.  It's too heavy.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M034
label: neu
text: Uh, so it was really heavy.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F029
label: xxx
text: So I would have carried it on, but they made me check it and then they lost it.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M035
label: fru
text: Well, you know what, it could still turn up, but until then I can offer you this fifty dollar voucher.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F030
label: fru
text: There's nothing else you can do?

name: Ses05F_impro05_M036
label: neu
text: I'm sorry, ma'am, there's nothing else I can do.  My hands are really tied here.  I really wish there was something else I could do for you.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F031
label: ang
text: I don't believe that for a second.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M037
label: neu
text: Well I don't know why you wouldn't believe that.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M038
label: fru
text: Obviously, I'm doing everything that I can here.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F032
label: xxx
text: No, I don't think you are. I mean If you were doing everything you could, you'd either give me more money or you'd figure out where my bag is.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M039
label: neu
text: Well, I have no way to give you more money.  I'm giving you as much money as I can, and figuring- as far as figuring out where you bag is-

name: Ses05F_impro05_F033
label: ang
text: What do you mean as you can?  Who makes up these rules?

name: Ses05F_impro05_M040
label: neu
text: makes up?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F034
label: ang
text: You're an autono- autonomous human being.  You could- You could go into the com-

name: Ses05F_impro05_M041
label: neu
text: The airline makes these rules, mom ma'am.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F035
label: xxx
text: You could go into the computer and- you know- print-

name: Ses05F_impro05_M042
label: xxx
text: I've gone into the computer.  I told you exactly what I can see in the computer that your luggage did arrive here.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F036
label: fru
text: So I'm just supposed to oh, well, oops, my luggage is gone and be fine with that and take your stinking fifty dollar voucher?

name: Ses05F_impro05_M043
label: fru
text: Well, you can take my stinking fifty dollar voucher and go home and wait and see if your luggage turns up. And if it does, then we'll deliver it to you.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F037
label: fru
text: And you have no guarantee.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M044
label: fru
text: I have no guarantee, absolutely not.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F038
label: fru
text: This is ridiculous.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M045
label: fru
text: How can I guarantee finding your luggage when it's lost?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F039
label: fru
text: Uh- Because you guys lost it, so it should be your responsibility to find it, too.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M046
label: fru
text: Right, well, when you're at home and you lose something, do you guarantee that you're going to find it later on?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F040
label: fru
text: Oh, come on.  Would you cut it out?  This is ridiculous.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M047
label: fru
text: Well, it sounds to me like you're being ridiculous

name: Ses05F_impro05_F041
label: ang
text: No, I don't think I am.  I like have a whole bunch of stuff that means a lot to me, and I brought it you know from Africa.  It's not like I can just go back and get it whenever I want.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M048
label: neu
text: Right.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F042
label: ang
text: It's not like I can go to Kmart and buy another.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M049
label: fru
text: I understand that, ma'am, but things get lost.  There's nothing I can do about that.  Things happen.  Accidents happen.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M050
label: neu
text: And while I really would love to be able to hand you your bag right now, obviously I can't do that.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F043
label: xxx
text: okay fine.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M051
label: neu
text: So you'd like the fifty dollar voucher?

name: Ses05F_impro05_F044
label: fru
text: Yeah, I'll take your fifty dollar voucher.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M052
label: neu
text: Okay, just fill out these three forms, and um- you'll- we'll have that sent to you within the next three weeks and, of course, we'll definitely keep an eye out for your bag.

name: Ses05F_impro05_F045
label: fru
text: Thanks.

name: Ses05F_impro05_M053
label: neu
text: You have a wonderful day.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M000
label: exc
text: Guess what?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F000
label: exc
text: What?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M001
label: exc
text: I got it.  I got accepted to U.S.C..

name: Ses05M_impro07_F001
label: exc
text: Oh, for real?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M002
label: exc
text: Yes! I just found out today.  I just got the letter.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F002
label: xxx
text: That's awesome!

name: Ses05M_impro07_F003
label: exc
text: oh,I'm so glad.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M003
label: exc
text: I know. I know.  I'm so excited.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F004
label: hap
text: What are you gonna study?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M004
label: exc
text: oh, Theater. yeah, yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F005
label: hap
text: Really? Are you doing the M.F.A. program?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M005
label: exc
text: yes.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F006
label: xxx
text: Oh, my gosh.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M006
label: exc
text: oh-

name: Ses05M_impro07_F007
label: hap
text: I heard it's so tough to get into.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M007
label: exc
text: It's exactly what I wanted.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M008
label: xxx
text: Oh, of course.  No.  I didn't know it was that tough.  I'm just happy that I made it.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F008
label: hap
text: That's awesome.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M009
label: hap
text: I worked really hard, I'll say, I worked really hard. You know, I I'm not bragging or anything like that. But-

name: Ses05M_impro07_F009
label: exc
text: Yeah, that's awesome.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F010
label: neu
text: No.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M010
label: xxx
text: No, No, I'm really looking forward to it.  You know how long -- I have been talking about this forever, right? right?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F011
label: exc
text: Uh huh.  Yes, seriously, for years.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M011
label: exc
text: Finally.  I'm so excited.  We're gonna -- well, I'll be here.  We're still gonna be able to see each other.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F012
label: exc
text: I know.  I know.  I'm- I'm definitely -- I realize [LAUGHTER].

name: Ses05M_impro07_M012
label: xxx
text: We're gonna hang out, right?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M013
label: exc
text: What are you, wait, what are you doing?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F013
label: hap
text: Um- I'm gonna be studying at U.S.C., too.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M014
label: exc
text: Perfect!  Oh, my God.  Are you staying, are you going to live on campus?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F014
label: xxx
text: Not on campus, but um- I probably won't live too far.  Maybe, I don't know, I might go to Silver Lake or something.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M015
label: xxx
text: We are gonna party all the time.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F015
label: exc
text: Yeah.  Totally- Well where are you going to live?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M016
label: exc
text: We are gonna have a great time.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M017
label: exc
text: [garbage] I'm going to live on campus.  I mean, well, around campus, anyway.  Yeah, housing around campus.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F016
label: neu
text: Oh yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F017
label: neu
text: Good tradeoff

name: Ses05M_impro07_M018
label: exc
text: I just want to be really close to things, you know.  I know it's not exactly the best neighborhood in the entire world. But uh-

name: Ses05M_impro07_F018
label: neu
text: I don't- I don't think it's that bad.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M019
label: exc
text: I don't- you know ,I feel the same way, you know what I mean.  And everybody says a lot of other crap you know, they don't know what they are talking about anyway.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F019
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M020
label: exc
text: They don't live here.  They don't know, right?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F020
label: neu
text: Yeah. I think it's really also if you- if you consider yourself like, us and them, kind of thing- If you think you're part of your community then --you going to like it more

name: Ses05M_impro07_M021
label: exc
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M022
label: exc
text: Exactly.  You make it what you make it. You know? Right? And I'm gonna make it so freaking awesome.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F021
label: exc
text: Right, Exactly.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F022
label: exc
text: Oh I'm so glad.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M023
label: exc
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F023
label: hap
text: So when do you know, like, where you're gonna live? and-

name: Ses05M_impro07_M024
label: exc
text: Well, I don't know.  I've got to go look for a place.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F024
label: neu
text: Oh, wow.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M025
label: exc
text: Yeah, yeah.  I- I don't- I don't know.  Do you have any suggestions?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F025
label: neu
text: Um-

name: Ses05M_impro07_M026
label: exc
text: You know the area better than I do.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F026
label: neu
text: Yeah.  I mean, I know, I know, like the- the housing surrounding the campus pretty well.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M027
label: xxx
text: yeah, yeah?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F027
label: neu
text: Um- How many people do you want to live with?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M028
label: exc
text: Not a lot.  I mean, I wouldn't want to live with more than three other people.  So, like four of us total, right?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F028
label: neu
text: All dudes?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M029
label: exc
text: I don't care. I don't care.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F029
label: neu
text: Um- I think I have some friends.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M030
label: exc
text: yeah?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F030
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M031
label: exc
text: That would be perfect.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F031
label: hap
text: There's actually, a friend of mine is um- moving out of her place and her place is amazing-- And it's really cheap.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M032
label: exc
text: Really?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M033
label: exc
text: Really?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F032
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M034
label: exc
text: Cheap is exactly what I need- Because I have no money at all.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F033
label: neu
text: Okay.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M035
label: exc
text: But, uh--

name: Ses05M_impro07_F034
label: xxx
text: How are you going to pay for school? Did- did you--?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M036
label: exc
text: Loans, scholarships, I've got a lot of scholarships-- Yeah, yeah. I'm- I'm half Native American so I get all those scholarships, too. yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F035
label: hap
text: You've got a lot- oh, awesome.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F036
label: hap
text: Oh cool.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M037
label: exc
text: So it comes Indian like. And you know I'm kind of smart, so.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F037
label: exc
text: Yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M038
label: xxx
text: That helps, right?  Get some academic scholarships. And uh-

name: Ses05M_impro07_F038
label: neu
text: totally.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F039
label: hap
text: good for you.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M039
label: hap
text: And yeah, well, I mean, basically I just applied for any and every possible scholarship and grant that could come by, so I can go.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F040
label: neu
text: the way to do it.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M040
label: exc
text: Yeah, yeah, yeah.  And it's gonna work out.  I'm gonna be able to pay for it, I'm gonna go, I mean, I'll have a little debt in the end.  But I don't care.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F041
label: exc
text: Wow, are you so excited?

name: Ses05M_impro07_M041
label: exc
text: It's just you know a dream come true.  How could you not be excited about a dream come true?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F042
label: exc
text: You're gonna be so busy, too. You're going to have to work so hard.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M042
label: exc
text: Oh I know, I know.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M043
label: exc
text: But I'm so looking forward to being so busy. You know what I mean?  It's the kind of busy you've got to love, right?

name: Ses05M_impro07_F043
label: xxx
text: Oh totally.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M044
label: exc
text: Because you're doing something you love.  That's the kind of busy you want.  I want to be able to do that for the rest of my life.  Be that kind of busy.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F044
label: exc
text: All right.  Wow.  So exciting.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M045
label: exc
text: I had to tell you right away.  I knew you'd be excited.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M046
label: hap
text: We'll have fun.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F045
label: hap
text: Yeah.  We'll have so much fun.

name: Ses05M_impro07_M047
label: exc
text: Great.  Okay.

name: Ses05M_impro07_F046
label: xxx
text: cool

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F000
label: sad
text: What's he going to say?  Maybe we should tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M000
label: xxx
text: He saw it.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F001
label: sad
text: When?  I was the first one up.  He was still in bed.  How could he have seen it?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M001
label: xxx
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F002
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M002
label: xxx
text: I don't know, like, four o'clock this morning.  I heard a crack, and I woke up, and I looked out the window and he was standing right there when it broke.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four in the morning?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M003
label: xxx
text: I don't know, but after it broke he ran back inside and started crying in the kitchen.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F004
label: sad
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M004
label: sad
text: No.  I figured it was best to leave him alone.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F005
label: sad
text: He cried hard?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M005
label: xxx
text: I could hear him right through the floor in my room.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F006
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out there at that hour?  He's getting just like after Larry died, walking around at night.  He dreams.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M006
label: xxx
text: I guess he is.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F007
label: xxx
text: What's the meaning of that?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M007
label: xxx
text: I don't know the meaning of it, but you know one thing Mom, we made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F008
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M008
label: xxx
text: Being dishonest with him.  It's the kind of thing that pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: What do you mean dishonest?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M009
label: fru
text: You know that Larry's not coming back and I know it.  So why do we go on letting him think that we believe with him?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F010
label: fru
text: What do you want to do, argue with him?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M010
label: fru
text: I don't want to argue with him.  But it's time he knows that nobody else thinks that Larry's alive anymore.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M011
label: ang
text: Why should he dream about him, walking around looking for him at night?  Do we contradict him?  Do we say straight out that we don't have any hope anymore, that we haven't had any hope for years now?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F011
label: xxx
text: You can't say that to him.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M012
label: fru
text: We have to say it to him.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F012
label: fru
text: how are you gonna prove it?  Can you prove it?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M013
label: ang
text: For Gods sake!  Three years!  Nobody comes back after three years.  That's insane!

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F013
label: fru
text: To you it is and to me, but not to him.  Now you can talk yourself until you're blue in the face, Chris, but there's no body and there's no grave.  So where are you?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M014
label: xxx
text: Sit down, mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F014
label: ang
text: The trouble is the God damn newspapers.  I mean every every week a kid turns up, missing like longer than Larry.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: All right.  All right, mom.  Just listen.  You know why I invited Annie her, don't you?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F015
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M016
label: neu
text: You know.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: Well, I have an idea.  But what's the story?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M017
label: neu
text: I'm going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Well, that's your business, Chris.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M018
label: fru
text: It's not just my business.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F018
label: ang
text: Well, what do you want me to do?  You're old enough to make- to know your own mind.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: So it's okay then?  I should just go ahead and do it?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F019
label: xxx
text: Well, you want to make sure that your father isn't --

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M020
label: ang
text: Oh, so it isn't just my business?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F020
label: fru
text: I'm just saying.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M021
label: ang
text: You infuriate me sometimes.  Do you know that?  God.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M022
label: ang
text: Isn't it your business, too, if dad -- if I tell dad and he throws a fit about it?  I mean, you have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F021
label: ang

label: ang

label: ang
text: From your father's point of view he's not dead and she's still his girl.  Now, you can go on from there if you know where to go, Chris, but I don't know.  So what can I do for you?

name: Ses05M_script01_1_M024
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is but everytime I reach out for something I- that I want, I have to pull back because I might hurt somebody else.  My whole bloody life; time after time after time.

text: Well, you're a considerate fella, there's nothing wrong in that

label: neu

label: xxx
text: Well, if that's the case, then that's the end of it.  But from her letters it sounds like she has forgotten him.  I'll find out.  And then we'll thrash it out with dad, all right?  Mom, don't avoid me.

label: fru

label: fru
text: No.  I don't want a -- look, your father thinks he's coming back, Chris.  You marry that girl and you're pronouncing him dead.  Now, what's going to happen to your father; do you know?  Because, I don't.

label: xxx
text: All right then, mom.

name: Ses05M_script01_1_F030
label: xxx
text: Just give it some more thought.

label: xxx
text: You can talk yourself blue in the face but there's no body and there's no grave.  So where are you?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M011
label: xxx
text: Sit down, mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F012
label: fru
text: The trouble is the God damn newspapers, I mean, ea- each week a new boy turns up out of nowhere.  So the next one is gonna be Larry.  So you--

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M012
label: fru
text: All right.  All right, just listen.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M013
label: xxx
text: You know why I invited Annie, right?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F013
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M014
label: xxx
text: You know.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F014
label: xxx
text: Well, I've got an idea but what's the story?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M015
label: xxx
text: I'm gonna ask her to marry me.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F015
label: xxx
text: Well, that's your business, Chris.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M016
label: fru
text: You know it's not just my business.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F016
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do?  I mean, You're old enough to know your own mind.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M017
label: fru
text: So it's all right then?  I should just go ahead with it?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F017
label: xxx
text: Well, you want to make sure that your father isn't gonna --

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M018
label: xxx
text: So it isn't just my business?  You infuriate me sometime, you know that.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M019
label: ang
text: Isn't it your business, too, if I tell dad and he throws a fit about it?  You have such a talent for ignoring things.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F018
label: fru
text: I ignore what I got to ignore.  I mean, the girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M020
label: ang
text: She's not Larry's girl.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F019
label: xxx
text: As far as your father is concerned, he's not dead.  And she's still his girl.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F020
label: xxx
text: Now, you can go on with this if you know where to go, but I don't know where to go.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M021
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is but every time I reach out for something that I want, I have to pull back because it might hurt somebody else, my whole bloody life, time after time, after time.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F021
label: xxx
text: Well, you're a considerate fella.  There's nothing wrong with that.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M022
label: ang
text: what to hell with that!

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F022
label: neu
text: Have you asked Annie yet?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M023
label: xxx
text: I wanted to get this settled first.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F023
label: neu
text: Well, how do you know she'll marry you?  Maybe she feels like your father does.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M024
label: xxx
text: Well, if she does then that's the end of it.  But from her letters it seems like she's forgotten him.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M025
label: fru
text: I'll find out and then we'll thrash it out with dad, all right?  Mom, don't avoid me.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F024
label: neu
text: The trouble is you don't see enough women.  You never did.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M026
label: fru
text: So what, I'm not fast with women?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F025
label: xxx
text: I just don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M027
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F026
label: neu
text: Well, that's a good reason.  But it don't mean a thing. I mean, You haven't seen her since you went to war.  It's been five years.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M028
label: fru
text: [garbage] I don't know.  It's just,

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M029
label: fru
text: she's who I know best. I know her since I- I was a kid I grew up with her.  When I think of somebody for my wife these days, I I think of Annie.  What do you want, a diagram?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F027
label: fru
text: No I don't want a-  Your father thinks he's coming back, Chris.  If you marry that girl, you're pronouncing him dead.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F028
label: sad
text: Now, what's going to happen to your father, do you know?  I don't.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M030
label: fru
text: All right then, mom.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F029
label: xxx
text: Just give it some more thought.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M031
label: ang
text: I've given it three years of thought.  I had hoped if I waited, dad would've forgotten him by now and we could have a- a regular wedding and everybody happy.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M032
label: ang
text: But if that can't happen then I'll just get out.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F030
label: sur
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M033
label: ang
text: I'll get out.  I'll go get married someplace else, I- I'll live someplace else, maybe New York.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F031
label: ang
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M034
label: xxx
text: I've been a good son for too long, a good sucker.  I'm through with it.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F032
label: xxx
text: But you have a business here.  What the hell is this?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M035
label: ang
text: The business?  The business doesn't inspire me.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F033
label: ang
text: Must you be inspired?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M036
label: ang
text: Yeah, I'd like one hour a day.  If I have to grub for money all day long, I'd like to go home to something beautiful.  I'd like a family.  I'd like some kids.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M037
label: xxx
text: I'd like to build something that's my own.  And Annie is in the center of that.  Now, where do I find it?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F034
label: ang
text: You don't want to think like that.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M038
label: xxx
text: Well, you help me stay here.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F035
label: fru
text: All right.  But don't think like that because what the hell did we work for, Chris?  All of this, all of it, it's all just for you.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M039
label: fru
text: I know that, mom.  Just you help me stay here.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F036
label: xxx
text: Don't think like that, do you hear me?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M040
label: ang
text: Well, I am thinking like that.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F037
label: fru
text: I don't understand you, do I?

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_M041
label: ang
text: No, you don't.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses05M_script01_1b_F038
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I can see that.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F000
label: exc
text: Okay, so big news.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M002
label: sur
text: Shut up.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F002
label: exc
text: Yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M003
label: exc
text: No way.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F003
label: exc
text: Yeah.

label: xxx
text: He asked you?

name: Ses05F_impro03_F004
label: exc
text: Uh-huh.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M005

text: No way, when? when,when, When did it happen?

name: Ses05F_impro03_F005
label: exc
text: Just a couple days ago.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M006
label: exc
text: Oh my gosh.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F006
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses05F_impro03_M007
label: exc
text: And you actually said yes.  I can't believe it.  I never thought you would get married.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F007
label: exc
text: I know me neither.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M008
label: exc
text: Oh my gosh.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F008
label: exc
text: Right, I thought I would be way older too. I thought I would be I be at least thirty something.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M009
label: exc
text: Oh absolutely.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M010
label: exc
text: Well, we always said we'd be in our thirtieth when we got married. And we were going to get married to each other if we didn't by then

name: Ses05F_impro03_F009
label: exc
text: Yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F010
label: xxx
text: I know, right. What'd we say, when we were thirty nine?

name: Ses05F_impro03_M011
label: exc
text: Thirty nine, yeah.  I can't believe it.  So you broke our pact. Thanks a lot.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F011

text: Sorry.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M012
label: exc
text: Thanks a lot.  Well, okay, you've got to tell me the details.  What did he say?  Where was it?  What happened?

name: Ses05F_impro03_F012

text: Um, Well, uh, I don't-I don't know how much planning he had done.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M013

text: It was really beautiful.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M014
label: xxx
text: You've got to love that.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F014
label: xxx
text: Yeah, we went to a really great jazz show, and um-

name: Ses05F_impro03_M015
label: xxx
text: Nice, you love the jazz.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F015
label: xxx
text: Yeah, and after, we went up to this um, this place like a restaurant on the roof kind of thing.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M016

name: Ses05F_impro03_F016

text: Were you in Chicago?

name: Ses05F_impro03_F017
label: xxx
text: Mm-hmm.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M018
label: xxx
text: Downtown, was it beautiful? of course it was beautiful

name: Ses05F_impro03_F018

text: so beautiful, full moon.

text: What a guy.  I can't believe it.  So okay, so do you know any details?  When's it going to be?  Anything?

text: Yeah.  Yeah, of course.

text: So next fall I guess.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M022
label: xxx
text: Next fall.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F022

text: Yeah, I like the autumn.

text: Are you going to do it in town or are you out of town?

name: Ses05F_impro03_F023
label: xxx
text: oh, We'll do it in town.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M024
label: xxx
text: Oh, okay.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F024
label: xxx
text: Yeah, his family doesn't live too far away, so I think-

label: xxx
text: Yeah, where's he from again?

name: Ses05F_impro03_F025
label: xxx
text: He's from Chicago as well.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M026
label: xxx
text: Oh he is, okay.

name: Ses05F_impro03_F026
label: xxx
text: Yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M027

text: Cool, perfect.  Another Chicagoite, got to love it.

label: hap
text: It's so weird too, right, that like you can grow up so near somebody and never know them until you travel hundreds of miles away.

name: Ses05F_impro03_M028

name: Ses05F_impro03_F028

text: I know

name: Ses05F_impro03_M036

name: Ses05F_impro03_M039

name: Ses05F_impro03_M040

It's like L.A. is so frustrating because if you don't know somebody, you can't -you can't get a job.  It's impossible.  It's totally discriminatory.  You have to know somebody.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M011
label: neu
text: Well, you know what?  Life gets humili... humiliating at times.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F012
label: fru
text: No, I don't I don't want to accept that.  I think that's bullshit.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M012
label: neu
text: Well, what are you going to do about it to make it different?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F013
label: fru
text: I don't know.  I feel like I've tried everything.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M013
label: neu
text: Have you?  There's got to be something else.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F014
label: fru
text: Three years of going out every day--every day--and looking for a job and being constantly denied everywhere I go.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M014
label: fru
text: I don't know what to tell you, babe. Maybe- Maybe you're right.  Maybe you do have to go someplace else.  I don't know, maybe it's just not meant to be here.  I mean I want you to-I don't want you to give up, but I mean I don't want you to move away, but at the same time, I don't like seeing you like this.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F015
label: sad
text: I'm just so scared to start over I mean.  I put so much time and energy into being here.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F016
label: sad
text: Where am I supposed to go?  I mean, like what?

name: Ses05F_impro04_M015
label: neu
text: If it's rent or something like that, I mean I can help you out a little bit, if- if that will help you you know stick with it.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F017
label: sad
text: I don't know. Maybe I can take out a loan. I just- I need prospects and I don't feel like I have any.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M016
label: neu
text: Well, just don't give up. And there's- you know, You never know, something might be around the corner tomorrow.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F018
label: xxx
text: But that doesn't help me when I'm hungry now.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M017
label: neu
text: Well, you know I'm not going to let you starve.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F019
label: sad
text: I'm just worried.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M018
label: xxx
text: Of course, you're worried.  We're all worried.  I'm worried for you.  Everyone's always worried.  You know, I don't-maybe I have a job and yeah, it's a good job whatever and I'm happy, but it doesn't mean I'm going to have it tomorrow or the next day.  You never know what's going to happen.  Something crazy could happen tomorrow.	Something crazy can happen for you tomorrow and you'll get a job.  You never know.  You can walk up to somebody on the street and it'll be something great.  You've just got to be positive.  You're so negative all the time.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F020
label: fru
text: It's three years.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M019
label: fru
text: I understand, but you know what, you've been negative for three years.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F021
label: xxx
text: Is that honestly what you think?

name: Ses05F_impro04_M020
label: neu
text: It's the way it seems to me.  You started complaining about not being able to find a job the first day you went out and didn't find a job.  And I'm not saying like and not trying to you know put you down or anything, it's just that-

name: Ses05F_impro04_F022
label: sad
text: That's really hard to hear.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M021
label: fru
text: But it's true, babe.  You've got to be more positive about things.  Like- Have some faith in yourself.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F023
label: sad
text: I feel like I have faith and now faith is running thin because there is no money.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M022
label: neu
text: Well, exactly.  Money is not everything.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F024
label: fru
text: Brian, I don't think you have a concept of what I mean by- by money.  I don't mean money like oh, I can't go get my hair and my nails done today, I mean like I can't eat.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M023
label: fru
text: You can.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F025
label: xxx
text: No, no, really, if I can't pay to live somewhere, I'm going to end up living in my car.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M024
label: neu
text: You know I would never let that happen.  I wouldn't let that happen.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F026
label: fru
text: I just-- I

name: Ses05F_impro04_M025
label: neu
text: You can always stay with me if you- if you have to stay with me for a while and get yourself back up on your feet again.  You know I'm not just going to you know just throw you to the wolves or something like that.  If there's any way I can help you, I will.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F027
label: xxx
text: Well, thank you.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M026
label: neu
text: But you have to keep trying.  You can't give up.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F028
label: fru
text: Yeah, I don't intend to stop trying.  I just--I don't when is when enough is enough.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M027
label: neu
text: And you've got to think--well, ask yourself why are they not hiring you?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F029
label: fru
text: I don't know.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M028
label: neu
text: I mean are you going in for interviews?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F030
label: fru
text: Yeah, and I look nice and I'm you know--

name: Ses05F_impro04_M029
label: neu
text: Are you presenting-

name: Ses05F_impro04_F031
label: fru
text: charismatic.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M030
label: neu
text: putting your best foot forward? or you

name: Ses05F_impro04_F032
label: fru
text: yah, to-totally, and I'm not--

name: Ses05F_impro04_M031
label: neu
text: Do they seem to like you? I mean, Can you get any read from them?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F033
label: fru
text: Yeah, I always think so, but I- I just feel like it's a lot of lip service everywhere I go.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M032
label: neu
text: Have you ever called them back and asked why you didn't get the job?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F034
label: fru
text: Yeah, I follow up.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M033
label: neu
text: Do they give you any specifics as to why they didn't go with you?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F035
label: fru
text: It's just like- it's a matter of-

name: Ses05F_impro04_F036
label: fru
text: not tall enough, not pretty enough, not--you know how this place is.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M034
label: neu
text: Yeah, I understand. maybe What jobs are we talking about?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F037
label: fru
text: I mean, anything.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M035
label: neu
text: Like- What's your ideal job?  What do you want to do?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F038
label: neu
text: Well, I'd like to be a working actor.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M036
label: neu
text: Of course.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F039
label: neu
text: But um--

name: Ses05F_impro04_M037
label: neu
text: Everyone wants to be a working actor, but they all work at something else.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F040
label: neu
text: Yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M038
label: neu
text: So what's the something else?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F041
label: neu
text: Bartending, catering.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M039
label: neu
text: You can't get a catering gig?  Well, I can call some friends.  I- Well, I did call some friends before, but you went in once and then never went back.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F042
label: sad
text: Would you be willing to make some more calls on my behalf? I won't--I won't make you look bad.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M040
label: neu
text: If I- If you- Will you stick with it?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F043
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M041
label: neu
text: Okay.  Okay, I'll call some people.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F044
label: neu
text: Thank you.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M042
label: neu
text: But you've got to keep looking for other stuff. You've got to do it on your own, too.  Okay?

name: Ses05F_impro04_F045
label: neu
text: I will, I will.

name: Ses05F_impro04_F046
label: xxx
text: Yeah, thank you.

name: Ses05F_impro04_M043
label: neu
text: You know I'll always help you.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M000
label: xxx
text: Oh Good God.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F000
label: fea
text: Do you think it's them?

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M001
label: exc
text: I wonder.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F001
label: exc
text: what, Nobody knows we are here except Freda and she wouldn't ring up.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M002
label: fea
text: Must be them then?

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F002
label: exc
text: What do we do?

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M003
label: neu
text: We're all right, aren't we, darling, whatever happens?

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F003
label: exc
text: Now and always, my sweet.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M004
label: exc
text: I don't care then.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F004
label: exc
text: It was bound to happen sooner or later.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M005
label: xxx
text: Hello?  Hello?  What?  Wrong number.

label: exc
text: Oh, it sent shivers up my spine.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M006
label: exc
text: Oh, what shall we do if they suddenly walk in on us.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F006
label: xxx
text: Behave exquisitely.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M007
label: exc
text: With the worst- with the most perfect poise?

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F007
label: xxx
text: I shall probably do a Court Curtsey.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M008
label: exc
text: Uhh, It's amazing how once you feel--

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M009
label: exc
text: things that ought to matter most dreadfully don't matter at all when one's happy, do they?

label: xxx
text: What's so horrible is that one can't stay happy.

label: exc
text: Uhh, You mustn't say that, my darling.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F009
label: xxx
text: Well, it's true.  The whole business is a very poor joke.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M011
label: exc
text: Being that sacred and wonderful thing, love.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_F010
label: xxx
text: Meaning just that.

name: Ses05M_script03_1_M012
label: exc
text: Um What does it all mean?  That's what I ask myself in my endless quest for ultimate truth.  Dear God, what does it all mean?

label: exc

label: exc
text: uh- the- Being flippant brings out the acid in their damned beauty and light.

label: xxx
text: Oh, how long will it last, this ludicrous, overbearing love of ours?

text: So is everyone else in the long run.  Let's be superficial and pity the poor philosophers.  Let's blow trumpets and squeakers and enjoy the party as long as we can, like little quiet idiotic school children.
