label: exc
text: Honey, it's a natural phenomenon.  I mean, this kind of thing only happens once a year.  It's a great opportunity.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M018
label: exc
text: I mean, Think about people in Kansas, they've got to get like you know plane tickets and hotel reservations just to see this.  We're just forty minutes away.  It's just too good of an opportunity to pass up.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F013
label: fru
text: Pass what up?  It's It's just little fish and they swim up on the beach and they flop around and they swim away and then they die.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M019
label: exc
text: Yeah, but all that time on the beach is the highlight of their little lives.  You know,

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M020
label: exc
text: and all that about flopping around, it's like laying eggs or what do you -- spawning or mating or something like that.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M021
label: exc
text: I mean, this is a big night for these guys.  You know, life's last orgy.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F014
label: fru
text: What are you so excited about.  This isn't rocket science, this is just fish.  Fish nobody even eats.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M022
label: fru
text: Yeah, they do.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F015
label: fru
text: Augie.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M023
label: exc
text: All right.  But they are fish that do something no other fish do.  Like the swallows were turning into Capistrano or Lemmings jumping off the cliffs, you know like that. There's- There's magic here and mystery.  And a little bit of the unexplainable.  You know, I can't see how you could not be interested.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F016
label: sad
text: I'm just not.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M024
label: fru
text: For real?

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F017
label: xxx
text: Yes.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M025
label: fru
text: I don't get it.  I mean, the first time we came you said it was the best night of your life. And last year I remember distinctly you were so excited about coming that you stubbed your toe toe pushing me out the door and you didn't even notice until you got in the car.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F018
label: fru
text: Well, if you also remember last year we- our shoes got wet, I got sand in my panties, we had a big argument, you had a sore throat, and we didn't see the grunion.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M026
label: xxx
text: We weren't in a good spot.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F019
label: fru
text: We didn't see them the first time either.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M027
label: xxx
text: We just weren't in a good spot.  This is a much better spot.  I've got a great sense for these things.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M028
label: exc
text: Look there.  What is that?  Is that -- Oh No, that's seaweed.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M029
label: exc
text: Oh, this is great.  I wouldn't miss this for the world. I mean, think about this, I know you're not interested but just think about this for a second;

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M030
label: exc
text: somewhere out there is a giant mass of silver fish all swimming in this direction.  They don't know why they're doing it.  We don't know why they're doing it.  They didn't- It wasn't a decision.  No one took a vote.  Nobody sent them an invitation or a map or anything like that.  It was just some internal time release fire cracker that went off. And all as one they turned around and formed this giant line as long as the California coastline and they just started swimming.  They are swimming right now at this very moment.   And And-

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M031
label: exc
text: And it's single mindedness with no mind. It- It's urgency, it's pure urge.  I mean, they didn't make any decisions.  They don't ask any questions.  They don't give it a name,

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M032
label: exc
text: they just all as one turn around and start swimming to this very point where we are standing now for one last celebration of sex and death. God, it's giving me Goosebumps.  Look at all the hairs that are standing up.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_F020
label: xxx
text: That's the wind.

name: Ses05M_script02_1_M033
label: exc
text: Well, so what do you think?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M000
label: exc
text: Well, so?  What do you think?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F000
label: xxx
text: About what?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M001
label: fru
text: What I was just saying.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F001
label: xxx
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M002
label: neu
text: It certainly is not. It's slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: It's PR, somebody sold you a bill of goods that this wonderful event is going to occur on the beach.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M003
label: neu
text: I am not the only one, look at all these people.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: Yeah, they are all told the same thing.  They are all told that you know.  Gets them excited and they can't wait and that if they just get in on the right spot, than you than maybe life will start

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M004
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F004
label: fru
text: I am sorry.  It's just fish to me.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M005
label: neu
text: Carla, can I ask you a question?  Now don't be upset, are you having a period?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F005
label: ang
text: God damn it, Augie.  Why do you always ask things like that?  It's so insulting.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: What's bugging you?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F006
label: fru
text: I just had a different idea of what this evening is going to look like.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M007
label: fru
text: There's nothing to it.  We come down here.  The grunion arrives and they do their little fish thing.  And we say, Oh, wow.  Look at the little fish.  They go home, we go home.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F007
label: fru
text: For heaven's sake Augie, grow up we are not going to see the grunions.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M008
label: fru
text: Why not?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: We never do.  Have we ever?  We never have.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M009
label: fru
text: We miss them twice, it's not ever.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F009
label: fru
text: Twice is every time we tried, that's ever.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M010
label: neu
text: Well We will see them this year.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F010
label: fru
text: No, we won't.  Augie it's like waiting for Santa Claus to come.  I feel like I am going to spend my entire life standing on the beach with my eyes wide open and my hands clasp expectantly in front of me waiting for the fish to show up and the fish will not show up.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: I thought you wanted to see it.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F011
label: fru
text: I did, I do want to see it.  I always want to see it, Augie.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: It's just fish, it's nothing to get traumatize over.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F012
label: fru
text: For heaven's sake, this is not about fish.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: Okay, I been trying to work this backwards but I can't seem to pinpoint a moment when we took a turn for the worst here.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M014
label: xxx
text: When you are on the phone with Marge, everything was fine.  Dinner was okay.  Doing the dishes was no problem. Let's see, I took a shower and you were watching the news and you said the grunions are running tonight and I said, great, let's go I am feeling lucky.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M015
label: xxx
text: Right, so I am putting on my jacket and putting up the animals and pulling the car out of the garage.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F013
label: sad
text: Augie, do you remember the first time we came to see it?  It was about four years ago right after we got married and we thought I was pregnant.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F014
label: sad
text: We had a bottle of champagne but no glasses and you ask me to dance so we took off our shoes and while we were dancing, you said the most intimate things right in my ears so I could feel them as much as hear them.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F015
label: hap
text: And I remember thinking, Finally, finally.  I am as happy as I am supposed to be.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M016
label: neu
text: Wait a minute, I got it.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F016
label: sad
text: Dancing barefoot in the sand, drinking champagne from the bottle.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M017
label: xxx
text: It was in the car, right?  When we were passing Knickerbocker Liquor Locker, you said, Let's get some champagne.  And I said time wasting or something like that.  Right? of course.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F017
label: sad
text: I rather not remember some things.  I rather not hope for some things.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M018
label: exc
text: Okay, all right I got it.  You wanted it to be like the other time, okay no problem. Listen, You want to dance?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M019
label: exc
text: You want me to go get some champagne?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F019
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M020
label: exc
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F020
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M021
label: xxx
text: What, you want me to whisper in your ear?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F021
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M022
label: fru
text: You want to get married again?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F022
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M023
label: fru
text: What? What You want a divorce?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F023
label: fru
text: No no.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M024
label: fru
text: A vacation? A new carpet, a poodle?  A bag of ice cream, a suicide pack, what what Carla?  What the hell do you want?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F024
label: fru
text: I want something to turn out the way it is suppose to turn out.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M025
label: ang
text: What.  Welcome to the human race.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M026
label: xxx
text: You think this is what I had in mind?  You think that when I propose I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road, we will end up on a beach arguing over fish. You think that I knew that there would be times when you will look at me like I am used Kleenex?  Or that I will look at you and think, holy hell what's the next flight to Alaska.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M027
label: fru
text: No, no I was just like you, I thought it will be all peaches and roses and- and sand in our toes and wind in our hair and the fish will always come. And the bills will always magically pay themselves and we will have three fat rosy kids and we will be, HAHA baby the joke is on us.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M028
label: xxx
text: Because you know what Carla?  You know what you get?  This.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F025
label: sad
text: This what?  What is this?  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M029
label: xxx
text: Yes it is.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F026
label: sad
text: Sure, this is standing.  This is waiting.  This is fighting.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M030
label: xxx
text: Right.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F027
label: sad
text: But this isn't anything like I thought it would be.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M031
label: sad
text: No, I know me either.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F028
label: sad
text: I mean it is just this , I mean it includes a lot and everything and you know it's the sand and it's the full moon and I just-I am sorry but I couldn't help wishing I was somewhere else.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M032
label: sad
text: Maybe if you are with somebody else too?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F029
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M033
label: sad
text: No, I know, but.  I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F030
label: sad
text: For heaven's sake Augie, wherever I am I always wanted to be with you.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M034
label: xxx
text: Yeah?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F031
label: xxx
text: For heaven's sake, don't you know that?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F032
label: sad
text: Whatever I am doing, I wanted to be with you.  I mean you are probably the one who wishes you were with somebody else, somebody who didn't take everything so hard and who knows how to enjoy herself.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M035
label: hap
text: Actually, now that you mention it.  No, I don't.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F033
label: hap
text: Good.  So maybe we are on the wrong spot but we are with the right person.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M036
label: hap
text: I don't know.  Seems like a pretty good spot to me I mean look at the view of the moon you got from here.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F034
label: hap
text: Yes, I did notice that.  It does look really beautiful on the water.  The gold white moon.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M037
label: hap
text: Well, look what we have got here.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F035
label: xxx
text: Augie, you bought refreshments.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M038
label: xxx
text: Well, it's not champagne.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F036
label: xxx
text: Well than we don't need glasses.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M039
label: xxx
text: Are you still cold?  You still want to go home?

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F037
label: hap
text: No, I am beginning to think that maybe this is the spot after all.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M040
label: hap
text: Shh, If we're very quiet, the fish might come.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_F038
label: xxx
text: Or not.

name: Ses05F_script02_2_M041
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F000
label: neu
text: You're the only one I know who loves his parents.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M000
label: xxx
text: I know.  It's going out of style, isn't it?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F001
label: hap
text: It's all right.  It's a good thing.  It's lovely here.  The air is sweet.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M001
label: exc
text: So, you're not sorry I came?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F002
label: xxx
text: No.  But I'm not going to stay.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M002
label: sur
text: Why?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F003
label: neu
text: Well, your mother, first of all, pretty much told me to leave.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M003
label: neu
text: Well-

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F004
label: xxx
text: You saw that.  And well you've been --

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M004
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F005
label: xxx
text: You've been sort of embarrassed since I got here.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M005
label: xxx
text: Well, I planned on kind of sneaking up on you in a period of a week or so, but they all take it for granted that we're set.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F006
label: neu
text: I figured they would, your mother at least.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M006
label: xxx
text: How did you know?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F007
label: neu
text: Well, from her perspective, I mean, why else would I come here?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M007
label: xxx
text: Well, so would you want to?  I mean, I guess you know that's why I asked you to come.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F008
label: xxx
text: Yes, that's why I came.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M008
label: xxx
text: Annie, I love you.  I love you a great deal.  I love you. -I

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M009
label: xxx
text: I don't know what to say.  I have no imagination.  That's all I have to say to you.  God, I'm embarrassing you. I-I didn't want to do this here. I- I wanted to do it someplace different, someplace where we could be new to each other.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M010
label: exc
text: You feel it's wrong here, don't you; this yard, this chair?  I want you to be ready for me, Annie. I- I don't want to win you away from anything.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F009
label: hap
text: Oh, Chris I've been ready for a long time.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M011
label: xxx
text: So he's gone forever then?  You sure?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F010
label: sad
text: I almost got married two years ago.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M012
label: sur
text: Why didn't you?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F011
label: xxx
text: You started to write me.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M013
label: hap
text: You felt something that far back?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F012
label: hap
text: Everyday since.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M014
label: xxx
text: Annie, why didn't you call me or tell me?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F013
label: exc
text: Well, I mean, until then you never wrote and when you did, what did you say?  I mean, you sure can be ambiguous.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M015
label: xxx
text: Give me a kiss, Annie.  Give me a --

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M016
label: exc
text: oh, God I kissed Annie.  I kissed Annie. I can't How long have I waited to do that?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F014
label: xxx
text: I'll never forgive you.  Why did you wait so long?  All this time I've sat around wondering if I was crazy for thinking of you.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M017
label: exc
text: Oh, Annie, we're gonna live now.  I'm going to make you so happy.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F015
label: exc
text: Not like that you're not.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M018
label: sur
text: I kissed you.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F016
label: sad
text: Like Larry's brother.  Do it like you, Chris.  What's the matter?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M019
label: sad
text: Lets go for a ride.  I I- I want to be alone with you.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F017
label: xxx
text: No.  Chris, what is it?  Is it your mother?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M020
label: sad
text: No, nothing like that.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F018
label: xxx
text: You have to tell me.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F019
label: sad
text: Even in your letters there was something ashamed.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M021
label: sad
text: Yeah, I suppose I have been.  But it's going for me.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F020
label: sad
text: You have to tell me.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M022
label: neu
text: I don't I don't know where to start.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F021
label: sad
text: It wouldn't work like this.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M023
label: sad
text: It's so mixed up with so many other things.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M024
label: xxx
text: You remember when I was overseas, I was in command of a company?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F022
label: neu
text: Yeah, sure.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M025
label: sad
text: I lost them.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F023
label: sad
text: How many?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M026
label: sad
text: Just about all.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M027
label: sad
text: It- It takes time to toss something like that off,I mean, because they weren't just men.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M028
label: xxx
text: For instance, there was this time, and it had been raining for several days, and this kid came up to me and he gave me his last pair of dry socks, just put them in my pocket.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M029
label: sad
text: I know it's it's just a little thing but that's just the kind of guys I had.  They didn't die.  They killed themselves for each other.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M030
label: sad
text: I mean that exactly, anymore selfish -- just a little bit more selfish and they would have been here today. And it gave me an idea as I was watching them all go down.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M031
label: xxx
text: Everything was being destroyed see, but I felt like something new was being created at the same time.  Like it kind of -- responsibility.  You know, man to man.  Do you understand what I'm saying?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M032
label: xxx
text: And and to see that again, to to bring that back on the earth again, like- like a monument that that would stand behind these men and and and it would make a difference to them.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M033
label: sad
text: It was and then I went home.  And it was incredible.  It didn't have any meaning there.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M034
label: xxx
text: I mean, the whole thing was like some kind of bus accident to them.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M035
label: xxx
text: So I went back to work for my dad and that whole rat race again.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M036
label: sad
text: I felt what you said, ashamed somehow because nobody had changed at all.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M037
label: fru
text: It seemed to make suckers out of so many guys.  And I-I felt wrong to be alive; to to open that bank book, to to drive that car, the new car, and look at that new refrigerator. I mean,

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M038
label: fru
text: you can take those things out of the war, but if you're gonna drive that car you've got to know that that came from the love a man can have from a man. And you've got to be a little bit better because of that.  Because if you're not, then it's all just loot and there's blood on it and I didn't want any of it.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M039
label: sad
text: And I guess that included you.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F024
label: sad
text: Do you still feel like that?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M040
label: sad
text: I want you now, Annie.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F025
label: sad
text: Because you can't feel like that anymore, Chris.  Because everything you have, you have a right to, me included.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F026
label: xxx
text: And you father, he put hundreds of planes in the air and you should be proud.  A man should be paid for that.

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M041
label: exc
text: Oh, Annie,

name: Ses05M_script01_3_F027
label: hap
text: [LAUGHTER] What will I do with a fortune?

name: Ses05M_script01_3_M042
label: hap
text: Annie I am going to make you a fortune.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F000
label: xxx
text: Ryan, what's wrong?

name: Ses05M_impro06_M000
label: sad
text: I just got some bad news.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F001
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses05M_impro06_M001
label: sad
text: My friend, Shotty, passed away.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: Oh, I'm so sorry

name: Ses05M_impro06_M002
label: sad
text: The end, he's been sick for awhile.  He had cancer.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: Oh, my gosh.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: Yeah.  It's just, I never thought it would actually happen, you know? I mean- He's such a fighter and he's always so positive about everything.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M004
label: sad
text: You know, he was gonna, and we -- all the way up to the end we were just talking about how- you know all the stuff we were gonna do and, you know.  When he finally kicked this stupid cancer, you know, and we were gonna --

name: Ses05M_impro06_M005
label: sad
text: he wanted to travel, you know.  And he's so talented.  Probably the most talented person I have ever met in my entire life.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: What did he do?

name: Ses05M_impro06_M006
label: sad
text: He was a designer, you know.  But he did everything. You know, He painted and he- and he did costume design, he did set design, he did lighting, he was --

name: Ses05M_impro06_M007
label: sad
text: he just did everything.  He was literally, literally the most talented guy I have ever met in my entire life.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M008
label: sad
text: And he's gone now and I  -- I just can't believe it.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: Yeah.  I'm so sorry.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M009
label: sad
text: I mean, one second you think, you know, you're just having a conversation and then --

name: Ses05M_impro06_M010
label: sad
text: you know, sometimes you think you want to make that phone call, or you think you want to tell somebody something, or something like that.  Do you know what I mean?  Like that's -- he was the person that I did that with.  You know, like, that's the person who I needed to call to tell things to all the time.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: You guys have been-

name: Ses05M_impro06_M011
label: sad
text: And now I don't have that person anymore, you know.  And it's -- -- it's just, you.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M012
label: sad
text: You think that things get easier, you know, as you as you get older and you -

name: Ses05M_impro06_M013
label: sad
text: and it just gets worse.  It just gets worse, everything is bad all the time; people die, your friends die, family dies, your best friends die. it's-

name: Ses05M_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: I'm sorry. I-

name: Ses05M_impro06_M014
label: sad
text: You always think, you know when you were- you know when you were a little kid and you think something is gonna happen, like, it will all be better when I am older, you know?

name: Ses05M_impro06_M015
label: xxx
text: And I don't know why people don't just tell you off the bat that it's just gonna suck anyway.  You know, like, what's the point?

name: Ses05M_impro06_M016
label: xxx
text: All the best people die, all the bad people live and they make life shitty for you anyway.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: Wow, Ryan I know that you are hurting right now but I don't think you always feel like that.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M017
label: sad
text: No, you're right.  I don't.  You're right.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M018
label: sad
text: Even, yeah -- he doesn't he would never feel that way, he would never want me to feel that way.  Of course not, but that's just where I am right now and -- -- I don't know what else to do with it.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F009
label: sad
text: Yeah. I understand.  I think it's really healthy to grieve.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M019
label: sad
text: I just miss him.

name: Ses05M_impro06_F010
label: sad
text: If there's anything I can do to be there for you.

name: Ses05M_impro06_M020
label: sad
text: Thanks.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F000
label: xxx
text: What is it?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M000
label: sad
text: Sweetheart, I've got to tell you something.  I just got a call.  I'm going to Iraq.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F001
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M001
label: sad
text: I know it's really crappy timing, but I don't have a choice.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F002
label: fea
text: What?  No, you can't!

name: Ses05M_impro02_M002
label: xxx
text: I know. I have to go-

name: Ses05M_impro02_F003
label: fea
text: You didn't- Did you tell them you have two young children at home?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M003
label: xxx
text: You think they'd listen to me?  No.  Of course, I told them that.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F004
label: xxx
text: And they didn't care?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M004
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M005
label: xxx
text: I don't know what to do.  I'm - Sorry

name: Ses05M_impro02_F005
label: xxx
text: They can't do that to you.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M006
label: xxx
text: I know.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M007
label: sad
text: I don't have a choice.  I have to go.  If I don't go, they'll come and take me.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F006
label: fru
text: No, we have- There's got to be something you can do.  You can't go.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M008
label: fru
text: I've tried everything.  I've called everyone I know.  I've tried everything. No one can do anything for me or they won't do anything for me.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F007
label: xxx
text: How long do you have to go for?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M009
label: xxx
text: At least a year.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F008
label: sur
text: What?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M010
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M011
label: sad
text: I don't want to -- the kids.  You've got to take care of them.  You've got- you've got to-

name: Ses05M_impro02_M012
label: sad
text: tell them about me and show them pictures of me and everything like that, because they are not going to see me for such a long time.  And it's such an important time and I just don't want to miss it.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F009
label: fru
text: There's got to be something we can do.  You can't just go.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M013
label: sad
text: I don't have -- I know.  What are we gonna- What are we- just run away?  What can I do?  Where can we go?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F010
label: fru
text: Why don't we do that- Can we- Can we just leave the country?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M014
label: xxx
text: Where are we gonna go?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M015
label: xxx
text: Where are we gonna go?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F011
label: xxx
text: I don't know.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M016
label: xxx
text: They'll find me anyway.  You know they will.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F012
label: neu
text: What would be the worst that would happen if they found you somewhere else?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M017
label: fru
text: They'd put me in jail and then how long- when will I get to see the kids?  What, ten years?  I don't know.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F013
label: sad
text: Well, they're so young.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M018
label: sad
text: I know.  But I'll-I'll send the pictures all the time and I'll write them emails and you can read them the emails that I send them.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F014
label: xxx
text: Where are you gonna be stationed?  What are you gonna be doing?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M019
label: sad
text: I'm gonna be in Bagdad, just doing security.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F015
label: fea
text: Are you gonna be like in tanks running around?  What- I mean, what does that mean?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M020
label: xxx
text: Yeah, it's gonna be everything.  I'm gonna be in the front.  I'll be -- it's not gonna be safe.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F016
label: fea
text: Oh, my God.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M021
label: sad
text: I just want to be honest with you.  I don't want you to .

name: Ses05M_impro02_M022
label: sad
text: but, it's gonna be fine.  I'm gonna be fine.  You know I'm good at this.  I can do this.  That's why I trained all this time.  I'm good at this.  Okay?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F017
label: fea
text: But so many people have died.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M023
label: sad
text: I know.  I know.  I know.  But, you know what?  That doesn't mean it's gonna be me; does it?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F018
label: xxx
text: I know.  I know.  I know I know. You're good You're good at what you do, but there's just so much chance involved.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M024
label: sad
text: No.  It doesn't.  And you can't think like that.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F019
label: fea
text: I mean, I-I know that you're a good soldier, but not everybody else is. and what if

name: Ses05M_impro02_M025
label: sad
text: I don't want you to -- I know.  I know. You can't worry about me.  You've got to worry about the kids.  And you've got to take care of the kids for me.  Okay?  Take care of the kids for me; all right?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M026
label: xxx
text: And you know my mom's here.  She'll come over and she'll be with you all the time, whenever you need her.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F020
label: sad
text: It's just so much.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M027
label: sad
text: I'll miss you, baby.

name: Ses05M_impro02_F021
label: sad
text: [GARBAGE] You have to write me everyday.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M028
label: sad
text: All- I'll write you everyday, all the time.  And I'll send you pictures and you send me pictures. I know We've got email out there.  We've got email and I can see stuff and you can send me stuff all the time.  Okay?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F022
label: xxx
text: Can I send you, like videos and stuff? What about when they start walking.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M029
label: sad
text: yeah yeah yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M030
label: exc
text: You you record every second.  You record every second because I want to see it all.  Okay?

name: Ses05M_impro02_M031
label: xxx
text: If I don't get to see it now, I get to see it later at least, you know?  You've got to keep it all for me; all right?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F023
label: sad
text: okay.

name: Ses05M_impro02_M032
label: xxx
text: I love you.  Okay?

name: Ses05M_impro02_F024
label: sad
text: [GARBAGE]

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M000
label: exc
text: Well, so, what do you think?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F000
label: neu
text: About what?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M001
label: exc
text: What I was just saying.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F001
label: neu
text: It's ridiculous.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M002
label: fru
text: It certainly is not.  It's slightly exaggerated scientific fact.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F002
label: xxx
text: It's P.R. somebody sold you a bill of goods that this magical thing would be happening on the beach.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M003
label: xxx
text: I'm not the only one, look at all these people.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F003
label: xxx
text: Sure.  Everybody is told the same thing, it keeps us all excited.  It keeps us all coming back for more.  It keeps us thinking that life is gonna start now any minute if we can just find the right spot and get in on the action.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M004
label: xxx
text: Are we talking about the same thing?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F004
label: fru
text: I'm sorry.  It's just, it's it's just fish to me.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M005
label: neu
text: uh, Carla Can I ask you a question?  no, don't get upset, but are you having your period?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F005
label: ang
text: God damn it, Augie.  Seriously, you always ask me that.  Why do you ask me that?  I hate it.  It's so insulting.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M006
label: fru
text: What's bugging you then?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F006
label: fru
text: I just - We just have different ideas of what this night is suppose to look like.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M007
label: fru
text: It's not that complicated.  We come down here, the grunions arrive, they do their little fish thing.  We say ooh, awe, look at the little fish.  And then they go home and we go home.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F007
label: xxx
text: For God's sake, Augie.  It's- Grow up, we're not going to see the grunion.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M008
label: xxx
text: Why not?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F008
label: fru
text: We We don't ever.  Have we ever?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M009
label: fru
text: We've missed them twice.  That's hardly ever.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F009
label: ang
text: Twice is every time we've tried, that's ever

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M010
label: xxx
text: Well, we'll see them this year.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F010
label: ang
text: No, we won't.  It's like waiting up for Santa Clause or something.  I feel like as though my whole life is going to be standing on the beach waiting with my eyes opened expectantly, my hands clasped neatly in front of me, waiting for fish to show up.  And the fish will not show up.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M011
label: fru
text: Okey, They're just fish.  It's nothing to get traumatized over.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F011
label: fru
text: You don't understand anything I am saying.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M012
label: fru
text: No, of course not.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F012
label: sad
text: I did want to see it.  I always want to see it.  I just- I keep thinking this will be the time and it never is.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M013
label: fru
text: I'm trying to work this backwards.  But I can't seem to pinpoint the time where everything went wrong here.  Okay, so --

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M014
label: fru
text: you were fine on the phone call with Marge, eating dinner was fine,talking- uh washing the dishes, no problem.  All right.  So, I'm taking a shower, you're watching TV, the news and you say the grunions are running tonight and I say, Great, let's go.  I'm feeling lucky.  And so, all right, and I'm putting on my coat, I'm putting out the animals, I'm pulling the car out of the garage.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F013
label: sad
text: Do you remember the first time that we came to see the grunion?  It was about four years ago right after we got married.  We thought I was pregnant.  We had a bottle of champagne and no glasses.  You asked me to dance.  We took off our shoes.  And while we were dancing you said the most intimate things to me right in my ear so I could feel them as much as hear them.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F014
label: sad
text: And I remember thinking to myself, finally.  I am as happy as I am supposed to be.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M015
label: xxx
text: Wait a minute.  I've got it.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F015
label: sad
text: Dancing barefoot in the sand, drinking champagne out of the bottle.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M016
label: neu
text: It was in the car, right?  When we were passing Knickerbocker Liquor Locker, you said, Let's stop and get champagne. and I said that times a wasting or something like that, right?  You wanted it to be like it was before, right?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F016
label: sad
text: I would rather not remember some things.  I'd rather not hope for something.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M017
label: xxx
text: Okay.  All right No problem.  I totally understand. okey  um, listen.  Do you want to dance?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F017
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M018
label: xxx
text: Do you want me to go get some champagne?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F018
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M019
label: xxx
text: Take off our shoes?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F019
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M020
label: fru
text: What, you want me to blow in your ear?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F020
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] No.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M021
label: fru
text: Do you want to get married again?- What?  What, do you want a divorce?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F021
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M022
label: fru
text: A vacation?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F022
label: sad
text: No.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M023
label: fru
text: A poodle, a backrub, a spa, a suicide pack?  What, Carla, what the hell do you want?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F023
label: sad
text: I just want- I just want things to turn out the way they are supposed to.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M024
label: ang
text: Well, welcome to the human race.  Do you think this is what I had planned?  Do you think that when I proposed that I had this great fantasy going that four years down the road we would end up arguing on the beach over some fish?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M025
label: ang
text: Do you think that I thought there would be times when you would look at me like I was used Kleenex or I would look at you and think, good God, when's the next flight to Alaska?  No.  No, I'm just like you. I thought it would all be like peaches and roses, and sand in our toes, and wind in our hair, and the fish would always come.  And the bills would magically pay themselves.  And we'd have three fat rosy kids.  But, ha ha, baby, the jokes on us!

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M026
label: ang
text: Because you know what you get, Carla?  You know what you get?  This.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F024
label: xxx
text: This?  What is this?  This isn't even anything.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M027
label: xxx
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F025
label: xxx
text: Sure, this is standing on the beach.  This is waiting.  This is fighting.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M028
label: fru
text: Right.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F026
label: sad
text: But this isn't at all what I wanted it to be.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M029
label: sad
text: Now, I know.  Me either

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F027
label: sad
text: This is just this.  I mean, it's a lot and everything.  But it's not, you know, something else.  Am I making any sense?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M030
label: sad
text: I'm trying the best I can.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F028
label: sad
text: I know that, Augie.  I do.  I know that. And and I know that this meant a lot to you and and it's special, you know, with the sand and the moon but.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F029
label: sad
text: But I just couldn't help thinking about being somewhere else.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M031
label: sad
text: Maybe if you're with somebody else, too?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F030
label: sad
text: I didn't say that.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M032
label: sad
text: No, I know.  But I know I don't make you happy.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F031
label: sad
text: For heavens sake, Augie, whatever I am doing, I'd rather it be with you.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M033
label: sur
text: Really?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F032
label: sad
text: Yes.  Don't you know that? I mean, You're probably the one you wishes you were with somebody else, somebody who didn't take everything so hard and who knew how to enjoy herself.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M034
label: hap
text: Actually, now that you mention it, no.  I don't.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F033
label: xxx
text: Okay.  Well, we're in the wrong spot but we're with the right person.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M035
label: hap
text: I don't know.  I think this is a pretty good spot.  I mean, look at the view of the moon from here.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F034
label: hap
text: Yes, I did notice that.  It does look really beautiful over the water.  Big old white moon.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M036
label: hap
text: Oh, well look what we've got here.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F035
label: xxx
text: Augie, you brought refreshments.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M037
label: hap
text: Well, it isn't champagne.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F036
label: xxx
text: Well, then we don't need glasses.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M038
label: xxx
text: Are you still cold?  Still want to go home?

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F037
label: hap
text: No.  I'm beginning to think you might be right. I think  this might be the spot after all.  Augie, I'm sorry.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M039
label: xxx
text: Shh.  If we're really quiet, the fish might come.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_F038
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses05M_script02_2_M040
label: hap
text: Or not.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F000
label: xxx
text: Why did you invite her here?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M000
label: neu
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F001
label: neu
text: She's been in New York three and a half years.  Why all of the sudden?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well maybe.  Maybe she just wanted to see her again.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F002
label: xxx
text: Nobody comes seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M002
label: neu
text: What did you mean? He lived next door to the girl all of his life, why wouldn't he want to see her again? Don't look at me like that, he didn't tell me any more than he told you.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M003
label: fru
text: How do you know he is even thinking about it?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F004
label: xxx
text: It's got that about it.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M004
label: fru
text: Well, so what.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F005
label: fru
text: What's going on here, Joe?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M005
label: fru
text: Now, listen, Kate, just-

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F006
label: ang
text: She's not his girl.  She knows she's not.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M006
label: xxx
text: You can't read her mind.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F007
label: fru
text: She's . . . Then why is she still single.  New York is full of men, why isn't she married?  Probably a hundred people told her she's foolish, but she's waited.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M007
label: fru
text: How do you know why she's waited?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F008
label: fru
text: Because she knows what I know - she's faithful as a rock and my worst moments I think of her waiting and I know again that I'm right.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M008
label: fru
text: Look.  It's a nice day.  Why are we arguing?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F009
label: fru
text: Nobody in her- this house dares shake her faith.  Strangers might, but not his father, and not his brother.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: What do you want me to do? What do you want--

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F010
label: ang
text: I want you to pretend like he's coming back!

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: But, Kate...

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F011
label: ang
text: Because if he's not coming back, then I'll kill myself.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: [LAUGHTER]

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F012
label: ang
text: Laugh.  Laugh at me, but what happens the night that she goes to sleep in his bed, and his memorial breaks in pieces?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F013
label: xxx
text: Believe with me, Joe.  I can't stand alone.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: Calm yourself!

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F014
label: ang
text: Only last week, another boy turned up in Detroit, been missing longer than Larry, you read it yourself.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M014
label: fru
text: All right, all right.  Calm yourself.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F015
label: xxx
text: You above all, have got to believe, Joe.

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M015
label: xxx
text: Why me, above all?

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F016
label: sad
text: You've got to believe. You've got to--

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: What do you mean me above all?  Look at you.  You're shaking!

name: Ses05F_script01_2_F017
label: ang
text: I can't help it!

name: Ses05F_script01_2_M017
label: ang
text: What have I got to hide?  What the hell is the matter with you, Kate?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F000
label: xxx
text: Why did you invite her here?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M000
label: neu
text: Why does that bother you?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F001
label: xxx
text: She's been in New York three and a half years, why all of a sudden?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M001
label: neu
text: Well, maybe maybe he just wanted to see her again.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F002
label: neu
text: Nobody comes seven hundred miles just to see.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M002
label: fru
text: What are you talking about?  He grew up next to the girl his whole life, why wouldn't he want to see her again?  Don't look at me like that.  He hasn't told me anything he didn't told you.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F003
label: xxx
text: He's not going to marry her.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M003
label: neu
text: Why do you think he's even thinking that?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F004
label: neu
text: He's got that about it.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M004
label: fru
text: Well, so what?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F005
label: ang
text: What's going on here, Joe?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M005
label: fru
text: Now listen.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F006
label: xxx
text: No.  She's not his girl, Joe.  She knows she's not.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M006
label: xxx
text: You don't know.  You can't read her mind.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Then why is she still single? I mean, New York is full of men.  Why isn't she married?  Probably a hundred people told her she's foolish but she's waited.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M007
label: fru
text: How do you know why she's waited?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F008
label: xxx
text: Because she knows what I know, that's why.  She's faithful as a rock.  In my worst moments I think of her waiting and I know again that I'm right.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M008
label: fru
text: Look, it's a beautiful day outside, why are we arguing?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F009
label: xxx
text: Nobody in this house dares takes her faith away, Joe.  Strangers might, but not his father, not his brother.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M009
label: fru
text: Well, what do you want me to do about it?  What do you want?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F010
label: fru
text: I want you to pretend like he's coming back.  Both of you, don't think I haven't noticed you and Chris since she's gotten here.  I don't want any nonsense.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M010
label: fru
text: But Kate?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F011
label: fru
text: No, because if she- he's not coming back then I'll kill myself. Laugh!  Laugh at me!

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F012
label: xxx
text: But why did that happen the very night she came back?  She goes to sleep in his bed and his memorial breaks in pieces.  Look at it.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M011
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F013
label: xxx
text: Believe with me, Joe.  I can't stand alone.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M012
label: fru
text: Calm yourself.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F014
label: fru
text: Only last week a man turned up in Detroit missing longer than Larry.  You read it yourself.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M013
label: fru
text: All right.  All right.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F015
label: ang
text: You above all have got to believe.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M014
label: xxx
text: What do you mean, me above all?

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F016
label: xxx
text: Just don't stop believing.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M015
label: ang
text: What's that suppose to mean, me above all?  Look at you, you're shaking.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_F017
label: ang
text: I can't help it.

name: Ses05M_script01_2_M016
label: ang
text: What have I got to hide, Kate?  What the hell is the matter with you?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M000
label: xxx
text: Come to think of it the real cause of that roue was Peter Burden.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F000
label: xxx
text: Oh You knew there was nothing in that.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M001
label: xxx
text: I knew nothing of the sort.  You accepted presents from him.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F001
label: neu
text: Only a trivial little broach.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M002
label: xxx
text: I remember it well, covered in diamonds and the worst possible taste.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F002
label: neu
text: Not at all.  I quite like it.  I wear it often.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M003
label: xxx
text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F003
label: fru
text: [garbage], No, I didn't.  You worked the whole thing up in your jealous imagination.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M004
label: fru
text: You must admit that he was in love with you. wasn't he?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F004
label: neu
text: Oh, maybe a little.  Nothing serious.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M005
label: fru
text: He let him kiss you.  You said you did.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F005
label: neu
text: Well, what of it.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M006
label: xxx
text: what of it?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F006
label: neu
text: Well it gave him a lot of pleasure and it didn't hurt me.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M007
label: xxx
text: What about me?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Well, if you hadn't been so nosey and suspicious you never would have known about it.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M008
label: ang
text: Well, that's a nice point of view I must say.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F008
label: fru
text: I'm getting very bored with this conversation.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M009
label: ang
text: Me, too, bored stiff.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: Do you want some brandy?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F009
label: neu
text: No thanks.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M011
label: neu
text: I think I'll have a little.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F010
label: xxx
text: I don't see why you want it; you've already had two glasses.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M012
label: xxx
text: No particular reason.  Besides, they were little ones.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F011
label: xxx
text: Well, it seems silly to go on and on with such a thing.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M013
label: xxx
text: You can hardly say- You can hardly call three little liquor glasses of brandy for the entire evening going on and on.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F012
label: neu
text: It's becoming a habit with you.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M014
label: xxx
text: You needn't be so grand simply because you don't happen to want me at the moment.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F013
label: fru
text: Don't be stupid.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M015
label: ang
text: Amanda, really.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F014
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M016
label: fru
text: Nothing.  Are you going out somewhere, darling?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F015
label: neu
text: Just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M017
label: fru
text: Um- Well, that reply has just broken my heart.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F016
label: xxx
text: It's a woman's job to allure the man.  Watch me a moment, won't you?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M018
label: xxx
text: Oh, as a matter of fact, that's perfectly true.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F017
label: ang
text: No, it isn't.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M019
label: xxx
text: Yes, it is.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F018
label: ang
text: No, it it is not, be quiet.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M020
label: ang
text: It's a pity you didn't have a little bit more brandy.  It might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F019
label: xxx
text: hum, It doesn't seem to have worked such wonders with you.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M021
label: xxx
text: oh, Snap, snap, snap.  Like a little Adder.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F020
label: xxx
text: Adders don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M022
label: fru
text: Nonsense, they've got a little bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap!

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F021
label: fru
text: They sting.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M023
label: ang
text: They snap.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F022
label: xxx
text: Okay, I don't care if they roll about like hoops and bark, okay?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M024
label: neu
text: So, did you see much of Peter Burden after the divorce?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F023
label: neu
text: Yes, I did quite a lot.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M025
label: ang
text: You must have let him kiss you quite a good deal more then, huh?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F024
label: xxx
text: [LAUGHTER] Mind your own business.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M026
label: ang
text: I'm sure you had a riotous time, no restrain at all, very enjoyable.  You never had much anyway.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F025
label: fru
text: You're quite insufferable.  I do imagine it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M027
label: ang
text: I am not the slightest bit drunk.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F026
label: neu
text: You always had a weak head.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M028
label: ang
text: I do believe that I have said already that I had three minuet liquor glasses of brandy in the entire evening.  A child of two couldn't get drunk of that.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F027
label: xxx
text: Oh, no on the contrary, a child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M029
label: ang
text: Oh, really?  How about a child of three, or child of six, what about a child of nine?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F028
label: ang
text: Not- Would you shut up.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M030
label: ang
text: You know, we could get a really good debate going on about this.  You know intemperate tots.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F029
label: fru
text: You're not very funny, dear.  You better have some more brandy.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M031
label: ang
text: You know what?  That's a very good idea.  I think I will.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M032
label: ang
text: You better turn that off, I think.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F030
label: xxx
text: Why?

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M033
label: ang
text: Because it's very late and you'll disturb the people upstairs.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F031
label: xxx
text: There aren't any people upstairs.  It's a photography studio.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M034
label: ang
text: Well, there are people downstairs, I suppose.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F032
label: xxx
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M035
label: ang
text: This is no time of the year for Tunis.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F033
label: xxx
text: Turn it on again, please.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M036
label: ang
text: I do I shall do no such thing.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Very well.  If you have to be boorish and idiotic.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M037
label: ang
text: Turn it off.  It's driving me mad.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: You are far too temperamental.  Try to control yourself.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: Turn it off!

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: Go away!  Go away!  I- I hate you.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Very amusing indeed.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: You know what, I'm sick and tire of listening to you.  You're a-- You're a total sadistic bully.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Ja! Very funny.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: Stop.  Would you just go away?  I mean, you're conceited, and overbearing, and utterly impossible.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: You are a vile tempered, wicked living, evil little beast.  And I hope I never set eyes on you ever again.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: This is the end! Do you understand me? This is the end.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: Oh, you're not going like this.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: Yes, I am. Let go with me

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: [GARBAGE] No, you're not.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: You are a cruel fiend and I-I loath you.  I thank God I realized who you are before I decided to marry you again.  Oh my God, never!

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M044
label: ang
text: oh! Marry you again? I wouldn't marry you again if you came crawling to me on bended knee.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F042
label: ang
text: Beast

name: Ses05M_script03_2_M045
label: ang
text: You're a wicked little vampire.  And I pray to God I never set eyes on you again as long as I live.

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F043
label: ang
text: Brute

name: Ses05M_script03_2_F044
label: ang
text: pig

name: Ses05F_impro01_F000
label: neu
text: Hi, I need an ID.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M000
label: neu
text: ahh Yeah, this is the wrong line.  I'm sorry.  You need to go back over to line two B.  That's where you should have started from.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F001
label: fru
text: Okay, I'm sorry, but I just stood in this line for an hour.  can I Is there any way I can-

name: Ses05F_impro01_M001
label: xxx
text: I mean, there's really nothing I can do for you in this line.  This is not the line for new I.D.  This is the line for registration.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F002
label: fru
text: No, they told me-I'm sorry, but they told me to be in this line.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M002
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I understand that ma'am.  I don't know what they said to you, but you need to be in a different line.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F003
label: fru
text: What, I mean what... what's the difference?  What do I need to do there that I can't do here?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M003
label: neu
text: Well, I have no camera here.  I can't help you at all here, ma'am.  I have forms for something completely different.  You need to go to a different place.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F004
label: fru
text: Can you just-can I just get the right-

name: Ses05F_impro01_M004
label: fru
text: Simply step to line two A, ma'am, I'm sorry.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: Would you be able to put me at the front of that line?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M005
label: fru
text: There is a large line of people behind you waiting to be--

name: Ses05F_impro01_F006
label: fru
text: I know.  I've been in line with these people.  I understand.  I understand what it's like.  Could you please like call over and-

name: Ses05F_impro01_M006
label: fru
text: I don't want to be rude here, ma'am, but line two B is where you need to be.  This is the line for registration.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: I hear that.  I hear that.  Thank you, but I've waited in line for so long, and I don't want to have to be here all day.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M007
label: fru
text: I don't have those-

name: Ses05F_impro01_F008
label: neu
text: So could I maybe get the form from you, fill it out here- and maybe you could-

name: Ses05F_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: I don't have those forms, ma'am.  I can't help you.  That's why you need to go to line two A.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F009
label: fru
text: And how long is that going to take?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: Ma'am, obviously I have no idea how long it's taking.  There seems to be a bit of a line there.  It looks like thirty forty people.  It could take four to five hours.  I'm sorry.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F010
label: fru
text: I don't-

name: Ses05F_impro01_M010
label: fru
text: There's nothing I can do for you, ma'am.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F011
label: fru
text: I don't have time for this today, and-

name: Ses05F_impro01_M011
label: fru
text: But, obviously I don't have time for you to stand here and waste my time in this line.  There are other people who need service behind you who are waiting for the right things.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F012
label: fru
text: Is there anything you can do?  Please, have some compassion.  Is there something you can do?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M012
label: fru
text: I am a very compassionate person, and I'm offended that you imply that I'm not.  Of course, I'm compassionate.  Look, I work in the D.M.V..  What do you think I am?  Go wait in line two A.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M013
label: fru
text: Don't ask me to have somebody else come over here and move you myself.  I can't come back over there.  I'll get security if you need me to.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F013
label: fru
text: Please, I don't think that's necessary.  I'm just asking, maybe you could call over and say that somebody miss informed her because I didn't pick to stand in this line.  I asked them where to stand, and they told me here.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M014
label: fru
text: what, no, I'm sure they did not tell you here.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F014
label: fru
text: No, they did.  The lady over there told me to stand in this line and I've been here for an hour.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M015
label: fru
text: what The lady, what? the janitor?

name: Ses05F_impro01_F015
label: fru
text: No.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M016
label: xxx
text: You asked the janitor what line to stand in?  Obviously, that's not going to be the right thing.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F016
label: fru
text: No, I'm not, I'm sorry.I'm not stupid.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M017
label: fru
text: I'm not saying that you're stupid, ma'am.  I think you just said that you were stupid.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F017
label: ang
text: Isn't there anything you can do?  Just call over and ask them if I can go to the front of the line in the other line.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M018
label: fru
text: It doesn't work that way here, ma'am.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F018
label: ang
text: Why not?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M019
label: fru
text: There is a strict system here.  You need to wait in the right line for the right thing.  This is the line for registration.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F019
label: fru
text: Except they're going tell, are you going to tell me the right line to stand in this time at least?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M020
label: fru
text: I told you it was line two A.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F020
label: ang
text: Right, well, last time they told me, it was this line, and obviously, it's not true.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M021
label: fru
text: I don't know who told you that but they were wrong.  I'm sorry.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F021
label: fru
text: Do you have a manager I could speak with?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M022
label: xxx
text: I am the manager.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F022
label: fru
text: Are you being straight with me?

name: Ses05F_impro01_M023
label: fru
text: I'm being very straight with you, ma'am.  There is nothing I can do for you.  You need to stand in line two A.

name: Ses05F_impro01_F023
label: fru
text: Fine.

name: Ses05F_impro01_M024
label: xxx
text: Thank you very much.  You have a wonderful day.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F000
label: sad
text: What's he going to say? Maybe we should tell him before he sees it.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M000
label: sad
text: He saw it.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F001
label: xxx
text: How could he see it?  I was the first one up.  He was still in bed.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M001
label: sad
text: He was out here when it broke.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F002
label: xxx
text: When?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M002
label: sad
text: Around Four this morning, and there was a crack and I looked out.  We're standing right there when I cracked.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F003
label: xxx
text: What was he doing out here at four in the morning?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M003
label: sad
text: I don't know.  but When it cracked he ran back into the house and start to cry in the kitchen.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F004
label: sad
text: Did you talk to him?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M004
label: sad
text: No.  I figured it was best to leave him alone.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F005
label: sad
text: He cried hard.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M005
label: sad
text: I could hear him right through the floor of my room.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F006
label: sad
text: He is thinking about him again.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F007
label: sad
text: It's getting just like after Larry died, he's having dreams, he's walking around at night.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M006
label: sad
text: I guess, he is.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F008
label: sad
text: What's the meaning of that?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M007
label: sad
text: I don't know the meaning of it.  But I know one thing mom did.  We made a terrible mistake with dad.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F009
label: xxx
text: What?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M008
label: sad
text: Being dishonest with him.  It's the kind of thing that pays off and now it's paying off.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F010
label: xxx
text: What do you mean, dishonest?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M009
label: sad
text: You know that Larry's not coming back, and I know it.  So why do we go on letting him think that we believe with him?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F011
label: xxx
text: What are you going to do, argue with him?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M010
label: fru
text: No um, I don't want to argue with him, but it's time we realized that nobody else believes that Larry is alive.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M011
label: fru
text: Why shouldn't he dream about him, walk around during the night, looking for him um.  Do we contradict him?  Do we say outright that we don't have any hope anymore, that we haven't had any for years now?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F012
label: xxx
text: You can't just say that to him.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M012
label: fru
text: We have to say it to him!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F013
label: xxx
text: How are you going to prove it, I mean, there's no body and there's no grave.  So what are you going to do? Do you have proof?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M013
label: ang
text: For God's sake, mom, three years.  Nobody comes back after three years!  It's insane!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F014
label: fru
text: To you it is, and to me, but not to your father.  Now look, you can talk yourself  blue in the face, but there's no body, and there's no grave, so where are you?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M014
label: fru
text: Sit down, mom.  I want to talk to you.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F015
label: xxx
text: The trouble with the god damned newspapers, I mean every week, they do a story about some boy's been gone longer than Larry and he comes back, so the next one is gonna--

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M015
label: fru
text: All right, All right mom.  Listen!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M016
label: sad
text: You know why I asked Annie here, don't you?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F016
label: xxx
text: why?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M017
label: fru
text: You know.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F017
label: neu
text: Well I got an idea.  But what's the story?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M018
label: neu
text: I'm going to ask her to marry me.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F018
label: xxx
text: Well that's nobody's business but yours, Chris.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M019
label: fru
text: You know that's not just my business.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F019
label: xxx
text: What- What am - what are you going to do, I mean you're old enough to make up your own mind?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M020
label: fru
text: So it's all right.  I can go ahead with it then?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F020
label: xxx
text: Well you're want to make sure your father isn't you know going to--lose them

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M021
label: xxx
text: Then it's not only my business.  Sometimes you infuriate me.  You know that?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M022
label: xxx
text: You know that?  Isn't it your business too, if I tell dad, and he gets, throws a fit about it?   you have such a talent for ignoring things!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F021
label: fru
text: I ignore what I got to ignore.  The girl is Larry's girl.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M023
label: xxx
text: She's not Larry's girl!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F022
label: xxx
text: As far as your father is concerned, he's not dead and you've no right to take his girl.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F023
label: fru
text: Now Chris you can go on from there, but I don't know what to do.  I mean do you know what to do, because I don't.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M024
label: fru
text: I don't know why it is.  But every time I reach out for something I want, I have to pull back because other people will suffer.  My whole bloody life, time after time, after time.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F024
label: neu
text: Well you're a considerate fellow, there's nothing wrong with that.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M025
label: ang
text: To hell with that!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F025
label: neu
text: Have you asked Annie yet to marry you?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M026
label: xxx
text: I want to get this settled first.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F026
label: neu
text: Well how did you know that she will go along with it, I mean maybe she feels the same way as your father?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M027
label: xxx
text: Well, if she does, then that's the end of it, but from her letters it sounds like she's forgotten about it.  I'll find out and then we'll thrash it out with Dad, all right?  Mom, don't avoid me.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F027
label: neu
text: The trouble is you don't see enough women, you never have

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M028
label: fru
text: So what, I'm not fast with women.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F028
label: neu
text: Well I just don't see why it has to be Annie.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M029
label: fru
text: Because it is.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F029
label: xxx
text: well, that's a good reason, but it doesn't answer a thing.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M030
label: fru
text: I can't help it.  I know her best.  I was brought up next door to here, the easiest, when I think of somebody for my wife, I think of Annie.  Do you want a diagram?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F030
label: fru
text: No, I don't want a diagram, but, Chris, your father thinks Larry's coming back.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F031
label: sad
text: You marry his girl, and you're pronouncing him dead.  Now what's going to happen to your father, do you know?  I don't.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M031
label: fru
text: All right, then, Mom.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F032
label: xxx
text: Give it some more thought.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M032
label: fru
text: I've given it three years of thought.  And hope by now that he wouldn't.  Can you forget about Larry an-- and we can have a regular wedding and have everybody be happy.  But that can't happen here, I'm set to get out.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F033
label: ang
text: What the hell is this?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M033
label: fru
text: I'll get out. I'll get married and live some place else.  Maybe, maybe New York?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F034
label: ang
text: Are you crazy?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M034
label: xxx
text: I've been a good son for too long, a big sucker.  I'm through with it.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F035
label: fru
text: Wait a minute.  Tell me this.  Do you mean to say that you would leave the business?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M035
label: ang
text: The business?  The business?  It doesn't inspire me?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F036
label: xxx
text: Must you be inspired?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M036
label: xxx
text: Yes!  I like it an hour a day.  If I had to grub for money all day long, I like to come home to something beautiful.  I want a family.  I want- I want kids.  I want to build something I can give myself to. and Annie is in the center of that, and now where do I find it?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F037
label: fru
text: Don't- you, you can't think like that!  Don't think like that!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M037
label: xxx
text: Then help me stay here.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F038
label: ang
text: All right!  But don't think like that, because I mean, what the hell did we do all this for, Chris?  The whole business it's all for you!  The whole shooting match is for you!

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M038
label: xxx
text: I know that Mom. I know.  Just you help me stay here.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F039
label: xxx
text: All right, but don't think like that.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M039
label: xxx
text: I am thinking like that.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F040
label: fru
text: I don't understand you, do I?

name: Ses05F_script01_1_M040
label: xxx
text: No.  You don't.  I'm a pretty tough guy.

name: Ses05F_script01_1_F041
label: xxx
text: Yeah, I can see that.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F000
label: neu
text: Can I help you?

name: Ses05M_impro01_M000
label: xxx
text: Yes, I'm um- just getting my I.D.  I need a new I.D.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F001
label: neu
text: Oh, this- this form that you have is the wrong form.  You need to go over to the other line on the other side of the D.M.V..

name: Ses05M_impro01_M001
label: xxx
text: What do you mean?  I filled out my forms and I rushed to get my I.D.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F002
label: neu
text: Right, but this is the wrong form.  Somebody gave you the wrong form.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M002
label: xxx
text: The wrong form?

name: Ses05M_impro01_F003
label: neu
text: Yeah.  So, I can't -- I can't do anything-

name: Ses05M_impro01_M003
label: xxx
text: What's wrong about this form?  It says new I.D. on it.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F004
label: neu
text: No, but this is for um- replacements and you need a new -- whole new license as a California --

name: Ses05M_impro01_M004
label: fru
text: What's the difference?  What's the difference between that form and this form?

name: Ses05M_impro01_F005
label: fru
text: Sir, don't get an attitude with me.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M005
label: ang
text: I'm not getting a -- well, you wait in this line and not get an attitude.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F006
label: neu
text: No, I understand and there are a lot of people here.  But what I'm telling you is that it's different for different states and since your getting a new license in the state of California -- You have to fill out a different form than you did.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M006
label: xxx
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M007
label: xxx
text: right.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M008
label: fru
text: Well then, when I showed them my I.D. before and I said I had to get a new I.D, why didn't they tell me to fill out the right form?

name: Ses05M_impro01_F007
label: fru
text: I don't know.  I don't know who told you.  It wasn't me.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M009
label: fru
text: Well, it was this girl standing right next to you.  Can we ask her why she didn't let me fill out the right form?

name: Ses05M_impro01_F008
label: fru
text: You- You can ask her if you want, but she's busy and she probably won't answer you.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M010
label: xxx
text: This is ridiculous.  I've been here for forty five minutes. Just standing in this one line. I took fifteen minutes to fill out that form.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F009
label: neu
text: I know.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F010
label: fru
text: Sir, you- I mean

name: Ses05M_impro01_M011
label: fru
text: Do you know how long it's gonna take me to start all over and fill out the new form?

label: fru
text: You can waist as much as you want

name: Ses05M_impro01_F012
label: neu
text: Yeah.  I know it's gonna take a minute.  But you-- so you might as well get started now.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M012
label: fru
text: Might as well get started now? but Just take this one.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F013
label: fru
text: I can't take this one, sir. this is the wrong form.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M013
label: fru
text: Why can't we just -- you know what?  How about if we just pretend that I'm getting a -- renewing my California I.D. and we just don't tell anybody -- That I'm getting a new one from a different state?

name: Ses05M_impro01_F014
label: fru
text: Sir, please don't waste my time.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F015
label: fru
text: There is nothing I can do about it.  You need to take this other form and fill it out and go stand in the other line.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M014
label: fru
text: Come on!  You know -- you can't just take -- make a little exception to the rule?  I know that you guys make exceptions.  I see -- you know, if I was-if I was your friend and you knew me, or something like that, you'd probably make a little exception for me wouldn't you?

name: Ses05M_impro01_F016
label: fru
text: They're different forms, we process them all different-

name: Ses05M_impro01_M015
label: ang
text: Wouldn't you? Oh, come on.  you just tell me.  You would make an exception for me.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F017
label: fru
text: I -- there's no way I'd make an exception.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F018
label: fru
text: Sir, don't patronize me.  I can't make an exception.  I don't- I don't have the power to do that.  It's a different form.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M016
label: fru
text: Shh...I know you've got the power to do that.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F019
label: fru
text: They're processed differently.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M017
label: fru
text: That's crap- You're crap.  I don't buy it.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F020
label: fru
text: Sir, you're gonna have to go stand in the other line.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M018
label: fru
text: I'm not leaving this line until I get my new I.D.  That's as simple as it is.  I'm not leaving this line until I get my new I.D.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F021
label: ang
text: I'm gonna- I'm gonna bring security over and have them escort you out.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M019
label: fru
text: Well, then you're just gonna look stupid because I'm just waiting for an I.D. and you're gonna make security take me out because I want my I.D.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M020
label: fru
text: That's just dumb.

name: Ses05M_impro01_F022
label: fru
text: But you filled out the wrong form and you're in the wrong line and you're wasting both of our times.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M021
label: fru
text: I filled out the wrong form because they made me fill out the wrong form!

name: Ses05M_impro01_F023
label: ang
text: Well, that's unfortunate, sir.  You're gonna have to go stand in the other line now.

name: Ses05M_impro01_M022
label: fru
text: This is crap.  You know, I don't even know why I'm in this state.  Screw California.  I'm out of here.

And I've restated my story about eight different times and I just want somebody to help me get my connection back, because this happens every two weeks.  And I want to know what to do to stop it from happening again.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M000

text: As a matter of fact, the real cause of that row was Peter Burden.

text: You knew there was nothing in that.

text: Only a trivial little broach.

text: I remember it well, covered in diamonds in the worst possible taste.

label: xxx
text: No, not at all.  I-I still have it.  I wear it quite often.

text: You went out of your way to torture me over Peter Burden.

text: And what of it?

text: What of it?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F006

text: Well, I- he got a lot of pleasure out of it and it didn't hurt me.
