name: Ses05F_script03_2_F007
label: xxx
text: Well, if you hadn't been so nosey and suspicious, you never would have heard about it.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M008
label: ang
text: Well, that's a nice point of view I must say.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F008
label: fru
text: I'm growing quite tired and bored of this conversation.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M009
label: neu
text: So am I, bored stiff.  Would you like some brandy?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F009
label: xxx
text: No.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M010
label: neu
text: I'll have a little I think.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F010
label: neu
text: I don't see why you want any.  You've already had three glasses.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M011
label: xxx
text: No particular reason, besides, they were very small ones.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F011
label: neu
text: Well, it seems silly to go on and on in such a thing.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M012
label: xxx
text: You can hardly call three liqueur glasses of brandy in a whole evening going on and on.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F012
label: neu
text: It's becoming a habit with you.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M013
label: ang
text: You needn't be so grand simply because you don't happen to want any at the moment.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F013
label: xxx
text: Don't be so stupid.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M014
label: ang
text: Really, Amanda.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M015
label: xxx
text: Going out somewhere, dear?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F014
label: neu
text: Just making myself fascinating for you.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M016
label: ang
text: Oh, that reply has broken my heart.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F015
label: xxx
text: It's the woman's job to allure the man.  Why don't you watch me for a moment?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M017
label: xxx
text: As a matter of fact, that is perfectly true.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F016
label: xxx
text: No, it's not.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M018
label: fru
text: Oh, yes it is.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F017
label: xxx
text: Oh, Do shut up.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M019
label: ang
text: It's a pity you didn't take a little more brandy.  It might have made you a little less disagreeable.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F018
label: ang
text: Um, It doesn't seem to have worked such wonders with you.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M020
label: xxx
text: Well, snap, snap, snap like a little adder.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F019
label: ang
text: adder don't snap, they sting.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M021
label: xxx
text: Nonsense, they have a little bag of venom behind their fangs and they snap.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F020
label: ang
text: They sting.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M022
label: ang
text: They snap.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F021
label: ang
text: I don't care if they bark and roll around like hoops, okay.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M023
label: fru
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M024
label: ang
text: Did you see much of Peter Burden after the divorce?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F022
label: neu
text: Yes, I did quite a bit.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M025
label: ang
text: I suppose you let him kiss you a good deal more then.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F023
label: ang
text: Mind your own business.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M026
label: ang
text: You must have a riotous time, no restraint at all, very enjoyable.  I mean, you never had much anyway.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F024
label: ang
text: Oh dear, you really are becoming quite insufferable.  I would imagine it's because you're drunk.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M027
label: xxx
text: I'm not the least bit drunk.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M028
label: xxx
text: I think I mentioned once before that I had only three-minute liqueur glasses of brandy the entire evening long.  A child of two could not be drunk on that.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F025
label: xxx
text: Oh no, on the contrary, a child of two could get violently drunk on only one glass.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M029
label: xxx
text: Oh, very interesting.  How about a child of three or a child of six?  How about a child of nine?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F026
label: fru
text: Oh, You are so insufferable.  Do you stop.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M030
label: fru
text: Oh, This is very interesting.  We- we might get a splendid debate going about this intemperate tots.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F027
label: ang
text: Not very funny, dear, you better have some more brandy.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M031
label: xxx
text: Oh, very good idea.  I will.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F028
label: fru
text: Ugh.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M032
label: fru
text: You better turn that off I think.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F029
label: ang
text: Why?

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M033
label: xxx
text: It's very late and it will disturb the people upstairs.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F030
label: ang
text: There aren't any people upstairs; it's a photographer's studio.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M034
label: xxx
text: Well, there are people downstairs I suppose.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F031
label: ang
text: They're away in Tunis.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M035
label: xxx
text: It is not time of year for Tunis.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F032
label: ang
text: Turn it on again.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M036
label: xxx
text: I'll do no such thing.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F033
label: ang
text: Fine, if you insist on being completely insolent.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M037
label: ang
text: Turn it off.  It is driving me mad.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F034
label: ang
text: Well, do try to control yourself darling.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M038
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F035
label: ang
text: You really do need to develop uh a clearer head.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M039
label: ang
text: Turn it off.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F036
label: ang
text: I- I hate you.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M040
label: ang
text: Amanda-- Listen- Listen-

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F037
label: ang
text: I hate you.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F038
label: ang
text: No, no.  I'm tired of listening to you.  You're boorish and idiotic and completely overbearing.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M041
label: ang
text: Very music- amusing indeed.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F039
label: ang
text: Yeah, very amusing.  Let me go.  I'm getting out of here.  I can't believe I intended to marry you.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M042
label: ang
text: You are a vile tempered, loose living, wicked little beast, and I never want to set eyes on you again.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F040
label: ang
text: Oh, marry you again?  I must have been insane.  What was I thinking?  I mean, you're completely outrageous.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_M043
label: ang
text: Shut up, shut up.  I wouldn't marry you again if you came crawling to me on bended knee. You're a mean, evil-minded little vampire and I hope to God I never set eyes on you again.

name: Ses05F_script03_2_F041
label: ang
text: Beast; brute; cad; whore

name: Ses05M_impro05_M000
label: neu
text: Hi. Um-  My luggage didn't come out of the conveyor thingy.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F000
label: neu
text: Hmm. Hmm.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M001
label: neu
text: So, um, what do I do?

name: Ses05M_impro05_F001
label: neu
text: How long ago was that?

name: Ses05M_impro05_M002
label: neu
text: Uh- Like, an hour and a half ago.  I talked to somebody who was standing out there and they said wait.  Sometimes like random butt- pieces come out late.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F002
label: neu
text: Uh-Hmm.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M003
label: neu
text: And so I waited there, but nothing came.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F003
label: neu
text: Um, okay.  Well, you can fly- file a claim.  Where were you coming from?

name: Ses05M_impro05_M004
label: neu
text: I was coming from um the Midwest, like Iowa.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F004
label: neu
text: So, within the country, though? umm

name: Ses05M_impro05_M005
label: neu
text: Yeah, I know I was in the country.  I mean, it's not that complicated.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F005
label: neu
text: Yeah, well the chances of it being lost forever, you know, are slight because -- -- you were in the --

name: Ses05M_impro05_M006
label: neu
text: Well, I would hope so.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F006
label: neu
text: Well, I mean, you know that happens pretty often that sometimes baggage -- -- gets lost.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M007
label: neu
text: People lose --

name: Ses05M_impro05_M008
label: sur
text: forever?

name: Ses05M_impro05_F007
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M009
label: neu
text: You know, this is actually, I mean it's -- it's a really important piece of luggage.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F008
label: neu
text: Okay.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M010
label: neu
text: I mean, it's not big or anything like that.  I mean, it's not worth a lot of money or anything.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F009
label: neu
text: Did you have insurance on your flight?

name: Ses05M_impro05_M011
label: xxx
text: No.  I mean, don't you get insurance when you buy your ticket or something?

name: Ses05M_impro05_F010
label: neu
text: No, you have to buy it now.  It's like thirty dollar extra.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M012
label: fru
text: Well, no one even told me about that.  Like, why would I think to buy insurance?  I was- It's like a three hour flight.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F011
label: neu
text: well, it's something that worth

name: Ses05M_impro05_F012
label: neu
text: yeah, I don't know.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M013
label: fru
text: How can you lose my luggage like from like, in --

name: Ses05M_impro05_F013
label: neu
text: Chances are it's probably just you know -- taking time being um- unloaded from the airplane.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M014
label: xxx
text: -- four hundred miles?

name: Ses05M_impro05_M015
label: fru
text: I should hope so.  You know, I need that today.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F014
label: neu
text: Um, well, there's not much I can do.  I can, you can file this report and we'll call you when it comes in.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M016
label: fru
text: Let me explain to you what the problem is.  My grandfather's remains are in that bag.  And I have to, like, distribute them today.  We're suppose to, you know, throw them out to the sea today.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F015
label: neu
text: wow.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F016
label: neu
text: Wow.  Well, that's really important, obviously.  But, um --

name: Ses05M_impro05_M017
label: fru
text: Yeah.  I mean, if you have a suggestion, like, it would be great to help me out here.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F017
label: neu
text: Uh- Actually, I don't know that that's legal. Um- it is the issue

name: Ses05M_impro05_M018
label: fru
text: Well, I don't care if it's legal.  It's happened.  It's already done.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F018
label: neu
text: Yeah I mean, Your bag might have been confiscated because it's --

name: Ses05M_impro05_M019
label: fru
text: Well, could you tell me if it's been confiscated then.

name: Ses05M_impro05_F019

text: -- it's a biohazard. so- um

name: Ses05M_impro05_M020

text: I mean, some information here would be great.  Some help.  Can you, like, type something in and find out?

name: Ses05M_impro05_F020

text: Yeah.  Let me just call security.

name: Ses05M_impro05_M021

text: That would be great.  Thank you very much.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M000

text: What's wrong Melissa?

name: Ses05F_impro06_F000

label: sad

name: Ses05F_impro06_F001
label: sad
text: Oh they had some pretty progressive cancer,

name: Ses05F_impro06_F002
label: sad
text: metastasized and it was old and they knew that it wasn't looking good, but-

name: Ses05F_impro06_M002
label: sad
text: That's the worst.  I'm so sorry.  Did you know him well?

name: Ses05F_impro06_F003
label: sad
text: Yeah.  We were.  Pretty close.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F004
label: sad
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses05F_impro06_M003
label: sad
text: I am so sorry,  It's-

name: Ses05F_impro06_M004
label: sad
text: It's the worst when they go like that. [GARBAGE] Was he young?

name: Ses05F_impro06_F005
label: sad
text: Kind of.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F006
label: sad
text: It's hard to watch when it's painful for them, you know.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M005
label: sad
text: Absolutely, absolutely.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M006
label: sad
text: It's the think

name: Ses05F_impro06_F007
label: sad
text: I just, I don't know.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M007
label: sad
text: There's no reason for it.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F008
label: sad
text: I know.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F009

text: And he could of...  He was pretty awesome

name: Ses05F_impro06_M008
label: sad
text: Yeah?  What'd he do?  What did they do?  How'd you know him?

name: Ses05F_impro06_F010

name: Ses05F_impro06_M009

text: yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F011

text: Yeah, he kind of did a lot of things, but we acted together, sometimes.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F012
label: sad
text: I feel really bad for his family, you know.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M011
label: sad
text: Yes of course, of course.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F013
label: sad
text: It must be really, really hard to lose a child.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M012
label: neu
text: Was he very close to his family?

name: Ses05F_impro06_F014
label: sad
text: Yeah.  And they were really supportive, like through the whole process, but-

name: Ses05F_impro06_M013
label: neu
text: yeah.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F015
label: sad
text: [BREATHING]

name: Ses05F_impro06_F016
label: sad
text: I can't imagine what his- what his parents are going through.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M014
label: sad
text: Of course not.  You have no idea what it's like to lose a kid.

name: Ses05F_impro06_F017
label: sad
text: Yeah, I'm just going to miss him.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M015
label: xxx
text: Of course. If there's anything I can do, you just let me know.  Okay?

name: Ses05F_impro06_F018
label: sad
text: Thank you.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M016
label: xxx
text: Of course.

label: neu

text: Yeah, they're going to do some sort of memorial service or something.

label: sad

name: Ses05F_impro06_M019

label: sad
text: something happens and they die and it's like-

name: Ses05F_impro06_F023

text: really hard to imagine that like you're going to continue to live, and that person's just going to have stopped.

name: Ses05F_impro06_M020
label: sad

name: Ses05F_impro06_M021
label: neu

text: yeah.
